tika-s0104t:10_0: Yo desetvāna saddhammaṃ, gambhīraṃ duddasaṃ varaṃ;
tika-s0104t:15_0: Saṃvaṇṇanā yā ca tassā, vaṇṇanā sādhuvaṇṇitā. 3.
tika-s0104t:20_0: Saṅkhepattā ca sotūhi, sammā ñātuṃ sudukkarā;
tika-s0104t:31_2: mahāveyyākaraṇoyamācariyo saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmapayojanādividhānāni karonto paṭhamaṃ tāva
tika-s0104t:31_4: Ettha ca saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇappayojanaṃ tattha tattha bahudhā papañcenti ācariyā.
tika-s0104t:32_0: “Saṃvaṇṇanārambhe satthari paṇāmakaraṇaṃ dhammassa svākkhātabhāvena satthari pasādajananatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t:32_2: Tadubhayappasādā hi mahato atthassa siddhi hotī”ti.
tika-s0104t:33_4: Atha vā “saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayavandanā saṃvaṇṇetabbassa dhammassa pabhavanissayavisuddhipaṭivedanatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t:33_6: taṃ sammadeva tesaṃ uggahaṇadhāraṇādikkamaladdhabbāya sammāpaṭipattiyā sabbahitasukhanipphādanattha”nti.
tika-s0104t:33_10: āyatiṃ paresaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanato ca saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmakiriyā”ti.
tika-s0104t:33_11: Atha vā “catugambhīrabhāvayuttaṃ dhammavinayaṃ saṃvaṇṇetukāmassa mahāsamuddaṃ ogāhantassa viya paññāveyyattiyasamannāgatassāpi
tika-s0104t:33_15: Atha vā “asattharipi satthābhinivesassa lokassa yathābhūtaṃ satthari eva sammāsambuddhe satthusambhāvanatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t:33_17: ‘tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā attano dahatī’ti ca vuttadosapariharaṇatthaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ paṇāmakiriyā”ti.
tika-s0104t:33_18: Atha vā “buddhassa bhagavato paṇāmavidhānena sammāsambuddhabhāvādhigamāya buddhayānaṃ paṭipajjantānaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t:33_19: saddhammassa ca paṇāmavidhānena paccekabuddhabhāvādhigamāya paccekabuddhayānaṃ paṭipajjantānaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t:33_20: saṅghassa ca paṇāmavidhānena paramatthasaṅghabhāvādhigamāya sāvakayānaṃ paṭipajjantānaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ paṇāmakiriyā”ti.
tika-s0104t:33_23: bahumatāni ca bhavantīti evaṃladdhikānaṃ cittaparitosanatthaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ paṇāmakiriyā”ti.
tika-s0104t:33_24: Atha vā “sotujanānaṃ yathāvuttapaṇāmena anantarāyena uggahaṇadhāraṇādinipphādanatthaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ paṇāmakiriyā.
tika-s0104t:33_25: Sotujanānuggahameva hi padhānaṃ katvā ācariyehi saṃvaṇṇanārambhe thutipaṇāmaparidīpakāni vākyāni nikkhipīyanti,
tika-s0104t:33_26: itarathā vināpi taṃ nikkhepaṃ kāyamanopaṇāmeneva yathādhippetappayojanasiddhito kimetena ganthagāravakaraṇenā”ti ca evamādinā.
tika-s0104t:33_28: tasmā saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇaṃ yathāpaṭiññātasaṃvaṇṇanāya anantarāyena parisamāpanatthanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:33_32: Ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇañhi yathāpaṭiññātasaṃvaṇṇanāya anantarāyena parisamāpanatthaṃ ratanattayapūjāya paññāpāṭavabhāvato,
tika-s0104t:34_1: nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t:36_0: “Ujugatacitto kho pana mahānāma ariyasāvako labhati atthavedaṃ,
tika-s0104t:37_0: Samādhissa ca paññāya padaṭṭhānabhāvo “samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti vuttoyeva.
tika-s0104t:37_1: Tato evaṃ paṭubhūtāya paññāya khedamabhibhuyya paṭiññātaṃ saṃvaṇṇanaṃ samāpayissati.
tika-s0104t:37_4: Atha vā ratanattayapūjāya āyuvaṇṇasukhabalavaḍḍhanato anantarāyena parisamāpanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:39_0: Cattāro dhammā vaḍḍhanti, āyu vaṇṇo sukhaṃ bala”nti. ;
tika-s0104t:40_0: Tato āyuvaṇṇasukhabalavuddhiyā hotveva kāriyaniṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ “ratanattayapūjāya āyu…pe…
tika-s0104t:40_2: Atha vā ratanattayapūjāya paṭibhānāparihānāvahattā anantarāyena parisamāpanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:41_9: sovacassatā”ti tato paṭibhānāparihānena hotveva yathāpaṭiññātaparisamāpananti vuttaṃ “ratanattaya…pe…
tika-s0104t:41_11: Atha vā pasādavatthūsu pūjāya puññātisayabhāvato anantarāyena parisamāpanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:45_0: Na sakkā puññaṃ saṅkhātuṃ, imettamapi kenacī”ti. ;
tika-s0104t:49_0: Upāyesu ca paṭipannassa hotveva kāriyaniṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ “pasādavatthūsu…pe…
tika-s0104t:49_2: Evaṃ ratanattayapūjā niratisayapuññakkhettasambuddhiyā aparimeyyappabhāvo puññātisayoti bahuvidhantarāyepi
tika-s0104t:49_5: Tasmā suvuttaṃ “saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇaṃ yathāpaṭiññātasaṃvaṇṇanāya anantarāyena parisamāpanatthanti veditabba”nti.
tika-s0104t:50_0: Evaṃ pana sapayojanaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmaṃ kattukāmo buddharatanamūlakattā sesaratanānaṃ paṭhamaṃ tassa paṇāmaṃ kātumāha –
tika-s0104t:50_7: candakiraṇasamuppāditapīṇito loko viya saṅgho”ti evamādīhi aṭṭhakathāyamāgataupamāhi vibhāvetabbo.
tika-s0104t:50_8: Atha vā sabbasattānaṃ aggoti katvā paṭhamaṃ buddho,
tika-s0104t:50_13: “Sabbasattānaṃ vā hite viniyojakoti katvā paṭhamaṃ buddho,
tika-s0104t:50_15: hitādhigamāya paṭipanno adhigatahito cāti katvā tadanantaraṃ saṅgho vutto”ti aṭṭhakathāgatanayena anupubbatā veditabbā.
tika-s0104t:51_0: Buddharatanapaṇāmañca karonto kevalapaṇāmato thomanāpubbaṅgamovasātisayoti “karuṇāsītalahadaya”ntiādipadehi thomanāpubbaṅgamataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:51_4: tena cassa khettaṅgatassa paṇāmassa yathādhippetanipphattihetubhāvo dassitoti.
tika-s0104t:51_8: nāpi abhidhammadesanā viya paññāppadhānāti tadubhayappadhānameva thomanamārabhati.
tika-s0104t:51_15: Vinayadesanā hi āsayādinirapekkhakevalakaruṇāya pākatikasattenāpi asotabbārahaṃ suṇanto,
tika-s0104t:51_18: Tathā hi ukkaṃsapariyantagatahirottappopi bhagavā lokiyasādhujanehipi pariharitabbāni “sikharaṇī,
tika-s0104t:51_21: taṃtaṃsikkhāpadapaññatti kāraṇāpekkhāya ca verañjādīsu sārīrikaṃ khedamanubhosi.
tika-s0104t:51_22: Tasmā kiñcāpi bhūmantarapaccayākārasamayantarakathānaṃ viya vinayapaññattiyāpi samuṭṭhāpikā paññā anaññasādhāraṇatāya atisayakiccavatī,
tika-s0104t:51_23: karuṇāya kiccaṃ pana tatopi adhikanti vinayadesanāya karuṇāppadhānatā vuttā.
tika-s0104t:51_25: abhidhammadesanā pana kevalapaññāppadhānā paramatthadhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvapaṭivedhasamatthāya paññāya tattha sātisayappavattito.
tika-s0104t:51_26: Suttantadesanā pana karuṇāpaññāppadhānā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ āsayānusayādhimutticaritādibhedaparicchindanasamatthāya
tika-s0104t:51_27: paññāya sattesu ca mahākaruṇāya tattha sātisayappavattito.
tika-s0104t:51_28: Suttantadesanāya hi mahākaruṇāya samāpattibahulo vineyyasantāne tadajjhāsayānulomena gambhīramatthapadaṃ patiṭṭhapesi.
tika-s0104t:51_29: Tasmā ārambhānurūpaṃ karuṇāpaññāppadhānameva thomanaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:52_7: Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ kampanaṃ hadayakhedaṃ karotīti vā karuṇā.
tika-s0104t:52_10: Esā hi paradukkhāpanayanakāmatālakkhaṇā attasukhanirapekkhatāya kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ rundhati vibandhatīti,
tika-s0104t:52_16: hadayaṃ vā te phālessāmī”ti ettha uro “hadaya”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:52_18: “hadayā hadayaṃ maññe aññāya tacchatī”ti ettha cittaṃ,
tika-s0104t:52_20: Attano sabhāvaṃ vā haratīti hadayaṃ, ra-
tika-s0104t:53_1: byāpādādīnaṃ ujuvipaccanīkatāya ca sattasantānagatasantāpavicchedanākārappavattiyā mettāmuditānampi cittasītalabhāvakāraṇatā upalabbhati,
tika-s0104t:53_2: tathāpi paradukkhāpanayanākārappavattiyā parūpatāpāsahanarasā avihiṃsābhūtā karuṇāva visesena bhagavato
tika-s0104t:53_3: cittassa cittapassaddhi viya sītibhāvanimittanti tassāyeva cittasītalabhāvakāraṇatā vuttā.
tika-s0104t:53_4: Karuṇāmukhena vā mettāmuditānampi hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇatā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:53_8: niravasesañca sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ viya savisayabyāpitāya mahākaruṇābhāvamupagatā anaññasādhāraṇasātisayabhāvappattā
tika-s0104t:53_10: Atha vā satipi mettāmuditānaṃ paresaṃ hitopasaṃhārasukhādiaparihānijjhānasabhāvatāya sātisaye hadayasītalabhāvanibandhanatte
tika-s0104t:53_11: sakalabuddhaguṇavisesakāraṇatāya tāsampi kāraṇanti karuṇāya eva hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇatā vuttā.
tika-s0104t:53_16: Tīsu cettha vikappesu paṭhame vikappe avisesabhūtā buddhabhūmigatā,
tika-s0104t:53_18: tatiye paṭhamābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya tīsupi avatthāsu pavattā bhagavato karuṇā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:54_4: Sāyeva ñeyyāvaraṇappahānato pakārehi dhammasabhāvajotanaṭṭhena pajjototi paññāpajjoto.
tika-s0104t:54_5: Paññavato hi ekapallaṅkenapi nisinnassa dasasahassilokadhātu ekapajjotā hoti.
tika-s0104t:54_21: Sveva visayasabhāvapaṭicchādanato andhakārasarikkhatāya tamo viyāti mohatamo.
tika-s0104t:54_22: Satipi tamasaddassa sadisakappanamantarena avijjāvācakatte mohasaddasannidhānena tabbisesakatāvettha yuttāti sadisakappanā.
tika-s0104t:55_0: Nanu ca sabbesampi khīṇāsavānaṃ paññāpajjotena avijjandhakārahatatā sambhavati,
tika-s0104t:55_1: atha kasmā aññasādhāraṇāvisesaguṇena bhagavato thomanā vuttāti?
tika-s0104t:55_3: Sabbesampi hi khīṇāsavānaṃ paññāpajjotahatāvijjandhakārattepi sati saddhādhimuttehi viya diṭṭhippattānaṃ
tika-s0104t:55_4: sāvakapaccekabuddhehi sammāsambuddhānaṃ savāsanappahānena kilesappahānassa viseso vijjatevāti.
tika-s0104t:55_5: Atha vā paropadesamantarena attano santāne accantaṃ avijjandhakāravigamassa nipphāditattā (nibbattitattā ma. ni. ṭī. 1.1),
tika-s0104t:55_6: tattha ca sabbaññutāya balesu ca vasībhāvassa samadhigatattā,
tika-s0104t:55_9: Imasmiñca atthavikappe paññāpajjotapadena sasantānagatamohavidhamanā paṭivedhapaññā ceva parasantānagatamohavidhamanā
tika-s0104t:55_12: Na tu purimasmiṃ atthavikappe viya paṭivedhapaññāyevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:56_4: Imasmiṃ pana atthavikappe mohatamavidhamanante adhigatattā anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ kāraṇūpacārena sakasantāne mohatamavidhamananti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:56_6: parasantāne pana mohatamavidhamanassa kāraṇabhāvato phalūpacārena anāvaraṇañāṇameva mohatamavidhamananti vuccati.
tika-s0104t:56_11: visayappavattimukhena pana aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ dvidhā katvā chaḷāsādhāraṇañāṇabhede vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:57_0: Kiṃ panettha kāraṇaṃ avijjāsamugghātoyeveko pahānasampattivasena bhagavato thomanāya gayhati,
tika-s0104t:57_2: tappahānavacaneneva hi tadekaṭṭhatāya sakalasaṃkilesasamugghātassa jotitabhāvato niravasesakilesappahānamettha gayhati.
tika-s0104t:57_7: saṃsārappavattiyā ca avijjāyeva padhānakāraṇanti tabbighātavacaneneva sakalasaṃkilesasamugghātavacanasiddhito soyeveko gayhatīti.
tika-s0104t:57_8: Atha vā sakalasaṃkilesadhammānaṃ muddhabhūtattā avijjāya taṃ samugghātoyeveko gayhati. Yathāha –
tika-s0104t:60_0: Sanarāmaralokagarunti ettha pana paṭhamapakatiyā avibhāgena sattopi naroti vuccati,
tika-s0104t:60_3: “Yathā hi paṭhamapakatibhūto satto itarāya pakatiyā seṭṭhaṭṭhena pure uccaṭṭhāne seti pavattatīti purisoti vuccati,
tika-s0104t:60_5: Puttabhātubhūtopi hi puggalo mātujeṭṭhabhaginīnaṃ pituṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0104t:60_11: amarehi cāti sanarāmaro.Garati uggacchati uggato pākaṭo bhavatīti garu,
tika-s0104t:64_2: gurūti ca dvidhā gahetvā bhāriyavācakatte garusaddo,
tika-s0104t:64_5: Pāḷivisaye hi sabbesampi yathāvuttānamatthānaṃ vācakatte garusaddoyevicchitabbo akārassa ākārabhāvena
tika-s0104t:64_7: Sakkatabhāsāvisaye pana gurusaddoyevicchitabbo ukārassa vuddhibhāvena aññathā taddhitantapadassa dassanatoti.
tika-s0104t:64_8: Sanarāmaro ca so loko cāti sanarāmaraloko,
tika-s0104t:64_14: Atthato hi dīghāyukāpi samānā yathāparicchedaṃ maraṇasabhāvattā marūti devā vuccanti.
tika-s0104t:64_15: Etena devamanussānaṃ viya tadavasiṭṭhasattānampi yathārahaṃ guṇavisesāvahatāya bhagavato upakārakataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:64_20: añño atthakkamoti saddakkamānusārena padhānāpadhānabhāvo na codetabbo.
tika-s0104t:64_21: Edisesu hi samāsapadesu padhānampi appadhānaṃ viya niddisīyati yathā taṃ “sarājikāya parisāyā”ti,
tika-s0104t:69_1: garubhāvassa pana adhippetattā garukaraṇasamatthasseva yujjanato sattalokavasena attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0104t:69_7: samūhattho ettha lokasaddo samudāyavasena lokīyati paññāpīyatīti katvā.
tika-s0104t:69_12: Amarasaddena cettha upapattidevā viya visuddhidevāpi saṅgayhanti.
tika-s0104t:69_14: Imasmiṃ pana atthavikappe narāmarānameva gahaṇaṃ ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena yathā “satthā devamanussāna”nti.
tika-s0104t:69_15: Tathā hi sabbānatthaparihānapubbaṅgamāya niravasesahitasukhavidhānatapparāya niratisayāya payogasampattiyā,
tika-s0104t:69_16: sadevamanussāya pajāya accantamupakāritāya aparimitanirupamappabhāvaguṇasamaṅgitāya ca sabbasattuttamo
tika-s0104t:69_17: bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ uttamamanaññasādhāraṇaṃ gāravaṭṭhānanti.
tika-s0104t:69_19: padhānabhūtaṃ pana lokaṃ dassetuṃ purisaliṅgena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:69_20: Neruttikā pana avisesanicchitaṭṭhāne tathā niddiṭṭhamicchanti yathā “narā nāgā ca gandhabbā,
tika-s0104t:75_10: Bhagavato hi vineyyajanopasaṅkamanaṃ ekantena tesaṃ hitasukhanipphādanato sobhanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:75_17: Atha vā “sayambhūñāṇena sakalampi lokaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena parijānanto sammā gato avagatoti sugato.
tika-s0104t:75_22: Tathā lokasamudayaṃ pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammatamāpādento sammā gato atītoti sugato.
tika-s0104t:75_23: Lokanirodhaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato adhigatoti sugato.
tika-s0104t:75_24: Lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā gato paṭipannoti sugato,
tika-s0104t:75_26: te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatī’ti sugatotiādinā niddesanayena vibhāvetabbo.
tika-s0104t:76_3: Bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ yathārahaṃ kālayuttameva vācaṃ vineyyānaṃ sammā gadatīti vā sugato, da-
tika-s0104t:76_10: sakalassāpi bhavagāmikammassa ariyamaggādhigamena avipākārahabhāvakaraṇena nivattitattā pañcahipi tāhi visaṃyutto hutvā muttoti gativimutto.
tika-s0104t:76_11: Uddhamuddhabhavagāmino hi devā taṃtaṃkammavipākadānakālānurūpena tato tato bhavato muttāpi muttamattāva,
tika-s0104t:76_15: Bhagavā pana yathāvuttappakārena visaṃyutto hutvā muttoti.
tika-s0104t:76_16: Tasmā anena bhagavato katthacipi gatiyā apariyāpannataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:79_0: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. ;
tika-s0104t:80_0: Taṃtaṃgatisaṃvattanakānañhi kammakilesānaṃ mahābodhimūleyeva aggamaggena pahīnattā natthi bhagavato taṃtaṃgatipariyāpannatāti
tika-s0104t:80_2: Atha vā kāmaṃ saupādisesāyapi nibbānadhātuyā tāhi gatīhi vimutto,
tika-s0104t:80_3: esā pana “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti etthevantogadhāti iminā padena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyāva thometīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:81_0: Ettha pana attahitasampattiparahitapaṭipattivasena dvīhākārehi bhagavato thomanā katā hoti.
tika-s0104t:81_4: lābhasakkārādinirapekkhacittassa pana sabbadukkhaniyyānikadhammadesanāpayogato devadattādīsupi viruddhasattesu niccaṃ hitajjhāsayatā,
tika-s0104t:81_7: parahitapaṭipatti tividhā ca attahitasampatti imāya gāthāya yathārahaṃ pakāsitā hoti.
tika-s0104t:82_0: Atha vā hetuphalasattūpakāravasena tīhākārehi thomanā katā.
tika-s0104t:82_14: rūpakāyasampadā sobhanakāyagamanatthena sugatasaddena lakkhaṇānubyañjanapāripūriyā vinā tadabhāvato.
tika-s0104t:82_16: sā pana sammā gadanatthena sugatasaddena pakāsitāti veditabbā.
tika-s0104t:83_1: tappaṭipattiyādayo aneke buddhaguṇā ācariyena pakāsitā honti.
tika-s0104t:83_3: yadidaṃ yena kenaci pakārena atthantaraviññāpanaṃ. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0104t:83_5: Mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso hi bhagavā saṃsārapaṅkato sattānaṃ samuddharaṇatthaṃ katābhinīhāro anupubbena
tika-s0104t:83_6: pāramiyo pūretvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhimadhigatoti karuṇā sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṃ.
tika-s0104t:83_10: Sammā gamanatthena sugatasaddena sammāsambodhiyā paṭipattiṃ dasseti līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanakāmasukhattakilamathānuyogasassatucchedābhinivesādiantadvayarahitāya
tika-s0104t:83_15: Tesu ca padhānena payojanena parahitapaṭipattiṃ dasseti,
tika-s0104t:83_17: tadubhayena ca attahitapaṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu bhagavato catutthapuggalabhāvaṃ pakāseti.
tika-s0104t:84_0: Apica karuṇāggahaṇena lokiyesu mahaggatabhāvappattāsādhāraṇaguṇadīpanato sabbalokiyaguṇasampatti dassitā,
tika-s0104t:84_5: Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena lokasamaññānurūpaṃ bhagavato pavattiṃ dasseti lokavohāravisayattā karuṇāya,
tika-s0104t:84_7: Sabhāvānavabodhena hi dhammānaṃ sabhāvaṃ atidhāvitvā sattādiparāmasanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:84_21: sattasattati ñāṇavatthūnīti evamādīnaṃ anekesaṃ paññāpabhedānaṃ vasena ñāṇacāraṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:84_37: paññāggahaṇena sabbadhammesu virattacittatā dassitā hoti sabbesañca buddhaguṇānaṃ karuṇā ādi tannidānabhāvato,
tika-s0104t:84_39: Iti ādipariyosānadassanena sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti.
tika-s0104t:84_40: Tathā karuṇāggahaṇena sīlakkhandhapubbaṅgamo samādhikkhandho dassito hoti.
tika-s0104t:84_46: paññā pariyosānanti evampi ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti nayato dassitattā.
tika-s0104t:84_47: Eso eva hi niravasesato buddhaguṇānaṃ dassanupāyo,
tika-s0104t:84_49: aññathā ko nāma samattho bhagavato guṇe anupadaṃ niravasesato dassetuṃ.
tika-s0104t:89_0: Teneva ca āyasmatā sāriputtattherenāpi buddhaguṇaparicchedanaṃ pati bhagavatā anuyuttena “no hetaṃ bhante”ti
tika-s0104t:89_1: paṭikkhipitvā “api ca me bhante dhammanvayo vidito”ti sampasādanīyasutte vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:90_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepena sakalasabbaññuguṇehi bhagavato thomanāpubbaṅgamaṃ paṇāmaṃ katvā idāni saddhammassāpi
tika-s0104t:90_4: saha pubbabhāgapaṭipattidhammena vā ariyamaggabhūtaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā ceva yaṃ phalanibbānasaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ,
tika-s0104t:90_5: pariyattidhammapaṭipattidhammehi vā saha phalanibbānabhūtaṃ dhammaṃ sacchikatvā ca sammāsambodhisaṅkhātaṃ buddhabhāvamupagato,
tika-s0104t:91_1: Bodhetā pajāyāti buddho”tiādinā niddesanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:91_2: Atha vā aggamaggañāṇādhigamena savāsanāya sammohaniddāya accantavigamanato,
tika-s0104t:91_4: Atha vā kassacipi ñeyyadhammassa anavabuddhassa abhāvena ñeyyavisesassa kammabhāvāgahaṇato kammavacanicchāyābhāvena
tika-s0104t:91_7: Padesaggahaṇe hi asati gahetabbassa nippadesatāva viññāyati yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti.
tika-s0104t:91_8: Evañca katvā kammavisesānapekkhā kattari eva buddhasaddasiddhi veditabbā,
tika-s0104t:91_9: atthato pana pāramitāparibhāvito sayambhuñāṇena saha vāsanāya vihataviddhastaniravasesakilesomahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādiaparimeyyaguṇagaṇādhāro
tika-s0104t:92_0: “Buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi,
tika-s0104t:93_1: tena evaṃ guṇavisesayutto sopi nāma bhagavā īdisaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā,
tika-s0104t:93_3: kā nāma kathā aññesaṃ sāvakādibhāvamupagamaneti dhamme sambhāvanaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0104t:94_0: “Yena yena nimittena, buddhi saddo ca vattate;
tika-s0104t:96_2: Sacchikatvāti paccakkhaṃ katvā. Ceva- saddo ca-
tika-s0104t:96_4: Tena hi saddadvayena na kevalaṃ bhagavā dhammassa bhāvanāmattena buddhabhāvamupagato,
tika-s0104t:96_10: Vītamalanti ettha virahavasena eti pavattatīti vīto,
tika-s0104t:96_15: evaṃ sati saupasaggo viya anupasaggopi gatasaddo virahatthavācako veditabbo dhātūnamanekatthattā.
tika-s0104t:96_21: saṃsārato ca apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo,
tika-s0104t:96_24: sacchikiriyāsammasanapariyāyassa ca labbhamānattā pariyattidhammopi idha saṅgahito.
tika-s0104t:96_26: tīṇi piṭakāni sammasī”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:96_27: tathā “yaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā sacchikatvā”ti ca vuttattā bhāvanāsacchikiriyāyogyatāya buddhakaradhammabhūtāhi
tika-s0104t:96_28: pāramitāhi saha pubbabhāgaadhisīlasikkhādayopi idha saṅgahitāti veditabbā.
tika-s0104t:96_35: kappānaṃ satasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ niravasesaṃ bhāvanāsacchikiriyāhi
tika-s0104t:96_37: bhagavā paccayākāre catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassamukhena mahāvajirañāṇaṃ pesetvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhisaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0104t:97_0: Imāya pana gāthāya vijjāvimuttisampadādīhi anekehi guṇehi yathārahaṃ saddhammaṃ thometi. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0104t:97_21: Atha vā “yaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā buddhabhāvaṃ upagato”ti etena svākkhātatāya dhammaṃ thometi,
tika-s0104t:97_27: Paṭhamena vā saha pubbabhāgasīlādīhi sekkhehi sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhehi,
tika-s0104t:97_28: dutiyena saha asaṅkhatadhātuyā asekkhehi dhammaṃ thometi.
tika-s0104t:98_0: “Vītamala”nti iminā pana saṃkilesābhāvadīpanena visuddhatāya dhammaṃ thometi,
tika-s0104t:99_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepeneva sabbasaddhammaguṇehi saddhammassāpi thomanāpubbaṅgamaṃ paṇāmaṃ katvā idāni ariyasaṅghassāpi
tika-s0104t:99_6: attajo khettajo antevāsiko dinnakoti catubbidhesu puttesu attajā,
tika-s0104t:99_8: Yathā hi manussānaṃ orasaputtā attajātatāya pitusantakassa dāyajjassa visesabhāgino honti,
tika-s0104t:99_9: evametepi saddhammasavanante ariyāya jātiyā jātatāya bhagavato santakassa vimuttisukhassa dhammaratanassa ca dāyajjassa visesabhāginoti.
tika-s0104t:99_10: Atha vā bhagavato dhammadesanānubhāvena ariyabhūmiṃ okkamamānā,
tika-s0104t:99_11: okkantā ca ariyasāvakā bhagavato ure vāyāmajanitābhijātatāya sadisakappanamantarena nippariyāyeneva “orasā”ti vattabbatamarahanti.
tika-s0104t:99_13: vajjānucintanena ca hadaye katvā vajjato nivāretvā anavajje patiṭṭhāpentena sīlādidhammasarīraposanena saṃvaḍḍhāpitā.
tika-s0104t:99_15: tassa me tumhe puttā orasā mukhato jātā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:99_18: lakkhaṇādivisesābhāvato ca “bhagavato dhammadesanā” icceva saṅkhyaṃ gatā,
tika-s0104t:99_20: etena catubbidhesu puttesu ariyasaṅghassa attajaputtabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:99_25: dhammānudhammapaṭipattiyā cittārādhanena ca tappaṭibhāgatāya bhagavato puttā nāma, tesaṃ.
tika-s0104t:100_0: Saṃkilesanimittaṃ hutvā guṇaṃ māreti vibādhatīti māro,
tika-s0104t:100_4: mārañca mārasenañca mathenti vilothentīti mārasenamathanā, tesaṃ.
tika-s0104t:100_10: Nanu ca ariyasāvakānaṃ maggādhigamasamaye bhagavato viya tadantarāyakaraṇatthaṃ devaputtamāro vā mārasenā vā na apasādeti,
tika-s0104t:100_13: Tesañhi apasādetabbatāya kāraṇe saṃkilese vimathite tepi vimathitā nāma hontīti.
tika-s0104t:100_14: Atha vā khandhābhisaṅkhāramārānaṃ viya devaputtamārassāpi guṇamāraṇe sahāyabhāvūpagamanato kilesabalakāyo idha “mārasenā”ti vuccati yathāha bhagavā –
tika-s0104t:101_0: “Kāmā te paṭhamā senā, dutiyā arati vuccati;
tika-s0104t:102_0: Tatiyā khuppipāsā te, catutthī taṇhā pavuccati.
tika-s0104t:103_0: Pañcamaṃ thinamiddhaṃ te, chaṭṭhā bhīrū pavuccati;
tika-s0104t:104_0: Sattamī vicikicchā te, makkho thambho te aṭṭhamo.
tika-s0104t:110_0: Na naṃ asūro jināti, jetvā ca labhate sukha”nti. ;
tika-s0104t:111_7: Apica khandhābhisaṅkhāramaccudevaputtamārānaṃ tesaṃ sahāyabhāvūpagamanatāya senāsaṅkhātassa kilesamārassa
tika-s0104t:111_9: Evañca sati pañcamāranimmathanabhāvena attho paripuṇṇo hoti.
tika-s0104t:111_14: devaputtamārañca samucchedappahānavasena sabbaso appavattikaraṇena kilesamāraṃ mathentīti,
tika-s0104t:112_1: tenasatipi tesaṃ taṃtaṃbhedena anekasatasahassasaṅkhyābhede ariyabhāvakaramaggaphaladhammabhedena imaṃ
tika-s0104t:112_2: gaṇanaparicchedaṃ nātivattanti maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhabhāvānativattanatoti dasseti. Pi- saddo, api-
tika-s0104t:112_3: saddo vā padalīḷādinā kāraṇena aṭṭhāne payutto,
tika-s0104t:112_7: Yadipi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma koci natthi avayavaṃ upādāya samudāyassa vattabbattā,
tika-s0104t:112_8: aviññāyamānasamudāyaṃ pana viññāyamānasamudāyena visesitumarahatīti āha “aṭṭhannampi samūha”nti,
tika-s0104t:112_9: etena “ariyasaṅgha”nti ettha na yena kenaci saṇṭhānādinā,
tika-s0104t:112_19: Atha vā sadevakena lokena saraṇanti araṇīyato upagantabbato,
tika-s0104t:112_22: samaggaṃ vā kammaṃ samudāyavasena samupagatoti saṅgho,
tika-s0104t:112_24: ariyo ca so saṅgho ca yathāvuttanayenāti vā ariyasaṅgho,
tika-s0104t:112_26: Bhagavato aparabhāge buddhadhammaratanānampi samadhigamo saṅgharatanādhīnoti ariyasaṅghassa bahūpakārataṃ dassetuṃ idheva “sirasā vande”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:112_28: Keci pana purimagāthāsupi taṃ padamānetvā yojenti,
tika-s0104t:113_0: Imāya pana gāthāya ariyasaṅghassa pabhavasampadā pahānasampadādayo aneke guṇā dassitā honti. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0104t:113_1: “Sugatassa orasānaṃ puttāna”nti hi etena ariyasaṅghassa pabhavasampadaṃ dasseti sammāsambuddhapabhavatādīpanato.
tika-s0104t:113_5: Atha vā “sugatassa orasānaṃ puttāna”nti ariyasaṅghassa visuddhanissayabhāvadīpanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:113_9: Tathā “sugatassa orasānaṃ puttāna”nti etena ariyasaṅghassa lokuttarasaraṇagamanasabbhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:113_10: Lokuttarasaraṇagamanena hi te bhagavato orasaputtā jātā.
tika-s0104t:113_14: “Aṭṭhannampi samūha”nti etena viddhastavipakkhe sekkhāsekkhadhamme dasseti puggalādhiṭṭhānena maggaphaladhammānaṃ dassitattā.
tika-s0104t:113_18: asekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo pariyosānantiādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā saṅkhepato sabbepi ariyasaṅghaguṇā dassitā hontīti.
tika-s0104t:114_0: Evaṃ gāthāttayena saṅkhepato sakalaguṇasaṃkittanamukhena ratanattayassa paṇāmaṃ katvā idāni taṃ nipaccakāraṃ
tika-s0104t:114_6: Tassa “yaṃ puññaṃ mayā laddha”nti pāṭhasesena sambandho,
tika-s0104t:114_19: Sadisakappanamaññatra pana yathāvuttavacanattheneva buddhādīnaṃ ratanabhāvo yujjati.
tika-s0104t:114_20: Tesañhi “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā yathābhūtaguṇe āvajjantassa amatādhigamahetubhūtaṃ anappakaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppajjati. Yathāha –
tika-s0104t:115_1: nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t:115_4: ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti tathāgataṃ ārabbha.
tika-s0104t:115_5: Ujugatacitto kho pana mahānāma ariyasāvako labhati atthavedaṃ,
tika-s0104t:119_0: Cittīkatabhāvādayo ca anaññasādhāraṇā sātisayato buddhādīsuyeva labbhantīti.
tika-s0104t:119_16: Avayavavinimuttassa pana samudāyassa abhāvato tīṇi eva ratanāni tathā vuccanti,
tika-s0104t:119_21: Vandanā cettha kāyavācācittehi tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇaninnatā,
tika-s0104t:119_23: Apica tassā cetanāya sahajātādopakāreko saddhāpaññāsativīriyādisampayuttadhammo vandanā,
tika-s0104t:120_0: Taṃtaṃsampattiyā vibandhanavasena sattasantānassa antare vemajjhe eti āgacchatīti antarāyo,
tika-s0104t:120_2: Paṇāmapayojane vuttavidhinā suṭṭhu vihato viddhasto antarāyo assāti suvihatantarāyo.
tika-s0104t:123_0: Vuttesu hi atthesu idha sattiyaṃ vattati.
tika-s0104t:123_1: Anu punappunaṃ taṃsamaṅgiṃ bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti hi anubhāvo,
tika-s0104t:123_3: atthato pana yathāladdhasampattinimittakassa purimakammassa balānuppadānavasasaṅkhātā vandanāmayapuññassa sattiyeva,
tika-s0104t:124_0: Ettha pana “pasannamatino”ti etena attano pasādasampattiṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:124_2: tato ca tassa puññassa attano pasādasampattiyā,
tika-s0104t:124_3: ratanattayassa ca khettabhāvasampattiyāti dvīhi aṅgehi atthasaṃvaṇṇanāya upaghātakaupaddavānaṃ vihanane samatthataṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0104t:124_4: Caturaṅgasampattiyā dānacetanā viya hi dvayaṅgasampattiyā paṇāmacetanāpi antarāyavihananena diṭṭhadhammikāti.
tika-s0104t:125_0: Evaṃ ratanattayassa nipaccakārakaraṇe payojanaṃ dassetvā idāni yassā dhammadesanāya atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetukāmo,
tika-s0104t:125_3: yadidaṃ taṃtaṃsaṃvaṇṇanāsu ādito tassa tassa saṃvaṇṇetabbadhammassa visesaguṇakittanena thomanā.
tika-s0104t:128_3: anena “dīgho”ti ayaṃ imassa āgamassa atthānugatā samaññāti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:128_7: paññattito pana suttāni upādāya āgamabhāvassa paññattattā avayavehi suttehi avayavībhūto āgamo aṅkīyati.
tika-s0104t:128_15: Apica āgamasammatehi bāhirakapaveditehi bhāratapurāṇakathānarasīhapurāṇakathādīhi varotipi āgamavaro, tassa.
tika-s0104t:128_17: buddhānaṃ saccapaṭivedhaṃ anugamma paṭividdhasaccā aggasāvakādayo ariyā,
tika-s0104t:128_20: Atha vā buddhā ca anubuddhā ca,
tika-s0104t:128_22: Sammāsambuddheneva hi tiṇṇampi piṭakānaṃ atthasaṃvaṇṇanākkamo bhāsito,
tika-s0104t:128_23: tato paraṃ saṅgāyanādivasena sāvakehīti ācariyā vadanti.
tika-s0104t:128_25: Bhagavatā hi abyākataṃ tantipadaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-s0104t:128_28: Nanu ca sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ tepiṭakaṃ saddhāvahaguṇameva,
tika-s0104t:128_34: anuttariyasuttādīsu visesato buddhaguṇavibhāvanena ratanattaye sātisayaṃ saddhaṃ āvahatīti.
tika-s0104t:129_0: Evaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbadhammassa abhitthavanampi katvā idāni saṃvaṇṇanāya sampati vakkhamānāya āgamanavisuddhiṃ dassetuṃ “atthappakāsanattha”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:129_1: Imāya hi gāthāya saṅgītittayamāruḷhadīghāgamaṭṭhakathātova sīhaḷabhāsāmattaṃ vinā ayaṃ vakkhamānasaṃvaṇṇanā āgatā, nāññato,
tika-s0104t:129_5: paramanipuṇagambhīraṃ buddhavisayamāgamavaraṃ attano baleneva vaṇṇayissāmīti aññehi vattumpi asakkuṇeyyattā
tika-s0104t:129_7: Imāya hi pubbācariyānubhāvaṃ nissāyeva tassa atthaṃ vaṇṇayissāmīti attano saṃvaṇṇanānissayaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:129_23: Akkharacintakāpi hi “tathānaṃṭṭha yuga”nti lakkhaṇaṃ vatvā idamevudāharanti.
tika-s0104t:132_5: Yā saṅgītāti yā aṭṭhakathā atthaṃ pakāsetuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne “ayametassa attho,
tika-s0104t:132_7: Anusaṅgītā ca pacchāpīti na kevalaṃ paṭhamasaṅgītiyameva,
tika-s0104t:132_9: Na ca pañcahi vasisatehi ādito saṅgītāyeva,
tika-s0104t:132_10: api tu yasattherādīhi anusaṅgītā cāti saha samuccayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:133_0: Atha porāṇaṭṭhakathāya vijjamānāya kimetāya adhunā puna katāya saṃvaṇṇanāyāti punaruttiyā,
tika-s0104t:133_1: niratthakatāya ca dosaṃ samanussaritvā taṃ pariharanto “sīhaḷadīpa”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:133_2: Taṃ pariharaṇeneva hi imissā saṃvaṇṇanāya nimittaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:133_3: Tattha sīhaṃ lāti gaṇhātīti sīhaḷo la-
tika-s0104t:133_13: dvidhā vā āpo ettha sandatīti dipo,
tika-s0104t:133_19: Tadatthasambandhatāya pana purimagāthāya “kāmañca saṅgītā anusaṅgītā cā”ti sānuggahatthayojanā sambhavati.
tika-s0104t:133_26: Sā hi dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi paṭhamaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni saṅgāyitvā tassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanānurūpeneva vācanāmaggaṃ āropitattā tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhāyeva,
tika-s0104t:133_28: pacchā pana tambapaṇṇiyehi mahātherehi nikāyantaraladdhisaṅkarapariharaṇatthaṃ sīhaḷabhāsāya ṭhapitāti.
tika-s0104t:133_30: Tathā “dīpavāsīnamatthāyā”ti idampi “ṭhapitā”ti ca “apanetvā āropento”ti ca etehi padehi sambajjhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:133_39: Sīhaḷabhāsā nāma anekakkharehi ekatthassāpi voharaṇato paresaṃ voharituṃ atidukkarā kañcukasadisā sīhaḷānaṃ samudāciṇṇā bhāsā.
tika-s0104t:134_1: adhunā kariyamānā pana aṭṭhakathā kathaṃ karīyatīti anuyoge sati imissā aṭṭhakathāya karaṇappakāraṃ dassetumāha “apanetvānā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:134_2: Tattha tato mūlaṭṭhakathāto sīhaḷabhāsaṃ apanetvā potthake anāropitabhāvena niraṅkaritvāti sambandho,
tika-s0104t:134_3: etena ayaṃ vakkhamānā aṭṭhakathā saṅgītittayamāropitāya mūlaṭṭhakathāya sīhaḷabhāsāpanayanamattamaññatra
tika-s0104t:134_4: atthato saṃsandati ceva sameti ca yathā “gaṅgodakena yamunodaka”nti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:134_6: Sabhāvaniruttibhāvena hi paṇḍitānaṃ manaṃ ramayatīti manoramā.
tika-s0104t:134_10: nānātthavisayaṃ vā kaṅkhaṃ taranti etāyāti tanti, pāḷi.
tika-s0104t:134_11: Tassā nayasaṅkhātāya gatiyā chaviṃ chāyaṃ anugatāti tantinayānucchavikā.
tika-s0104t:137_0: Vuttaṃ pāḷigatibhāsaṃ potthake likhanavasena āropentoti attho, iminā saddadosābhāvamāha.
tika-s0104t:138_2: Aviruddhattā eva hi te theravādāpi idha pakāsayissanti.
tika-s0104t:139_0: “Yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, ahiṃsā saṃyamo damo;
tika-s0104t:141_2: tappariyāpannā hutvā āgamādhigamasampannattā paññāpajjotena tassa samujjalanato taṃ pakārena dīpenti,
tika-s0104t:141_6: suṭṭhu nipuṇo saṇho vinicchayo etesanti sunipuṇavinicchayā.
tika-s0104t:141_9: suṭṭhu nipuṇo cheko vinicchayo etesanti sunipuṇavinicchayā.
tika-s0104t:141_15: tatoyeva aviparito saṇhasukhumo vinicchayoti mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ samayassa pamāṇabhūtataṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānavasena dasseti.
tika-s0104t:142_0: Hitvā punappunabhatamatthanti ekattha vutampi puna aññattha ābhatamatthaṃ punaruttibhāvato,
tika-s0104t:142_1: ganthagarukabhāvato ca cajitvā tassa āgamavarassa atthaṃ pakāsayissāmīti attho.
tika-s0104t:143_0: Evaṃ karaṇappakārampi dassetvā “dīpavāsīnamatthāyā”ti vuttappayojanato aññampi saṃvaṇṇanāya payojanaṃ dassetuṃ “sujanassa cā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:143_5: Teneva ca tambapaṇṇidīpavāsīnampi atthāyāti ayamattho siddho hoti uggahaṇādisukaratāya tesampi bahūpakārattā.
tika-s0104t:143_9: pariyattidhammassa vā pañcavassasahassaparimāṇaṃ cirakālaṃ ṭhitatthañcāti samuccayatthameva dasseti.
tika-s0104t:143_10: Pariyattidhammassa hi ṭhitiyā paṭipattidhammapaṭivedhadhammānampi ṭhiti hoti tasseva tesaṃ mūlabhāvato.
tika-s0104t:143_16: tadatthassa ca sunikkhittassa upāyabhāvamupādāya vuttaṃ “ciraṭṭhitatthañca dhammassā”ti.
tika-s0104t:144_0: “Dveme bhikkhave dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṃvattanti.
tika-s0104t:145_0: Evaṃ payojanampi dassetvā vakkhamānāya saṃvaṇṇanāya mahattapariccāgena ganthagarukabhāvaṃ pariharitumāha “sīlakathā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:145_4: tadekadesabhāvena visuddhimaggo gahetabboti kathikānaṃ upadesaṃ karonto tattha vicāritadhamme uddesavasena dassetumāha “sīlakathā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:145_7: Kammaṭṭhānānīti bhāvanāsaṅkhātassa yogakammassa pavattiṭṭhānattā kammaṭṭhānanāmāni dhammajātāni.
tika-s0104t:145_8: Tāni pana pāḷiyamāgatāni aṭṭhatiṃ seva na gahetabbāni,
tika-s0104t:145_9: atha kho aṭṭhakathāyamāgatānipi dveti ñāpetuṃ “sabbānipī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:145_10: Cari yāvidhānasahitoti rāgacaritādīnaṃ sabhāvādividhānena saha pavatto,
tika-s0104t:146_0: Lokiyalokuttarabhedānaṃ channampi abhiññānaṃ gahaṇatthaṃ “sabbā ca abhiññāyo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:146_1: Ñāṇavibhaṅgādīsu āgatanayena ekavidhādinā bhedena paññāya saṅkalayitvā sampiṇḍetvā,
tika-s0104t:147_7: Paṭisambhidādīsu āgatanayaṃ avissajjitvāva vicāritattā avimutto tantimaggo yassāti avimuttatanti maggā.
tika-s0104t:147_8: Maggoti cettha pāḷisaṅkhāto upāyo taṃtadatthānaṃ avabodhassa,
tika-s0104t:148_5: vattabbassa ca avuttassa avasesassa abhāvato suviññeyyabhāvena suparisuddhaṃ,
tika-s0104t:148_11: Etaṃ sabbaṃ idha aṭṭhakathāya na vicārayissāmi punaruttibhāvato,
tika-s0104t:148_13: Vicarayissāmīti ca gāthābhāvato na vuddhibhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:149_0: Evampi esa visuddhimaggo āgamānamatthaṃ na pakāseyya,
tika-s0104t:149_1: atha sabbopeso idha vicāritabboyevāti codanāya tathā avicāraṇassa ekantakāraṇaṃ niddhāretvā taṃ pariharanto “majjhe visuddhimaggo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:149_2: Tattha majjheti khuddakato aññesaṃ catunnampi āgamānaṃ abbhantare. Hi-
tika-s0104t:149_8: Api ca saṃvaṇṇakehi saṃvaṇṇanāvasena yaṃ yaṃ bhāsitaṃ,
tika-s0104t:149_13: idameva vā kāraṇaṃ manasi sannidhāyāti attho.
tika-s0104t:149_14: Katoti etthāpi “visuddhimaggo esā”ti padaṃ kammabhāvena sambajjhati āvuttiyādinayenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:149_17: Ettha ca “majjhe ṭhatvā”ti etena majjhattabhāvadīpanena visesato catunnampi āgamānaṃ sādhāraṇaṭṭhakathā visuddhimaggo,
tika-s0104t:149_19: Avisesato pana vinayābhidhammānampi yathārahaṃ sādhāraṇaṭṭhakathā hotiyeva,
tika-s0104t:149_20: tehi sammissatāya ca tadavasesassa khuddakāgamassa visesato sādhāraṇā samānāpi taṃ ṭhapetvā catunnameva āgamānaṃ sādhāraṇātveva vuttāti.
tika-s0104t:153_0: Evaṃ yathāvuttena vividhena nayena paṇāmādikaṃ pakaraṇārambhavidhānaṃ katvā idāni vibhāgavantānaṃ sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ
tika-s0104t:153_2: suviññāpitañca hotīti paṭhamaṃ tāva vaggasuttavasena vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha dīghāgamo nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:153_3: Tattha tatthāti “dīghassa āgamavarassa atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti yadidaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:153_6: so dīghāgamo nāma vaggasuttavasena evaṃ veditabbo,
tika-s0104t:153_15: saddena paṭiniddisati viya “dīghāgamanissita”nti vuttaṃ āsannavacanampi taṃ-
tika-s0104t:153_16: saddena paṭiniddisati attano buddhiyaṃ parammukhaṃ viya parivattamānaṃ hutvā pavattanato.
tika-s0104t:153_17: Edisesu hi ṭhānesu attano buddhiyaṃ sammukhaṃ vā parammukhaṃ vā parivattamānaṃ yathā tathā vā paṭiniddisituṃ
tika-s0104t:153_22: tesaṃ vā saṅgaho gaṇanā etthāti catuttiṃsasuttasaṅgaho.
tika-s0104t:154_0: Attano saṃvaṇṇanāya paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṃ nikkhittānukkameneva pavattabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “tassa…pe…
tika-s0104t:154_3: Kasmā pana catūsu āgamesu dīghāgamo paṭhamaṃ saṅgīto,
tika-s0104t:154_7: Nāyamanuyogo katthacipi na pavattati sabbattheva vacanakkamamattaṃ paṭicca anuyuñjitabbato.
tika-s0104t:154_13: katipayasuttasaṅgahatāya ceva appaparimāṇatāya ca uggahaṇadhāraṇādisukhato paṭhamaṃ saṅgīto.
tika-s0104t:154_18: Tenevāha “tasmā tiha tvaṃ bhikkhu ādimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu.
tika-s0104t:154_22: Diṭṭhiviniveṭhanakathābhāvato pana suttantapiṭakassa niravasesadiṭṭhivibhajanaṃ brahmajālasuttaṃ paṭhamaṃ nikkhittanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:154_23: Tepiṭake hi buddhavacane brahmajālasadisaṃ diṭṭhigatāni niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ katvā vibhattasuttaṃ natthi.
tika-s0104t:154_24: Nidānaṃ pana paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṃ mahākassapattherena puṭṭhena āyasmatā ānandena desakālādinidassanatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ nikkhittanti.
tika-s0104t:156_1: yassaṃ vā paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyaṃ nikkhittānukkamena saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmattā taṃ vibhāvento tassā tantiyā
tika-s0104t:156_2: āruḷhāyapi idha vacane kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti nāma cesā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:156_4: māruḷhāti etena nanu sā saṅgītikkhandhake tantimāruḷhā,
tika-s0104t:156_9: veditabbā”ti pana etena nidānakosallatthabhāvato yathāvuttadosatā na siyāti visesakāraṇadassanena pariharati.
tika-s0104t:156_12: Tena hi paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vuttaṃ nidānañca ādi,
tika-s0104t:156_13: esā ca paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti nāma evaṃ veditabbāti imamatthaṃ sampiṇḍeti.
tika-s0104t:156_17: yadidaṃ kiñci vatvā puna aparaṃ vattumārabhantānaṃ ca-
tika-s0104t:156_28: evaṃ sati so na kattabboyeva paṭhamasaddeneva aññāsaṃ dutiyādisaṅgītīnampi atthibhāvassa dassitattā.
tika-s0104t:156_29: Dutiyādimupādāya hi paṭhamasaddapayogo dīghādimupādāya rassādisaddapayogo viya.
tika-s0104t:156_31: paññattattā ca vippakiṇṇānaṃ dhammavinayānaṃ saṅgahetvā gāyanaṃ kathanaṃ saṅgīti,
tika-s0104t:156_34: antarantarā ca sambandhavasena ṭhapitaṃ saṅgītikārakavacanaṃ saṅgahitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:156_39: tena pāḷiyampi sā saṅgītimāruḷhāvāti anuggahaṃ karoti,
tika-s0104t:156_40: evampi tatthāruḷhamattena idha sotūnaṃ nidānakosallaṃ na hotīti pana-
tika-s0104t:156_42: Nidadāti desanaṃ desakālādivasena aviditaṃ viditaṃ katvā nidassetīti nidānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:157_1: Tattha sattānaṃ dassanānuttariyasaraṇādipaṭilābhahetubhūtāsu vijjamānāsupi aññāsu bhagavato kiriyāsu
tika-s0104t:157_2: “buddho bodheyya”nti paṭiññāya anulomanato vineyyānaṃ maggaphaluppattihetubhūtā kiriyāva nippariyāyena
tika-s0104t:157_5: Dhammacakkappavattanato pana pubbabhāge bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ suṇantānampi vāsanābhāgiyameva jātaṃ,
tika-s0104t:157_12: dhammato anapetattā dhammañca taṃ cakkañcāti dhammacakkaṃ.
tika-s0104t:159_3: Yaṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ “dhammacakkapavattanasuttantaṃ desento dhammacakkaṃ pavatteti nāma,
tika-s0104t:159_7: subhaddassa nāma paribbājakassa vinayanaṃ antoparicchedaṃ katvāti abhividhivasena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:159_9: Kataṃ pariniṭṭhāpitaṃ buddhakiccaṃ yenāti tathā, tasmiṃ.
tika-s0104t:159_11: etena buddhakattabbassa kiccassa kassacipi asesitabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0104t:159_13: Nanu ca sāvakehi vinītāpi vineyyā bhagavatāyeva vinītā nāma.
tika-s0104t:159_17: Nāyaṃ doso tesaṃ vinayanupāyassa sāvakesu ṭhapitattā.
tika-s0104t:160_1: yāva me bhikkhū na sāvakā bhavissanti viyattā vinītā visāradā bahussutā dhammadharā…pe…
tika-s0104t:160_2: uppannaṃ parappavādaṃ saha dhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā sapāṭihāriyaṃ dhammaṃ desessantī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:161_2: Tathā hi manussabhāvassa supākaṭakaraṇatthaṃ mahābodhisattā carimabhave dārapariggahādīnipi karontīti.
tika-s0104t:161_4: Tañhi nagaraṃ kusahatthaṃ purisaṃ dassanaṭṭhāne māpitattā “kusināra”nti vuccati,
tika-s0104t:161_6: Upavattane mallānaṃ sālavaneti tassa nagarassa upavattanabhūte mallarājūnaṃ sālavane.
tika-s0104t:161_7: Tañhi sālavanaṃ nagaraṃ pavisitukāmā uyyānato upacca vattanti gacchanti etenāti upavattanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:161_9: evaṃ taṃ uyyānaṃ kusinārāya dakkhiṇapacchimadisāyaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:161_10: Yathā ca thūpārāmato dakkhiṇadvārena nagaraṃ pavisanamaggo pācīnamukho gantvā uttarena nivattati,
tika-s0104t:161_11: evaṃ uyyānato sālapanti pācīnamukhā gantvā uttarena nivattā,
tika-s0104t:161_13: Apare pana “taṃ sālavanamupagantvā mittasuhajje apaloketvā nivattanato upavattananti pākaṭaṃ jātaṃ kirā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0104t:161_15: Tattha kira bhagavato paññattassa parinibbānamañcassa sīsabhāge ekā sālapanti hoti,
tika-s0104t:161_17: Tatrāpi eko taruṇasālo sīsabhāgassa āsanno hoti,
tika-s0104t:161_20: Apica “yamakasālā nāma mūlakkhandhaviṭapapattehi aññamaññaṃ saṃsibbetvā ṭhitasālā”tipi mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:161_21: Mā iti cando vuccati tassa gatiyā divasassa minitabbato,
tika-s0104t:161_22: tadā sabbakalāpāripūriyā puṇṇo eva māti puṇṇamā.
tika-s0104t:161_23: Saddavidū pana “mo sivo candimā cevā”ti vuttaṃ sakkatabhāsānayaṃ gahetvā okārantampi candimavācaka ma-
tika-s0104t:161_30: soyeva samayoti rattiyā pacchimayāmapariyāpanno kālaviseso vuccati, tasmiṃ.
tika-s0104t:161_31: Visākhāpuṇṇamadivase īdise rattiyā pacchimasamayeti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:162_8: nibbānañca taṃ sabhāvadhāraṇato dhātu cāti katvā.
tika-s0104t:162_9: Nibbutiyā hi kāraṇapariyāyena asaṅkhatadhātu tathā vuccati.
tika-s0104t:162_11: Anupādisesatāsaṅkhātaṃ imaṃ pakāraṃ bhūtassa pattassa parinibbutassa bhagavato lakkhaṇe nibbānadhātusaṅkhāte atthe tatiyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:162_14: atha kasmā taṃ bhagavā pattoti vuttoti?
tika-s0104t:162_16: Taṃsahacaraṇena hi bhagavāpi anupādisesabhāvaṃ pattoti vuccati.
tika-s0104t:162_17: Atha vā anupādisesabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ imaṃ pakāraṃ pattāya nibbānadhātuyā lakkhaṇe sañjānanakiriyāya tatiyātipi vattuṃ yujjati.
tika-s0104t:162_18: Anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyāti ca anupādisesanibbānadhātu hutvāti attho.
tika-s0104t:162_20: Ettha hi ūnapañcabandhanapatto hutvāti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0104t:162_21: Apica nibbānadhātuyā anupādisesāya anupādisesā hutvā bhūtāyātipi yujjati.
tika-s0104t:162_22: Vuttañhi udānaṭṭhakathāya nandasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ “upaḍḍhullikhitehi kesehīti itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ
tika-s0104t:162_23: vippakatullikhitehi kesehi upalakkhitāti attho”ti esanayo īdisesu.
tika-s0104t:162_26: “ussāhaṃ janesī”ti etassa pana visesanaṃ “dhātubhājanadivase bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janesī”ti ussāhajananassa kālavasena bhinnādhikaraṇavisesanabhāvato.
tika-s0104t:162_28: Atha vā “sannipatitāna”nti idaṃ kāyasāmaggivasena sannipatanameva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:162_31: idañca bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janesīti ettha “bhikkhūna”nti etenapi sambajjhanīyaṃ.
tika-s0104t:162_33: So pana saṅgho kiṃ parimāṇoti āha “sattannaṃ bhikkhusatasahassāna”nti.
tika-s0104t:162_34: Saṅghasaddena hi aviññāyamānassa parimāṇassa viññāpanatthamevetaṃ puna vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:165_0: Tasmā nāmamattabhūtassa saṅghattherassa visesanatthamevetaṃ puna vuttanti,
tika-s0104t:165_1: niccasāpekkhatāya ca edisesu samāso yathā “devadattassa garukula”nti.
tika-s0104t:165_2: Niccasāpekkhatā cettha saṅghasaddassa bhikkhusatasahassasaddaṃ sāpekkhattepi aññapadantarābhāvena vākye viya apekkhitabbatthassa gamakattā.
tika-s0104t:165_3: “Sattannaṃ bhikkhusatasahassāna”nti hi etassa saṅghasadde avayavībhāvena sambandho,
tika-s0104t:165_6: Tadā hi sannipatitā bhikkhū ettakāti gaṇanapathamatikkantā.
tika-s0104t:165_7: Tathā hi veḷuvagāme vedanāvikkhambhanato paṭṭhāya “nacireneva bhagavā parinibbāyissatī”ti sutvā tato
tika-s0104t:165_8: tato āgatesu bhikkhūsu ekabhikkhupi pakkanto nāma natthi. Yathāhu –
tika-s0104t:168_0: Āyasmā mahākassapo anussaranto maññamāno cintayanto hutvā ussāhaṃ janesi,
tika-s0104t:168_1: anussaranto maññamāno cintayanto āyasmā mahākassapo ussāhaṃ janesīti vā sambandho.
tika-s0104t:168_2: Mahantehi sīlakkhandhādīhi samannāgatattā mahanto kassapoti mahākassapo.
tika-s0104t:168_3: Apica “mahākassapo”ti uruvelakassapo nadīkassapo gayākassapo kumārakassapoti ime khuddānukhuddake there upādāya vuccati.
tika-s0104t:168_4: Kasmā panāyasmā mahākassapo ussāhaṃ janesīti anuyoge sati taṃ kāraṇaṃ vibhāvento āha “sattāhaparinibbute”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:168_9: Bhagavato parinibbānadivasato paṭṭhāya sattāhe vītivatteti vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t:168_16: So hi sattāhaparinibbute bhagavati āyasmatā mahākassapattherena saddhiṃ pāvāya kusināraṃ addhānamaggapaṭipannesu
tika-s0104t:168_17: pañcamattesu bhikkhusatesu avītarāge bhikkhū antarāmagge diṭṭhaājīvakassa santikā bhagavato parinibbānaṃ
tika-s0104t:168_18: sutvā pattacīvarāni chaḍḍetvā bāhā paggayhaṃ nānappakāraṃ paridevante disvā evamāha.
tika-s0104t:169_2: Ayaṃ kireso khandhake āgate ātumāvatthusmiṃ nahāpitapubbako vuḍḍhapabbajito bhagavati kusinārato nikkhamitvā
tika-s0104t:169_3: aḍḍhateḷasehi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ ātumaṃ gacchante “bhagavā āgacchatī”ti sutvā “āgatakāleyāgudānaṃ
tika-s0104t:169_4: karissāmī”ti sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhite dve putte etadavoca “bhagavā kira tātā ātumaṃ āgacchati mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena
tika-s0104t:169_7: khurabhaṇḍaṃ ādāya nāḷiyā vā pasibbakena vā anugharakaṃ āhiṇḍatha,
tika-s0104t:169_11: Atha bhagavati ātumaṃ āgantvā bhusāgārakaṃ paviṭṭhe subhaddo sāyanhasamayaṃ gāmadvāraṃ gantvā manusse
tika-s0104t:169_12: āmantetvā “hatthakammamattaṃ me dethā”ti hatthakammaṃ yācitvā “kiṃ bhante karomā”ti vutte “idañcidañca
tika-s0104t:169_13: gaṇhathā”ti sabbūpakaraṇāni gāhāpetvā vihāre uddhanāni kāretvā ekaṃ kāḷakaṃ kāsāvaṃ nivāsetvā tādisameva
tika-s0104t:169_15: idaṃ karothā”ti sabbarattiṃ vicārento satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā bhojjayāguñca madhugoḷakañca paṭiyādāpesi.
tika-s0104t:169_17: tattha sappimadhuphāṇitamacchamaṃsapupphaphalarasādi yaṃ kiñci khādanīyaṃ nāma atthi,
tika-s0104t:170_0: Atha bhagavā kālasseva sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto piṇḍāya carituṃ ātumābhimukho pāyāsi.
tika-s0104t:170_1: Atha tassa ārocesuṃ “bhagavā piṇḍāya gāmaṃ pavisati,
tika-s0104t:170_3: So yathānivatthapāruteheva tehi kāḷakakāsāvehi ekena hatthena dabbiñca kaṭacchuñca gahetvā brahmā viya
tika-s0104t:170_4: dakkhiṇaṃ jāṇumaṇḍalaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā vanditvā “paṭiggaṇhātu me bhante bhagavā yāgu”nti āha.
tika-s0104t:170_5: Tato “jānantāpi tathāgatā pucchantī”ti khandhake āgatanayena bhagavā pucchitvā ca sutvā ca taṃ vuḍḍhapabbajitaṃ
tika-s0104t:170_7: khurabhaṇḍapariharaṇasikkhāpadañcāti dve sikkhāpadāni paññapetvā “anekakappakoṭiyo bhikkhave bhojanaṃ pariyesanteheva vītināmitā,
tika-s0104t:170_9: adhammena uppannaṃ bhojanaṃ imaṃ paribhuñjitvā anekāni attabhāvasahassāni apāyesveva nibbattissanti,
tika-s0104t:170_10: apetha mā gaṇhathā”ti vatvā bhikkhācārābhimukho agamāsi,
tika-s0104t:170_12: Subhaddo anattamano hutvā “ayaṃ sabbaṃ jānāmī”ti āhiṇḍati,
tika-s0104t:170_13: sace na gahetukāmo pesetvā ārocetabbaṃ assa,
tika-s0104t:170_14: pakkāhāro nāma sabbaciraṃ tiṭṭhanto sattāhamattaṃ tiṭṭheyya,
tika-s0104t:170_17: ahitakāmo ayaṃ mayha”nti bhagavati āghātaṃ bandhitvā dasabale dharamāne kiñci vattuṃ nāsakkhi.
tika-s0104t:170_18: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “ayaṃ uccā kulā pabbajito mahāpuriso,
tika-s0104t:171_0: Svāyaṃ ajja mahākassapattherena saddhiṃ gacchanto “parinibbuto bhagavā”ti sutvā laddhassāso viya haṭṭhatuṭṭho evamāha.
tika-s0104t:171_1: Thero pana taṃ sutvā hadaye pahāraṃ viya,
tika-s0104t:171_2: matthake patitasukkhāsaniṃ viya (sukkhāsani viya dī. ni. aṭṭha.
tika-s0104t:171_6: dukkhena bhagavatā ārādhitasāsane nāma evaṃ lahuṃ mahantaṃ pāpaṃ kasaṭaṃ kaṇṭako uppanno,
tika-s0104t:171_7: alaṃ kho panesa pāpo vaḍḍhamāno aññepi evarūpe sahāye labhitvā sāsanaṃ osakkāpetu”nti.
tika-s0104t:172_0: Tato thero cintesi “sace kho panāhaṃ imaṃ mahallakaṃ idheva pilotikaṃ nivāsetvā chārikāya okirāpetvā nīharāpessāmi,
tika-s0104t:172_1: manussā ‘samaṇassa gotamassa sarīre dharamāneyeva sāvakā vivadantī’ti amhākaṃ dosaṃ dassessanti,
tika-s0104t:172_4: tattha yathā vātena pahaṭapupphāni yato vā tato vā gacchanti,
tika-s0104t:172_5: evameva evarūpānaṃ vasena gacchante gacchante kāle vinaye ekaṃ dve sikkhāpadāni nassissanti,
tika-s0104t:172_8: evaṃ anukkamena mūle naṭṭhe pisācasadisā bhavissāma,
tika-s0104t:172_10: evaṃ sati daḷhasuttena saṅgahitapupphāni viya ayaṃ dhammavinayo niccalo bhavissati.
tika-s0104t:172_11: Etadatthañhi bhagavā mayhaṃ tīṇi gāvutāni paccuggamanaṃ akāsi,
tika-s0104t:172_14: ākāse pāṇiṃ cāletvā candopamapaṭipadaṃ kathento maññeva sakkhiṃ katvā kathesi,
tika-s0104t:172_16: mādise bhikkhumhi tiṭṭhamāne ayaṃ pāpo sāsane vaḍḍhiṃ mā alattha,
tika-s0104t:172_26: tato bhikkhū attano attano pahonakaṃ gahetvā kappiyākappiye kathessanti,
tika-s0104t:172_29: sāsanaṃ iddhañceva phīttañca bhavissatī”ti cintetvā so “evaṃ nāma mayhaṃ cittaṃ uppanna”nti kassacipi
tika-s0104t:172_30: anārocetvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ samassāsetvā atha pacchā dhātubhājanadivase dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-s0104t:173_3: Mā socitthāti citte uppannabalavasokena mā sokamakattha.
tika-s0104t:176_1: Tattha īdisassa ca saṅghasannipātassāti sattasatasahassagaṇapāmokkhattherappamukhagaṇanapathātikkantasaṅghasannipātaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0104t:176_2: “Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjatī”tiādināpi aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:176_3: Tiṭṭhati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ṭhānaṃ, hetu.
tika-s0104t:176_13: Pāpena lāmakena icchāvacarena samannāgatā bhikkhū pāpabhikkhū.
tika-s0104t:176_17: saddo cettha nipāto “pā eva vutyassā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0104t:176_19: dīghaṃ katvā pana tathā vuttaṃ yathā “pāvadatī”tipi vadanti.
tika-s0104t:177_0: Tattha yāva ca dhammavinayo tiṭṭhatīti yattakaṃ kālaṃ dhammo ca vinayo ca lajjipuggalesu tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0104t:177_1: Parinibbānamañcake nipannena bhagavatā mahāparinibbānasutte vuttaṃ sandhāya “vuttañheta”ntiādimāha. Hi-
tika-s0104t:177_3: Desito paññattoti dhammopi desito ceva paññatto ca.
tika-s0104t:177_4: Suttābhidhammasaṅgahitassa hi dhammassa atisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ desanā,
tika-s0104t:177_5: tasseva pakārato ñāpanaṃ vineyyasantāne ṭhapanaṃ paññāpanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:177_7: Vinayatantisaṅgahitassa hi atthassa atisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ desanā,
tika-s0104t:177_8: tasseva pakārato ñāpanaṃ asaṅkarato ṭhapanaṃ paññāpanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:177_9: tasmā kammadvayampi kiriyādvayena sambajjhanaṃ yujjatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:178_0: Soti so dhammo ca vinayo ca.
tika-s0104t:178_4: mama accayahetu tumhākaṃ satthā nāma bhavissatīti attho.
tika-s0104t:178_5: Vuttañhi mahāparinibbānasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ “mayi parinibbute tumhākaṃ satthukiccaṃ sādhessatī”ti.
tika-s0104t:178_6: Lakkhaṇavacanañhettha hetvatthasādhakaṃ yathā “nette ujuṃ gate satī”ti.
tika-s0104t:178_16: ayaṃ saṅghassa santike vuṭṭhātī”ti sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ avītikkamanīyatāvasena otiṇṇavatthusmiṃ
tika-s0104t:178_18: taṃ sakalampi vinayapiṭakaṃ mayi parinibbute tumhākaṃ satthukiccaṃ sādhessati “idaṃ vo kattabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:178_19: idaṃ vo na kattabba”nti kattabbākattabbassa vibhāgena anusāsanato.
tika-s0104t:178_26: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti tena tena vineyyānaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpena pakārena ime sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhamme
tika-s0104t:178_28: taṃ sakalampi suttantapiṭakaṃ mayi parinibbute tumhākaṃ satthukiccaṃ sādhessati taṃtaṃcariyānurūpaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā anusāsanato,
tika-s0104t:178_47: ettakā lokuttarā”ti ime dhamme vibhajitvā vibhajitvā abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desitaṃ,
tika-s0104t:178_48: taṃ sakalampi abhidhammapiṭakaṃ mayi parinibbute tumhākaṃ satthukiccaṃ sādhessati khandhādivibhāgena ñāyamānaṃ catusaccasambodhāvahattā.
tika-s0104t:178_49: Iti sabbampetaṃ abhisambodhito yāva parinibbānā pañcacattālīsa vassāni bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ “tīṇi piṭakāni,
tika-s0104t:178_56: mayi parinibbute imāni caturāsīti buddhasahassāni tumhe ovadissanti anusāsissanti ovādānusāsanakiccassa nipphādanatoti.
tika-s0104t:179_8: tena pakārena dhammañca vinayañca yadi panāhaṃ saṅgāyeyyaṃ,
tika-s0104t:180_0: Idāni sammāsambuddhena attano kataṃ anuggahavisesaṃ samanussaritvā cintanākārampi dassento “yañcāhaṃ bhagavatā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:180_8: “Dhāressasī”tiādikaṃ pana vacanaṃ bhagavā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle mahākassapattherena paññattasaṅghāṭiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:180_9: nisinno taṃ saṅghāṭiṃ padumapupphavaṇṇena pāṇinā antantena parāmasanto āha.
tika-s0104t:180_10: Vuttañhetaṃ kassapasaṃyutte mahākassapatthereneva ānandattheraṃ āmantetvā kathentena –
tika-s0104t:181_0: “Atha kho āvuso bhagavā maggā okkamma yena aññataraṃ rukkhamūlaṃ tenupasaṅkami,
tika-s0104t:181_1: atha khvāhaṃ āvuso paṭapilotikānaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ catugguṇaṃ paññapetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavocaṃ ‘idha bhante bhagavā nisīdatu,
tika-s0104t:181_3: Nisīdi kho āvuso bhagavā paññatte āsane,
tika-s0104t:181_4: nisajja kho maṃ āvuso bhagavā etadavoca ‘mudukā kho tyāyaṃ kassapa paṭapilotikānaṃ saṅghāṭī’ti.
tika-s0104t:181_5: Paṭiggaṇhātu me bhante bhagavā paṭapilotikānaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ anukampaṃ upādāyāti.
tika-s0104t:181_6: Dhāressasi pana me tvaṃ kassapa sāṇāni paṃsukūlāni nibbasanānīti.
tika-s0104t:181_7: Dhāressāmahaṃ bhante bhagavato sāṇāni paṃsukūlāni nibbasanānīti.
tika-s0104t:181_8: So khvāhaṃ āvuso paṭapilotikānaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ bhagavato pādāsiṃ,
tika-s0104t:181_9: ahaṃ pana bhagavato sāṇāni paṃsukūlāni nibbasanāni paṭipajji”nti.
tika-s0104t:182_0: Tattha mudukā kho tyāyanti mudukā kho te ayaṃ.
tika-s0104t:182_6: evaṃ panassa ahosi “ime na ciraṃ ṭhassanti,
tika-s0104t:182_8: so mayi parinibbute sattapaṇṇiguhāyaṃ vasitvā dhammavinayasaṅgahaṃ katvā mama sāsanaṃ pañcavassasahassaparimāṇakālaṃ
tika-s0104t:182_9: pavattanakaṃ karissatī”ti attano naṃ ṭhāne ṭhapesi,
tika-s0104t:182_10: evaṃ bhikkhū kassapassa sussusitabbaṃ maññissantī”ti tasmā evamāha.
tika-s0104t:182_11: Thero pana yasmā cīvarassa vā pattassa vā vaṇṇe kathite “imaṃ tumhe gaṇhathā”ti vacanaṃ cārittameva,
tika-s0104t:183_0: Dhāressasi pana me tvaṃ kassapāti kassapa tvaṃ imāni paribhogajiṇṇāni paṃsukūlāni pārupituṃ sakkhissasīti vadati.
tika-s0104t:183_4: ahaṃ imaṃ cīvaraṃ puṇṇaṃ nāma dāsiṃ pārupitvā āmakasusāne chaḍḍitaṃ susānaṃ pavisitvā tumbamattehi pāṇakehi
tika-s0104t:183_5: samparikiṇṇaṃ te pāṇake vidhunitvā mahāariyavaṃse ṭhatvā aggahesiṃ,
tika-s0104t:183_6: tassa me imaṃ cīvaraṃ gahitadivase dasasahassacakkavāḷe mahāpathavī mahāviravaṃ viravamānā kampittha,
tika-s0104t:183_9: imaṃ cīvaraṃ gaṇhantena bhikkhunā jātipaṃsukūlikena jātiāraññikena jātiekāsanikena jātisapadānacārikena bhavituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-s0104t:183_10: tvaṃ imassa cīvarassa anucchavikaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissasīti.
tika-s0104t:183_11: Theropi attanā pañcannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhāreti,
tika-s0104t:183_12: so taṃ atakkayitvā “ahametaṃ paṭipattiṃ pūressāmī”ti ussāhena sugatacīvarassa anucchavikaṃ kātukāmo “dhāressāmahaṃ bhante”ti āha.
tika-s0104t:183_14: Evaṃ pana cīvaraparivattanaṃ katvā therena pārupitacīvaraṃ bhagavā pārupi,
tika-s0104t:183_16: Tasmiṃ samaye mahāpathavī udakapariyantaṃ katvā unnadantī kampittha.
tika-s0104t:184_0: Sāṇāni paṃsukūlānīti matakaḷevaraṃ pariveṭhetvā chaḍḍitāni tumbamatte kimī papphoṭetvā gahitāni sāṇavākamayāni paṃsukūlacīvarāni.
tika-s0104t:184_3: Ettha ca kiñcāpi ekameva taṃ cīvaraṃ,
tika-s0104t:184_4: anekāvayavattā pana bahuvacanaṃ katanti majjhimagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:184_5: Cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogenāti ettha attanā sādhāraṇaparibhogenāti atthassa viññāyamānattā,
tika-s0104t:184_6: viññāyamānatthassa ca saddassa payoge kāmācārattā “attanā”ti na vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:184_7: “Dhāressasi pana me tvaṃ kassapa sāṇāni paṃsukūlānī”ti hi vuttattā “attanāva sādhāraṇaparibhogenā”ti viññāyati, nāññena.
tika-s0104t:184_8: Na hi kevalaṃ saddatoyeva sabbattha atthanicchayo,
tika-s0104t:184_10: Ācariyadhammapālattherena panettha evaṃ vuttaṃ “cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogenāti ettha ‘attanā samasamaṭṭhapanenā’ti idha vuttaṃ attanā –
tika-s0104t:185_0: Yassa yena hi sambandho, dūraṭṭhampi ca tassa taṃ;
tika-s0104t:187_0: Atha vā bhagavatā cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogena bhagavatā anuggahitoti yojanīyaṃ.
tika-s0104t:187_4: Sādhāraṇaparibhogena ca samasamaṭṭhapanena ca anuggahitoti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:189_1: yāvade ākaṅkhāmi vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharāmi,
tika-s0104t:189_2: kassapopi bhikkhave yāvade ākaṅkhati vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ
tika-s0104t:189_3: vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”tiādinā –
tika-s0104t:190_0: Navānupubbavihārachaḷabhiññāpabhede uttarimanussadhamme attanā samasamaṭṭhapanatthāya bhagavatā vuttaṃ
tika-s0104t:190_2: ādiggahaṇena ca saṅkhipitvā dassento āha “ahaṃ bhikkhave”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:191_4: cūḷagaṇṭhipade ca “yāvadeti yāvadevāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-s0104t:191_5: Saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyampi “yāvade ākaṅkhāmīti yāvadeva icchāmī”ti attho vutto.
tika-s0104t:191_6: Tathā hi tattha līnatthapakāsaniyaṃ ācariyadhammapālattherena “yāvadevāti iminā samānatthaṃ ‘yāvade’ti idaṃ pada”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:191_7: Potthakesu pana katthaci “yāvadevā”ti ayameva pāṭho dissati.
tika-s0104t:191_8: Api ca yāvadeti yattakaṃ samāpattivihāraṃ viharituṃ ākaṅkhāmi,
tika-s0104t:191_11: tattakaṃ abhiññāvohāraṃ voharāmīti abhiññāṭhāne ca saha pāṭhasesena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:191_13: abhiññāvohāre vā ākaṅkhanto vihārāmi ceva voharāmi ca,
tika-s0104t:191_19: tena dibbasotena sadde suṇāmī’tiādinā sesābhiññāṭhāne karaṇavasena yojanā vattabbā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0104t:192_0: Navānupubbavihārachaḷabhiññāppabhedeti ettha navānupubbavihārā nāma anupaṭipāṭiyā samāpajjitabbattā evaṃsaññitā
tika-s0104t:192_4: So anadhippeto yathāvuttāya pāḷiyā gahetabbassa atthassa anavasesattā.
tika-s0104t:192_7: uttarīnaṃ vā manussānaṃ jhāyīnañceva ariyānañca dhammoti uttarimanussadhammo,
tika-s0104t:192_9: Dasa kusalakammapathā cettha vinā bhāvanāmanasikārena pakatiyāva manussehi nibbattetabbato,
tika-s0104t:192_11: tato uttari pana jhānādi uttarimanussadhammoti veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:192_15: tathā kassapopī”ti evaṃ samasamaṃ katvā ṭhapanena.
tika-s0104t:192_17: kassacipi uttarimanussadhammassa asesabhāvena ekantasamaṭṭhapanaṃ vā sandhāya “samasamaṭṭhapanenā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:192_19: Na hi āyasmā mahākassapo bhagavā viya devasikaṃ catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhyā samāpattiyo samāpajjati,
tika-s0104t:192_21: Ettha ca uttarimanussadhamme attanā samasamaṭṭhapanenā”ti idaṃ nidassanamattanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:193_2: ahaṃ vā kassapa bhikkhū ovadeyyaṃ, tvaṃ vā.
tika-s0104t:193_3: Ahaṃ vā kassapa bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ kareyyaṃ,
tika-s0104t:195_2: Ākāse pāṇiṃ cāletvāti bhagavatā attanoyeva pāṇiṃ ākāse cāletvā kulesu alaggacittatāya ceva karaṇabhūtāya pasaṃsitoti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:195_4: ākāse pāṇiṃ cāletvā kulūpakassa bhikkhuno alaggacittatāya kulesu alagganacittena bhavituṃ yuttatāya ceva maññeva sakkhiṃ katvā pasaṃsitoti attho. Yathāha –
tika-s0104t:196_0: “Atha kho bhagavā ākāse pāṇiṃ cālesi seyyathāpi bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t:196_1: ayaṃ ākāse pāṇi na sajjati na gayhati na bajjhati,
tika-s0104t:196_2: evameva kho bhikkhave yassa kassaci bhikkhuno kulāni upasaṅkamato kulesu cittaṃ na sajjati na gayhati na bajjhati ‘labhantu lābhakāmā,
tika-s0104t:196_4: Yathā sakena lābhena attamano hoti sumano,
tika-s0104t:196_5: evaṃ paresaṃ lābhena attamano hoti sumano.
tika-s0104t:196_6: Evarūpo kho bhikkhave bhikkhu arahati kulāni upasaṅkamituṃ.
tika-s0104t:196_7: Kassapassa bhikkhave kulāni upasaṅkamato kulesu cittaṃ na sajjati na gayhati na bajjhati ‘labhantu lābhakāmā,
tika-s0104t:196_9: Yathā sakena lābhena attamano hoti sumano,
tika-s0104t:196_10: evaṃ paresaṃ lābhena attamano hoti sumano”ti.
tika-s0104t:197_0: Tattha ākāse pāṇiṃ cālesīti nīle gaganantare yamakavijjukaṃ sañcālayamāno viya heṭṭhābhāge,
tika-s0104t:197_3: idañca pana tepiṭake buddhavacane asambhinnapadaṃ nāma.
tika-s0104t:197_7: idāni yo hīnādhimuttiko micchāpaṭipanno evaṃ vadeyya “sammāsambuddho ‘alaggacittatāya ākāse cālitapāṇūpamā
tika-s0104t:197_12: tassa vādapathaṃ pacchinditvā “sakkā ca kho evaṃ kātuṃ,
tika-s0104t:197_13: atthi evarūpo bhikkhū”ti āyasmantaṃ mahākassapattherameva sakkhiṃ katvā dassento “kassapassa bhikkhave”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:198_2: tassaṃ vā ādhārabhūtāya maññeva sakkhiṃ katvā pasaṃsitoti attho. Yathāha –
tika-s0104t:199_2: Seyyathāpi bhikkhave puriso jarudapānaṃ vā olokeyya pabbatavisamaṃ vā nadīviduggaṃ vā apakasseva kāyaṃ,
tika-s0104t:199_4: evameva kho bhikkhave candūpamā kulāni upasaṅkamatha apakasseva kāyaṃ,
tika-s0104t:199_6: Kassapo bhikkhave candūpamo kulāni upasaṅkamati apakasseva kāyaṃ,
tika-s0104t:200_2: apica kho yathā cando gaganatalaṃ pakkhandamāno na kenaci saddhiṃ santhavaṃ vā sinehaṃ vā ālayaṃ vā nikantiṃ vā patthanaṃ vā pariyuṭṭhānaṃ vā karoti,
tika-s0104t:200_3: na ca na hoti mahājanassa piyo manāpo,
tika-s0104t:200_4: tumhepi evaṃ kenaci saddhiṃ santhavādīnaṃ akaraṇena bahujanassa piyā manāpā candūpamā hutvā khattiyakulādīni cattāri kulāni upasaṅkamathāti attho.
tika-s0104t:200_8: ñāṇālokapharaṇena ca candūpamā hutvāti evamādīhipi nayehi attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t:201_1: apakassa cittanti teneva santhavādīnamakaraṇena kāyañca cittañca apakassitvā,
tika-s0104t:201_5: Āgantuko hi paṭipāṭiyā sampattagehaṃ pavisitvā sace naṃ gharasāmikā disvā “amhākaṃ puttabhātaropi vippavāsagatā
tika-s0104t:201_8: na tehi saddhiṃ santhavaṃ vā karoti,
tika-s0104t:201_10: evaṃ tumhepi paṭipāṭiyā sampattagharaṃ pavisitvā yaṃ iriyāpathesu pasannā manussā denti,
tika-s0104t:201_11: taṃ gahetvā pacchinnasanthavā tesaṃ kiccakaraṇīye abyāvaṭā hutvā nikkhamathāti dīpeti.
tika-s0104t:201_15: anekaṭṭhānena manopāgabbhiyena ca virahitā kulāni upasaṅkamathāti attho.
tika-s0104t:202_6: yathā pana anapakaṭṭhakāyacitto tāni olokento puriso tattha patati,
tika-s0104t:202_7: evaṃ arakkhitehi kāyādīhi kulāni upasaṅkamanto bhikkhu kulesu bajjhati,
tika-s0104t:202_9: Yathā pana apakaṭṭhakāyacitto puriso tattha na patati,
tika-s0104t:202_13: sūpaṭṭhitāya satiyā apakaṭṭhakāyacitto hutvā kulāni upasaṅkamanto bhikkhu kulesu na bajjhati,
tika-s0104t:202_17: evarūpo ayaṃ mahākassapoti hīnādhimuttikassa micchāpaṭipannassa vādapathapacchindanatthaṃ mahākassapattheraṃ
tika-s0104t:202_20: tassaṃ vā ādhārabhūtāya maññeva sakkhiṃ katvā pasaṃsitoti,
tika-s0104t:202_22: saddo ca na payujjitabbo dvinnaṃ padānaṃ tulyādhikaraṇattā,
tika-s0104t:202_23: ayameva attho pāṭho ca yuttataro viya dissati parinibbānasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ “ākāse pāṇiṃ cāletvā candūpamaṃ
tika-s0104t:202_24: paṭipadaṃ kathento maṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā kathesī”ti vuttattāti.
tika-s0104t:203_3: saddassa kāraṇanidassane “tasmā”ti ajjhāharitvā tassa meti attho,
tika-s0104t:203_10: Dhammavinayasaṅgāyanaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ kiṃ nāma tassa iṇavirahitattaṃ bhavissati,
tika-s0104t:203_21: puttaṃ rājā viya bhagavāpi maṃ dīghadassī “saddhammavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpako me ayaṃ bhavissatī”ti mantvā sāsanapaccatthikagaṇanimmaddanena
tika-s0104t:203_22: saddhammavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ cīvaradānasamasamaṭṭhapanasaṅkhātena iminā asādhāraṇānuggahena anuggahesi nanu,
tika-s0104t:203_23: imāya ca uḷārāya pasaṃsāya pasaṃsi nanūti.
tika-s0104t:204_2: mayā vuttassa atthassa sādhakaṃ kiṃ āhāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:204_3: Yathā vā yena pakārena mayā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:204_4: tathā tena pakārena pāḷiyampi āhāti attho.
tika-s0104t:204_5: Yathā vā yaṃ vacanaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āha,
tika-s0104t:204_6: tathā tena vacanena mayā vuttavacanaṃ saṃsandati ceva sameti ca yathā taṃ gaṅgodakena yamunodakantipi
tika-s0104t:204_7: vattabbo pāḷiyā sādhanatthaṃ udāharitabhāvassa paccakkhato viññāyamānattā,
tika-s0104t:204_10: Yathā vā yena pakārena dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janesi,
tika-s0104t:204_11: tathā tena pakārena pāḷiyampi āhāti attho.
tika-s0104t:205_4: tattha piṇḍāya caritvā “kusināraṃ gamissāmī”ti addhānamaggappaṭipannoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:205_10: “Dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ ussāhaṃ janesī”ti etassatthassa sādhanatthaṃ āhatā “atha kho”tiādikā pāḷi yathāvuttamatthaṃ na sādheti.
tika-s0104t:205_11: Na hettha ussāhajananappakāro āgatoti codanaṃ pariharitumāha “sabbaṃ subhaddakaṇḍaṃ vitthārato veditabba”nti.
tika-s0104t:205_12: Evampesā codanā tadavatthāyevāti vuttaṃ “tato paraṃ āhā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:205_13: Apica yathāvuttatthasādhikā pāḷi mahatarāti ganthagarutāpariharaṇatthaṃ majjhe peyyālamukhena ādiantameva
tika-s0104t:205_14: pāḷiṃ dassento “sabbaṃ subhaddakaṇḍaṃ vitthārato veditabba”nti āha.
tika-s0104t:205_15: Tena hi “atha khvāhaṃ āvuso maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdī”ti vuttapāḷito paṭṭhāya “yaṃ na icchissāma,
tika-s0104t:205_16: na taṃ karissāmā”ti vuttapāḷipariyosānaṃ subhaddakaṇḍaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:206_0: “Tato para”ntiādinā pana tadavasesaṃ “handa mayaṃ āvuso”tiādikaṃ ussāhajananappakāradassanapāḷiṃ.
tika-s0104t:206_1: Tasmā tato paraṃ āhāti ettha subhaddakaṇḍato paraṃ ussāhajananappakāradassanavacanamāhāti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:206_4: Ācariyadhammapālattherena pana “tato paranti tato bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhajananato parato”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:206_5: tadetaṃ vicāretabbaṃ heṭṭhā ussāhajananappakārassa pāḷiyaṃ avuttattā.
tika-s0104t:206_6: Ayameva hi ussāhajananappakāro yadidaṃ “handa mayaṃ āvuso dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāma,
tika-s0104t:206_8: Yadi pana subhaddakaṇḍameva ussāhajananahetubhūtassa subhaddena vuttavacanassa pakāsanattā ussāhajanananti vadeyya,
tika-s0104t:206_10: Pure adhammo dippatīti ettha adhammo nāma dasakusalakammapathapaṭipakkhabhūto adhammo.
tika-s0104t:206_11: Dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ ussāhajananappasaṅgattā vā tadasaṅgāyanahetuko dosagaṇopi sambhavati,
tika-s0104t:206_13: dhammavādino dubbalā hontī”ti vuttattā sīlavipattiādihetuko pāpicchatādidosagaṇo adhammotipi vadanti.
tika-s0104t:206_16: Atha vā yāva adhammo dhammaṃ paṭibāhituṃ samattho hoti,
tika-s0104t:206_18: Āsanne hi anadhippete ayaṃ pure- saddo.
tika-s0104t:206_20: saddayogena hi anāgatatthe ayaṃ vattamānapayogo yathā “purā vassati devo”ti.
tika-s0104t:210_0: Lacchāyamapi kiṃ vutte, vattamānā bhavissatī”ti ca.
tika-s0104t:211_4: Evaṃ sati taṃkālāpekkhāya cettha vattamānapayogo sambhavati.
tika-s0104t:212_1: Uccinane uyyojentā hi mahākassapattheraṃ evamāhaṃsu “bhikkhū uccinatū”ti,
tika-s0104t:212_2: saṅgītiyā anurūpe bhikkhū uccinitvā upadhāretvā gaṇhātūti attho.
tika-s0104t:212_4: pariggahesī”ti etena sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavapariyantānaṃ yathāvuttapuggalānaṃ satipi āgamādhigamasambhave
tika-s0104t:212_5: saha paṭisambhidāhi pana tevijjādiguṇayuttānaṃ āgamādhigamasampattiyā ukkaṃsagatattā saṅgītiyā bahūpakārataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:212_8: satthu bhagavato sāsanaṃ satthusāsanaṃ sāsīyati etenāti katvā,
tika-s0104t:212_16: diṭṭhadhammikādipurisatthaṃ vā nipphādetuṃ pariyattā samatthāti pariyatti,
tika-s0104t:215_0: Vuttesu kalyāṇaputhujjanāva adhippetā saddantarasannidhānenapi atthavisesassa viññātabbattā.
tika-s0104t:215_1: Samathabhāvanāsinehābhāvena sukkhā lūkhā asiniddhā vipassanā etesanti sukkhavipassakā,
tika-s0104t:218_0: Tipiṭakasabbapariyattippabhedadhareti ettha tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ samāhāro tipiṭakaṃ,
tika-s0104t:218_1: taṃsaṅkhātaṃ navaṅgādivasena anekabhedabhinnaṃ sabbaṃ pariyattippabhedaṃ dhārentīti tathā, tādise.
tika-s0104t:218_2: Anu anu taṃ samaṅginaṃ bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti anubhāvo,
tika-s0104t:218_5: “Etadaggaṃ bhikkhave”ti bhagavatā vuttavacanamupādāya pavattattā “etadagga”nti padaṃ anukaraṇajanāmaṃ nāma yathā “yevāpanaka”nti,
tika-s0104t:218_8: Etadaggaṃ eso bhikkhu aggoti vā āropitepi vaṭṭati.
tika-s0104t:218_9: Tadanāropitāpi avasesaguṇasampannattā uccinitā tattha santīti dassetuṃ “yebhuyyenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:218_13: Atha vā tisso vijjā assa khīṇāsavassāti tevijjo,
tika-s0104t:218_17: Ye sandhāya vuttanti ye bhikkhū sandhāya idaṃ “atha kho”tiādivacanaṃ saṅgītikkhandhake vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:218_19: tathāpi visesena yathāvuttakhīṇāsavabhikkhūyeva sandhāya vuttanti pāḷiyā saṃsandanaṃ karoti.
tika-s0104t:219_2: kasmā thero ekenūnamakāsīti codanaṃ uddharitvā visesakāraṇadassanena taṃ pariharituṃ “kissa panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:219_6: saddo hi “chaṇatthañca nagarato nikkhamitvā missakapabbataṃ abhiruhatū”tiādīsu viya kāraṇavacano,
tika-s0104t:219_8: Tathā hi vaṇṇayanti “chaṇatthanti chaṇanimittaṃ chaṇahetūti attho”ti.
tika-s0104t:220_2: “So hāyasmā”tiādinā “sahāpi vināpi na sakkā”ti vuttavacane paccekaṃ kāraṇaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:220_13: na asekkho viya pariniṭṭhitasikkho tattha paṭippassaddhussāho,
tika-s0104t:220_14: nāpi vissaṭṭhasikkho pacurajano viya tattha anadhimutto,
tika-s0104t:220_15: kitavasena viya ca taddhitavasenidha tappakatiyattho gayhati yathā “kāruṇiko”ti.
tika-s0104t:220_16: Atha vā ariyāya jātiyā tīsupi sikkhāsu jāto,
tika-s0104t:220_26: Vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “asammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ nāma natthī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:220_27: taṃ” dve sahassāni bhikkhuto”ti vuttampi bhagavato santike paṭiggahitameva nāmāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:221_1: Ayañhi gāthā gopakamoggallānena nāma brāhmaṇena “buddhasāsane tvaṃ bahussutoti pākaṭo,
tika-s0104t:221_3: tayā ca dhāritā”ti pucchitena tassa paṭivacanaṃ dentena āyasmatā ānandeneva gopakamoggallānasutte,
tika-s0104t:221_6: buddhato satthu santikā dvāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassāni ahaṃ gaṇhiṃ adhigaṇhiṃ,
tika-s0104t:221_7: dve dhammakkhandhasahassāni bhikkhuto dhammasenāpatiādīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santikā gaṇhiṃ.
tika-s0104t:221_10: te dhammā tadubhayaṃ sampiṇḍetvā caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānīti.
tika-s0104t:221_11: Keci pana “yemeti ettha ‘ye ime’ti padacchedaṃ katvā ye ime dhammā buddhassa,
tika-s0104t:221_13: tesu dhammesu buddhato dvāsīti sahassāni ahaṃ gaṇhiṃ,
tika-s0104t:221_16: ayañca sambandho “ettakāyeva dhammakkhandhā”ti sanniṭṭhānassa aviññāyamānattā kecivādo nāma kato.
tika-s0104t:222_0: “Sahāpi na sakkā”ti vattabbahetuto “vināpi na sakkā”ti vattabbahetuyeva balavataro saṅgītiyā bahukārattā.
tika-s0104t:222_1: Tasmā tattha codanaṃ dassetvā pariharituṃ “yadi eva”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:222_2: Tattha yadi evanti evaṃ vinā yadi na sakkā,
tika-s0104t:222_12: Pañhe “atha tvaṃ kena vaṇṇenā”ti hi payogamudāharanti.
tika-s0104t:222_14: Parūpavādavivajjanatoti yathāvuttakāraṇaṃ ajānantānaṃ paresaṃ āropitaupavādato vivajjitukāmattā.
tika-s0104t:222_20: tathā hi iccete daḷhīkaraṇatthe”ti hi vadanti saddavidū.
tika-s0104t:222_23: Ānandattherassa yebhuyyena navakāya parisāya vibbhamane mahākassapatthero “na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”ti āha.
tika-s0104t:222_24: Tathā hi parinibbute bhagavati mahākassapatthero bhagavato parinibbāne sannipatitassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
tika-s0104t:222_25: majjhe nisīditvā dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ pañcasate bhikkhū uccinitvā “rājagahe āvuso vassaṃ vasantā
tika-s0104t:222_27: tumhe pure vassūpanāyikāya attano attano palibodhaṃ pacchinditvā rājagahe sannipatathā”ti vatvā attanā rājagahaṃ gato.
tika-s0104t:223_0: Ānandattheropi bhagavato pattacīvaramādāya mahājanaṃ saññāpento sāvatthiṃ gantvā tato nikkhamma rājagahaṃ gacchanto dakkhiṇāgirismiṃ cārikaṃ cari.
tika-s0104t:223_1: Tasmiṃ samaye ānandattherassa tiṃsamattā saddhivihārikā yebhuyyena kumārakā ekavassikaduvassikabhikkhū ceva anupasampannā ca vibbhamiṃsu.
tika-s0104t:223_4: Tesaṃ kira mātāpitaro cintesuṃ “ānandatthero satthuvissāsiko aṭṭha vare yācitvā upaṭṭhahati,
tika-s0104t:223_8: tasmiṃ āgate mayaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ kātuṃ labhissāmā”ti.
tika-s0104t:223_9: Iminā tāva kāraṇena nesaṃ ñātakā te pabbājesuṃ,
tika-s0104t:223_10: satthari pana parinibbute tesaṃ sā patthanā upacchinnā,
tika-s0104t:223_12: Atha ānandattheraṃ dakkhiṇāgirismiṃ cārikaṃ caritvā rājagahamāgataṃ disvā mahākassapatthero evamāhāti.
tika-s0104t:224_0: “Atha kiñcarahi tvaṃ āvuso ānanda imehi navehi bhikkhūhi indriyesu aguttadvārehi bhojane amattaññūhi jāgariyaṃ ananuyuttehi saddhiṃ cārikaṃ carasi,
tika-s0104t:224_3: olujjati kho te āvuso ānanda parisā,
tika-s0104t:225_0: Api me bhante kassapa sirasmiṃ palitāni jātāni,
tika-s0104t:225_1: atha ca pana mayaṃ ajjāpi āyasmato mahākassapassa kumārakavādā na muccāmāti.
tika-s0104t:225_2: Tathā hi pana tvaṃ āvuso ānanda imehi navehi bhikkhūhi indriyesu aguttadvārehi bhojane amattaññūhi jāgariyaṃ ananuyuttehi saddhiṃ cārikaṃ carasi,
tika-s0104t:225_5: olujjati kho te āvuso ānanda parisā,
tika-s0104t:226_0: Tattha sassaghātaṃ maññe carasīti sassaṃ ghātento viya āhiṇḍasi.
tika-s0104t:226_1: Kulūpaghātaṃ maññe carasīti kulāni upaghātento viya āhiṇḍasi.
tika-s0104t:226_3: Palujjanti kho te āvuso navappāyāti āvuso ānanda ete tuyhaṃ pāyena yebhuyyena navakā ekavassikaduvassikadaharā ceva sāmaṇerā ca palujjanti.
tika-s0104t:226_4: Na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsīti ayaṃ kumārako attano pamāṇaṃ na vata jānātīti theraṃ tajjento āha.
tika-s0104t:226_5: Kumārakavādā na muccāmāti kumārakavādato na muccāma.
tika-s0104t:226_6: Tathā hi pana tvanti idamassa evaṃ vattabbatāya kāraṇadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:226_8: yasmā tvaṃ imehi navehi indriyasaṃvaravirahitehi bhojane amattaññūhi saddhiṃ vicarasi,
tika-s0104t:226_9: tasmā kumārakehi saddhiṃ vicaranto “kumārako”ti vattabbataṃ arahasīti.
tika-s0104t:227_0: Na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsīti ettha vā-
tika-s0104t:227_3: Tathā hesa “paṇḍito vāpi tena so”tiādīsu upamāne dissati,
tika-s0104t:227_7: “Ayaṃ vā imesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sabbabālo sabbamūḷho”tiādīsu vavassagge.
tika-s0104t:227_8: “Ye hi keci bhikkhave samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā”tiādīsupi vikappe.
tika-s0104t:227_13: saddassa atthuddhāraṃ karontena vuttaṃ “na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”tiādīsu padapūraṇe”ti.
tika-s0104t:227_14: Saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyampi idameva vuttaṃ “na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsīti ayaṃ kumārako attano pamāṇaṃ na vata jānāsīti theraṃ tajjento āhā”ti.
tika-s0104t:227_16: “Na vāya”nti etassa vā “na ve aya”nti padacchedaṃ katvā ve-
tika-s0104t:227_19: saddassa ekaṃsatthabhāve tadeva pāḷiṃ payogaṃ katvā udāharanti neruttikā.
tika-s0104t:227_20: Vajirabuddhitthero pana evaṃ vadati “na vāyanti ettha ca vāti vibhāsā,
tika-s0104t:227_22: taṃ tassa matimattaṃ saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāya tathā avuttattā.
tika-s0104t:228_2: sākiyakulabhāvena vā pākaṭo ca āyasmā ānando.
tika-s0104t:230_0: Amitā pālitā cāti, ime pañca imā duve”ti.
tika-s0104t:231_0: Vuttesu hi sabbakaniṭṭhassa amitodanasakkassa putto āyasmā ānando. Vuttañhi manorathapūraṇiyaṃ –
tika-s0104t:232_0: “Kappasatasahassaṃ pana dānaṃ dadamāno amhākaṃ bodhisattena saddhiṃ tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cuto amitodanasakkassa gehe nibbatti,
tika-s0104t:232_1: athassa sabbe ñātake ānandite pamodite karonto jātoti ‘ānando’tveva nāmamakaṃsū”ti.
tika-s0104t:234_2: vayasā ca cūḷapituputtatāya ca bhagavato kaniṭṭhabhātāyeva.
tika-s0104t:234_3: Tathā hi manorathapūraṇiyaṃ ekanipātavaṇṇanāyaṃ sahajātagaṇane so na vuto”ti.
tika-s0104t:235_5: Tathā hi ācariyadhammapālattherena nettiṭṭhakathāyaṃ “gunnañce taramānāna”nti gāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ –
tika-s0104t:236_0: “Sabbā tā jimhaṃ gacchantīti sabbā tā gāviyo kuṭilameva gacchanti, kasmā?
tika-s0104t:236_1: Nette jimhagate sati nette kuṭilaṃ gate sati,
tika-s0104t:237_0: Udānaṭṭhakathāyampi “iti imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotī”ti suttapadavaṇṇanāyaṃ “hetuatthatā bhummavacanassa kāraṇassa
tika-s0104t:237_1: bhāvena tadavinābhāvī phalassa bhāvo lakkhīyatīti veditabbā”ti.
tika-s0104t:237_4: Chandāgamanaṃ viyāti ettha chandā āgamanaṃ viyāti padacchedo.
tika-s0104t:237_12: chandena sinehena ananurūpaṃ gamanaṃ pavattanaṃ viya akattabbakaraṇaṃ viyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:237_15: asekkhā ca te paṭisambhidāppattā cāti vā tathā, tādise.
tika-s0104t:238_4: tathāpi thero āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ uccinatūti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:238_7: “Abhabbo”tiādinā pana dhammasaṅgītiyā tassa arahabhāvaṃ dassento vijjamānaguṇe katheti,
tika-s0104t:238_8: tena saṅgītiyā dhammavinayavinicchaye sampatte chandādivasena aññathā akathetvā yathābhūtameva kathessatīti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:240_0: Evaṃ saṅgāyakavicinanappakāraṃ dassetvā aññampi saṅgāyanatthaṃ desavicinanādippakāraṃ dassento “atha kho”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:240_1: Tattha etadahosīti etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosi. Nu-
tika-s0104t:242_1: Evaṃ katabhāvo ca imāya gaṇanāya viññāyatīti dasseti “bhagavā hī”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:242_7: Saṃvegavatthuṃ kittetvā kittetvā aniccatāpaṭisaññuttāni gītāni gāyitvā pūjāvasena kīḷanato sundaraṃ kīḷanadivasā sādhukīḷanadivasā nāma,
tika-s0104t:242_8: saparahitasādhanaṭṭhena vā sādhūti vuttānaṃ sappurisānaṃ saṃvegavatthuṃ kittetvā kittetvā kīḷanadivasātipi yujjati.
tika-s0104t:243_0: “Ito purimesu hi dvīsu sattāhesu te bhikkhū saṅghassa ṭhānanisajjokāsaṃ karontā khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ saṃvidahantā sādhukīḷikāya okāsaṃ na labhiṃsu,
tika-s0104t:243_1: tato nesaṃ ahosi ‘imaṃ sattāhaṃ sādhukīḷitaṃ kīḷissāma,
tika-s0104t:243_3: yaṃ amhākaṃ pamattabhāvaṃ ñatvā kocideva āgantvā dhātuyo gaṇheyya,
tika-s0104t:244_0: Tathāpi te dhātupūjāyapi katattā dhātupūjādivasā nāma.
tika-s0104t:244_1: Imeyeva visesena bhagavati kattabbassa aññassa abhāvato ekadesena katampi sādhukīḷanaṃ upādāya “sādhukīḷanadivasā”ti
tika-s0104t:244_2: pākaṭā jātāti āha “evaṃ sattāhaṃ sādhukīḷanadivasā nāma ahesu”nti.
tika-s0104t:245_1: padhānakiccavaseneva ca sattāhaṃ citakāyaṃ agginā jhāyīti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:245_2: Na hi accantasaṃyogavasena nirantaraṃ sattāhameva agginā jhāyi tattha pacchimadivaseyeva jhāyitattā,
tika-s0104t:245_4: Purimapacchimānañhi dvinnaṃ sattāhānamantare sattāhe yattha katthacipi divase jhāyamāne sati “sattāhe jhāyī”ti vattuṃ yujjati. Yathāha –
tika-s0104t:246_0: “Tena kho pana samayena cattāro mallapāmokkhā sīsaṃ nhātā ahatāni vatthāni nivatthā ‘mayaṃ bhagavato
tika-s0104t:247_0: Sattipañjaraṃ katvāti sattikhaggādihatthehi purisehi mallarājūnaṃ bhagavato dhātuārakkhakaraṇaṃ upalakkhaṇavasenāha.
tika-s0104t:247_1: Sattihatthā purisā hi sattiyo yathā “kuntā pacarantī”ti,
tika-s0104t:247_4: Uyyogakālādīsu hi rājāno tattha ṭhatvā “ettakā purato gacchantu,
tika-s0104t:247_9: ettakā rathesū”ti evaṃ sandhiṃ karonti mariyādaṃ bandhanti,
tika-s0104t:247_11: Apica uyyogaṭṭhānato āgantvāpi yāva gehesu allagomayaparibhaṇḍādīni karonti,
tika-s0104t:247_12: tāva dve tīṇi divasāni rājāno tattha santhambhanti vissamanti parissayaṃ vinodentītipi sandhāgāraṃ,
tika-s0104t:247_13: rājūnaṃ vā saha atthānusāsanaṃ agārantipi sandhāgāraṃ ha-
tika-s0104t:247_16: yasmā vā rājāno tattha sannipatitvā “imasmiṃ kāle kasituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-s0104t:247_17: imasmiṃ kāle vapitu”nti evamādinā nayena gharāvāsakiccāni sammantayanti,
tika-s0104t:247_18: tasmā chinnavicchinnaṃ gharāvāsaṃ tattha sandhārentītipi sandhāgāraṃ.
tika-s0104t:247_21: jeṭṭhamūlamāsassa sukkapakkhe ca pañca divasāti āha “iti ekavīsati divasā gatā”ti.
tika-s0104t:247_23: tasmiṃyeva ca divase ayaṃ kammavācā katā.
tika-s0104t:247_25: Tattha jeṭṭhanakkhattaṃ vā mūlanakkhattaṃ vā tassa māsassa puṇṇamiyaṃ candena yuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:248_3: Sattasu dhātupūjādivasesu gahitesu tadavinābhāvato majjhe citakāya jhāyanasattāhampi gahitamevāti katvā visuṃ na vuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-s0104t:248_7: Appakañhi ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0104t:248_8: tasmā appakena adhikopi samudāyo anadhiko viya hotīti katvā aḍḍhamāsato adhikepi pañcadivase “aḍḍhamāso
tika-s0104t:248_9: atikkanto”ti vuttaṃ dvāsītikhandhakavattānaṃ katthaci “asīti khandhakavattānī”ti vacanaṃ viya,
tika-s0104t:248_10: tathā appakena ūnopi samudāyo anūno viya hotīti katvā diyaḍḍhamāsato ūnepi pañcadivase “diyaḍḍhamāso
tika-s0104t:248_11: seso”ti vuttaṃ satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ chamāsato ūnepi aḍḍhamāse “chamāsaṃ sajjhāyo kātabbo”ti
tika-s0104t:248_14: Apica dīghabhāṇakānaṃ matena tiṇṇaṃ sattāhānaṃ vasena “ekavīsati divasā gatā”ti idha vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:248_15: Vinayasuttanipātakhuddakapāṭhaṭṭhakathāsu pana khuddakabhāṇakānaṃ matena ekameva jhāyanadivasaṃ katvā
tika-s0104t:248_18: Paṭhamabuddhavacanādīsu viya taṃ taṃ bhāṇakānaṃ matena aṭṭhakathāsupi vacanabhedo hotīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:248_21: tato paraṃ tayo sādhukīḷanadivasā ceva citakajhāyanadivasā ca,
tika-s0104t:248_23: tato paraṃ tayo citakajhāyanadivasā ceva dhātupūjādivasā ca,
tika-s0104t:248_25: iti taṃ taṃ kiccānurūpagaṇanavasena tīṇi sattāhāni paripūrenti,
tika-s0104t:248_27: “Ekavīsati divasā gatā”ti idha vuttavacanañca taṃ taṃ kiccānurūpagaṇaneneva.
tika-s0104t:248_28: Evañhi catūsupi aṭṭhakathāsu vuttavacanaṃ sametīti vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:248_29: Vajirabuddhittherena pana vuttaṃ “aḍḍhamāso atikkantoti ettha eko divaso naṭṭho,
tika-s0104t:248_33: taṃ na sundaraṃ parinibbānasuttantapāḷiyaṃ pāṭipadadivasatoyeva paṭṭhāya sattāhassa vuttattā,
tika-s0104t:248_34: aṭṭhakathāyañca parinibbānadivasena saddhiṃ tiṇṇaṃ sattāhānaṃ gaṇitattā.
tika-s0104t:248_35: Tathā hi parinibbānadivasena saddhiṃ tiṇṇaṃ sattāhānaṃ gaṇaneneva jeṭṭhamūlasukkapakkhapañcamī ekavīsatimo divaso hoti.
tika-s0104t:249_0: Cattālīsa divasāti jeṭṭhamūlasukkapakkhachaṭṭhadivasato yāva āsaḷhī puṇṇamī,
tika-s0104t:249_7: kammaṃ vā paribundheti uparodheti pavattituṃ na detīti palibodho ra-
tika-s0104t:249_10: Taṃ palibodhaṃ chinditvā taṃ karaṇīyaṃ karotūti saṅgāhakena chinditabbaṃ taṃ sabbaṃ palibodhaṃ chinditvā
tika-s0104t:250_9: “thero attano pañcasatāya parisāya parivutto rājagahaṃ gato,
tika-s0104t:250_10: aññepi mahātherā attano attano parivāre gahetvā sokasallasamappitaṃ mahājanaṃ assāsetukāmā taṃ taṃ disaṃ
tika-s0104t:250_11: pakkantā”ti idha vuttavacanaṃ samantapāsādikāya “mahākassapatthero ‘rājagahaṃ āvuso gacchāmā’ti upaḍḍhaṃ
tika-s0104t:250_13: anuruddhattheropi upaḍḍhaṃ gahetvā ekaṃ maggaṃ gato”ti vuttavacanañca aññamaññaṃ viruddhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:250_14: Idha hi mahākassapattherādayo attano attano parivārabhikkhūhiyeva saddhiṃ taṃ taṃ disaṃ gatāti attho āpajjati,
tika-s0104t:250_15: tattha pana mahākassapattheraanuruddhattherāyeva paccekamupaḍḍhasaṅghena saddhiṃ ekekaṃ maggaṃ gatāti? Vuccate –
tika-s0104t:250_16: tadubhayampi hi vacanaṃ na virujjhati atthato saṃsandanattā.
tika-s0104t:250_17: Idha hi niravasesena therānaṃ paccekagamanavacanameva tattha nayavasena dasseti,
tika-s0104t:250_18: idha attano attano parisāya gamanavacanañca tattha upaḍḍhasaṅghena saddhiṃ gamanavacanena.
tika-s0104t:250_19: Upaḍḍhasaṅghoti hi sakasakaparisābhūto bhikkhugaṇo gayhati upaḍḍhasaddassa asamepi bhāge pavattattā.
tika-s0104t:250_20: Yadi hi sannipatite saṅghe upaḍḍhasaṅghena saddhinti atthaṃ gaṇheyya,
tika-s0104t:250_22: yadi ca saṅgāyanatthaṃ uccinitānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ majjhe upaḍḍhasaṅghena saddhinti atthaṃ gaṇheyya,
tika-s0104t:250_23: evampi tesaṃ gaṇapāmokkhānaṃyeva uccinitattā na yujjateva.
