tika-s0104t:871_17: tato eva ca datvā na pacchānutāpī hoti,
tika-s0104t:871_19: paṭiggāhakānaṃ piyasamudācāro hoti vadaññū yācayogo saparivāradāyako.
tika-s0104t:871_20: Annadānañhi dento “taṃ saparivāraṃ katvā dassāmī”ti vatthādīhi saddhiṃ deti,
tika-s0104t:871_21: tathā vatthadānaṃ dento “taṃ saparivāraṃ katvā dassāmī”ti annādīhi saddhiṃ deti.
tika-s0104t:871_23: tathā rūpadānaṃ dento itarārammaṇānipi tassa parivāraṃ katvā deti,
tika-s0104t:872_0: Tattha rūpadānaṃ nāma nīlapītalohitodātādivaṇṇādīsu pupphavatthadhātūsu aññataraṃ labhitvā rūpavasena ābhujitvā “rūpadānaṃ dassāmi,
tika-s0104t:872_1: rūpadānaṃ mayha”nti cintetvā tādise dakkhiṇeyye dānaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti,
tika-s0104t:873_2: nīluppalahatthakaṃ viya ca hatthe ṭhapetvā dātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0104t:873_3: savatthukaṃ pana katvā dadanto saddadānaṃ deti nāma,
tika-s0104t:873_4: tasmā yadā “saddadānaṃ dassāmī”ti bherīmudiṅgādīsu aññatarena tūriyena tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ upahāraṃ karoti,
tika-s0104t:874_1: pisitameva vā gandhaṃ yaṃ kiñci labhitvā gandhavasena ābhujitvā “gandhadānaṃ dassāmi,
tika-s0104t:875_0: Tathā mūlarasādīsu yaṃ kiñci rajanīyaṃ rasavatthuṃ labhitvā rasavasena ābhujitvā “rasadānaṃ dassāmi,
tika-s0104t:876_3: nivāsanapārupanādikaṃ vā sukhasamphassaṃ rajanīyaṃ anavajjaṃ phoṭṭhabbavatthuṃ labhitvā phoṭṭhabbavasena ābhujitvā “phoṭṭhabbadānaṃ dassāmi,
tika-s0104t:877_0: Dhammadānaṃ pana dhammārammaṇassa adhippetattā ojāpānajīvitavasena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:877_1: Ojādīsu hi aññataraṃ rajanīyaṃ dhammavatthuṃ labhitvā dhammārammaṇavasena ābhujitvā “dhammadānaṃ dassāmi,
tika-s0104t:877_11: aññānipi sattānaṃ jīvitaparittāṇatthaṃ evarūpāni kammāni karoti,
tika-s0104t:878_0: Sabbampetaṃ yathāvuttadānasampadaṃ sakalalokahitasukhāya pariṇāmeti attano ca akuppāya vimuttiyā aparikkhayassa
tika-s0104t:878_1: chandassa aparikkhayassa vīriyassa aparikkhayassa samādhissa aparikkhayassa paṭibhānassa aparikkhayassa
tika-s0104t:878_3: imañca dānapāramiṃ paṭipajjantena mahāsattena jīvite aniccasaññā paccupaṭṭhapetabbā.
tika-s0104t:878_6: sattesu ca mahākaruṇā satataṃ samitaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetabbā.
tika-s0104t:878_7: Evañhi bhogehi gahetabbasāraṃ gaṇhanto ādittato viya agārato sabbaṃ sāpateyyaṃ,
tika-s0104t:878_8: attānañca bahi nīharanto na kiñci seseti,
tika-s0104t:879_1: yasmā sabbaññusīlālaṅkārehi satte alaṅkaritukāmena mahāpurisena ādito attano eva tāva sīlaṃ visodhetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:879_6: Visuddhāsayatāya hi ekacco attādhipati hutvā pāpajigucchanasabhāvo ajjhattaṃ hiridhammaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā suparisuddhasamācāro hoti,
tika-s0104t:879_7: tathā parato samādāne sati ekacco lokādhipati hutvā pāpato uttasanto ottappadhammaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā suparisuddhasamācāro hoti,
tika-s0104t:879_8: iti ubhayathāpi ete avītikkamanato sīle patiṭṭhahanti.
tika-s0104t:879_9: Atha ca pana kadāci satisammosena sīlassa khaṇḍādibhāvo siyā,
tika-s0104t:879_10: tāyayeva yathāvuttāya hirottappasampattiyā khippameva naṃ vuṭṭhānādinā paṭipākatikaṃ karontīti.
tika-s0104t:880_4: parūpakaraṇaviratatāya parasantako alagaddo viya na parāmasitabbo.
tika-s0104t:880_8: Gahaṭṭho samāno paresaṃ dāresu sadā pāpakaṃ cittampi na uppādeti.
tika-s0104t:880_9: Kathento saccaṃ hitaṃ piyaṃ parimitameva ca kālena dhammiṃ kathaṃ bhāsitā hoti.
tika-s0104t:881_1: akusaladhammehi ca oramitvā saggamokkhānaṃ pathabhūtesu kusalakammapathesu,
tika-s0104t:881_2: kusaladhammesu ca patiṭṭhitassa mahāpurisassa parisuddhāsayapayogato yathābhipatthitā sattānaṃ hitasukhūpasañhitā
tika-s0104t:881_13: Tathā adinnādānanivattiyā corādīhi asādhāraṇe bhoge adhigacchati,
tika-s0104t:882_0: Musāvādanivattiyā sattānaṃ pamāṇabhūto hoti paccayiko theto ādeyyavacano devatānaṃ piyo manāpo surabhigandhamukho asaddhammārakkhitakāyavacīsamācāro,
tika-s0104t:882_7: Pharusavācānivattiyā sattānaṃ piyo hoti manāpo sukhasīlo madhuravacano sambhāvanīyo,
tika-s0104t:882_14: buddhabhūmiyañca ekāya eva vācāya anekabhāsānaṃ sattānaṃ anekesaṃ pañhānaṃ byākaraṇasamattho hoti.
tika-s0104t:883_13: saddhamme cassa saddhā patiṭṭhitā hoti mūlajātā,
tika-s0104t:883_19: tāva tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sattanikāye ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭho hoti,
tika-s0104t:884_2: sabbabuddhakārakadhammānaṃ ādi caraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ mukhaṃ pamukha”nti bahumānaṃ uppādetvā kāyavacīsaṃyame,
tika-s0104t:884_6: lābhasakkārasilokaṃ ukkhittāsikapaccatthikaṃ viya sallakkhetvā “kikīva aṇḍa”ntiādinā vuttanayena sakkaccaṃ sīlaṃ sampādetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:885_1: idha bodhisatto kalyāṇamittānaṃ garuṭṭhāniyānaṃ abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kālena kālaṃ kattā hoti,
tika-s0104t:885_2: tathā tesaṃ kālena kālaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ kattā hoti,
tika-s0104t:885_12: sati accaye accayato disvā tādisānaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ āvi kattā,
tika-s0104t:886_0: Tathā attano anurūpāsu atthūpasaṃhitāsu sattānaṃ itikattabbatāpurekkhāro analaso sahāyabhāvaṃ upagacchati.
tika-s0104t:886_1: Uppannesu ca sattānaṃ byādhiādidukkhesu yathārahaṃ patikāravidhāyako,
tika-s0104t:886_3: ullumpanasabhāvāvaṭṭhito hutvā niggahārahānaṃ dhammeneva niggaṇhanako yāvadeva akusalā vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpanāya,
tika-s0104t:886_5: Yāni purimakānaṃ mahābodhisattānaṃ uḷāratamāni paramadukkarāni acinteyyānubhāvāni sattānaṃ ekantahitasukhāvahāni caritāni,
tika-s0104t:886_6: yehi nesaṃ bodhisambhārā sammadeva paripākaṃ agamiṃsu,
tika-s0104t:886_7: tāni sutvā anubbiggo anutrāso “tepi mahāpurisā manussā eva,
tika-s0104t:886_8: anukkamena pana sikkhāpāripūriyā bhāvitattā tādisāya uḷāratamāya ānubhāvasampattiyā bodhisambhāresu ukkaṃsapāramippattā ahesuṃ,
tika-s0104t:886_9: tasmā mayāpi sīlādisikkhāsu sammadeva tathā paṭipajjitabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:886_10: yāya paṭipattiyā ahampi anukkamena sikkhaṃ paripūretvā ekantato padaṃ anupāpuṇissāmī”ti saddhāpurecārikaṃ
tika-s0104t:886_11: vīriyaṃ avissajjanto sammadeva sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti.
tika-s0104t:887_1: appiccho santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho dukkhasaho aviparītadassanajātiko anuddhato anunnaḷo acapalo
tika-s0104t:887_2: amukharo avikiṇṇavāco saṃvutindriyo santamānaso kuhanādimicchājīvavirahito ācāragocarasampanno,
tika-s0104t:887_3: aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu,
tika-s0104t:887_4: āraddhavīriyo pahitatto kāye ca jīvite ca nirapekkho,
tika-s0104t:887_6: jīvite vā apekkhaṃ nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti,
tika-s0104t:887_8: Sabbepi dussīlyahetubhūte kodhupanāhādike kilesupakkilese pajahati vinodeti,
tika-s0104t:888_0: Yena yathāladdhā sampatti hānabhāgiyā vā ṭhitibhāgiyā vā na hoti,
tika-s0104t:888_16: Pubbakārīnaṃ sattānaṃ kataññutaṃ nissāya pubbabhāsī piyavādī saṅgāhako sadisena,
tika-s0104t:889_2: sabhāvañca parijānitvā yehi yathā saṃvasitabbaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t:889_6: Tañca kho akusalato vuṭṭhāpetvā kusale patiṭṭhāpanavasena,
tika-s0104t:889_14: na nīcataraṃ paṭipannassa attā uccatare ṭhapetabbo,
tika-s0104t:889_15: na ca paresu sabbena sabbaṃ asevinā bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:890_1: na ca paresaṃ purato piyepi garahati,
tika-s0104t:890_10: pamādāpanne satte abhiññābalena yathārahaṃ nirayādike dassento saṃvejetvā assaddhādike saddhādīsu patiṭṭhāpeti,
tika-s0104t:890_13: Evamassa mahāpurisassa cārittabhūto aparimāṇo puññābhisando kusalābhisando uparūpari abhivaḍḍhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:891_2: vattapaṭipattiṃ vā pūrentassa cetanādayo dhammā sīla”ntiādinā nayena nānappakārato sīlassa vitthārakathā visuddhimagge vuttā,
tika-s0104t:891_5: idha mahābodhisattavasena karuṇūpāyakosallapubbaṅgamaṃ katvā vattabbāti ayameva viseso.
tika-s0104t:891_6: Yato idaṃ sīlaṃ mahāpuriso yathā na attano duggatiyaṃ parikilesavimuttiyā,
tika-s0104t:891_8: na cakkavattī, na deva, na sakka, na māra,
tika-s0104t:891_15: atha kho sabbaññubhāvena sabbasattānaṃ anuttarasīlālaṅkārasampādanatthameva pariṇāmetīti ayaṃ sīlapāramiyā paṭipattikkamo.
tika-s0104t:892_0: Tathā yasmā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā ādīnavadassanapubbaṅgamā kāmehi ca bhavehi ca nikkhamanavasena pavattā kusalacittuppatti nekkhammapāramī,
tika-s0104t:892_4: kāmānañca “satthadhārālaggamadhubindu viya ca kadalī viya ca avaleyhamānaparittassādavipulānatthānubandhā”ti
tika-s0104t:892_5: ca vijjulatobhāsena gahetabbaṃ naccaṃ viya parittakālūpalabbhā,
tika-s0104t:892_10: balisāmisaṃ viya byāsanupanipātakāraṇā (byasanasannipātakāraṇā – dī. ni. ṭī. 1.7),
tika-s0104t:892_21: appassādatāya aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā”tiādinā ca nayena ādīnavaṃ sallakkhetvā tabbipariyāyena nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ
tika-s0104t:893_2: Pabbajjamanutiṭṭhantena mahāsattena asati buddhuppāde kammavādīnaṃ kiriyavādīnaṃ tāpasaparibbājakānaṃ pabbajjā anuṭṭhātabbā.
tika-s0104t:893_3: Uppannesu pana sammāsambuddhesu tesaṃ sāsane eva pabbajitabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:893_4: Pabbajitvā ca yathāvutte sīle patiṭṭhitena tassā eva sīlapāramiyā vodāpanatthaṃ dhutaguṇā samādātabbā.
tika-s0104t:893_5: Samādinnadhutadhammā hi mahāpurisā sammadeva te pariharantā appicchāsantuṭṭhasallekhapavivekaasaṃsaggavīriyārambhasubharatādiguṇasalilavikkhālitakilesamalatāya
tika-s0104t:893_6: anavajjasīlavataguṇaparisuddhasamācārā porāṇe ariyavaṃsattaye patiṭṭhitā catutthaṃ bhāvanārāmatāsaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0104t:893_7: ariyavaṃsaṃ gantuṃ cattārīsāya ārammaṇesu yathārahaṃ upacārappanābhedaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharanti.
tika-s0104t:893_9: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne terasahi dhutadhammehi saddhiṃ dasa kasiṇāni dasāsubhāni dasānussatiyo cattāro brahmavihārā
tika-s0104t:893_10: cattāro āruppā ekā saññā ekaṃ vavatthānanti cattārīsa samādhibhāvanākammaṭṭhānāni,
tika-s0104t:893_12: taṃ panetaṃ sabbaṃ yasmā visuddhimagge sabbākārato vitthāretvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:893_15: idha mahābodhisattassa vasena karuṇūpāyakosallapubbaṅgamaṃ katvā vattabbanti ayameva viseso.
tika-s0104t:894_0: Tathā paññāpāramiṃ sampādetukāmena yasmā paññā āloko viya andhakārena mohena saha na vattati,
tika-s0104t:894_3: arati tandī vijambhitā ālasiyaṃ gaṇasaṅgaṇikārāmatā niddāsīlatā anicchayasīlatā ñāṇasmiṃ akutūhalatā
tika-s0104t:894_4: micchādhimāno aparipucchakatā kāyassa nasammāparihāro asamāhitacittatā duppaññānaṃ puggalānaṃ sevanā
tika-s0104t:894_5: paññavantānaṃ apayirupāsanā attaparibhavo micchāvikappo viparītābhiniveso kāyadaḷhībahulatā asaṃvegasīlatā
tika-s0104t:894_7: saṅkhepato yevāpanadhamme āsevato anuppannā paññā nuppajjati,
tika-s0104t:895_1: pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo cattāri saccāni bāvīsatindriyāni dvādasapadiko paṭiccasamuppādo,
tika-s0104t:895_5: Iti evaṃ pakāraṃ sakalameva sutavisayaṃ upāyakosallapubbaṅgamāya paññāya, satiyā,
tika-s0104t:895_6: vīriyena ca sādhukaṃ uggahaṇasavanadhāraṇaparicayaparipucchāhi ogāhetvā tattha ca paresaṃ patiṭṭhāpanena sutamayā paññā nibbattetabbā,
tika-s0104t:895_8: āyāpāyaupāyakosallabhūtā ca paññā hitesitaṃ nissāya tattha tattha yathārahaṃ pavattetabbā,
tika-s0104t:895_9: tathā khandhādīnaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ ākāraparitakkanamukhena ceva nijjhānaṃ khamāpentena ca cintāmayā paññā nibbattetabbā.
tika-s0104t:896_0: Khandhādīnaṃyeva pana salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇapariggahaṇavasena lokiyapariññaṃ nibbattentena pubbabhāgabhāvanāpaññā sampādetabbā.
tika-s0104t:896_2: yathārahaṃ paccayehi uppajjati ceva nirujjhati ca,
tika-s0104t:896_3: na ettha koci kattā vā kāretā vā,
tika-s0104t:896_7: bāhirakadhamme ca nibbisesaṃ parijānanto tattha āsaṅgaṃ pajahanto,
tika-s0104t:896_8: pare ca tattha taṃ pajahāpento kevalaṃ karuṇāvaseneva yāva na buddhaguṇā hatthatalaṃ āgacchanti,
tika-s0104t:896_11: abhiññāyo ca lokiyavasībhāvaṃ pāpento paññāya matthakaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0104t:897_0: Tattha yācimā iddhividhañāṇaṃ dibbasotadhātuñāṇaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ
tika-s0104t:897_3: ñāṇaparicayaṃ katvā sīlavisuddhi cittavisuddhīti mūlabhūtāsu imāsu dvīsu visuddhīsu patiṭṭhāya diṭṭhivisuddhi
tika-s0104t:897_5: sarīrabhūtā imā pañca visuddhiyo sampādentena bhāvetabbā lokiyalokuttarabhedā bhāvanāpaññā,
tika-s0104t:897_6: tāsaṃ sampādanavidhānaṃ yasmā “tattha ‘ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī’tiādikaṃ iddhivikubbanaṃ kātukāmena ādikammikena yoginā”tiādinā,
tika-s0104t:897_7: “khandhāti pañcha khandhā rūpakkhandho vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho viññāṇakkhandho”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:897_9: pakiṇṇakakathā) saddhiṃ visuddhimagge sabbākārato vitthāretvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:897_11: Kevalañhi tattha sāvakabodhisattassa vasena paññā āgatā,
tika-s0104t:897_12: idha mahābodhisattassa vasena karuṇūpāyakosallapubbaṅgamaṃ katvā vattabbā.
tika-s0104t:897_13: Ñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ apāpetvā paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiyaṃyeva vipassanā ṭhapetabbāti ayameva visesoti.
tika-s0104t:898_0: Tathā yasmā sammāsambodhiyā katābhinīhārena mahāsattena pāramīparipūraṇatthaṃ sabbakālaṃ yuttappayuttena bhavitabbaṃ ābaddhaparikaraṇena,
tika-s0104t:898_1: tasmā kālena kālaṃ “ko nu kho ajja mayā puññasambhāro,
tika-s0104t:898_3: kiṃ vā mayā parahitaṃ kata”nti divase divase paccavekkhantena sattahitatthaṃ ussāho karaṇīyo,
tika-s0104t:898_4: sabbesampi sattānaṃ upakārāya attano pariggahabhūtaṃ vatthuṃ, kāyaṃ,
tika-s0104t:898_11: sabbāsu ca itikattabbatāsu upāyakosallaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:899_0: Tasmiṃ tasmiñca sattahite āraddhavīriyena bhavitabbaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādisabbasahena avisaṃvādinā.
tika-s0104t:899_10: Iminā hi upāyena dānādīsu yuttappayuttassa thāmavato daḷhaparakkamassa mahāsattassa bodhisattassa aparimeyyo puññasambhāro,
tika-s0104t:900_2: jīvitañca pariccajitvā khuppipāsasītuṇhavātātapādidukkhapatikāro pariyesitabbo ca uppādetabbo ca,
tika-s0104t:900_5: araññāyatanesu ca kāyacittasantāpābhāvena abhinibbutattā attanā sukhaṃ paṭilabhati,
tika-s0104t:900_7: mahābodhisattā ca nekkhammapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitā”ti ca “diṭṭhadhammikasukhavihārabhūtaṃ īdisaṃ nāma jhānasamāpattisukhamanubhavantī”ti ca,
tika-s0104t:901_0: Samāhitabhūmiyaṃ pana patiṭṭhito attanā yathānubhūtaṃ visesādhigamanibbattaṃ pītiṃ,
tika-s0104t:901_4: tassa ca nimittabhūte kilesābhisaṅkhāradukkhe nimuggaṃ sattanikāyaṃ disvā tatrāpi khādanachedanabhedanasedanapisanahiṃsanaaggisantāpādijanitā
tika-s0104t:901_5: dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā nirantaraṃ cirakālaṃ vedayante narake,
tika-s0104t:901_9: uddhabāhu viravante nijjhāmataṇhikādike mahādukkhaṃ vedayamāne pete ca pariyeṭṭhimūlakaṃ mahantaṃ anayabyasanaṃ
tika-s0104t:901_14: tiracchānagate ca atisayante apāyadukkhanibbisesaṃ dukkhamanubhavante manusse ca tathā visayaparibhogavikkhittacittatāya
tika-s0104t:901_17: 1.7) kāmāvacaradeve ca mahatā vāyāmena vidūramākāsaṃ vigāhitasakuntā viya,
tika-s0104t:901_18: balavatā dūre pāṇinā khittasarā viya ca “satipi cirappavattiyaṃ anaccantikatāya pātapariyosānā anatikkantajātijarāmaraṇā
tika-s0104t:901_19: evā”ti rūpāvacarārūpāvacaradeve ca passantena mahantaṃ saṃvegaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā mettāya,
tika-s0104t:901_22: manasā ca bodhisambhāre nirantaraṃ upacinantena yathā pāramiyo paripūrenti,
tika-s0104t:901_23: evaṃ sakkaccakārinā sātaccakārinā anolīnavuttinā ussāho pavattetabbo,
tika-s0104t:902_21: yathāsutassa dhammassa paresaṃ hitajjhāsayena desanāya ārambhadaḷhatā,
tika-s0104t:902_29: navalokuttarāvakkantī”ti evamādikā sabbāpi bodhisambhārapaṭipatti vīriyānubhāveneva samijjhatīti abhinīhārato
tika-s0104t:902_30: yāva mahābodhi anossajjantena sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ vīriyaṃ yathā uparūpari visesāvahaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t:902_33: khantisaccādhiṭṭhānādayo ca dānasīlādayo ca sabbepi bodhisambhārā tadadhīnavuttitāya sampannā eva hontītikhantiādīsupi
tika-s0104t:903_0: Iti sattānaṃ sukhūpakaraṇapariccāgena bahudhānuggahakaraṇaṃ dānena paṭipatti,
tika-s0104t:903_9: upekkhāya nesaṃ upakārāpakāresu vikārānāpattīti evaṃ aparimāṇe satte ārabbha anukampitasabbasattassa
tika-s0104t:903_10: bodhisattassa puthujjanehi asādhāraṇo aparimāṇo puññañāṇasambhārupacayo ettha paṭipattīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:907_0: Dasa pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyoti hi samatiṃsa pāramiyo.
tika-s0104t:907_1: Tattha “katābhinīhārassa bodhisattassa parahitakaraṇābhininnāsayapayogassa kaṇhadhammavokiṇṇā sukkā dhammā pāramiyo,
tika-s0104t:907_9: buddhabhūmiyaṃ balavesārajjasamadhigamena ubhayahitaparipūraṇato paramatthapāramiyoti evaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānesu
tika-s0104t:909_3: Tathā puttadārādikassa tividhassāpi hetu avītikkamanavasena tisso sīlapāramiyo,
tika-s0104t:909_4: tesu eva tividhesu vatthūsu ālayaṃ upacchinditvā nikkhamanavasena tisso nekkhammapāramiyo,
tika-s0104t:909_5: upakaraṇaaṅgajīvitataṇhaṃ samūhanitvā sattānaṃ hitāhitavinicchayakaraṇavasena tisso paññāpāramiyo,
tika-s0104t:909_9: dānādipāramiyo akuppādhiṭṭhānavaseneva samijjhantīti upakaraṇādivināsepi acalādhiṭṭhānavasena tisso adhiṭṭhānapāramiyo,
tika-s0104t:909_10: upakaraṇādivighātakesupi sattesu mettāya avijahanavasena tisso mettāpāramiyo,
tika-s0104t:909_11: yathāvuttavatthuttayassa upakārāpakāresu sattasaṅkhāresu majjhattatāpaṭilābhavasena tisso upekkhāpāramiyoti evamādinā etāsaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:913_0: Yathā hi esā vibhāgato tiṃsavidhāpi dānapāramiādibhāvato dasavidhā,
tika-s0104t:913_2: Etāsu hi nekkhammapāramī sīlapāramiyā saṅgahitā tassā pabbajjābhāve.
tika-s0104t:914_0: Etesañca dānādīnaṃ channaṃ guṇānaṃ aññamaññasambandhānaṃ pañcadasa yugaḷādīni pañcadasa yugaḷādisādhakāni honti.
tika-s0104t:915_0: Evaṃ chabbidhānampi pana imāsaṃ pāramīnaṃ catūhi adhiṭṭhānehi saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:915_14: Tattha avisesato tāva katābhinīhārassa anukampitasabbasattassa mahāsattassa paṭiññānurūpaṃ sabbapāramīpariggahato saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:916_0: Visesato pana “yācakānaṃ janānaṃ avisaṃvādetvā dassāmī”ti paṭijānanato,
tika-s0104t:917_15: ñāṇānuparivattanato cāti evaṃ sabbāpi pāramiyo saccappabhāvitā cāgaparibyañjitā upasamopabrūhitā paññāparisuddhā.
tika-s0104t:918_0: Tattha mahāpurisā satataṃ attahitaparahitakarehi garupiyabhāvakarehi saccacāgādhiṭṭhānehi gihibhūtā āmisadānena pare anuggaṇhanti.
tika-s0104t:918_3: upasamapaññādhiṭṭhānehi ca pabbajitabhūtā dhammadānena pare anuggaṇhanti.
tika-s0104t:919_2: Tatrāpi hi gabbhāvakkantiabhinikkhamanesu paññādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena sato sampajāno saccādhiṭṭhānapāripūriyā
tika-s0104t:919_3: sampatijāto uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gantvā sabbā disā oloketvā saccānuparivattinā vacasā “aggohamasmi lokassa,
tika-s0104t:920_1: Tattha hi yathāpaṭiññaṃ saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ abhisamayo.
tika-s0104t:921_0: Tatiye ṭhāne dhammacakkappavattane caturadhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇanti aññe.
tika-s0104t:921_1: Tattha hi saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa dvādasahi ākārehi ariyasaccadesanāya saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:921_3: upasamādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa sayaṃ upasantassa paresaṃ upasamanena upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:922_0: Catutthe ṭhāne parinibbāne caturadhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇanti apare.
tika-s0104t:923_0: Tatra mahāpurisassa visesena mettākhette abhijātiyaṃ saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa saccādhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇamabhibyattaṃ,
tika-s0104t:923_3: visesena upekkhākhette parinibbāne upasamādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa upasamādhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇamabhibyattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:924_5: Tathā saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena dosāgatiṃ na gacchati avisaṃvādanato,
tika-s0104t:925_6: Tathā vivekajapītisukhasamādhijapītisukhaapītijakāyasukha satipārisuddhijaupekkhāsukhuppattiyo etehi catūhi yathākkamaṃ hontīti.
tika-s0104t:925_11: Karuṇāpaññāpariggahitā hi dānādiguṇā mahābodhisambhārā bhavanti buddhattasiddhipariyosānāti.
tika-s0104t:929_0: Sakalassāpi hi puññādisambhārassa sammāsambodhiṃ uddissa anavasesasambharaṇaṃ avekallakāritāyogena,
tika-s0104t:929_4: Taṃ panassa kālaparimāṇaṃ parato āvi bhavissati.
tika-s0104t:930_0: Tathā mahāsattena bodhāya paṭipajjantena sammāsambodhāya buddhānaṃ puretarameva attā niyyātetabbo “imāhaṃ attabhāvaṃ buddhānaṃ niyyātemī”ti.
tika-s0104t:930_1: Taṃ taṃ pariggahavatthuñca paṭilābhato puretarameva dānamukhe nissajjitabbaṃ “yaṃ kiñci mayhaṃ uppajjanakaṃ jīvitaparikkhārajātaṃ,
tika-s0104t:930_3: tesaṃ pana dinnāvasesaṃ eva mayā paribhuñjitabba”nti.
tika-s0104t:931_0: Evañhissa sammadeva pariccāgāya kate cittābhisaṅkhāre yaṃ uppajjati pariggahavatthu aviññāṇakaṃ,
tika-s0104t:931_2: tattha ye ime pubbe dāne akataparicayo,
tika-s0104t:931_7: paccupaṭṭhite ca yācakajane dāne cittaṃ na pakkhandati na kamati,
tika-s0104t:931_8: tena niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ “addhāhaṃ dāne pubbe akataparicayo,
tika-s0104t:931_9: tena me etarahi dātukamyatā citte na saṇṭhātī”ti.
tika-s0104t:931_10: So “evaṃ me ito paraṃ dānābhirataṃ cittaṃ bhavissati,
tika-s0104t:931_12: nanu mayā paṭikacceva pariggahavatthuṃ yācakānaṃ pariccatta”nti dānaṃ deti muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato.
tika-s0104t:931_13: Evaṃ mahāsattassa paṭhamo dānavinibandho hato hoti vihato samucchinno.
tika-s0104t:932_0: Tathā mahāsatto deyyadhammassa parittabhāve sati paccayavekalle iti paṭisañcikkhati “ahaṃ kho pubbe adānasīlatāya etarahi evaṃ paccayavekallo jāto,
tika-s0104t:932_1: tasmā idāni mayā parittena vā hīnena vā yathāladdhena deyyadhammena attānaṃ pīḷetvāpi dānameva dātabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:932_2: yenāhaṃ āyatimpi dānapāramiṃ matthakaṃ pāpessāmī”ti so itarītarena dānaṃ deti muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato.
tika-s0104t:932_3: Evaṃ mahāsattassa dutiyo dānavinibandho hato hoti vihato samucchinno.
tika-s0104t:933_0: Tathā mahāsatto deyyadhammassa uḷāramanuññatāya adātukamyatācitte uppajjamāne iti paṭisañcikkhati “nanu
tika-s0104t:933_1: tayā sappurisa uḷāratamā sabbaseṭṭhā sammāsambodhi abhipatthitā,
tika-s0104t:933_2: tasmā tadatthaṃ tayā uḷāramanuññe eva deyyadhamme dātuṃ yuttarūpa”nti.
tika-s0104t:933_4: manuññañca dānaṃ deti muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato.
tika-s0104t:933_5: Evaṃ mahāpurisassa tatiyo dānavinibandho hato hoti vihato samucchinno.
tika-s0104t:934_0: Tathā mahāsatto dānaṃ dento yadā deyyadhammassa parikkhayaṃ passati,
tika-s0104t:934_1: so iti paṭisañcikkhati “ayaṃ kho bhogānaṃ sabhāvo,
tika-s0104t:934_3: apica me pubbe tādisassa dānassa akatattā evaṃ bhogānaṃ parikkhayo dissati,
tika-s0104t:934_7: So yathāladdhena dānaṃ deti muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato.
tika-s0104t:934_8: Evaṃ mahāsattassa catuttho dānavinibandho hato hoti vihato samucchinno.
tika-s0104t:934_9: Evaṃ ye ye dānapāramiyā vinibandhabhūtā anatthā,
tika-s0104t:934_10: tesaṃ tesaṃ yathārahaṃ paccavekkhitvā paṭivinodanaṃ upāyo.
tika-s0104t:935_2: buddhānañca attānaṃ niyyātetvā ṭhito mahāpuriso tattha tattha bodhisambhārapāripūriyā ghaṭento vāyamanto sarīrassa,
tika-s0104t:935_3: sukhūpakaraṇānañca upacchedakesu dussahesupi kiccesu (kicchesu cariyā. aṭṭha.
tika-s0104t:935_4: pakiṇṇakakathā) durabhisambhavesupi sattasaṅkhārasamupanītesu anatthesu tibbesu pāṇaharesu “ayaṃ mayā attabhāvo buddhānaṃ pariccatto,
tika-s0104t:935_5: yaṃ vā taṃ vā ettha hotū”ti tannimittaṃ na kampati na vedhati īsakampi aññathattaṃ na gacchati,
tika-s0104t:936_0: Apica samāsato katābhinīhārassa attani sinehassa pariyādānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:936_2: pakiṇṇakakathā) paresu ca sinehassa parivaḍḍhanaṃ etāsaṃ sampādanūpāyo.
tika-s0104t:936_3: Sammāsambodhisamadhigamāya hi katamahāpaṇidhānassa mahāsattassa yāthāvato parijānanena sabbesu dhammesu
tika-s0104t:936_4: anupalittassa attani sineho parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0104t:936_6: pakiṇṇakakathā) pana piyaputte viya sabbasatte sampassamānassa tesu mettākaruṇāsineho parivaḍḍhati,
tika-s0104t:936_7: tato ca taṃ tadāvatthānurūpaṃ attaparasantānesu lobhadosamohavigamena vidūrīkatamacchariyādibodhisambhārapaṭipakkho
tika-s0104t:936_8: mahāpuriso dānapiyavacanaatthacariyā samānattatāsaṅkhātehi catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi caturadhiṭṭhānānugatehi
tika-s0104t:936_9: accantaṃ janassa saṅgahakaraṇena upari yānattaye avatāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:937_6: Tesañhi sabbepi satte attanā nibbisese katvā bodhisambhāresu paṭipajjantānaṃ sabbattha samānasukhadukkhatāya samānattatāsiddhi.
tika-s0104t:937_7: Buddhabhūtānampi ca teheva catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi caturadhiṭṭhānena paripūritābhibuddhehi janassa accantikasaṅgahakaraṇena abhivinayanaṃ sijjhati.
tika-s0104t:941_0: Nirapekkho ca sabbattha, aho acchariyo jino.
tika-s0104t:943_0: Sadā sattahite yutto, aho acchariyo jino.
tika-s0104t:944_0: Sabbadā sabbasattānaṃ, hitāya ca sukhāya ca;
tika-s0104t:945_0: Uyyutto akilāsū ca, aho acchariyo jino”ti. ;
tika-s0104t:948_0: Tiṇṇampi bodhisattānaṃ, vasā kālo tidhā mato.
tika-s0104t:949_0: Heṭṭhimena hi tāva paricchedena cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni,
tika-s0104t:949_6: Ete ca bhedā yathākkamaṃ paññādhikasaddhādhikavīriyādhikavasena veditabbā.
tika-s0104t:949_11: Paññānubhāvena ca sammāsambodhi abhigantabbāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:950_0: Apare pana “vīriyassa tikkhamajjhimamudubhāvena bodhisattānaṃ ayaṃ kālavibhāgo”ti vadanti,
tika-s0104t:950_1: avisesena pana vimuttiparipācanīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ tikkhamajjhimamudubhāvena yathāvuttakālabhedena bodhisambhārā
tika-s0104t:950_2: tesaṃ pāripūriṃ gacchantīti tayopete kālabhedā yuttātipi vadanti.
tika-s0104t:950_3: Evaṃ tividhā hi bodhisattā abhinīhārakkhaṇe bhavanti eko ugghaṭitaññū,
tika-s0104t:950_7: so sammāsambuddhassa sammukhā catuppadagāthaṃ suṇanto gāthāya tatiyapade apariyosite eva chahi abhiññāhi
tika-s0104t:950_8: saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ adhigantuṃ samatthupanissayo hoti,
tika-s0104t:951_0: Dutiyo bhagavato sammukhā catuppadagāthaṃ suṇanto apariyosite eva gāthāya catutthapade chahi abhiññāhi arahattaṃ adhigantuṃ samatthupanissayo hoti,
tika-s0104t:952_0: Itaro pana bhagavato sammukhā catuppadagāthaṃ sutvā pariyositāya gāthāya chahi abhiññāhi arahattaṃ adhigantuṃ samatthupanissayo hoti.
tika-s0104t:953_1: buddhānaṃ santike laddhabyākaraṇā ca anukkamena pāramiyo pūrentā yathākkamaṃ yathāvuttabhedena kālena sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇanti.
tika-s0104t:953_2: Tesu tesu pana kālabhedesu aparipuṇṇesu te te mahāsattā divase divase vessantaradānasadisaṃ mahādānaṃ
tika-s0104t:953_3: dentāpi tadanurūpe sīlādisabbapāramidhamme ācinantāpi pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajantāpi ñātatthacariyaṃ
tika-s0104t:953_4: lokatthacariyaṃ buddhatthacariyaṃ paramakoṭiṃ pāpentāpi antarāva sammāsambuddhā bhavissantīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Kasmā?
tika-s0104t:953_7: Paricchinnakālanipphāditaṃ viya hi sassaṃ yathāvuttakālaparicchedena parinipphāditā sammāsambodhi tadantarā
tika-s0104t:953_8: pana sabbussāhena vāyamantenāpi na sakkā adhigantunti pāramipāripūri yathāvuttakālavisesena sampajjatīti
tika-s0104t:959_0: Nijjhāmataṇhā khuppipāsā, na honti kālakañcikā. (kālakañcikā cariyā. aṭṭha. pakiṇṇakakathā);
tika-s0104t:960_0: Na honti khuddakā pāṇā, upapajjantāpi duggatiṃ;
tika-s0104t:961_0: Jāyamānā manussesu, jaccandhā na bhavanti te.
tika-s0104t:964_0: Na bhavanti pariyāpannā, bodhiyā niyatā narā;
tika-s0104t:968_0: Suddhāvāsesu devesu, hetu nāma na vijjati;
tika-s0104t:971_1: ye ca “sato sampajāno ānanda bodhisatto tusitā kāyā cavitvā mātukucchiṃ okkamatī”tiādinā soḷasa acchariyabbhutadhammappakārā,
tika-s0104t:971_5: bodhisatte ayaṃ dasasahassilokadhātu saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhatī”tiādinā ca dvattiṃsa pubbanimittappakārā,
tika-s0104t:971_7: kammādīsu ca vasibhāvoti evamādayo tattha tattha jātakabuddhavaṃsādīsu dassitappakārā ānisaṃsā,
tika-s0104t:972_0: Apica yasmā bodhisatto abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya sabbasattānaṃ pitusamo hoti hitesitāya,
tika-s0104t:972_1: dakkhiṇeyyako garu bhāvanīyo paramañca puññakkhettaṃ hoti guṇavisesayogena,
tika-s0104t:972_7: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ uḷārena vaṇṇena uḷārena yasena uḷārena sukhena uḷārena balena uḷārena ādhipateyyena aññe satte abhibhavati puññavisesayogato.
tika-s0104t:973_16: tattha sattānaṃ bhayādayo upaddavā yebhuyyena anuppannā nuppajjanti,
tika-s0104t:973_19: na tattha pacurajano viya dukkhena adhimattaṃ pīḷīyati,
tika-s0104t:973_21: Tasmā mahāpurisassa yathārahaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave labbhamānā ete sattānaṃ pitusamatādakkhiṇeyyatādayo guṇavisesā ānisaṃsāti veditabbā.
tika-s0104t:974_0: Tathā āyusampadā rūpasampadā kulasampadā issariyasampadā ādeyyavacanatā mahānubhāvatāti etepi mahāpurisassa pāramīnaṃ ānisaṃsāti veditabbā.
tika-s0104t:974_1: Tattha āyusampadā nāma tassaṃ tassaṃ upapattiyaṃ dīghāyukatā ciraṭṭhitikatā,
tika-s0104t:974_5: tāya rūpappamāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ pasādāvaho hoti sambhāvanīyo.
tika-s0104t:974_20: sayameva pana pare aññadatthu abhibhavati dhammena, samena,
tika-s0104t:974_23: sayañca aparimāṇassa puññasambhārassa parivuddhihetubhūtā yānattaye sattānaṃ avatāraṇassa paripācanassa kāraṇabhūtāti veditabbā.
tika-s0104t:978_0: Samāsato hi tāva sammāsambuddhabhāvo etāsaṃ phalaṃ.
tika-s0104t:978_6: yāvatā pana buddhaguṇā ye anekehipi kappehi sammāsambuddhenāpi vācāya pariyosāpetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0104t:984_0: Evaṃ yathāvuttāya paṭipadāya yathāvuttavibhāgānaṃ pāramīnaṃ pūritabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha “samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā”ti.
tika-s0104t:984_5: pariggahapariccāgabhāvasāmaññepi dhanarajjapariccāgato puttadārapariccāgassa visuṃ gahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0104t:984_8: katthaci pana puttadārapariccāge visuṃ katvā nayanapariccāgamaññatra jīvitapariccāgaṃ vā pakkhipitvā
tika-s0104t:985_5: Dānādipaṭipatti vā kāyavivekavasena ekacariyā vā pubbacariyā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0104t:985_7: sattānaṃ bodhittaye patiṭṭhāpanaparipācanavasena ca pavattā kathā dhammakkhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:985_18: Tathā amhākampi bhagavā āgatoti etthāpi “dānapāramiṃ pūretvā”tiādinā sambandho.
tika-s0104t:986_0: Evaṃ pāramipūraṇavasena “tathā āgato”ti padassatthaṃ dassetvā idāni bodhipakkhiyadhammavasenapi dassento “cattāro satipaṭṭhāne”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:986_1: Tattha satipaṭṭhānādiggahaṇena āgamanapaṭipadaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dasseti maggaphalapakkhikānaññeva gahetabbattā,
tika-s0104t:986_2: vipassanāsaṅgahitā eva vā satipaṭṭhānādayo daṭṭhabbā pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya gahaṇato.
tika-s0104t:986_8: Tasmā “āgato”ti vuttassa āgamanassa kāraṇabhūtapaṭipadāvisesadassanaṃyeva tiṇṇaṃ nayānaṃ visesoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:986_9: Idāni yathāvuttena atthayojanattayena siddhaṃ paṭhamakāraṇameva gāthābandhavasena dassetuṃ “yathevā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:986_10: Tattha idhalokamhi vipassiādayo munayo sabbaññubhāvaṃ yathāvuttena kāraṇattayena āgatā yatheva,
tika-s0104t:986_11: tathā pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā ayaṃ sakyamunipi yena kāraṇena āgato,
tika-s0104t:987_1: na pana mātukucchito nikkhantamatto mātukucchito nikkhantamattañhi mahāsattaṃ paṭhamaṃ brahmāno suvaṇṇajālena paṭiggaṇhiṃsu,
tika-s0104t:987_10: “Ettha ca chattaggahaṇeneva khaggadīni pañca kakudhabhaṇḍānipi gahitānevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:987_11: Khaggatālavaṇṭamorahatthakavālabījanīuṇhīsapaṭṭāpi hi chattena saha tadā upaṭṭhitā ahesuṃ.
tika-s0104t:987_14: ācariyasāriputtattherenāpi aṅguttaraṭīkāyaṃ evaṃ sati tālavaṇṭādīnampi kakudhabhaṇḍasamaññā.
tika-s0104t:987_16: tadaññānipi tālavaṇṭādīni tadā upaṭṭhitānīti adhippāyena tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:988_1: Anuviloketīti puññānubhāvena lokavivaraṇapāṭihāriye jāte paññāyamānaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ maṃsacakkhunāva oloketīti attho.
tika-s0104t:988_3: Mahāsatto hi manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā puratthimaṃ disaṃ olokesi.
tika-s0104t:988_4: Tattha devamanussā gandhamālādīhi pūjayamānā “mahāpurisa idha tumhehi sadisopi natthi,
tika-s0104t:988_6: Evaṃ catasso disā catasso anudisā heṭṭhā uparīti sabbā disāanuviloketvā sabbattha attanā sadisamadisvā
tika-s0104t:988_7: “ayaṃ uttarā disā”ti sattapadavītihārena agamāsīti ācariyadhammapālattherena ācariyasāriputtattherena
tika-s0104t:988_10: Tasmā sattapadavītihārato paṭhamaṃ sabbadisānuvilokanaṃ katvā sattapadavītihārena gantvā tadupari āsabhiṃ vācaṃ bhāsatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Idha,
tika-s0104t:988_11: pana aññāsu ca aṭṭhakathāsu samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahanato paṭṭhāya yāva āsabhīvācābhāsanaṃ tāva yathākkamaṃ
tika-s0104t:988_12: eva pubbanimittabhāvaṃ vibhāvento “sattamapadūpari ṭhatvā sabbadisānuvilokanaṃ sabbaññutānāvaraṇañāṇapaṭilābhassā”tiādīni vadati,
tika-s0104t:988_15: “Sattamapadūpari ṭhatvā”ti ca pāṭho pacchā pamādalekhavasena edisena vacanakkamena mahāpadānaṭṭhakathāyamadissamānattāti.
tika-s0104t:988_30: natthi dāni punabbhavoti imasmiṃ attabhāve pattabbaṃ arahattaṃ byākāsi tabbaseneva punabbhavābhāvato.
tika-s0104t:989_9: Pubbanimittanti tappaṭilābhasaṅkhātassa āyatiṃ uppajjamānakassa hitassa paṭhamaṃ pavattaṃ sañjānanakāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:989_10: Bhagavato hi acchariyabbhutaguṇavisesādhigamane pañca mahāsupinādayo viya etāni sañjānananimittāni pātubhavanti,
tika-s0104t:990_5: So pana samagamane dvinnaṃ padānamantare muṭṭhiratanamattanti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:995_0: Suttanipāte nāḷakasutte āyasmatā ānandattherena vuttaṃ nidānagāthāpadaṃ sandhāya “suvaṇṇadaṇḍā vītipatanti cāmarāti etthā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:995_2: Mahāpadānasutte anāgatattā pana cāmarukkhepassa tathā vacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:995_3: Tattha āgatānusārena hi idha pubbanimittabhāvaṃ vadati,
tika-s0104t:995_17: etena ca abhijātiyaṃ dhammatāvasena uppajjanakavisesā sabbabodhisattānaṃ sādhāraṇāti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:996_1: Gavampati usabho samehi pādehi vasūnaṃ ratanānaṃ dhāraṇato vasundarasaṅkhātaṃ bhūmiṃ phusī yathā,
tika-s0104t:996_2: tathā manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā muhuttajāto so gotamo samehi pādehi vasundharaṃ phusīti attho.
tika-s0104t:996_9: Mahāpuriso hi yathā ekaṃ disaṃ vilokesi,
tika-s0104t:996_11: na katthaci vilokane vinibandho tassa ahosi,
tika-s0104t:996_13: Na hi tadā bodhisattassa virūpabībhacchavisamarūpāni viloketumayuttāni disāsu upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-s0104t:996_14: vissaṭṭhamañjūviññeyyādivasena aṭṭhaṅgupetaṃ giraṃ abbhudīrayi pabbatamuddhaniṭṭhito sīho yathā abhinadīti attho.
tika-s0104t:997_0: Evaṃ kāyagamanatthena gatasaddena tathāgatasaddaṃ niddisitvā idāni ñāṇagamanatthena niddisituṃ “atha vā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:997_1: Tattha “yathā vipassī bhagavā”tiādīsupi “nekkhammena kāmacchandaṃ pahāyā”tiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:997_3: Kusalā hi dhammā idha nekkhammaṃ tesaṃ sabbesampi kāmacchandapaṭipakkhattā,
tika-s0104t:997_6: tadayuttameva paṭhamajjhānassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya eva idha icchitattā.
tika-s0104t:997_14: paṭipattisaṅkhātaṃ vā gamanaṃ kāmacchandādippahānena ca taṃ lakkhīyati,
tika-s0104t:998_0: Evaṃ kāmacchandādinīvaraṇappahānena “abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyā”tiādinā vuttāya paṭhamajjhānassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya
tika-s0104t:998_1: bhagavato ñāṇagamanavisiṭṭhaṃ tathāgatabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni saha upāyena aṭṭhahi samāpattīhi,
tika-s0104t:998_3: Nāmarūpapariggahakaṅkhāvitaraṇānañhi vinibandhabhūtassa mohassa dūrīkaraṇena ñātapariññāyaṃ ṭhitassa aniccasaññādayo sijjhanti,
tika-s0104t:998_6: tattha anabhiratiyā vinoditāya jhānādīnaṃ samadhigamoti samāpattiyā arativinodanaṃ upāyo.
tika-s0104t:998_7: Samāpattivipassanānukkamena pana upari vakkhamānanayena niddisitabbepi nīvaraṇasabhāvāya avijjāya heṭṭhā
tika-s0104t:999_1: “Rattiṃ anuvitakketvā anuvicāretvā divā kammante payojetī”ti majjhimāgamavare mūlapaṇṇāsake vammikasutte
tika-s0104t:999_2: vuttaṭṭhāne viya vitakkavicārā vūpasamā [dhūmāyanā ] adhippetāti sandhāya “vitakkavicāradhūmaṃ vūpasametvā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1000_0: Rūpasaññāti saññāsīsena rūpāvacarajjhānāni ceva tadārammaṇāni ca vuttāni.
tika-s0104t:1000_1: Rūpāvacarajjhānampi hi “rūpa”nti vuccati uttarapadalopena “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādīsu tassa ārammaṇampi
tika-s0104t:1000_2: kasiṇarūpaṃ purimapadalopena “bahiddhā rūpāni passati suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”tiādīsu tasmā idha rūpe rūpajjhāne
tika-s0104t:1000_3: taṃsahagatā saññā rūpasaññāti evaṃ saññāsīsena rūpāvacarajjhānāni vuttāni,
tika-s0104t:1000_6: Evaṃ pathavīkasiṇādibhedassa tadārammaṇassa cetaṃ adhivacananti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1000_8: rūpādīnaṃ ārammaṇānañca paṭighātena paṭihananena visayivisayasamodhānena samuppannā dvipañcaviññāṇasahagatā saññā.
tika-s0104t:1000_14: Etā hi yasmā rūpasaddādibhede nānatte nānāsabhāve gocare pavattanti,
tika-s0104t:1000_15: yasmā ca nānattā nānāsabhāvā aññamaññaṃ asadisā,
tika-s0104t:1001_2: tebhūmakadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ gahetvā pavattāya vipassanāyetaṃ nāmaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1001_11: āyatiṃ samudayavasena na uppajjantī”ti evaṃ vā anupassanā nirodhānupassanā.
tika-s0104t:1002_3: Issarakuttādivasena loko samuppannoti abhiniveso sammohābhiniveso nāma.
tika-s0104t:1002_4: Keci pana “ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna’ntiādinā pavattasaṃsayāpatti sammohābhiniveso”ti vadanti.
tika-s0104t:1002_8: rūpādīsu ca abhinivesavasena pavattiyā ālayābhinivesoti keci.
tika-s0104t:1002_11: tattha ārammaṇakaraṇasaṅkhātena anupassanena pavattiyā vivaṭṭānupassanā, gotrabhu.
tika-s0104t:1002_16: aññathā dassanapahātabbā ca dutiyamaggavajjhehipi oḷārikāti tesampi tabbacanīyatā siyā.
tika-s0104t:1002_21: Na hi paṭhamādimaggehi pahīnā kilesā puna pahīyanti.
tika-s0104t:1002_22: Sabbasaddo cettha sappadesavisayo “sabbe tasanti daṇḍassā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0104t:1003_2: Lokiyavāyunā bhastassa viya yena taṃtaṃkalāpassa uddhumāyanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1003_5: Vijjamānepi kalāpantarabhūtānaṃ kalāpantarabhūtehi phuṭṭhabhāve taṃtaṃbhūtavivittatā rūpapariyanto ākāsoti yesaṃ yo paricchedo,
tika-s0104t:1003_7: aññathā bhūtānaṃ paricchedabhāvo na siyā byāpitabhāvāpattito.
tika-s0104t:1004_2: Tathā hi suttantabhājaniye saṅkhārakkhandhavibhaṅge “cakkhusamphassajā cetanā”tiādinā cetanāva vibhattā.
tika-s0104t:1004_5: kusalā cetanā”tiādi sampayuttadhammānaṃ ārammaṇe ṭhapanaṃ abhiniropanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1004_13: Līnuddhaccarahite adhicitte vattamāne paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu abyāvaṭatāya ajjhupekkhanaṃ paṭisaṅkhānaṃ pakkhapātupacchedato.
tika-s0104t:1005_0: Musāvādādīnaṃ visaṃvādanādikiccatāya lūkhānaṃ apariggāhakānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato pariggāhakasabhāvā sammāvācā siniddhabhāvato sampayuttadhamme,
tika-s0104t:1005_1: sammāvācāpaccayasubhāsitaṃ sotārañca puggalaṃ pariggaṇhātīti sā pariggahalakkhaṇā.
tika-s0104t:1005_3: sayañca samuṭṭhānaṃ ghaṭanaṃ hotīti sammākammantasaṅkhātā virati samuṭṭhānalakkhaṇāti daṭṭhabbā,
tika-s0104t:1005_4: sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā ukkhipanaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ kāyikakiriyāya bhārukkhipanaṃ viya.
tika-s0104t:1006_1: na pana “saṅkhārā saṅkhārakkhandho”tiādīsu viya samapaññāsacetasikāti vuttaṃ “saṅkhārānaṃ cetanālakkhaṇa”nti.
tika-s0104t:1006_6: Taṇhāya hetulakkhaṇati ettha vaṭṭassa janakahetubhāvo taṇhāya hetulakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1006_7: maggassa pana vakkhamānassa nibbānasampāpakattanti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-s0104t:1006_17: Yuganaddhā nāma samathavipassanā aññamaññopakāratāya yugaḷavasena bandhitabbato.
tika-s0104t:1006_31: sammā vā odahanti sampiṇḍitā bhavanti sampayuttadhammā anenātipi samodhānaṃ, phasso,
tika-s0104t:1006_34: Tāya hi vinā appavattamānā sampayuttadhammā vedanānubhavananimittaṃ samosaṭā viya hontīti evaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1006_36: Pāsādādīsu gopānasīnaṃ kūṭaṃ viya sampayuttadhammānaṃ pāmokkhabhāvo pamukhalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1006_39: tesaṃ vā sampayuttadhammānaṃ uttari padhānaṃ tatuttari,
tika-s0104t:1006_45: Ayañca lakkhaṇavibhāgo chadhātupañcajhānaṅgādivasena taṃtaṃsuttapadānusārena porāṇaṭṭhakathāyamāgatanayena vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1006_46: Tathā hi pubbe vuttopi koci dhammo pariyāyantarappakāsanatthaṃ puna dassito.
tika-s0104t:1006_47: Tato eva ca “chandamūlakā dhammā manasikārasamuṭṭhānā phassasamodhānā vedanāsamosaraṇā”ti “paññuttarā kusalā dhammā”ti,
tika-s0104t:1006_50: 3.512 (atthato samānaṃ)] ca suttapadānaṃ vasena chandassa mūlalakkhaṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1006_51: Tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti atthaṃ dasseti “eva”ntiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1006_52: Taṃ pana gamanaṃ idha ñāṇagamanamevāti vuttaṃ “ñāṇagatiyā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1006_53: Satipi gatasaddassa avabodhanatthabhāve ñāṇagamanattheneveso siddhoti na vutto. Ā-
tika-s0104t:1007_4: Saccasaṃyuttādīsu āgataṃ paripuṇṇasaccacatukkakathaṃ sandhāya “iti vitthāro”ti āha.
tika-s0104t:1008_0: Evaṃ saccavasena catutthakāraṇaṃ dassetvā idāni paccayapaccayuppannabhāvena aviparītasabhāvattā tathabhūtānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1008_2: Tattha jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭhoti jātipaccayā sambhūtaṃ hutvā sahitassa attano paccayānurūpassa uddhaṃ uddhaṃ āgatasabhāvo,
tika-s0104t:1008_4: Atha vā sambhūtaṭṭho ca samudāgataṭṭho ca sambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho pubbapade uttarapadalopavasena.
tika-s0104t:1008_6: Na cettha jātito jarāmaraṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0104t:1008_7: na ca jātiṃ vinā aññato hotīti jātipaccayasambhūtaṭṭho.
tika-s0104t:1008_10: yā yā jāti yathā yathā paccayo hoti,
tika-s0104t:1008_12: Paccayapakkhe pana avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ paccayaṭṭhoti ettha na avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo na hoti,
tika-s0104t:1008_13: na ca avijjaṃ vinā saṅkhārā uppajjanti.
tika-s0104t:1008_14: Yā yā avijjā yesaṃ yesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ yathā yathā paccayo hoti,
tika-s0104t:1008_15: ayaṃ avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ paccayaṭṭho paccayasabhāvoti attho.
tika-s0104t:1009_3: pajāyāti ādhāro “atthī”ti padeti puna aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsaūti taṃnivāsasattāpekkhāya,
tika-s0104t:1009_5: Tena bhagavatā vibhajjamānaṃ taṃ rūpāyatanaṃ tathameva hotīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1009_7: Sabbākārato ñātattā passitattāti hi hetvantogadhametaṃ padadvayaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1009_11: Labbhamānakapadavasenāti “rūpāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ saddāyatanaṃ sutaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1009_12: mutaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ manasā viññāta”nti vacanato diṭṭhapadañca viññātapadañca rūpārammaṇe labbhati.
tika-s0104t:1009_13: Rūpārammaṇaṃ iṭṭhaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ majjhattaṃ parittaṃ atītaṃ anāgataṃ paccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā diṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0104t:1009_14: viññātaṃ rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ rūpadhātu vaṇṇanibhā sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ pītakanti evamādīhi anekehi nāmehi.
tika-s0104t:1009_16: Terasahi vārehīti dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ rūpakaṇḍe āgate terasa niddesavāre sandhāyāha.
tika-s0104t:1009_17: Ekekasmiṃ vāre cettha catunnaṃ catunnaṃ vavatthāpananayānaṃ vasena “dvipaññāsāya nayehī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1009_27: Jānāmi abbhaññāsinti paccuppannātītakālesu ñāṇappavattidassanena anāgatepi ñāṇappavatti dassitāyeva nayato dassitattā. Vidita-
tika-s0104t:1009_28: saddo pana anāmaṭṭhakālaviseso kālattayasādhāraṇattā “diṭṭhaṃ suttaṃ muta”ntiādīsu viya,
tika-s0104t:1009_32: Bhagavatā hi imehi padehi sabbaññubhūmi nāma kathitā.
tika-s0104t:1009_33: Na upaṭṭhāsīti taṃ chadvārikamārammaṇaṃ taṇhāya vā diṭṭhiyā vā tathāgato attattaniyavasena na upaṭṭhāsi na upagacchati,
tika-s0104t:1009_37: tathā te dhamme taṃsabhāve taṃpakāre gamati passati jānātīti tathāgatoti imamatthaṃ sandhāya “tathadassīatthe”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1012_0: Ettha “anupassatī”ti āgatasaddatthaṃ vatvā tadidaṃ ñāṇapassanamevāti dassetuṃ “jānātī”ti,
tika-s0104t:1013_1: accantasaṃyoge vā etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ rattekadesabhūtassa abhisambujjhanakkhaṇassa accantasaṃyogattā,
tika-s0104t:1013_2: sakalāpi vā esā ratti abhisambodhāya padahanakālattā pariyāyena accantasaṃyogabhūtāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1013_3: Pathavīpukkhalaniruttarabhūmisīsagatattā na parājito aññehi etthāti aparājito,
tika-s0104t:1013_7: pariyāyato pana heṭṭhā vuttanayena pañcannampi mārānaṃ maddanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1013_11: Tāsu pana vīsativassaparicchinnā paṭhamabodhīti vinayagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1013_12: tañca tadaṭṭhakathāyameva “bhagavato hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsativassantare nibaddhupaṭṭhāko nāma natthī”ti
tika-s0104t:1013_13: kathitattā paṭhamabodhi nāma vīsativassānīti gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1013_14: Ācariyadhammapālattherena pana “pañcacattālīsāya vassesu ādito pannarasa vassāni paṭhamabodhī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1013_15: evañca sati majjhe pannarasa vassāni majjhimabodhi,
tika-s0104t:1013_16: ante pannarasa vassāni pacchimabodhīti tiṇṇaṃ bodhīnaṃ samappamāṇatā siyā,
tika-s0104t:1013_19: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana pannarasavassappamāṇāya paṭhamabodhiyā vīsativassesuyeva antogadhattā “paṭhamabodhiyaṃ
tika-s0104t:1014_15: “Gadattho”ti etena tathaṃ gadati bhāsatīti tathāgato da-
tika-s0104t:1015_0: Evaṃ “sugato”tiādīsu viya dhātusaddanipphattiparikappena niruttiṃ dassetvā bāhiratthasamāsenapi dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1016_8: gatā pavattā”ti ca etena kāyavacīkiriyānaṃ aññamaññānulomanavacanicchāya kāyassa,
tika-s0104t:1016_13: saddānaṃ abyabhicāritasambandhatāya “tathā”ti vutte “yathā”ti ayamattho upaṭṭhitoyeva hotīti tathāsaddatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1016_21: tasmā kāmaṃ tathāvāditāya tathāgatoti ayampi attho siddho hoti,
tika-s0104t:1016_22: so pana pubbe pakārantarena dassitoti pārisesanayena tathākāritāatthameva dassetuṃ “evaṃ tathākāritāya tathāgato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1021_3: tesaṃ taṃ paṭisedhetuṃ evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1021_8: Pare abhibhavati guṇena ajjhottharati adhiko bhavatīti abhibhū.
tika-s0104t:1022_2: Tattha agadoti dibbāgado agaṃ rogaṃ dāti avakhaṇḍati,
tika-s0104t:1022_3: natthi vā gado rogo etenāti katvā,
tika-s0104t:1022_5: puññussayassa ca agadatā labbhatīti āha “agado viyā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1022_9: Tena hi dhammānamākārabhedaṃ ñatvā tadanurūpaṃ desanaṃ niyāmeti.
tika-s0104t:1022_10: Desanāvilāsoyeva desanāvilāsamayo yathā “dānamayaṃ sīlamaya”nti adhunā pana potthakesu bahūsupi maya-
tika-s0104t:1022_15: Tenāti ca tadubhayena desanāvilāsena ceva puññussayena ca so bhagavā abhibhavatīti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:1024_5: Tattha kattabbakiccampi katamevāti dassetuṃ “lokasmā tathāgato visaṃyutto”tiādinā saccacatukkepi dutiyapakkhaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1024_9: sadevakassa lokassa samārakassa sabrahmakassa sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ
tika-s0104t:1024_10: mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā,
tika-s0104t:1024_12: tasmā tathāgatoti vuccatī”ti aṅguttarāgame catukkanipāte āgataṃ pāḷimimaṃ peyyālamukhena dasseti,
tika-s0104t:1024_15: Sā hi peyyālaniddiṭṭhā pāḷi tathadassitā atthassa sādhikāti.
tika-s0104t:1024_16: “Tassapi evaṃ attho veditabbo”ti iminā sādhyasādhakasaṃsandanaṃ karoti.
tika-s0104t:1024_19: Tattha idanti atibyāsarūpena vuttaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ kāraṇaṃ, pi- saddo, api-
tika-s0104t:1024_27: Appamādapadaṃ viya sakalakusaladhammapaṭipattiyā sabbabuddhaguṇānaṃ tathāgatapadaṃ saṅgāhakanti dassetuṃ “sabbākārenā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:1029_0: Samatthane vā etaṃ “so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa”ntiādīsu viyātipi vadanti keci.
tika-s0104t:1030_2: etthantare mahābodhiyānapaṭipattiyā hānaṭṭhānasaṃkilesanivattīnaṃ abhāvato yathāpaṇidhānaṃ tathāgato abhinīhārānurūpaṃ paṭipannoti tathāgato.
tika-s0104t:1030_4: paṭisambhidānaṃ ukkaṃsādhigamena anāvaraṇañāṇatāya ca katthacipi paṭighātābhāvato yathāruci,
tika-s0104t:1030_5: tathā kāyavacīcittānaṃ gatāni gamanāni pavattiyo etassāti tathāgato.
tika-s0104t:1030_6: Apica yasmā loke vidhayuttagatapakārasaddā samānatthā dissanti,
tika-s0104t:1030_7: tasmā yathā vidhā vipassiādayo bhagavanto nikhilasabbaññuguṇasamaṅgitāya,
tika-s0104t:1030_9: yathā yuttā ca te bhagavanto vuttanayena,
tika-s0104t:1030_12: yasmā saccaṃ tacchaṃ tathanti ñāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1060_0: “Katamañca taṃ bhikkhave”ti ayaṃ kassa pucchāti āha “yenā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1060_1: Evaṃ sāmaññato yathāvuttassa sīlamattakassa pucchābhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni pucchāvisesabhāvañāpanatthaṃ
tika-s0104t:1060_2: mahāniddese āgatā sabbāva pucchā atthuddhāravasena dasseti “tattha pucchā nāmā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1060_3: Tattha tatthāti “taṃ katamanti pucchatī”ti ettha yadetaṃ sāmaññato pucchāvacanaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmiṃ.
tika-s0104t:1061_4: itarena vā yena kenacipi ñāṇena aññātaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1061_19: na nu kho”tiādinā dvidhā viya pavattaṃ dveḷhakaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1061_20: Dvidhā elati kampati cittametenāti hi dveḷhakaṃ hapaccayaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1061_25: Anattalakkhaṇasuttādīsu āgataṃ khandhapañcakapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ pucchaṃ sandhāyāha “sabbaṃ vattabba”nti.
tika-s0104t:1061_27: “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave”tiādipucchāya hi “kā tumhākaṃ anumatī”ti anumati pucchitā hoti.
tika-s0104t:1061_29: “Aññāṇatā āpajjatī”tiādīsu viya hi ettha ya- kāralopo,
tika-s0104t:1062_5: Sabbā kaṅkhā chinnā sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānena aggamaggena samucchindanato.
tika-s0104t:1062_8: tathā eva tattha tattha diṭṭhattā ca vuttaṃ “avasesā pana dve pucchā buddhānaṃ atthī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1062_9: Yā panetā “sattādhiṭṭhānā pucchā dhammādhiṭṭhānā pucchā ekādhiṭṭhānā pucchā anekādhiṭṭhānā pucchā”tiādinā aparāpi anekadhā pucchāyo niddese āgatā,
tika-s0104t:1062_10: tā sabbāpi niddhāretvā idha avicayanaṃ “alaṃ ettāvatāva,
tika-s0104t:1062_11: atthikehi pana iminā nayena niddhāretvā vicetabbā”ti nayadānassa sijjhanatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1063_1: Pucchā ca nāmesā vissajjanāya satiyeva yuttarūpāti codanāya “idānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1063_5: tasmā saraseneva patanasabhāvassa antarā eva atirekaṃ pātanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1063_6: saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā sīghaṃ pātananti attho,
tika-s0104t:1063_8: atikkamma satthādīhi abhibhavitvā pātananti vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t:1063_10: Atthato pana pakaraṇādivasenādhigatattā pāṇavadho pāṇaghātoti vuttaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t:1064_0: “Yathā hi aṅgasambhārā, hoti saddo ratho iti;
tika-s0104t:1065_0: Evaṃ khandhesu santesu, hoti sattoti sammutī”ti. ;
tika-s0104t:1066_1: Rūpajīvitindriye hi vikopite itarampi taṃsambandhatāya vinassati.
tika-s0104t:1066_3: “pāṇoti cettha vohārato satto”ti ca ekavacananiddeso kato,
tika-s0104t:1066_4: nanu niravasesānaṃ pāṇānaṃ atipātato virati idha adhippetā.
tika-s0104t:1066_5: Tathā hi vakkhati “sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampīti sabbe pāṇabhūte”tiādinā bahuvacananiddesanti?
tika-s0104t:1066_8: tattha pana sabbasaddasannidhānena puthuttaṃ suviññāyamānamevāti sāmaññaniddesamakatvā bhedavacanicchāvasena bahuvacananiddeso kato.
tika-s0104t:1066_11: tabbisesato saṃvarabhedoti imassa visesassa ñāpanatthampi ayaṃ vacanabhedo katoti veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:1067_0: Tasmiṃ pana pāṇeti yathāvutte dubbidhepi pāṇe.
tika-s0104t:1067_2: Yāya pana cetanāya pavattamānassa jīvitindriyassa nissayabhūtesu mahābhūtesu upakkamakaraṇahetu taṃmahābhūtapaccayā
tika-s0104t:1067_5: jīvitindriyupacchedakassa kāyavacīpayogassa tannissayesu mahābhūtesu samuṭṭhāpikāti attho.
tika-s0104t:1067_6: Laddhupakkamāni hi bhūtāni purimabhūtāni viya na visadāni,
tika-s0104t:1067_7: tasmā samānajātiyānaṃ bhūtānaṃ kāraṇāni na hontīti tesuyeva upakkame kate tato parānaṃ asati antarāye uppajjamānānaṃ bhūtānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1067_9: “Kāyavacīdvārāna”nti etena vitaṇḍavādimataṃ manodvāre pavattāya vadhakacetanāya pāṇātipātabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-s0104t:1068_0: Payogavatthumahantatādīhi mahāsāvajjatā tehi paccayehi uppajjamānāya cetanāya balavabhāvato veditabbā.
tika-s0104t:1068_2: kiccasādhikāya bahukkhattuṃ pavattajavanehi laddhāsevanāya ca sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya vasena payogassa mahantabhāvo.
tika-s0104t:1068_3: Satipi kadāci khuddake ceva mahante ca pāṇe payogassa samabhāve mahantaṃ hanantassa cetanā tibbatarā uppajjatīti vatthussa mahantabhāvo.
tika-s0104t:1068_5: Satipi ca payogavatthūnaṃ amahantabhāve hantabbassa guṇamahattenapi tattha pavattaupakāracetanā viya
tika-s0104t:1068_7: tibbatarā ca uppajjatīti tassā mahāsāvajjatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0104t:1068_9: “Kilesāna”ntiādinā pana satipi payogavatthuguṇānaṃ amahantabhāve kilesupakkamānaṃ mudutibbatāya cetanāya
tika-s0104t:1069_4: Pañcasambhāravatī pana pāṇātipātacetanāti sā pañcasambhāravinimuttā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0104t:1070_1: khaṇe khaṇe nirujjhanasabhāvesu saṅkhāresu ko hanti,
tika-s0104t:1070_7: evampi so acetanatāya kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamoti na tattha chedanādinā pāṇātipāto labbhati yathā matasarīre.
tika-s0104t:1070_8: Payogopi pāṇātipātassa paharaṇappakārādiatītesu vā saṅkhāresu bhaveyya,
tika-s0104t:1070_10: Tattha na tāva atītānāgatesu sambhavati tesaṃ abhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1070_11: Paccuppannesu ca saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikattā saraseneva nirujjhanasabhāvatāya vināsābhimukhesu nippayojano eva payogo siyā.
tika-s0104t:1070_12: Vināsassa ca kāraṇarahitattā na paharaṇappakārādipayogahetukaṃ maraṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1070_13: nirīhakatāya ca saṅkhārānaṃ kassa so payogo,
tika-s0104t:1070_14: khaṇikattā vadhādhippāyasamakālabhijjanakassa kiriyāpariyosānakālānavaṭṭhānato kassa vā pāṇātipātakammabaddhoti?
tika-s0104t:1071_5: vadhappayogāvisayabhāvepi tassa pañcavokārabhave rūpasantānādhīnavuttitāya rūpasantāne parena payojitajīvitindriyupacchedakapayogavasena
tika-s0104t:1071_6: tannibbattivibandhakavisadisarūpuppattiyā vihate vicchedo hotīti na pāṇātipātassa asambhavo,
tika-s0104t:1071_8: na ca payogo nippayojano paccuppannesu saṅkhāresu katapayogavasena tadanantaraṃ uppajjanārahassa saṅkhārakalāpassa tathāanuppattito,
tika-s0104t:1071_9: khaṇikānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikamaraṇassa idha maraṇabhāvena anadhippetattā santatimaraṇassa ca yathāvuttanayena sahetukabhāvato na ahetukaṃ maraṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1071_10: na ca katturahito pāṇātipātappayogo nirīhakesupi saṅkhāresu sannihitatāmattena upakārakesu attano attano
tika-s0104t:1071_13: na ca kevalassa vadhādhippāyasahabhuno cittacetasikakalāpassa pāṇātipāto icchito santānavasena avaṭṭhitasseva paṭijānanato,
tika-s0104t:1071_14: santānavasena pavattamānānañca padīpādīnaṃ attakiriyāsiddhi dissatīti attheva pāṇātipātena kammabaddhoti.
tika-s0104t:1072_0: Sāhatthikoti sayaṃ mārentassa kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā paharaṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1072_1: Āṇattikoti aññaṃ āṇāpentassa “evaṃ vijjhitvā vā paharitvā vā mārehī”ti āṇāpanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1072_2: Nissaggiyoti dūre ṭhitaṃ māretukāmassa kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā usuyantapāsāṇādīnaṃ nissajjanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1072_6: Āthabbaṇikā hi āthabbaṇaṃ payojenti nagare vā ruddhe saṅgāme vā paccupaṭṭhite paṭisenāya paccatthikesu
tika-s0104t:1072_7: paccāmittesu ītiṃ uppādenti upaddavaṃ uppādenti rogaṃ uppādenti pajjarakaṃ uppādenti sūcikaṃ uppādenti
tika-s0104t:1072_9: Vijjādharā ca vijjaṃ parivattetvā nagare vā ruddhe…pe…
tika-s0104t:1072_12: Piturañño kira sīhaḷanarindassa dāṭhākoṭanena cūḷasumanakuṭumbiyassa maraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1072_13: “Imasmiṃ panatthe”tiādinā ganthagāravaṃ pariharitvā tassa anūnabhāvampi karoti “atthikehī”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1072_14: Idha avuttopi hi esa attho atidisanena vutto viya anūno paripuṇṇoti.
tika-s0104t:1073_5: Etena hi pahānahetukā idhādhippetā samucchedanikā viratīti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1073_6: Kammakkhayañāṇena hi pāṇātipātadussīlyassa pahīnattā bhagavā accantameva tato paṭiviratoti vuccati samucchedavasena pahānaviratīnamadhippetattā.
tika-s0104t:1073_7: Kiñcāpi “pahāya paṭivirato”ti padehi vuttānaṃ pahānaviramaṇānaṃ purimapacchimakālatā natthi,
tika-s0104t:1073_9: paccayabhūtānaṃ sammāvācādīnañca paccayuppannabhūtānaṃ paccayapaccayuppannabhāve apekkhite sahajātānampi
tika-s0104t:1073_12: tato paraṃ paccayuppannaṃ paccayasattiṃ paṭicca pavattati,
tika-s0104t:1073_13: tasmā gahaṇappavattiākāravasena sahajātādipaccayabhūtesu sammādiṭṭhiādīsu pahāyakadhammesu pahānakiriyāya purimakālavohāro,
tika-s0104t:1073_14: tappaccayuppannāsu ca viratīsu viramaṇakiriyāya aparakālavohāro sambhavati.
tika-s0104t:1073_15: Tasmā “sammādiṭṭhiādīhi pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya sammāvācādīhi pāṇātipātā paṭivirato”ti pāḷiyaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t:1074_2: tasmā maggena pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya phalena pāṇātipātā paṭiviratoti attho.
tika-s0104t:1074_7: Te hi bhagavā ariyamaggena pahāya samugghāṭetvā pāṇātipātadussīlyato accantameva paṭivirato kilesesu pahīnesu tannimittakammassa anuppajjanato,
tika-s0104t:1074_8: tasmā maggena pāṇātipātaṃ yathāvuttakilesaṃ pahāya teneva pāṇātipātā dussīlyacetanā paṭiviratoti attho.
tika-s0104t:1075_1: visaddānaṃ vā paccekaṃ yojetabbato tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1075_8: saddo pana tassā viratiyā kālādivasena apariyantataṃ dassetuṃ vutto.
tika-s0104t:1075_10: Yathā hi aññe samādinnaviratikāpi anavaṭṭhitacittatāya lābhajīvitādihetu samādānaṃ bhinnanti,
tika-s0104t:1075_15: Tattha vītikkamissāmīti uppajjanakā dhammāti saha pāṭhasesena sambandho.
tika-s0104t:1075_16: Te pana anavajjadhammehi vokiṇṇā antarantarā uppajjanakā dubbalā sāvajjā dhammā,
tika-s0104t:1075_17: yasmā ca “kāyavacīpayogaṃ upalabhitvā imassa kilesā uppannā”ti viññunā sakkā ñātuṃ,
tika-s0104t:1075_21: tannissitaviññāṇehi vā kāyikavācasikapayogamupalabhitvā manoviññāṇena viññeyyāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t:1075_22: Kāyikāti kāyena katā pāṇātipātādinipphādakā balavanto akusalā.
tika-s0104t:1076_2: tena gottenasambandho gotamoti atthaṃ sandhāya “samaṇoti bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1076_5: tena ca bhikkhusaṅghavaṇṇassāpi bhāsitattā bhikkhusaṅghavaṇṇopi vuttanayena desitabbo,
tika-s0104t:1076_7: Kiṃ so pāṇātipātā paṭiviratabhāvo bhikkhusaṅghassa na vijjatīti anuyogamapanento “na kevalañcā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:1076_8: Evaṃ sati kasmā na desitoti punānuyogaṃ pariharati “desanā panā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1077_1: aññe ca dhammā”tiādinā anaññasādhāraṇe buddhaguṇe ārabbha upari desanaṃ vaḍḍhetukāmo bhagavā ādito paṭṭhāya
tika-s0104t:1077_2: “tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno vadeyyā”tiādinā buddhaguṇavaseneva desanaṃ ārabhi,
tika-s0104t:1077_5: yadidaṃ ekaraseneva desanaṃ dassetuṃ labbhamānassāpi kassaci aggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1077_10: na evaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ ekantena hadayavatthunissayaṃ āruppe tadabhāvato,
tika-s0104t:1077_11: nissayanissitavasena ca vatthudukādidesanā pavattā “atthi rūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa vatthu,
tika-s0104t:1077_14: tassa vasena “atthi rūpaṃ manoviññāṇassa vatthū”tiādinā dukādīsu vuccamānesupi na tadanurūpā ārammaṇadukādayo sambhavanti.
tika-s0104t:1077_16: atthi rūpaṃ na manoviññāṇassa ārammaṇa”nti sakkā vattuṃ tadanārammaṇarūpassābhāvatoti vatthārammaṇadukā bhinnagatikā siyuṃ,
tika-s0104t:1077_17: tasmā na ekarasā desanā bhaveyyāti na vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1077_18: tathā nikkhepakaṇḍe cittuppādavibhāgena visuṃ avuccamānattā avitakkaavicārapadavissajjane “vicāro cā”ti
tika-s0104t:1077_19: vattuṃ na sakkāti āvitakkavicāramattapadavissajane labbhamānopi vitakko na uddhato.
tika-s0104t:1077_23: atthato pana brahmadattena bhāsitavaṇṇassa anusandhidassanavasena imissā desanāya āraddhattā dīpetuṃ vaṭṭatīti āha “atthaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1078_1: “pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakasaṅgho nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho”ti vitthāretabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1078_5: ariyasaṅghādhārattā ca dhammassa dhammānubhāvasiddhattā ca tesaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1078_9: Atthāpattivasena paraviheṭhanassa parivajjitabhāvadīpanatthaṃ daṇḍasatthānaṃ nikkhepavacanti āha “parūpaghātatthāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1078_18: etena sasati hiṃsati anenāti satthanti atthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1078_28: “Bhikkhusaṅghavasenapi dīpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttatā tassāpi ekadesena dīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1079_3: dhammassa ca attādhīnattā attādhipatibhūtā lajjāva vuttā,
tika-s0104t:1079_13: ayaṃ pana dayāsaddo anurakkhaṇatthaṃ antonītaṃ katvā pavattamāno mettāya,
tika-s0104t:1079_14: karuṇāya ca pavattatīti idha mettāya pavattamāno vutto karuṇāya,
tika-s0104t:1079_20: tassa bhāvo mettacittatā mettā eva mūlabhūtena tannimittena puggalasmiṃ buddhiyā,
tika-s0104t:1080_1: Evaṃ sati pāṇo bhūto yesanti pāṇabhūtāti nibbacanaṃ kattabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1080_2: Atha vā jīvitindriyasamaṅgitāya pāṇasaṅkhāte taṃtaṃkammānurūpaṃ pavattanato bhūtanāmake satteti attho.
tika-s0104t:1080_4: Yasmā pana mettā karuṇāya visesapaccayo hoti,
tika-s0104t:1080_5: tasmā purimapadatthabhūtā mettā eva paccayabhāvena “tāya eva dayāpannatāyā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0104t:1080_6: Iminā hi padena karuṇāya gahitāya yehi dhammehi pāṇātipātā paṭivirati sampajjati,
tika-s0104t:1080_7: tehi lajjāmettākaruṇāhi samaṅgibhāvo yathākkamaṃ padattayena dassito.
tika-s0104t:1080_8: Paradukkhāpanayanakāmatāpi hi hitānukampanamevāti avassaṃ ayamattho sampaṭicchitabboti.
tika-s0104t:1080_10: saṃvaṇṇanāya ca tassā viratiyā sattavasena apariyantataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1081_4: pālanaṃ vāti āha “iriyati yapeti yāpeti pāletī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1081_6: Tasmā yathāvuttappakāro hutvā ekasmiṃ iriyāpathe uppannaṃ dukkhaṃ aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā harati pavatteti,
tika-s0104t:1081_7: attabhāvaṃ vā yāpeti pāletīti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:1081_9: saddo vacanasiliṭṭhatāmatte kassacipi tena jotitatthassa abhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1081_11: Visuṃ kappanameva attho vikappatthoti so anekabhinnesuyeva atthesu labbhati,
tika-s0104t:1081_12: anekabhedā ca atthā uparivakkhamānā evāti vuttaṃ “upari adinnā…pe…
tika-s0104t:1082_5: Aho vata reti bhonto ekaṃsato acchariyāti attho.
tika-s0104t:1082_8: tena indriyasaṃvarādiguṇehipi lokiyaputhujjano tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vattuṃ na sakkotīti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1082_9: Tathā hi indriyasaṃvarapaccayaparibhogasīlāni idha na vibhattāni. Eva-
tika-s0104t:1082_14: “Iti vā hi bhikkhave puthujjano tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno vadeyyā”ti vacanasāmatthiyeneva taduttari guṇaṃ vattuṃ na sakkhissati.
tika-s0104t:1082_15: “Taṃ vo upari vakkhāmī”ti ca atthassāpajjanato tathāpannamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “upari asādhāraṇabhāva”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1082_16: “Na kevalañcā”tiādinā puggalavivecanena pana “puthujjano”ti idaṃ nidassanamattanti dassitaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1082_18: Pubbe vuttaṃ padaṃ pubbapadaṃ,na pubbapadaṃ tathā,
tika-s0104t:1083_0: Saddantarayogena dhātūnamatthavisesavācakattā “ādāna”nti etassa gahaṇanti attho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-s0104t:1083_15: na pana dantapoṇasikkhāpade viya appaṭiggahitakaṃ attasantakanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t:1083_31: hīnaguṇānaṃ santake ca cetanā dubbalā, paṇīte,
tika-s0104t:1083_32: paṇītaguṇānaṃ santake ca balavatīti heṭṭhā vuttanayena tehi kāraṇehi appasāvajjamahāsāvajjatā veditabbā.
tika-s0104t:1083_33: Ācariyā pana hīnapaṇītato khuddakamahante visuṃ gahetvā “idhāpi khuddake parasantake appasāvajjaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1083_36: Vatthuguṇānaṃ pana samabhāve sati kilesānamupakkamānañca mudutāya appasāvajjaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1083_37: tibbatāya mahāsāvajjanti ayampi nayo yojetabbo”ti vadanti.
tika-s0104t:1084_0: Sāhatthikādayoti ettha parasantakassa sahatthā gahaṇaṃ sāhatthiko.
tika-s0104t:1084_2: Antosuṅkaghāte ṭhitena bahisuṅkaghātaṃ pātetvā gahaṇaṃ nissaggiyo.
tika-s0104t:1084_6: yadā kadāci parasantakavināsakena sappitelakumbhiādīsu dukūlasāṭakacammakhaṇḍādipakkhipanādinā vā gahaṇaṃ thāvaro.
tika-s0104t:1084_10: Kāyavacīpayogesu hi santesuyeva iddhimayo avaharaṇapayogo hoti,
tika-s0104t:1084_14: te ca kho payogā yathānurūpaṃ pavattāti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:1084_15: Tesaṃ pana payogānaṃ sabbesaṃ sabbattha avahāresu asambhavato “yathānurūpa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1085_9: nidassananayena vā avasesā cattāro pañcakāpi gahitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1085_10: Pañcannañhi pañcakānaṃ samodhānabhūtā pañcavīsati avahārā sabbepi adinnādānameva,
tika-s0104t:1085_11: aviññattiyā vā ariyāya viññattiyā vā dinnamevāti attho.
tika-s0104t:1086_5: Pakaraṇādhigate pana atthe viveciyamāne idha athenatoyeva sucibhūtatā adhigamīyati adinnādānādhikārattāti
tika-s0104t:1086_9: Bhagavato pana so ruḷhiyā yathā taṃ nicchandarāgesu sattavohāro.
tika-s0104t:1086_14: Athenena attanā athenattā hutvā sucibhūtena attanā sucibhūtattā hutvā viharatītipi attho.
tika-s0104t:1087_14: ahirikādīnañca pahānaṃ vuttamevāti “lajjī dayāpanno”ti na vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1088_3: abrahmaṃ vā nihīnaṃ cariyaṃ vutti abrahmacariyaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1088_11: methunadhammato vā dūro hutvā tabbiratiṃ ācaratīti dūracārītipi vaṭṭati.
tika-s0104t:1088_12: Mithunānaṃ rāgapariyuṭṭhānena sadisānaṃ ubhinnaṃ ayaṃ methunoti atthaṃ dasseti “rāgapariyuṭṭhānavasenā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1089_1: ekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā sammā brahmacārī paṭijānamāno na heva kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ dvayaṃdvayasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
tika-s0104t:1089_6: idampi kho brāhmaṇa brahmacariyassa khaṇḍampi chiddampi sabalampi kammāsampi,
tika-s0104t:1089_7: ayaṃ vuccati brāhmaṇa aparisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carati saṃyutto methunena saṃyogena,
tika-s0104t:1089_8: na parimuccati jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
tika-s0104t:1090_2: apica kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ sañjagghati saṃkīḷati saṃkelāyati…pe…
tika-s0104t:1090_3: napi mātugāmena saddhiṃ sañjagghati saṃkīḷati saṃkelāyati,
tika-s0104t:1090_4: apica kho mātugāmassa cakkhunā cakkhuṃ upanijjhāyati pekkhati…pe…
tika-s0104t:1090_5: napi mātugāmassa cakkhunā cakkhuṃ upanijjhāyati pekkhati,
tika-s0104t:1090_6: apica kho mātugāmassa saddaṃ suṇāti tirokuṭṭaṃ vā tiropākāraṃ vā hasantiyā vā bhaṇantiyā vā gāyantiyā vā rodantiyā vā…pe…
tika-s0104t:1090_7: napi mātugāmassa saddaṃ suṇāti tirokuṭṭaṃ vā tiropākāraṃ vā hasantiyā vā bhaṇantiyā vā gāyantiyā vā rodantiyā vā,
tika-s0104t:1090_8: apica kho yānissa tāni pubbe mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasitalapitakīḷitāni,
tika-s0104t:1090_10: napi yānissa tāni pubbe mātugāmena saddhiṃ hasitalapitakīḷitāni,
tika-s0104t:1090_12: apica kho passati gahapatiṃ vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitaṃ samaṅgibhūtaṃ paricārayamānaṃ…pe…
tika-s0104t:1090_13: napi passati gahapatiṃ vā gahapatiputtaṃ vā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitaṃ samaṅgibhūtaṃ paricārayamānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1090_14: apica kho aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ carati “imināhaṃ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā
tika-s0104t:1090_15: brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1090_19: Idampi kho brāhmaṇa brahmacariyassa khaṇḍampi chiddampi sabalampi kammāsampi.
tika-s0104t:1090_21: aparisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carati saṃyutto methunena saṃyogena,
tika-s0104t:1090_22: na parimuccati jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
tika-s0104t:1091_0: Aṅguttarāgame sattakanipāte jāṇusoṇisutte āgatā sattavidhamethunasaṃyogāpi paṭivirati dassitāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0104t:1091_1: Idhāpi asaddhammasevanādhippāyena kāyadvārappavattā maggenamaggapaṭipattisamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā abrahmacariyaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1091_2: Pañcasikkhāpadakkame micchācāre pana agamanīyaṭṭhānavītikkamacetanā yathāvuttā kāmesu micchācāroti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1092_0: Tattha agamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma purisānaṃ tāva māturakkhitādayo dasa,
tika-s0104t:1092_4: Ye paneke vadanti “cattāro kāmesu micchācārā akālo, adeso, anaṅgo,
tika-s0104t:1092_7: Na hi sāgamanīyaṭṭhāne pavattā vippaṭipatti micchācāro nāma sambhavati.
tika-s0104t:1092_8: Sā panesā duvidhāpi vippaṭipatti guṇavirahite appasāvajjā,
tika-s0104t:1093_0: Tassa pana abrahmacariyassa dve sambhārā sevetukāmatācittaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1093_5: maggenamaggapaṭipattiadhivāsananti evaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu “cattāro sambhārā”ti vuttattā abhibhavitvā vītikkamane
tika-s0104t:1093_8: Sevanacitte sati payogābhāvo na pamāṇaṃ itthiyā sevanapayogassa yebhuyyena abhāvato,
tika-s0104t:1093_9: purisasseva yebhuyyena sevanapayogo hotīti itthiyā puretaraṃ sevanacittaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā nisinnāya [nipannāya ] micchācāro na siyāti āpajjati.
tika-s0104t:1093_10: Tasmā purisassa vasena ukkaṃsato “cattāro sambhārā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1093_11: Aññathā hi itthiyā purisakiccakaraṇakāle purisassāpi sevanāpayogābhāvato micchācāro na siyāti vadanti eke.
tika-s0104t:1094_1: attano ruciyā pavattitassa sevanāpayogeneva sevanacittatāsiddhito agamanīyavatthu,
tika-s0104t:1095_15: bhaṇantassa hoti ‘musā bhaṇāmī’ti” etadeva hi dvayaṃ aṅgabhūtaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1095_16: Itaraṃ “bhaṇitassa hoti ‘musā mayā bhaṇita’nti” vuttaṃ pana hotu vā, mā vā,
tika-s0104t:1096_2: Tasmā idha naye lakkhaṇassa abyāpitatāya, musā-
tika-s0104t:1096_3: saddassa ca visaṃvāditabbatthavācakatāsambhavato paripuṇṇaṃ katvā musāvādalakkhaṇaṃ dassetuṃ “aparo nayo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1096_7: Imasmiṃ pana naye musā vatthu vadīyati vuccati etenāti musāvādoti nibbacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1096_11: mahāguṇatāya mahāsāvajjoti adinnādāne viya guṇavasenāpi yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1097_5: Tattha pana cetanā balavatī na hotīti appasāvajjatā vuttā.
tika-s0104t:1097_7: Appatāya ūnassa atthassa pūraṇavasena pavattā kathā pūraṇakathā,
tika-s0104t:1098_5: Visaṃvādanādhippāyena payoge katepi aparena tasmiṃ atthe aviññāte visaṃvādanassa asijjhanato parassa tadatthavijānanampi ekasambhārabhāvena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1098_9: Kāyikova sāhatthikoti koci maññeyyāti taṃ nivāraṇatthaṃ “so kāyena vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1098_10: Tāya ce kiriyāya paro tamatthaṃ jānātīti taṅkhaṇe vā dandhatāya vicāretvā pacchā vā jānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1098_15: Sacepi dandhatāya vicāretvā pacchā cirenāpi paro tadatthaṃ jānāti,
tika-s0104t:1098_16: sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya nibbattattā taṅkhaṇeyeva bajjhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1099_0: “Eko payogo sāhatthikovā”ti idaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu āgatanayena vuttanti idha saṅgahaṭṭhakathāya saṅgahakārassa
tika-s0104t:1099_3: tathā”ti etena sāhatthiko viya āṇattikādayopi gahetabbā,
tika-s0104t:1099_4: aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ natthi parassa visaṃvādanabhāvena tassadisattāti dasseti,
tika-s0104t:1099_12: Paṇṇaṃ likhitvāti tālādīnaṃ paṇṇaṃ akkharena likhitvā,
tika-s0104t:1099_14: Tena vuttaṃ “tirokuṭṭādīsū”ti [kuḍḍādīsu ] paṇṇe akkharaṃ lekhaniyā likhitvāti attho.
tika-s0104t:1099_15: Vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbāti attanomatiyā sabbadubbalattā anattukkaṃsanena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1100_1: saccena saccanti purimena vacīsaccena pacchimaṃ vacīsaccaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1104_2: thirabhāvo ca saccavāditādhikārattā kathāvasena veditabboti āha “thirakathoti attho”ti.
tika-s0104t:1104_5: tena yuttattā puggalo idha theto nāma.
tika-s0104t:1104_12: evaṃ na ṭhitā kathā etassāti naṭhitakatho [nathirakatho ] yathā pāsāṇalekhādayo avaṭṭhitasabhāvatāya ṭhitā,
tika-s0104t:1104_13: evaṃ ṭhitā kathā etassāti ṭhitakathoti [thirakatho ] haliddirāgādayo yathā kathāya upamāyo honti,
tika-s0104t:1105_0: Pattisaṅkhātā saddhā ayati pavattati etthāti paccayikoti āha “pattiyāyitabbako”ti.
tika-s0104t:1106_0: Satipi paccekaṃ pāṭhakkame aññāsu abhidhammaṭṭhakathā dīsu saṃvaṇṇanākkamena tiṇṇampi padānaṃ ekatthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ kātuṃ “yāya vācāyā”tiādimāha,
tika-s0104t:1106_2: Parassāti yaṃ bhindituṃ taṃ vācaṃ bhāsati, tassa. Ca-
tika-s0104t:1106_8: taṃ karoti etāyāti pisuṇā niruttinayenāti vacanatthaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0104t:1106_10: samagge satte avayavabhūte vaggabhinne karotīti attho.
tika-s0104t:1107_1: Sayampi pharusāti domanassasamuṭṭhitattā sabhāvena sayampi kakkasā.
tika-s0104t:1107_4: Ettha pana paṭhamanaye pharusaṃ karotīti vacanatthena vā phalūpacārena vā vācāya pharusasaddappavatti veditabbā.
tika-s0104t:1107_5: Dutiyanaye mammacchedavasena pavattiyā ekantaniṭṭhuratāya ruḷhisaddavasena sabhāvena,
tika-s0104t:1108_2: hitañca phalati paharati vināsetīti atthena “sampha”nti laddhanāmaṃ attano,
tika-s0104t:1108_5: iminā samphaṃ palapati etenāti samphappalāpoti vacanatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1109_1: “Sā evā”tiādinā pana cetanāya pavattiparikappanāya hetuṃ vibhāveti.
tika-s0104t:1109_2: Tattha “pahāyā”tiādivacanasannidhānato tassāyeva ca pahātabbatā yuttito adhippetāti attho.
tika-s0104t:1110_8: Cetanā pisuṇavācā nāma pisuṇaṃ vadanti etāyāti katvā.
tika-s0104t:1111_5: Imesanti aniyamatāya parammukhāpavattānampi attano buddhiyaṃ parivattamāne sandhāya vuttanti dassetuṃ “yesa”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:1112_14: Ramitabbaṭṭhānaṃ samaggoti hi tadadhiṭṭhānānaṃ vasena tabbisesanatā vuttā.
tika-s0104t:1112_17: Yasmā pana ākārena vināpi ayamattho labbhati,
tika-s0104t:1112_18: tasmā “ayamevettha attho”ti vuttaṃ samaggesūti samaggabhūtesu janakāyesu,
tika-s0104t:1112_21: Tappakatiyatthena hi “disvāpi sutvāpī”ti vacanaṃ supapannaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1113_2: Yathā hi duṭṭhārūsu yena kenaci vatthunā ghaṭitesu cittaṃ adhimattaṃ dukkhappattaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t:1113_3: tathā tesu dasasujātiādīsu akkosavatthūsu pharusavācāya phusitamattesūti.
tika-s0104t:1113_5: yesu pharusavācāya chupitamattesu duṭṭhārūsu viya ghaṭṭitesu cittaṃ adhimattaṃ dukkhappattaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t:1113_7: Jātiādīni akkosavatthūnī”ti “yassa sarīrappadesassa satthādipaṭihanena bhusaṃ rujjanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1113_9: Idha pana yassa cittassa pharusavācāvasena domanassasaṅkhātaṃ bhusaṃ rujjanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1113_11: Tāni mammāni chijjanti bhijjanti yenāti mammacchedako,
tika-s0104t:1113_14: Ekantapharusacetanā pharusā vācā pharusaṃ vadanti etāyāti katvā.
tika-s0104t:1113_15: “Pharusacetanā” icceva avatvā “ekantapharusacetanā”ti vacanaṃ duṭṭhacittatāya eva pharusacetanā adhippetā,
tika-s0104t:1113_23: Saccakiriyanti yaṃ “caṇḍā taṃ mahiṃsī anubandhatū”ti vacanaṃ mukhena kathesi,
tika-s0104t:1113_26: yaṃ pana uppalapattampi mayhaṃ upari na patatū”ti kāraṇaṃ cittena cintesi,
tika-s0104t:1113_32: Evaṃ mammacchedakoti ettha savanapharusatāmattena mammacchedakatā veditabbā.
tika-s0104t:1114_2: Tatoyeva hi pharusavācā na hoti kammapathappattā,
tika-s0104t:1114_3: kammabhāvaṃ pana na sakkā vāretunti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1114_5: Evaṃ byatirekavasena cetanāpharusatāya pharusavācābhāvaṃ sādhetvā idāni tameva anvayavasena sādhetuṃ “yathā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1114_6: Apharusā vācā na hoti pharusā vācā hotiyevāti attho sāti pharusavācā.
tika-s0104t:1115_7: sammukhā payoge agāravādīnaṃ balavabhāvato siyā cetanā balavatī,
tika-s0104t:1115_10: Yathā pana akkosite mate āḷahane katā khamanā upavādantarāyaṃ nivatteti,
tika-s0104t:1115_11: evaṃ parammukhā payuttāpi pharusavācā hotiyevāti sakkā ñātunti,
tika-s0104t:1115_13: Tathā hi parassa tadatthavijānanamaññatra tayova tassā sambhārā aṭṭhakathāsu vuttāti.
tika-s0104t:1116_0: Elaṃ vuccati doso ilati cittaṃ, puggalo vā kampati etenāti katvā. Etthāti –
tika-s0104t:1119_2: Tenevāha citto gahapati āyasmatā kāmabhūtherena puṭṭho saṃyuttāgamavare saḷāyatanavagge “nelaṅga”nti
tika-s0104t:1119_3: kho bhante sīlānametaṃ adhivacana”nti vācā nāma saddasabhāvā taṃtadatthanibandhanāti sādurasasadisattā
tika-s0104t:1119_5: attho ca tabbhāvatoti atthameva sandhāya byañjanamadhuratāya,
tika-s0104t:1119_8: Apica avayavāpekkhane sati “madhuraṃ byañjanaṃ yassā”tiādinā vattabbo.
tika-s0104t:1119_25: tādisā nārī viyāti vācāpi porīti atthamāha “pure”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1119_27: Upameyyapakkhe pana apharusatāya mudukabhāvo eva sukumāratā.
tika-s0104t:1119_36: Yathā “anāpatti asamanubhāsantassā”ti manaṃ appeti vaḍḍhetīti manāpā,
tika-s0104t:1119_39: Ato bahuno janassāti idha sambandhe sāmivacanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1120_1: so pana aphalattā bhāsitatthapariyāyena atthoyeva nāma na hotīti āha “anatthaviññāpikā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1120_4: Akusalacetanā samphappalāpo samphaṃ palapanti etāyāti katvā.
tika-s0104t:1120_13: yathā taṃ adhunā bāhirakehi paricayitā sakkaṭabhāsāya gaṇṭhitā rāmapurāṇabhāratapurāṇādikathāti,
tika-s0104t:1121_0: “Kālavādī”tiādi samphappalāpā paṭiviratassa paṭipattisandassanaṃ yathā “pāṇātipātā paṭivirato”tiādi pāṇātipātappahānassa paṭipattidassanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1121_1: “Pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya viharatī”ti hi vutte kathaṃ pāṇātipātappahānaṃ hotīti apekkhāsambhavato “pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1121_2: Sā pana virati kathanti āha “nihitadaṇḍo nihita sattho”ti.
tika-s0104t:1121_7: Atthasaṃhitāpi hi vācā ayuttakālapayogena atthāvahā na siyāti anatthaviññāpanabhāvaṃ anulometi,
tika-s0104t:1121_8: tasmā samphappalāpaṃ pajahantena akālavāditā parivajjetabbāti dassetuṃ “kālavādī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1121_9: Kāle vadantenāpi ubhayattha asādhanato abhūtaṃ parivajjetabbanti āha “bhūtavādī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1122_4: Evaṃ guṇavisesayutto ca attho vuccamāno desanākosalle sati sobhati,
tika-s0104t:1122_9: pucchāya ca vasena otiṇṇe desanāvisaye ekaṃsādibyākaraṇavibhāgaṃ sallakkhetvā ṭhapanāhetudāharaṇasaṃsandanāni
tika-s0104t:1122_11: pare yathājjhāsayaṃ paramatthasiddhiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpento “desanākusalo”ti vuccatīti evametthāpi atthayojanā
tika-s0104t:1124_2: “Ṭhānavatī”ti vutte tasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapetuṃ yuttātipi attho sambhavatīti āha “hadaye”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1124_4: tasmā “kālenā”ti idaṃ “nidhānavatiṃ” vācaṃ bhāsitā”ti etassāpekkhavacananti dasseti “evarūpi”ntiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1124_6: apadisīyati vā icchitattho anenāti apadeso, upamā,
tika-s0104t:1124_14: Sikhamappattā hi kathā atthāvahā nāma na hoti.
tika-s0104t:1124_17: Bhāsitattho ca nāma saddānusārena adhigato sabbopi pakatyatthapaccayatthabhāvatthādiko,
tika-s0104t:1124_18: tatoyeva bhagavato vacanaṃ ekagāthāpadampi saṅkhepavitthārādiekattādinandiyāvattādinayehi anekehipi niddhāraṇakkhamatāya
tika-s0104t:1124_20: Evaṃ atthasāmaññato saṃvaṇṇetvā icchitatthavisesatopi saṃvaṇṇetuṃ “yaṃ vā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:1124_23: kimettha vattabbaṃ atthīti antolīnacodanaṃ parisodheti “na añña”ntiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1124_24: Aññamatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ nikkhipitvā ananusandhivasena pacchā aññamatthaṃ na bhāsati.
tika-s0104t:1125_1: Evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā sattamūlasikkhāpadāni vibhajitvā satipi abhijjhādippahānassa saṃvarasīlasaṅgahe upariguṇasaṅgahato,
tika-s0104t:1125_2: lokiyaputhujjanāvisayato ca uttaridesanāya saṅgahituṃ taṃ pariharitvā pacurajanapākaṭaṃ ācārasīlameva
tika-s0104t:1125_5: Paccayantarasamavāye sadisaphaluppattiyā visesakāraṇabhāvato viruhanasamatthānaṃ sāraphalādīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Bhavanti,
tika-s0104t:1125_11: Viruḷhamūlā hi nīlabhāvaṃ āpajjantā taruṇarukkhagacchā jāyanti vaḍḍhantīti vuccanti.
tika-s0104t:1125_12: Vaḍḍhitvā ṭhitā mahantā rukkhagacchā jātā vaḍḍhitāti.
tika-s0104t:1125_17: Avayavavinimuttassa hi samudāyassa abhāvato duvidhenāpi atthena teyeva tiṇarukkhalatādayo gayhanti.
tika-s0104t:1126_0: Apica bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā haritabhāvamāpannā rukkhagacchādayo devatā pariggayhanti,
tika-s0104t:1126_1: tasmā bhūtānaṃ nivāsanaṭṭhānatāya gāmoti bhūtagāmotipi vadanti,
tika-s0104t:1126_6: Paccayantarasamavāye sadisaphaluppattiyā visesakāraṇabhāvato viruhanasamatthe sāraphale niruḷho bīja-
tika-s0104t:1126_7: saddo tadatthasiddhiyā mūlādīsupi kesuci pavattatīti mūlādito nivattanatthaṃ ekena bīja-
tika-s0104t:1126_10: Nīlatiṇarukkhādikassāti allatiṇassa ceva allarukkhādikassa ca. Ādi-
tika-s0104t:1126_14: Nanu ca rukkhādayo cittarahitatāya na jīvā,
tika-s0104t:1126_19: Vuḍḍhi pana pavāḷasilālavaṇādīnampi vijjatīti na tesaṃ jīvatābhāve kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1126_20: Visayaggahaṇañca nesaṃ parikappanāmattaṃ supanaṃ viya ciñcādīnaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1126_25: Tenevāha āḷavakānaṃ rukkhacchedanādivatthūsu “jīvasaññino hi moghapurisā manussā rukkhasmi”ntiādi.
tika-s0104t:1127_1: tamassa atthi ekasmiṃ divase ekavārameva bhuñjanatoti ekabhattiko.
tika-s0104t:1127_2: Tayidaṃ ekabhattaṃ kadā bhuñjitabbanti sandhāya vuttaṃ “pātarāsabhatta”ntiādi,
tika-s0104t:1128_3: Aruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya yāva majjhanhikā ayaṃ buddhādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo bhojanassa kālo nāma,
tika-s0104t:1128_5: Tattha dutiyapadena rattibhojanassa paṭikkhittattā aparanhova idha vikāloti pārisesanayena tatiyapadassa
tika-s0104t:1128_8: saddo ajjhoharaṇatthavācakoti dīpeti “yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā bhojana”nti iminā.
tika-s0104t:1128_15: Yathā ca “rattūparato”ti ettha rattibhojanaṃ rattisaddena vuccati,
tika-s0104t:1128_22: ekasmiṃ divase ekavārameva bhuñjanato “ekabhattiko”ti vutte rattibhojanopi siyāti tannivāraṇatthaṃ “rattūparato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1128_23: Evaṃ sati sāyanhabhojīpi ekabhattiko siyāti tadāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ “virato vikālabhojanā”ti vuttanti.
tika-s0104t:1129_0: Saṅkhepato “sabbapāpassa akaraṇa”ntiādi nayappavattaṃ bhagavato sāsanaṃ sachandarāgappavattito naccādīnaṃ
tika-s0104t:1129_8: parehi payojāpiyamānañca naccaṃ naccabhāvasāmaññato pāḷiyaṃ ekeneva naccasaddena sāmaññaniddesanayena gahitaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1129_14: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana yathāpāṭhaṃ vākyāvatthikantavacanena saha samuccayasamāsadassanatthaṃ “naccā cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1129_16: (Dassanavisaye mayūranaccādipaṭikkhipanena naccāpanavisayepi paṭikkhipanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ) “naccādīni hī”tiādinā yathāvuttatthasamatthanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1129_18: yathāsakaṃ vā visayassa ālocanasabhāvatāya pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ savanakiriyāyapi dassanasaṅkhepasambhavato “dassanā” icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1129_19: Tenevāha “pañcahi viññāṇehi na kiñci dhammaṃ paṭijānāti aññatra atinipātamattā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1130_0: “Visūkabhūtā dassanā cā”ti etena avisūkabhūtassa pana gītassa savanaṃ kadāci vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1130_1: Tathā hi vuttaṃ paramatthajotikāya khuddakapāṭhaṭṭhakathāya “dhammūpasaṃhitampi cettha gītaṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-s0104t:1130_2: gītūpasaṃhito pana dhammo vaṭṭatī”ti katthaci pana na-
tika-s0104t:1130_4: Ubhayatthāpi ca gīto ce dhammānulomatthapaṭisaṃyuttopi na vaṭṭati,
tika-s0104t:1130_5: dhammo ce gītasaddapaṭisaṃyuttopi vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:1130_9: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti hi desanāya eva paṭikkhepo,
tika-s0104t:1130_11: Imassa ca sikkhāpadassa visuṃ paññāpanato viññāyati “gītassarena desitopi dhammo na gīto”ti.
tika-s0104t:1130_12: Yañca sakkapañhasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ sevitabbāsevitabbasaddaṃ niddharantena “yaṃ pana atthanissitaṃ dhammanissitaṃ
tika-s0104t:1130_17: Samādānasikkhāpadassa hi evarūpaṃ suṇantassa sikkhāpadasaṃvaraṃ bhijjati gītasaddabhāvatoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1130_18: Tathā hi vinayaṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ “gītanti naṭādīnaṃ vā gītaṃ hotu,
tika-s0104t:1131_3: tasmā yaṃ kiñci pupphaṃ baddhamabaddhaṃ vā,
tika-s0104t:1131_4: taṃ sabbaṃ “mālā” tveva daṭṭhabbanti āha “yaṃ kiñci puppha”nti.
tika-s0104t:1131_5: “Yaṃ kiñci gandha”nti cettha vāsacuṇṇadhūpādikaṃ vilepanato aññaṃ yaṃ kiñci gandhajātaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1131_6: Vuttatthaṃ viya hi vuccamānatthamantarenāpi saddo atthavisesavācako.
tika-s0104t:1131_7: Chavirāgakaraṇanti vilepanena chaviyā rañjanatthaṃ pisitvā paṭiyattaṃ yaṃ kiñci gandhacuṇṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1131_14: paramatthajotikāyaṃ pana khuddakapāṭhaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “mālādīsu dhāraṇādīni yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yojetabbānī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1131_26: “Cetayitvā kammaṃ karoti kāyena vācāya manasā”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1131_27: Dhāraṇādibhūtā eva ca cetanā ṭhānanti. Ṭhāna-
tika-s0104t:1132_0: Uccāti uccasaddena akārantena samānatthaṃ ākārantaṃ ekaṃ saddantaraṃ accuggatavācakanti āha “pamāṇātikkanta”nti.
tika-s0104t:1132_3: gahaṭṭhehi ca seṭṭhasammatattā akappiyapaccattharaṇaṃ “mahāsayana”nti idhādhippetanti dassetuṃ “akappiyattharaṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1132_5: Yasmā pana ādhāre paṭikkhitte tadādhārakiriyāpi paṭikkhittāva hoti,
tika-s0104t:1132_7: Atthato pana tadupabhogabhūtanisajjānipajjanehi virati dassitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1132_8: Atha vā “uccāsayanamahāsayanā”ti esa niddeso ekasesanayena yathā “nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana”nti etasmimpi
tika-s0104t:1132_9: vikappe āsanapubbakattā sayanakiriyāya sayanaggahaṇeneva āsanampi gahitanti veditabbaṃ.
