tika-s0104t:1133_3: rañjanti vā ettha sattāti rajataṃ yathā “nesaṃ padakkanta”nti.
tika-s0104t:1133_5: dve guñjā māsako bhave”ti vuttalakkhaṇena vīsatimāsako nīlakahāpaṇo vā dudradāmakādiko vā taṃtaṃdesavohārānurūpaṃ kato kahāpaṇo.
tika-s0104t:1133_10: upanikkhittasādiyane ca paṭiggahaṇattho labbhatīti āha “na uggaṇhāpeti na upanikkhittaṃ sādiyatī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1133_11: Atha vā tividhaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ kāyena vācāya manasā.
tika-s0104t:1133_16: ekasesanayena vā gahetvā paṭiggahaṇāti vuttanti āha “neva naṃ uggaṇhātī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1134_1: Saṭṭhidinaparipāko sukadhaññaviseso sāli nāma salīyate sīlāghateti katvā.
tika-s0104t:1136_0: Sālayo hemantā tatra, saṭṭhikā gimhajā api;
tika-s0104t:1138_1: brūheti vā sattānaṃ jīvitanti vīhi, sassaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1138_3: So hi atilūkhatāya aññena missetvā paribhuñjīyati.
tika-s0104t:1138_12: Tāni sattapi sappabhedā nidhāne posane sādhuttena “dhaññānī”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0104t:1138_17: vasāni bhesajjāni acchavasaṃ macchavasaṃ susukāvasaṃ sūkaravasaṃ gadrabhavasa”nti vuttattā idaṃ pañcavidhampi bhesajjaṃ odissa anuññātaṃ nāma.
tika-s0104t:1138_18: Tassa pana “kāle paṭiggahita”nti vuttattā paṭiggahaṇaṃ vaṭṭatīti āha “aññatra odissa anuññātā”ti. Maṃsa-
tika-s0104t:1138_19: saddena macchānampi maṃsaṃ gahitaṃ evāti dassetuṃ “āmakamaṃsamacchāna”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1138_21: aparisaṅkitanti vā payogassa dassanato virūpekasesanayo dassito anenāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1142_1: Idha pana purisantaragatāgatavasena itthikumārikābhedoti āha “itthīti purisantaragatā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1143_6: Vasanti patiṭṭhahanti aparaṇṇāni etthāti vatthūti atthaṃ dasseti “vatthu nāmā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1143_8: Evaṃ aṭṭhakathānayānurūpaṃ atthaṃ dassetvā idāni “khettaṃ nāma yattha pubbaṇṇaṃ vā aparaṇṇaṃ vā jāyatī”ti
tika-s0104t:1144_4: Gharā gharanti aññasmā gharā aññaṃ gharaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1145_1: paramparā gahetvā attano dhanassa dānaṃ. Kī-
tika-s0104t:1145_3: paṭhamameva attano dhanassa paresaṃ dānanti vadanti.
tika-s0104t:1145_6: Tadeva “kayitañca hoti parabhaṇḍaṃ attano hatthagataṃ karontena,
tika-s0104t:1145_7: vikkītañca attano bhaṇḍaṃ parahatthagataṃ karontenā”ti vinayaṭṭhakathāvacanena sameti.
tika-s0104t:1145_12: Taṃ pana karonto tulāya rūpaaṅgagahaṇākārapaṭicchannasaṇṭhānavasena karotīti catubbidhatā vuttā.
tika-s0104t:1145_14: paresaṃ dātabbaṃ pubbabhāge katvā minentīti āha “gaṇhanto pacchābhāge”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1145_17: Mūle rajjunti tulāya mūle yojitaṃ rajjuṃ.
tika-s0104t:1146_5: paṭibhānakaraṇavasena pana upāyakusalatāya vañcana”nti nikativañcanaṃ bhedato kaṇhajātakaṭṭhakathādīsu vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1146_8: Samagghataranti tāsaṃ pātīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ samakaṃ agghavisesaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1147_2: Tilādīnaṃ nāḷiādīhi minanakāle ussāpitā sikhāyeva sikhā,
tika-s0104t:1149_2: na pana puna kammāya ukkoṭanamattanti āha “assāmike…pe…
tika-s0104t:1149_6: “Vatthu”nti avatvā “ekaṃ vatthu”nti vadanto aññānipi atthi bahūnīti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1149_7: Aññānipi hi sasavatthuādīni tattha tattha vuttāni.
tika-s0104t:1149_10: yena vā kāraṇena “migaṃ me dehī”ti āha,
tika-s0104t:1149_14: Māyāvasenāti mantajappanaṃ vinā abhūtassāpi bhūtākārasaññāpanāya cakkhumohanamāyāya vasena.
tika-s0104t:1152_1: Hemayaññopavittaṅganti suvaṇṇapāmaṅgalaggitagattanti attho”ti savanaṃ saṭhanaṃ sāvi,
tika-s0104t:1152_7: Ye pana catunnampi padānaṃ bhinnādhikaraṇataṃ vadanti,
tika-s0104t:1152_11: tesaṃ taṃ na yuttaṃ vañcanena saṅgahitasseva puna gahitattāti dasseti “taṃ panā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1153_0: Māraṇanti muṭṭhipahārakasātāḷanādīhi hiṃsanaṃ viheṭhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1153_3: saddo dissati “attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodeyyā”tiādīsu māraṇa-
tika-s0104t:1153_7: taṃ na sakkā tathā vattuṃ “kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā,
tika-s0104t:1153_9: Yathā hi appaṭiggāhabhāvasāmaññepi sati pabbajitehi appaṭiggahitabbavatthuvisesabhāvasandassanatthaṃ itthikumāridāsidāsādayo vibhāgena vuttā.
tika-s0104t:1153_10: Yathā ca parasantakassa haraṇabhāvato adinnādānabhāvasāmaññepi sati tulākūṭādayo adinnādānavisesabhāvasandassanatthaṃ vibhāgena vuttā,
tika-s0104t:1153_11: na evaṃ pāṇātipātapariyāyassa vadhassa puna gahaṇe payojanaṃ atthi tathāvibhajitabbassābhāvato,
tika-s0104t:1154_0: Viparāmosoti visesena samantato bhusaṃ mosāpanaṃ muyhanakaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1154_6: mosetvā tesaṃ santakaṃ gaṇhantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1155_0: Ettāvatāti “pāṇātipātaṃ pahāyā”tiādinā “sahasākārā paṭivirato”ti pariyosānena etapparimāṇena pāṭhena.
tika-s0104t:1155_1: Antarabhedaṃ aggahetvā pāḷiyaṃ yathārutamāgatavaseneva chabbīsatisikkhāpadasaṅgahametaṃ sīlaṃ yebhuyyena
tika-s0104t:1155_5: Tathā hi idhasaṅkhittena uddiṭṭhānaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ avibhattānaṃ vibhajanavasena majjhimasīladesanā pavattā,
tika-s0104t:1157_5: tena imamatthaṃ vikappeti “ussāhaṃ katvā mama vaṇṇaṃ vadamānopi puthujjano pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā
tika-s0104t:1157_6: paṭivirato”tiādinā parānuddesikanayena vā sabbathāpi ācārasīlamattameva vadeyya,
tika-s0104t:1157_9: parehi ca tathā sambhāviyamānā tadanurūpapaṭipattiṃ ajānanato,
tika-s0104t:1157_12: Ayaṃ pana samaṇo gotamo sabbathāpi samaṇasāruppapaṭipattiṃ pūresiyevā”ti evaṃ aññuddesikanayena vā sabbathāpi ācārasīlamattameva vadeyya,
tika-s0104t:1157_18: Sādhavo hi pare “bhonto”ti vā “devānaṃ piyā”ti vā “āyasmanto”ti vā samālapanti.
tika-s0104t:1157_19: Samaṇabrāhmaṇāti yaṃ kiñci pabbajjaṃ upagatatāya samaṇā.
tika-s0104t:1158_0: Saddhā nāma idha catubbidhesu ṭhānesūti āha “kammañcā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1158_7: Tena catubbidhampi paccayaṃ nidassetīti vuttaṃ “atthato panā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1159_0: “Seyyathida”nti ayaṃ saddo “so katamo”ti atthe eko nipāto,
tika-s0104t:1159_2: tena ca bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhapade saddakkamena appadhānabhūtopi bījagāmabhūtagāmo vibhajjitabbaṭṭhāne padhānabhūto viya paṭiniddisīyati.
tika-s0104t:1159_3: Añño hi saddakkamo añño atthakkamoti āha “katamo so bījagāmabhūtagāmo”ti.
tika-s0104t:1159_5: Imamatthañhi dassetuṃ “yassa samārambhaṃ anuyuttā viharantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1159_8: mūlaṃ bījaṃ etassātipi mūlabījanti idha dvidhā attho.
tika-s0104t:1159_10: Ato na codetabbametaṃ “kasmā panettha bījagāmabhūtagāmaṃ pucchitvā bījagāmo eva vibhatto”ti.
tika-s0104t:1159_11: Tattha hi paṭhamena atthena bījagāmo niddiṭṭho,
tika-s0104t:1159_13: duvidhopesa sāmaññaniddesena vā mūlabījañca mūlabījañca mūlabījanti ekasesanayena vā niddiṭṭhoti veditabbo,
tika-s0104t:1159_20: So hi kampati calatīti kapithano thanapaccayena,
tika-s0104t:1159_28: Paccayantarasamavāye sadisaphaluppattiyā visesakāraṇabhāvato viruhanasamatthe sāraphale niruḷho bījasaddoti dasseti “viruhanasamatthamevā”ti iminā.
tika-s0104t:1160_7: yathā “ācayaṃ gāmino”ti vattabbe anunāsikalopena “ācayagāmino”ti niddeso kato,
tika-s0104t:1160_13: Suttantanayapaṭipattiyā visuṃ gahitattā vinayācāroyeva idha labbhati.
tika-s0104t:1160_14: Sammā kilese likhatīti sallekhoti ca vinayācārassa visuṃ gahitattā suttantanayapaṭipatti eva.
tika-s0104t:1160_15: Paṭiggahitanti kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā paṭiggahitaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1161_0: Yāni ca tesaṃ anulomānīti ettha sānulomadhaññarasaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1161_2: pakkaḍākarasañca ṭhapetvā avasesā sabbepi phalapupphapattarasā anulomapānānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1162_13: “Adātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti iminā adāne sallekhakopanaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1162_17: atthate kathine pacchimakattikamāsena saha hemantikā cattāro māsā,
tika-s0104t:1162_18: piṭṭhisamaye yo koci eko māsoti evaṃ tatiyakathinasikkhāpadādīsu anuññātasamaye.
tika-s0104t:1162_20: Vinayakammaṃ katvāti mūlacīvaraṃ parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā paccāsācīvarameva mūlacīvaraṃ katvā ṭhapetabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1162_23: tāva aññamaññaṃ mūlacīvaraṃ katvā ṭhapetuṃ labbhatīti vuttanayena,
tika-s0104t:1162_25: Kasmā na vaṭṭatīti āha “sannidhi ca hoti sallekhañca kopetī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1163_2: Ubhosu passesu suvaṇṇarajatādimayā gopānasiyo datvā garuḷapakkhakanayena katā sandamānitā.
tika-s0104t:1163_11: Aññassa dātabbāti ettha vuttanayena dānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1164_1: Sabbepi hi pīṭhabhisādayo nisīdanasayanayoggā gahetabbā tesupi tathāpaṭipajjitabbato.
tika-s0104t:1165_0: Ābādhapaccayā eva attanā paribhuñjitabbā gandhā vaṭṭantīti dasseti “kaṇḍukacchuchavidosādiābādhe satī”ti iminā.
tika-s0104t:1165_1: “Lakkhaṇe hi sati hetutthopi katthaci sambhavatī”ti heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
tika-s0104t:1165_5: Āharāpetvāti ñātipavāritato bhikkhācāravattena vā na yena kenaci vā ākārena harāpetvā.
tika-s0104t:1165_9: pupphaṃ gahetvā vihāre ekamantaṃ nikkhipitu”nti vacanato “dvāre”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1166_2: tasmā yathāvuttānampi pasaṅgaṃ nivāretuṃ “vuttāvasesaṃ daṭṭhabba”nti āha,
tika-s0104t:1166_19: yathā vā bhutte atibhuttatāya gīvā āyamitabbā hoti,
tika-s0104t:1166_24: muṇḍo ca so kuṭumbiko cāti muṇḍakuṭumbiko,
tika-s0104t:1167_3: “Ekā taṇḍulanāḷī”ti vuttattā pana tassā catubhāgo ekapatthoti vadanti.
tika-s0104t:1168_0: “Kuḍuvo pasato eko, pattho te caturo siyuṃ;
tika-s0104t:1169_0: Āḷhako caturo patthā, doṇaṃ vā caturāḷhaka”nti.
tika-s0104t:1170_3: “Aphāsukakāle”tiādinā suddhacittena ṭhapitassa paribhogo sallekhaṃ na kopetīti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1170_5: avāsāgārabhūtena vā uposathāgārādinā saha pañcakuṭiyo sandhāya “kappiyakuṭiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1170_6: Sannidhi nāma natthi tattha antovutthaantopakkassa anuññātattā.
tika-s0104t:1171_1: “Gīvaṃ pasāretvā”ti etena sayameva āpāthagamane doso natthīti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1171_4: Yassa pana padassa vitthārakathaṃ vinā na sakkā attho viññātuṃ,
tika-s0104t:1172_3: Janānaṃ sammadde samūhe katanti hi sammajjaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1172_7: rāmarañño ca yujjhanādikaṃ tappasutehi ācikkhitabbato akkhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1172_14: Pāṇīnaṃ tāḷanasaranti atthaṃ sandhāya pāṇitāḷantipi vadanti.
tika-s0104t:1172_23: Caturassaambaṇakatāḷaṃ nāma rukkhasāradaṇḍādīsu yena kenaci caturassaambaṇaṃ katvā catūsu passesu dhammena onaddhitvā vāditabhaṇḍassa tāḷanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1172_30: Te hi naccaṭṭhāne devatānaṃ balikaraṇaṃ nāma katvā kīḷanti,
tika-s0104t:1172_38: Sāṇe udakena temetvā aññamaññaṃ ākoṭanakīḷā sāṇadhovanakīḷā.
tika-s0104t:1172_39: Vaṃsena kataṃ kīḷanaṃ vaṃsanti āha “veḷuṃ ussāpetvā kīḷana”nti.
tika-s0104t:1173_4: Indajālenāti aṭṭhidhovanamantaṃ parijappetvā yathā pare aṭṭhīniyeva passanti,
tika-s0104t:1173_7: Indassa jālamiva hi paṭicchādituṃ samatthanato “indajāla”nti māyā vuccati indacāpādayo viya.
tika-s0104t:1174_0: Hatthiādīhi saddhiṃ yujjhitunti hatthiādīsu abhiruhitvā aññehi saddhiṃ yujjhanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1174_1: hatthiādīhi ca saddhiṃ sayameva yujjhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1174_9: Balassa senāya aggaṃ gaṇanakoṭṭhāsaṃ karonti etthāti balaggaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1174_13: senāya vā ettha byūhanaṃ vinyāsoti senābyūho,
tika-s0104t:1174_15: ito assā hontū”tiādinā yuddhatthaṃ caturaṅgabalāya senāya desavisesesu vicāraṇaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1174_21: cattāro purisā sarahatthā pattī pacchimaṃ pattānīka”nti kaṇḍaviddhasikkhāpadassa padabhājanaṃ sandhāya “tayo…pe…ādinā nayena vuttassā”ti āha.
tika-s0104t:1174_25: cattāro purisā sarahatthā pattī”ti vuttalakkhaṇato hatthiādigaṇanenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1174_27: eko ca hatthī idameka”nti cammakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttamanīkaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-s0104t:1175_6: Dasapadaṃ nāma dvīhi pantīti vīsatiyā padehi kīḷanajūtaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1175_8: Ākāseyeva kīḷananti “ayaṃ sārī asukapadaṃ mayā nītā,
tika-s0104t:1175_9: ayaṃ asukapada”nti kevalaṃ mukheneva vadantānaṃ ākāseyeva jūtassa kīḷanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1175_12: Ito cito ca saranti parivattantīti sāriyo,
tika-s0104t:1175_18: Pāsakaṃ vuccati chasu passesu ekekaṃ yāva chakkaṃ dassetvā katakīḷanakaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1175_19: taṃ vaḍḍhetvā yathāladdhaṃ ekakādivasena sāriyo apanento,
tika-s0104t:1179_4: Mañjiṭṭhikāya vāti mañjiṭṭhisaṅkhātassa yojanavallirukkhassa sāraṃ gahetvā pakkakasāvaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0104t:1179_7: Bahūsu salākāsu visesarahitaṃ ekaṃ salākaṃ gahetvā tāsu pakkhipitvā puna taññeva uddharantā salākahatthena kīḷantīti keci.
tika-s0104t:1179_14: Hatthapādānaṃ mokkhena mocanena cayati parivattati etāyāti mokkhacikā,
tika-s0104t:1179_16: Paribbhamanattāyeva taṃ cakkaṃ nāmāti dassetuṃ “paribbhamanacakka”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1180_2: Tena katā pana kīḷā pattāḷhakāti vuttaṃ “tāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1180_7: tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ vā yathā vā tathā vā akkharaṃ likhitvā “evamida”nti jānanena kīḷā akkharikā,
tika-s0104t:1180_8: pucchantassa mukhāgataṃ akkharaṃ gahetvā naṭṭhamuttilābhādijānanakīḷātipi vadanti. Vajja-
tika-s0104t:1180_13: evaṃ kate parājayo”ti jayaparājayaṃ purakkhatvā payogakaraṇavasena parihārapathādīnampi jūtappamādaṭṭhānabhāvo veditabbo,
tika-s0104t:1180_16: yathāvajjanti ca kāṇādīhi sadisākāradassanehi jayaparājayavasena jūtakīḷikabhāvena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1180_17: Sabbepi hete jotenti pakāsenti etehi tappayogikā jayaparājayavasena,
tika-s0104t:1180_18: javanti ca gacchanti jayaparājayaṃ etehīti vā atthena jūtasaddavacanīyataṃ nātivattanti.
tika-s0104t:1181_2: Kammavasena payojanato “anuyuttā viharantīti padaṃ apekkhitvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1181_4: Vuttañhi bhikkhunivibhaṅge “pallaṅko nāma āharimehi vāḷehi kato”ti “akappiyarūpākulo akappiyamañco pallaṅko”ti sārasamāse vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1181_8: “Caturaṅgulādhikāni kira tassa lomānī”ti vacanato caturaṅgulato heṭṭhā vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-s0104t:1181_19: Āmalakapattākārāhi pupphapantīhi yebhuyyato katattā āmalakapattotipi vuccati.
tika-s0104t:1182_1: Uditaṃ dvīsu lomaṃ dasā yassāti uddalomī i-
tika-s0104t:1182_5: Ekasmiṃ ante lomaṃ dasā yassāti ekantalomī.
tika-s0104t:1182_8: Tesaṃ vāde pana uditamekato uggataṃ lomamayaṃ pupphaṃ yassāti uddalomī vuttanayena.
tika-s0104t:1182_9: Ubhato antato ekaṃ sadisaṃ lomamayaṃ pupphaṃ yassāti ekantalomīti vacanattho.
tika-s0104t:1182_14: Atthato pana aggahitāvaseso aṭṭhakathādvayepi natthīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t:1183_3: koseyyasuttānamantarantaraṃ suvaṇṇamayasuttāni pavesetvā vītamattharaṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1183_13: Idha hi suttantikapariyāye “ṭhapetvā tūlikaṃ sabbāneva gonakādīni ratanaparisibbitāni vaṭṭantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1183_14: Vinayapariyāyaṃ pana patvā garuke ṭhātabbattā suddhakoseyyameva vaṭṭati,
tika-s0104t:1183_16: suttantikapariyāye pana ratanaparisibbanarahitāpi tūlikā na vaṭṭati,
tika-s0104t:1183_19: bhūmattharaṇavasena yathānurūpaṃ mañcapīṭhādīsu ca upanetuṃ vaṭṭantīti.
tika-s0104t:1183_20: Suttantadesanāya gahaṭṭhānampi vasena vuttattā tesaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ “ṭhapetvā…pe…
tika-s0104t:1186_6: uparūpari ṭhapetvā sibbanavasena hi santatibhūtā “paveṇī”ti vuccati.
tika-s0104t:1186_19: Yaṃ pana nānāvaṇṇaṃ vānacittaṃ vā lepacittaṃ vā,
tika-s0104t:1186_21: Paccattharaṇasseva padhānattā tappaṭibaddhaṃ setavitānampi na vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1186_26: Vicitraṃ vāti pana sabbathā kappiyattā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1186_31: Sace pamāṇayuttanti vuttamevatthaṃ byatirekato samatthetuṃ āha “mahāupadhānaṃ pana paṭikkhitta”nti.
tika-s0104t:1186_35: sīsappamāṇaṃ bibbohanaṃ kātu”nti sīsappamāṇañca nāma yassa vitthārato tīsu kaṇṇesu dvinnaṃ kaṇṇānaṃ antaraṃ
tika-s0104t:1186_38: dīghato pana diyaḍḍharatanaṃ vā dviratanaṃ vā.
tika-s0104t:1186_43: Paccattharaṇaṃ datvāti paccattharaṇaṃ katvā attharitvāti attho,
tika-s0104t:1186_45: Tenāha senāsanakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ “agilānassāpi sīsūpadhānañca pādūpadhānañcāti dvayameva vaṭṭati.
tika-s0104t:1186_46: Gilānassa bibbohanāni santharitvā upari paccattharaṇaṃ katvā nipajjitumpi vaṭṭatī”ti vuttanayenevāti vinaye bhagavatā vuttanayeneva.
tika-s0104t:1186_50: Pallaṅkassa pana āharimāni vāḷarūpāni āharitvā puna appaṭibaddhatākāraṇampi bhedanameva.
tika-s0104t:1186_52: Bibbohanaṃ kātunti tāni vijaṭitatūlāni anto pakkhipitvā bibbohanaṃ kātuṃ.
tika-s0104t:1188_3: Ādāso nāma maṇḍanakapakatikānaṃ manussānaṃ attano mukhachāyāpassanatthaṃ kaṃsalohādīhi kato bhaṇḍaviseso.
tika-s0104t:1188_10: Sāsane pana suddhapupphesupi niruḷhoti āha “abaddhamālā vā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1188_25: Mukhacuṇṇasaṅkhātaṃ mukhavilepananti vā padadvayassa tulyādhikaraṇavasena atthavibhāvanā.
tika-s0104t:1189_10: Alaṅkatadaṇḍakanti pana tato omakaṃ rathayaṭṭhiādikaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0104t:1189_14: tāya ca ratanena ca parikkhitto koso yassa tathā.
tika-s0104t:1189_15: Pañcavaṇṇasuttasibbitanti nīlapītalohitodātamañjiṭṭhavasena pañcavaṇṇehi suttehi sibbitaṃ tividhampi chattaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1189_16: Ratanamattāyāmaṃ caturaṅgulavitthatanti tesaṃ paricayaniyāmena vā nalāṭe bandhituṃ pahonakappamāṇena vā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1190_7: taṃ vā niyyānaṃ phalabhūtaṃ etissāti niyyānikā,
tika-s0104t:1191_3: idha pana visikhāgahaṇena tannivāsinopi gahitā “sabbo gāmo āgato”tiādīsu viya,
tika-s0104t:1192_3: Tadapadesena pana kumbhadāsiyo vuttāti dasseti “kumbhadāsikathā vā”ti iminā.
tika-s0104t:1193_7: sā pana lokāyatasamaññe vitaṇḍasatthe nissitā sallāpakathāti dasseti “lokāyatavitaṇḍasallāpakathā”ti iminā.
tika-s0104t:1193_8: Lokā bālajanā āyatanti ettha ussahanti vādassādenāti lokāyataṃ,
tika-s0104t:1193_9: loko vā hitaṃ na yatati na īhati tenāti lokāyataṃ.
tika-s0104t:1193_10: Tañhi ganthaṃ nissāya sattā puññakiriyāya cittampi na uppādenti.
tika-s0104t:1193_12: saggamokkhaviruddhaṃ vā kathaṃ tanonti etthāti vitaṇḍo,
tika-s0104t:1193_13: viruddhena vā vādadaṇḍena tāḷenti ettha vādinoti vitaṇḍo,
tika-s0104t:1194_0: Sāgaradevena khatoti ettha sāgararañño puttehi khatotipi vadanti.
tika-s0104t:1194_1: Vijjati pavedanahetubhūtā muddhā yassāti samuddo dha-
tika-s0104t:1194_7: Dvandato pubbe suyyamāno itisaddo paccekaṃ yojetabboti āha “iti bhavo iti abhavo”ti.
tika-s0104t:1194_8: Yaṃ vā taṃ vāti yaṃ kiñci,
tika-s0104t:1195_0: Iti imāya chabbidhāya itibhavābhavakathāya saddhiṃ bāttiṃsa tiracchānakathā nāma honti.
tika-s0104t:1195_1: Atha vā pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato anāgatāpi araññapabbatanadīdīpakathā iti-
tika-s0104t:1195_7: ito aññaṃ vā tādisaṃ niratthakakathaṃ anuyuttā viharantī”ti,
tika-s0104t:1195_9: saddo iti vā iti evarūpā “naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā paṭivirato”tiādīsu viya,
tika-s0104t:1195_10: iti evamādiṃ aññampi tādisaṃ kathamanuyuttā viharantīti attho.
tika-s0104t:1196_9: Taṃ pana atthakāraṇayuttatāyāti dassetuṃ “atthayuttaṃ kāraṇayuttanti attho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1196_11: Parivattitvā ṭhitaṃ sapattagato asamattho yodho viya na kiñci jānāsi,
tika-s0104t:1197_5: Vitthārato vinicchayo vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttoti saṅkhepato idha dassetuṃ “saṅkhepato panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1198_2: Vimhāpayantīti “ayamacchariyapuriso”ti attani paresaṃ vimhayaṃ sampahaṃsanaṃ acchariyaṃ uppādenti.
tika-s0104t:1198_6: Lapantīti attānaṃ vā dāyakaṃ vā ukkhipitvā yathā so kiñci dadāti,
tika-s0104t:1198_8: Nimittaṃ sīlametesanti nemittikāti taddhitavasena tassīlattho yathā “paṃsukūliko”ti apica nimittena vadanti,
tika-s0104t:1198_10: Nimittanti ca paresaṃ paccayadānasaññuppādakaṃ kāyavacīkammaṃ vuccati.
tika-s0104t:1198_16: Nippeso ca nāma bhaṭapuriso viya lābhasakkāratthaṃ akkosanakhuṃsanuppaṇḍanaparapiṭṭhimaṃsikatā.
tika-s0104t:1198_17: Lābhena lābhanti ito lābhena amutra lābhaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1198_19: Kuhakādayo saddā kuhānādīni nimittaṃ katvā taṃsamaṅgipuggalesu pavattāti āha “kuhanā…pe…
tika-s0104t:1201_1: Aṅgāni ārabbha pavattattā aṅgasahacaritaṃ satthaṃ “aṅga”nti vuttaṃ uttarapadalopena vā.
tika-s0104t:1201_4: Keci pana “aṅganti aṅgavikāraṃ paresaṃ aṅgavikāradassanenāpi lābhālābhādivijānana”nti vadanti.
tika-s0104t:1202_1: mahantaṃ pana uppādoti nimittuppādānaṃ visesaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1202_3: Subhāsubhaphalaṃ pakāsento uppajjati gacchatīti uppādo, uppātopi,
tika-s0104t:1202_5: So hi dhūmo viya aggissa kammaphalassa pakāsanamattameva karoti,
tika-s0104t:1202_14: tassa “idaṃ nāma phala”ntiādinā hi vatthukittanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1202_19: Lakkhaṇanti hi aṅgapaccaṅgesu dissamānākāravisesaṃ sattisirivacchagadāpāsādādikamadhippetaṃ taṃ taṃ phalaṃ lakkhīyati anenāti katvā,
tika-s0104t:1202_24: Ito paṭṭhāyāti devarakkhasamanussādibhedena yathāphalaṃ parikappitena vividhavatthabhāge ito vā etto vā sañchinne idaṃ nāma bhogādiphalaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1203_10: aṅgulicchavimattaṃ apassitvā tadaṭṭhivipassanavaseneva byākarontīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1203_12: evaṃ sati aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ viruhanabhāvena laṭṭhisadisattā sarīrameva aṅgalaṭṭhīti viññāyati.
tika-s0104t:1203_23: saddameva rassaṃ katvā evamahāti sandhāya “siṅgālarutavijjā”ti vadanti,
tika-s0104t:1203_46: Nanu sakuṇavijjāya eva vāyasavijjāpaviṭṭhāti āha “taṃ visuññeva sattha”nti.
tika-s0104t:1203_47: Taṃtaṃpakāsakasatthānurūpavasena hi idha tassa tassa vacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1204_10: yathā taṃ subhāsubhajānanappakāre sabbato bhadraṃ cakkādisamaññāti āha “sabba…pe…
tika-s0104t:1205_4: “Yamhi kule”tiādinā imasmiṃ ṭhāne tathājānanahetu eva sesaṃ lakkhaṇanti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1205_5: Ayaṃ visesoti “lakkhaṇa”nti heṭṭhā vuttā lakkhaṇato viseso.
tika-s0104t:1205_6: Tadatthāvikaraṇatthaṃ “idañcettha vatthū”ti vuttaṃ aggiṃ dhamamānanti aggiṃ mukhavātena jālentaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1206_8: “Abbhantarānaṃ raññaṃ jayo”tiādīhi dvīhi vākyehi vuttā jayaparājayā pākaṭāyeva.
tika-s0104t:1207_0: 24. Rāhūti rāhu nāma asurissaro asurarājā. Tathā hi mahāsamayasutte asuranikāye vuttaṃ –
tika-s0104t:1210_0: Tassa candimasūriyānaṃ gahaṇaṃ saṃyuttanikāye candimasuttasūriyasuttehi dīpetabbaṃ. Iti-
tika-s0104t:1210_3: Tasmā candimasūriyānamiva nakkhattānampi rāhunā gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1210_4: Tato eva hi “api cā”tiādinā nakkhattagāhe dutiyanayo vutto.
tika-s0104t:1210_6: samāyogo api nakkhattagāhoyeva saha payogena gahaṇato.
tika-s0104t:1210_9: Vātasaṅghātesu hi vegena aññamaññaṃ saṅghaṭṭentesu dīpikobhāso viya obhāso uppajjitvā ākāsato patati,
tika-s0104t:1212_0: Porisī ca pamāṇena, ukkā nānāvidhā matā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1213_1: taṃ sarūpato dasseti “aggisikhadhūmasikhādīhi ākulabhāvo viyā”ti iminā,
tika-s0104t:1213_2: aggisikhadhūmasikhādīnaṃ bahudhā pātubhāvo eva disādāho nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1220_2: Abbhā dhūmo rajo rāhūti imehi catūhi kāraṇehi avisuddhatā.
tika-s0104t:1220_6: yehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhā candimasūriyā na tapanti na bhāsanti na virocanti.
tika-s0104t:1221_6: taṃ pana aṅgulisaṅkocanena gaṇanāyevāti ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1221_7: Ācariyasāriputtattherena pana “hatthamuddā nāma aṅgulipabbesu saññaṃ ṭhapetvā gaṇanā”ti dassitā.
tika-s0104t:1221_9: sā pana pādasikamilakkhakādayo viya “ekaṃ dve”tiādinā navantavidhinā nirantaragaṇanāti veditabbā.
tika-s0104t:1221_10: Samūhanaṃ saṅkalanaṃ visuṃ uppādanaṃ apanayanaṃ paṭuppādanaṃ [saṭuppādanaṃ (aṭṭhakathāyaṃ)] “saduppādana”ntipi paṭhanti,
tika-s0104t:1221_17: Sāti yathāvuttā piṇḍagaṇanā disvāti ettha diṭṭhamattena gaṇetvāti attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0104t:1222_3: kavīnaṃ vā idaṃ kāveyyanti atthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1222_6: anusandhiñca sayameva cirena cintetvā karaṇavasena cintākavi veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:1222_7: Kiñci sutvā sutena asutaṃ anusandhetvā karaṇavasena sutakavi,
tika-s0104t:1222_8: kiñci atthaṃ upadhāretvā tassa saṅkhipanavitthāraṇādivasena atthakavi,
tika-s0104t:1222_9: yaṃ kiñci parena kataṃ kabbaṃ vā nāṭakaṃ vā disvā taṃsadisameva aññaṃ attano ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānena karaṇavasena paṭibhānakavīti.
tika-s0104t:1223_13: Paresaṃ dinnaṃ iṇaṃ vā dhananti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:1223_16: Tattha vā aññattha vā yathākālaparicchedaṃ vaḍḍhigahaṇavasena payojanaṃ uddhāro.
tika-s0104t:1223_17: “Bhaṇḍamūlarahitānaṃ vāṇijaṃ katvā ettakena udayena saha mūlaṃ dethā’ti dhanadānaṃ payogo,
tika-s0104t:1223_19: Ajja payojitaṃ diguṇaṃ catuguṇaṃ hotīti yadi ajja payojitaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1223_32: pāṇakehi vā gabbhe vinassante na purimakammunā okāso kato,
tika-s0104t:1223_34: sayameva pana kammunā okāse kate na ekantena vātā,
tika-s0104t:1223_35: pāṇakā vā apekkhitabbāti kammassa visuṃ kāraṇabhāvo vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1223_36: Vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vātena pāṇakehi vā gabbho vinassanto kammaṃ vinā na vinassatīti adhippāyena tamaññātra dvīhi kāraṇehīti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1224_0: Bandhakaraṇanti yathā jiṃ cāletuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0104t:1224_2: Parivattanatthanti āvudhādinā saha ukkhittahatthānaṃ aññattha parivattanatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1224_3: attanā gopitaṭṭhāne akhipetvā parattha khipanatthanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1224_6: Icchitatthassa devatāya kaṇṇe kathanavasena jappanaṃ kaṇṇajappananti ca vadanti.
tika-s0104t:1224_7: Devataṃ otāretvāti ettha mantajappanena devatāya otāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1224_8: Jīvikatthāyāti yathā pāricariyaṃ katvā jīvitavutti hoti,
tika-s0104t:1224_10: Ādiccapāricariyāti karamālāhi pūjaṃ katvā sakaladivasaṃ ādiccābhimukhāvaṭṭhānena ādiccassa paricaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1224_15: “Sirenā”ti pana ṭhānavasena avhāyanākāraṃ dasseti. Ye tu a- kārato a-
tika-s0104t:1224_17: tesaṃ pāṭhe ayamattho “mantaṃ jappetvā sirasā icchitassa atthassa avhāyana”nti.
tika-s0104t:1225_8: Tasminti yaṃ “sace me idaṃ nāma samijjhissatī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1225_12: Yathāpaṭissavañhi upahāre kate paṇidhiāyācanā katā niyyātitā hotīti.
tika-s0104t:1225_19: Purisaliṅgato virahena avaasati hīḷito hutvā bhavatīti vosso.
tika-s0104t:1225_21: Vigato rāgassavo yassāti vossoti niruttinayena padasiddhītipi vadanti.
tika-s0104t:1226_14: adhovirecanaṃ dosanīharaṇanti ayametesaṃ viseso pākaṭo hoti.
tika-s0104t:1226_20: Yena akkhimhi añjite uṇhaṃ usumaṃ nikkhamati.
tika-s0104t:1226_29: Salākasadisattā salākasaṅkhātassa akkhirogassa vejjakammanti hi sālākiyaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1226_30: Idaṃ pana vuttāvasesassa akkhirogapaṭikammassa saṅgahaṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ “tappanādayopi hi sālākiyānevā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1226_31: Paṭividdhassa salākassa nikkhamanatthaṃ vejjakammaṃ salākavejjakammanti keci,
tika-s0104t:1227_8: Mūlāni padhānāni rogūpasamane samatthāni bhesajjāni mūlabhesajjāni,
tika-s0104t:1227_11: Tatra mūlabyādhimhi tikicchite yebhuyyena itaraṃ vūpasamati,
tika-s0104t:1227_16: Tadanurūpe vaṇeti vūpasamitassa mūlabyādhino anucchavike arumhi.
tika-s0104t:1227_20: Idañca komārabhaccasallakattasālākiyādivisesabhūtānaṃ tantīnaṃ pubbe vuttattā pārisesavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1227_21: tasmā tadavasesāya tantiyā idha saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-s0104t:1227_22: sabbāni cetāni ājīvahetukāniyeva idhādhippetāni “micchājīvena jīvikaṃ kappentī”ti vuttattā.
tika-s0104t:1227_23: Yaṃ pana tattha tattha pāḷiyaṃ “iti vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1227_30: Tena yāni ito bāhirakapabbajitā sippāyatanavijjāṭṭhānādīni jīvikopāyabhūtāni ājīvikapakatā upajīvanti,
tika-s0104t:1230_8: ettakā eva buddhaguṇā ye tumhākaṃ pākaṭā,
tika-s0104t:1230_11: “Ime diṭṭhiṭṭhānā evaṃ gahitā”tiādinā sassatādidiṭṭhiṭṭhānānaṃ yathāgahitākārassa suññabhāvappakāsanato,
tika-s0104t:1230_12: “tañca pajānanaṃ na parāmasatī”ti sīlādīnañca aparāmasanīyabhāvadīpanena niccasārādivirahappakāsanato,
tika-s0104t:1230_13: yāsu vedanāsu avītarāgatāya bāhirānaṃ etāni diṭṭhivibandhakāni sambhavanti,
tika-s0104t:1230_14: tāsaṃ paccayabhūtānañca sammohādīnaṃ vedakakārakasabhāvābhāvadassanamukhena sabbadhammānaṃ attattaniyatāvirahadīpanato,
tika-s0104t:1230_15: anupādāparinibbānadīpanato ca ayaṃ desanā suññatāvibhāvanappadhānāti āha “suññatāpakāsanaṃ ārabhī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1231_1: Desanāti tassā tantiyā manasā vavatthāpitāya vibhāvanā,
tika-s0104t:1231_3: anulomādivasena vā kathananti pariyattidesanānaṃ viseso pubbeyeva vavatthāpitoti imamatthaṃ sandhāya “desanāya,
tika-s0104t:1231_13: sa ve pecca na socati”tiādīsu paññāyaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1231_18: “sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthamāgacchantī”tiādīsu ñeyye pavattati.
tika-s0104t:1231_19: Dhammā hontīti sattajīvato suññā dhammamattā hontīti attho.
tika-s0104t:1232_3: “Duddasā”ti padeneva tesaṃ dhammānaṃ dukkhogāhatā pakāsitāti “alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā” icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1232_13: sace koci attano pamāṇaṃ ajānanto ñāṇena te dhamme ogāhituṃ ussāhaṃ kareyya,
tika-s0104t:1232_14: tassa taṃ ñāṇaṃ appatiṭṭhameva makasatuṇḍasūci viya mahāsamuddeti.
tika-s0104t:1232_15: Ogāhitumasakkuṇeyyatāya “ettakā ete īdisā vā”ti te passituṃ na sakkāti vuttaṃ “gambhīrattā eva duddasā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1232_17: tesaṃ ogāhitvā anu anu bujjhane kathā eva natthīti āha “duddasattā eva duranubodhāti.
tika-s0104t:1233_0: Atha vā kasiṇugghāṭimākāsatabbisayaviññāṇānaṃ anantabhāvo viya susamūhatavikkhepatāya niccasamāhitassa
tika-s0104t:1233_2: Avirajjhitvā nimittapaṭivedho viya issāsānaṃ avirajjhitvā dhammānaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvāvabodho sāduraso mahārasova hotīti āha “atittikaraṇaṭṭhenā”ti,
tika-s0104t:1233_6: Paṭivedhappattānaṃ tesu ca buddhānameva sabbākārena visayabhāvūpagamanato na takkabuddhiyā gocarāti āha “uttamañāṇavisayattā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1233_8: Yasmā pana so chekabhāvo ārammaṇe appaṭihatavuttitāya,
tika-s0104t:1234_2: Kadāciyeva asaṅkhyeyye mahākappe atikkamitvāpi dullabhadassanatāya duddasā.
tika-s0104t:1234_9: atakkena vā ñāṇena avacaritabbato atakkāvacarā. Nipuṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1234_10: nipuṇe vā atthe saccapaccayākārādivasena vibhāvanato nipuṇā.
tika-s0104t:1234_11: Loke aggapaṇḍitena sammāsambuddhena veditabbato pakāsitabbato paṇḍitavedanīyā.
tika-s0104t:1235_3: tenevāha “sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedetī”ti. Sayaṃ- saddena,
tika-s0104t:1235_4: niddhāritāvadhāraṇena vā nivattetabbamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “anaññaneyyo hutvā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1235_7: kāralopo “aññāṇatā āpajjatī”tiādīsu viyāti dasseti “abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇenā”ti iminā.
tika-s0104t:1235_8: Apica “sayaṃ abhiññā”ti padassa anaññaneyyo hutvāti atthavacanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1236_0: Tattha kiñcāpi sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ phalanibbānāni viya sacchikātabbasabhāvaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0104t:1236_2: tasmā tassa paccakkhakaraṇaṃ sacchikiriyāti āha “abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena paccakkhaṃ katvā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1236_5: Abhivisiṭṭhañāṇanti vā paccavekkhaṇāñāṇe adhippete karaṇatthe karaṇavacanampi yujjateva.
tika-s0104t:1237_0: Vadamānāti ettha sattiattho mānasaddo yathā “ekapuggalo bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t:1237_5: Sāvasesaṃ vadantāpi viparītavadantā viya sammā vadantīti na vattabbāti yathā sammā vadanti,
tika-s0104t:1237_7: Tena hi anavasesavadanameva sammā vadananti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1237_8: “Vattuṃ sakkuṇeyyu”nti iminā ca “vadeyyu”nti etassa samatthanatthabhāvamāha yathā “so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti ye evaṃ bhagavatā thomitā,
tika-s0104t:1237_11: aññeva dhammā”tiādipāḷiyā “sabbaññutaññāṇa”nti vuttavacanassa virodhibhāvaṃ codento “yadi eva”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:1237_12: Tattha yadi evanti evaṃ “sabbaññutaññāṇa”nti vuttavacanaṃ yadi siyāti attho.
tika-s0104t:1238_0: Apica puthu ārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇametassāti puthuārammaṇārammaṇanti etasmiṃ atthe “oṭṭhamukho,
tika-s0104t:1238_1: kāmāvacara”ntiādīsu viya ekassa ārammaṇasaddassa lopaṃ katvā “puthuārammaṇato”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1238_3: Tathā hetaṃ ñāṇaṃ tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1238_10: dasabalañāṇanti evamādīnaṃ anekasatasahassabhedānaṃ ñāṇānaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ kiccaṃ sādheti,
tika-s0104t:1238_11: tesaṃ ārammaṇabhūtānaṃ anekesampi dhammānaṃ tadārammaṇabhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1238_15: Ekavāravasena puthuārammaṇabhāvaṃ nivattetvā anekavāravasena kamappavattiyā taṃ dassetuṃ “punappunaṃ uppattivasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1238_18: Yathā bāhirakā vadanti “sakiṃyeva sabbaññū sabbaṃ jānāti,
tika-s0104t:1239_0: Yadi evaṃ acinteyyāparimeyyappabhedassa ñeyyassa paricchedavatā ekena ñāṇena niravasesato kathaṃ paṭivedhoti,
tika-s0104t:1239_7: disādesakālādivasena ca anekabhedabhinne ñeyye kamena gayhamāne anavasesapaṭivedho na sambhavatiyevāti?
tika-s0104t:1239_9: Yañhi kiñci bhagavatā ñātumicchitaṃ sakalamekadeso vā,
tika-s0104t:1239_11: Vikkhepābhāvato ca bhagavā sabbakālaṃ samāhitoti ñātumicchitassa paccakkhabhāvo na sakkā nivāretuṃ.
tika-s0104t:1239_13: nanu cettha dūrato cittapaṭaṃ passantānaṃ viya,
tika-s0104t:1239_14: “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti vipassantānaṃ viya ca anekadhammāvabodhakāle anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti gahetabbanti?
tika-s0104t:1239_18: sabbākārena sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthassa ākaṅkhāpaṭibaddhavuttino anāvaraṇañāṇassa paṭilābhena bhagavā
tika-s0104t:1239_21: na sakiṃyeva sabbadhammāvabodhato yathāsantānena sabbassa indhanassa dahanasamatthatāya pāvako “sabbabhū”ti vuccatīti.
tika-s0104t:1240_2: imissā ca porāṇasaṃvaṇṇanāvisodhanavasena pavattattā puna vibhāvitoti na cettha punaruttidoso pariyesitabbo,
tika-s0104t:1240_4: Ettha ca kiñcāpi bhagavato dasabalādiñāṇānipi anaññasādhāraṇāni,
tika-s0104t:1240_5: sabbadesavisayattā pana tesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ na tehi buddhaguṇā ahāpetvā gahitā nāma honti.
tika-s0104t:1240_6: Sabbaññutaññāṇassa pana nippadesavisayattā tasmiṃ gahite sabbepi buddhaguṇā gahitā eva nāma honti,
tika-s0104t:1240_7: tasmā pāḷiatthānusārena tadeva ñāṇaṃ gahitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1240_8: Pāḷiyampi hi “yehi tathāgatassa yathābhuccaṃ vaṇṇaṃ sammā vadamānā vadeyyu”nti tameva pakāsitaṃ tamantarena aññassa nippadesavisayassa abhāvato,
tika-s0104t:1241_1: saddo sanniṭṭhāpanatthoti dassetuṃ “aññevāti idaṃ panettha vavatthāpanavacana”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1241_5: “Na pāṇātipātā veramaṇiādayo”ti iminā avadhāraṇena nivattitaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1241_9: tato aññatthāpi vacanicchāvasena upatiṭṭhatīti āha “gambhīrāvā”tiādi. Iti-
tika-s0104t:1241_10: saddena ca ādiatthena duddasāva na sudasā,
tika-s0104t:1242_1: Tattha sāvakapāramiñāṇanti sāvakānaṃ dānādipāramipāripūriyā nipphannaṃ vijjattayachaḷabhiññācatupaṭisambhidābhedaṃ ñāṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1242_5: Tatopīti anantaraniddiṭṭhato paccekabodhiñāṇatopi. Api- saddena, pi-
tika-s0104t:1242_6: saddena vā ko pana vādo sāvakapāramiñāṇatoti sambhāveti.
tika-s0104t:1242_9: tasmā ettha sabbaññutaññāṇe vavatthānaṃ labbhatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t:1242_12: Ayañca gambhīro ayañca gambhīro ime imesaṃ visesena gambhīrāti vā gambhīratarā.
tika-s0104t:1243_1: kiñcāpi sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ sekkhañāṇaṃ puthujjanañāṇañca upādāya gambhīraṃ,
tika-s0104t:1243_2: paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ pana upādāya na tathā gambhīranti “gambhīramevā”ti na sakkā byavacchijjituṃ,
tika-s0104t:1243_4: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pana upādāya na evaṃ gambhīranti “gambhīramevā”ti na sakkā byavacchijjituṃ,
tika-s0104t:1243_6: Sabbaññutaññāṇadhammā pana sāvakapāramiñāṇādīnamiva kiñci upādāya gambhīrābhāvābhāvato “gambhīrā evā”ti vavatthānaṃ labbhatīti.
tika-s0104t:1243_9: “Paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ pana tato duddasataranti tattha vavatthānaṃ natthī”tiādinā vavatthānasambhavo netabbo,
tika-s0104t:1244_5: bhavatu tāva niravasesabuddhaguṇavibhāvanupāyabhāvato sabbaññutaññāṇameva ekampi puthunissayārammaṇañāṇakiccasiddhiyā “atthi bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t:1244_7: tassa pana vissajjanaṃ saccapaccayākārādivisayavisesavasena anaññasādhāraṇena vibhajananayena anārabhitvā
tika-s0104t:1244_9: Tattha yathā saccapaccayākārādīnaṃ vibhajanaṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇasseva visayo,
tika-s0104t:1244_12: Gajjitaṃ mahantaṃ hotīti desetabbassa atthassa anekavidhatāya,
tika-s0104t:1244_13: dubbiññeyyatāya ca nānānayehi pavattamānaṃ desanāgajjitaṃ mahantaṃ vipulaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1244_15: Ñāṇaṃ anupavisatīti tato eva ca desanāñāṇaṃ desetabbadhamme vibhāgaso kurumānaṃ anupavisati,
tika-s0104t:1244_16: te anupavisitvā ṭhitaṃ viya hotīti attho.
tika-s0104t:1245_0: Buddhañāṇassa mahantabhāvo paññāyatīti evaṃvidhassa nāma dhammassa desakaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1245_3: Desanā gambhīrā hotīti sabhāvena gambhīrānaṃ tesaṃ catubbidhānampi desanā desetabbavasena gambhīrāva hoti,
tika-s0104t:1245_8: Ettha ca kiñcāpi “sabbaṃ vacīkammaṃ buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ñāṇānuparivattī”ti vacanato sabbāpi bhagavato desanā ñāṇarahitā nāma natthi,
tika-s0104t:1245_10: desetabbadhammavasena pana desanā visesato ñāṇena anupaviṭṭhā,
tika-s0104t:1246_0: Kathaṃ pana vinayapaṇṇattiṃ patvā desanā tilakkhaṇāhatā,
tika-s0104t:1246_4: Tatthāpi hi sannisinnaparisāya ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ pavattamānā desanā saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatādivibhāvinī sabbadhammānaṃ attattaniyatā,
tika-s0104t:1246_11: Bhavanti dhammā etthāti bhūmīti hi avatthāviseso,
tika-s0104t:1246_22: Vinayapaññattiṃ patvā mahantaṃ gajjitaṃ hotītiādinā sambandho.
tika-s0104t:1247_0: Evaṃ otiṇṇe vatthusminti yathāvuttanayena lahukagarukādivasena tadanurūpe vatthumhi otarante.
tika-s0104t:1247_5: Thāmo balanti vā sāmatthiyavacanameva paccavekkhaṇādesanāñāṇavasena yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1247_8: eso sikkhāpadapaññāpanasaṅkhāto visayo aññesaṃ avisayoti attho.
tika-s0104t:1248_1: tathāpi suttantabhājanīyādivasena abhidhammeyeva te visesato vibhattāti āha “ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā…pe…
tika-s0104t:1248_8: tena vuttāvasesaṃ abhidhamme āgataṃ dhammānaṃ vibhajitabbākāraṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0104t:1248_11: Ettha ca paccayanayaṃ aggahetvā dhammavaseneva samantapaṭṭhānassa catuvīsatividhatā vuttā. Yathāha –
tika-s0104t:1255_0: Evaṃ dhammavasena catuvīsatibhedesu tikapaṭṭhānādīsu ekekaṃ paccayanayena anulomādivasena catubbidhaṃ hotīti channavutisamantapaṭṭhānāni.
tika-s0104t:1255_1: Tattha pana dhammānulome tikapaṭṭhāne kusalattike paṭiccavāre paccayānulome hetumūlake hetupaccayavasena
tika-s0104t:1255_2: ekūnapaññāsa pucchānayā satta vissajjananayātiādinā dassiyamānā anantabhedā nayāti āha “anantanaya”nti.
tika-s0104t:1256_4: Sati ca avijjāya saṅkhārā uppajjanti, nāsati.
tika-s0104t:1256_5: Tasmā avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ uppādo hutvā paccayo hoti,
tika-s0104t:1256_6: tathā pavattati dharati etasmiṃ phalanti pavattaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1256_8: (Nidadāti phalaṃ attano paccayuppannaṃ etenāti nidānaṃ.) (Etthantare aṭṭhakathāya na sameti) āyūhati
tika-s0104t:1256_9: phalaṃ attano paccayuppannuppattiyā ghaṭeti etenāti āyūhanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1256_10: Saṃyujjati phalaṃ attano paccayuppannena etasminti saṃyogo.
tika-s0104t:1256_17: te avijjāya sati attano phalaṃ (nidadanti) bhavādīsu khipanti,
tika-s0104t:1256_20: yasmiṃ santāne sayaṃ uppannā taṃ palibuddhanti,
tika-s0104t:1256_25: Evaṃ avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ kāraṇabhāvūpagamanavisesā uppādādayo veditabbā.
tika-s0104t:1257_4: Yasmā pana “āsavasamudayā avijjāsamudayo”ti vuttattā āsavāva avijjāya paccayo,
tika-s0104t:1257_6: avijjā ca saṅkhārā ca ubhopete dhammā paccayato eva samuppannā,
tika-s0104t:1257_9: avijjāya ca uppādādike paccayākāre paricchinditvā gahaṇavasena pavattā paññā.
tika-s0104t:1257_10: Dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti paccayuppannadhammānaṃ paccayabhāvato dhammaṭṭhitisaṅkhāte paṭiccasamuppāde ñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1257_11: “Dvādasa paṭiccasamuppādā”ti vacanato hi dvādasa paccayā eva paṭiccasamuppādo.
tika-s0104t:1257_15: atha kho saṅkhārādīnaṃ viññāṇādīsupi labbhatīti paripuṇṇaṃ katvā paccayākārassa vibhattabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “atītampi addhāna”ntiādi pāḷimāhari.
tika-s0104t:1257_16: Paṭṭhāne pana dassitā hetādipaccayāevettha uppādādipaccayākārehi gahitāti tepi yathāsambhavaṃ nīharitvā yojetabbā.
tika-s0104t:1258_3: Atītapaccuppannānāgatavasena tayo addhā kālā etassāti tiyaddhaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1258_8: Atha vā hetu vipākoti saṅkhippantīti saṅkhepā.
tika-s0104t:1258_12: Sarūpato avuttāpi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ saṅkhepe ākirīyanti avijjāsaṅkhārādiggahaṇehi pakāsīyantīti ākārā,
tika-s0104t:1258_14: Te saṅkhepe pañca pañca katvā vīsati ākārā etassāti vīsatākāraṃ.
tika-s0104t:1259_0: Khattiyādibhedena anekabhedabhinnāpi sassatavādino jātisatasahassānussaraṇādikassa abhinivesahetuno vasena cattārova honti,
tika-s0104t:1259_2: adho vāti sassatavādīnaṃ parimāṇaparicchedassa anaññavisayataṃ dassetuṃ “cattāro janā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:1259_4: Tattha cattāro janāti cattāro janasamūhāti attho gahetabbo tesu ekekassāpi anekappabhedato.
tika-s0104t:1259_7: Tatthāpi ca hetuphalabhāvena sambandhānaṃ dhammānaṃ santatighanassa abheditattā paramatthato vijjamānampi
tika-s0104t:1259_8: bhedanibandhanaṃ nānattanayaṃ anupadhāretvā gahitaṃ ekattaggahaṇaṃ nissāya.
tika-s0104t:1259_9: Idaṃ gaṇhantīti idaṃ sassataggahaṇaṃ abhinivissa voharanti,
tika-s0104t:1259_10: iminā nayena ekaccasassatavādādayopi yathāsambhavaṃ yojetvā vattabbā.
tika-s0104t:1259_20: diṭṭhigumbavivaraṇena ca nijjaṭaṃ nigumbaṃ katvāti attho.
tika-s0104t:1260_0: “Tasmā”tiādinā buddhaguṇe ārabbha desanāya samuṭṭhitattā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ uddisitvā desanākusalo bhagavā
tika-s0104t:1261_4: Saṃvijjamānaparidīpanena pana “santī”ti iminā padena tesaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ vijjamānatāya avicchinnataṃ,
tika-s0104t:1261_5: tato ca nesaṃ micchāgāhato sithilakaraṇavivecanehi attano desanāya kiccakāritaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1261_7: Atthīti ca santipadena samānattho puthuvacanavisayo eko nipāto “atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0104t:1261_14: “Eke”ti vutte ekacceti attho eva saṅkhyāvācakassa eka-
tika-s0104t:1261_21: Yasmā pana tesaṃ pubbantaṃ purimasiddhehi taṇhādiṭṭhikappehi kappetvā āsevanabalavatāya,
tika-s0104t:1261_22: vicitravuttitāya ca vikappetvā aparabhāgasiddhehi abhinivesabhūtehi taṇhādiṭṭhigāhehi gaṇhanti abhinivisanti parāmasanti,
tika-s0104t:1261_24: Purimabhāgapacchimabhāgasiddhānaṃ vā taṇhāupādānānaṃ vasena yathākkamaṃ kappanagahaṇāni veditabbāni.
tika-s0104t:1261_26: Pahutapasaṃsānindātisayasaṃsagganiccayogādivisayesu idha niccayogavasena vijjamānattho sambhavatīti vuttaṃ “pubbanta kappo vā”tiādi vuttañca –
tika-s0104t:1264_0: Koṭṭhāsesūti ettha koṭṭhāsādīsūti attho veditabbo ādi-
tika-s0104t:1264_5: Tathā hi “iṅgha tāva suttante vā gāthāyo vā abhidhammaṃ vā pariyāpuṇassu,
tika-s0104t:1264_6: suttante okāsaṃ kārāpetvā”tiādīsu ca padapūraṇe anta-
tika-s0104t:1264_10: atthīti kho kaccāna ayameko anto”tiādīsu ca ummaggeti.
tika-s0104t:1265_1: “Sā haritantaṃ vā panthantaṃ vā”ti majjhimanikāye mahāhatthipadopamasuttantapāḷi.
tika-s0104t:1265_15: Etena sabbapaccayasaṅkhayanato asaṅkhataṃ nibbānaṃ saṅkhatabhūtassa vaṭṭadukkhassa parabhāgaṃ pariyosānabhūtaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1265_16: tasmā ettha parabhāgova attho yuttoti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1266_7: “saṅkappo kāmo rāgo kāmo saṅkapparāgo kāmo”tiādīsu kilesakāme,
tika-s0104t:1266_11: “satthukappena vata kira bho sāvakena saddhiṃ mantayamānā na jānimhā”tiādīsu sadisabhāveti.
tika-s0104t:1267_3: Taṇhādiṭṭhivasenāti upanissayasahajātabhūtāya abhinandanasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya ceva sassatādiākārena abhinivisantassa micchāgāhassa ca vasena.
tika-s0104t:1267_4: Pubbe nivutthadhammavisayāya kappanāya idha adhippetattā atītakālavācakoyeva pubba- saddo,
tika-s0104t:1267_8: na pana abbhantarādivācakoti dassetuṃ “atītaṃ khandhakoṭṭhāsa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1267_9: Kappetvāti ca tasmiṃ pubbante taṇhāyanābhinivesanānaṃ samatthanaṃ pariniṭṭhāpanamāha.
tika-s0104t:1267_11: pubbantameva anugatā diṭṭhi tesamatthīti yojanā. Atthitā,
tika-s0104t:1267_12: anugatatā ca nāma punappunaṃ pavattiyāti dasseti “punappunaṃ uppajjanavasenā”ti iminā.
tika-s0104t:1267_18: Tadetaṃ aññesaṃ patiṭṭhāpanadassananti āha “aññampi janaṃ diṭṭhigatitaṃ karontā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1268_1: Dāsādīsu hi sirivaḍḍhakādisaddā viya vacanamattameva adhikāraṃ katvā pavattiyā tathā paṇṇattiyeva adhivacanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1268_22: kāyādiñca abhūtaṃ atthaṃ sabhāvadhammesu ajjhāropetvā diṭṭhiyo pavattanti.
tika-s0104t:1269_5: Abhivadanakiriyāya ajjāpi avicchedabhāvadassanatthaṃ vattamānavacanaṃ katanti ayamettha pāḷivaṇṇanā.
tika-s0104t:1269_16: Ekasmiṃyeva khandhe “attā”ti ca “loko”ti ca gahaṇavisesaṃ upādāya paññāpanaṃ hotīti āha “rūpādīsu aññataraṃ attāti ca lokoti ca gahetvā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1269_25: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatī”ti imissā pañcavidhāya sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā vasena vutto,
tika-s0104t:1269_26: “rūpavantaṃ attāna”ntiādikāya pana pañcadasavidhāyapi tadavasesāya sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā vasena cattāro khandhe
tika-s0104t:1269_27: “attā”ti gahetvā tadañño “loko”ti paññapentīti ayampi attho labbhateva.
tika-s0104t:1269_28: Tathā ekaṃ khandhaṃ “attā”ti gahetvā añño attano upabhogabhūto “loko”ti ca.
tika-s0104t:1269_29: Sasantatipatite khandhe “attā”ti gahetvā tadañño parasantatipatito “loko”ti ca paññapetīti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Etthāha –
tika-s0104t:1269_31: nanu tesaṃ attā ca loko ca sassatoti adhippeto,
tika-s0104t:1269_34: sassatasahacaritatāya pana vādopi sassatoti vutto yathā “kuntā pacarantī”ti,
tika-s0104t:1269_35: sassato iti vādo etesanti vā tattha iti-
tika-s0104t:1269_38: moghamañña”nti abhinivissa voharantīti sassatavādā tipi yujjati.
tika-s0104t:1270_5: Samādahanaṃ pana kosajjapakkhe patitumadatvā cittassa ussāhanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1270_8: Iti padattayena vīriyameva vuttanti āha “evaṃ tippabhedaṃ vīriya”nti.
tika-s0104t:1270_12: So pana satipaṭṭhānā cattāro khandhā eva.
tika-s0104t:1270_13: Sammā upāyena manasi karoti kammaṭṭhānametenāti sammāmanasikāro,
tika-s0104t:1270_19: Tattha yasmiṃ manasikāreti kammaṭṭhānamanasikaraṇūpāyabhūte ñāṇasaṅkhāte manasikāre.
tika-s0104t:1270_20: “Imasmiṃ ṭhāne”ti iminā saddantarasampayogādinā viya pakaraṇavasenāpi saddo visesavisayoti dīpeti.
tika-s0104t:1270_21: Vīriyañcāti yathāvuttehi tīhi padehi vuttaṃ tippabhedaṃ vīriyañca.
tika-s0104t:1270_24: sīlavisuddhiyā saddhiṃ catunnaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ adhigamanapaṭipadā idha vattabbā,
tika-s0104t:1270_25: sā pana visuddhimagge vitthārato vuttāti āha “saṅkhepattho”ti.
tika-s0104t:1270_27: etena cuddasavidhehi cittaparidamanehi rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānassa paguṇatāpādanena damitataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1271_4: Vanati yācati puttanti vañjhā jha- paccayaṃ, na-
tika-s0104t:1271_10: Sā viya kassaci phalassa ajanenāti vañjho,
tika-s0104t:1271_12: Evaṃ padatthavatā iminā kīdisaṃ sāmatthiyatthaṃ dassetīti antolīnacodanaṃ pariharituṃ “etenā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:1271_14: tammukhena pana sesadhammāpīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya “jhānādīna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1271_19: sukhādidhammānaṃ viya ca paccayāyattavuttitāya uppādavantatā viññāyati,
tika-s0104t:1271_20: uppāde ca sati avassaṃbhāvī nirodhoti anavakāsāva niccatā siyā,
tika-s0104t:1272_1: saddoyeva vā loke accantaṃ nicce niruḷho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t:1272_3: esikā ca sā ṭhāyī cāti esikaṭṭhāyī,
tika-s0104t:1272_5: tasmā gambhīranemo niccalaṭṭhitiko indakhīlo viyāti attho,
tika-s0104t:1272_8: “Esikaṭṭhāyī ṭhito”ti iminā pana yathā esikā vātappahārādīhi na calati,
tika-s0104t:1272_10: vikāropi atthato vināsoyevāti vuttaṃ “ubhayenāpi lokassa vināsābhāvaṃ dassetī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1273_0: Evamaṭṭhakathāvādaṃ dassetvā idāni kecivādaṃ dassetuṃ “keci panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1273_4: taṃ sattirūpavasena pubbe vijjamānameva byattirūpavasena nikkhamati,
tika-s0104t:1273_6: “Vijjamānamevā”ti hi etena kāraṇe phalassa atthibhāvadassanena byattirūpavasena abhibyattivādaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1273_7: Sāligabbhe saṃvijjamānaṃ sālisīsaṃ viya hi sattirūpaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1273_9: Kathaṃ pana sattirūpavasena vijjamānoyeva pubbe anabhibyatto byattirūpavasena abhibyattiṃ gacchatīti?
tika-s0104t:1273_10: Yathā andhakārena paṭicchanno ghaṭo ālokena abhibyattiṃ gacchati,
tika-s0104t:1274_1: kiṃ karonto āloko ghaṭaṃ pakāsetīti vuccati,
tika-s0104t:1274_3: anuppannāya eva buddhiyā uppattidīpanato abhibyattivādo hāyati.
tika-s0104t:1274_4: Atha ghaṭavisayāya buddhiyā āvaraṇabhūtaṃ andhakāraṃ vidhamanto pakāseti,
tika-s0104t:1274_6: Sati hi ghaṭavisayāya buddhiyā kathaṃ andhakāro tassā āvaraṇaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0104t:1274_7: Yathā ca ghaṭassa abhibyatti na yujjati,
tika-s0104t:1274_8: evaṃ diṭṭhigatikaparikappitassa attanopi abhibyatti na yujjatiyeva.
tika-s0104t:1274_9: Tatthāpi hi yadi indriyavisayādisannipātena anuppannā eva buddhi uppannā,
tika-s0104t:1274_10: uppattivacaneneva abhibyattivādo hāyati abhibyattimattamatikkamma anuppannāya eva buddhiyā uppattidīpanato.
tika-s0104t:1274_12: Atha buddhippavattiyā āvaraṇabhūtassa andhakāraṭṭhāniyassa mohassa vidhamanena buddhi uppannā.
tika-s0104t:1274_13: Evampi sati atthavisayāya buddhiyā kathaṃ moho tassā āvaraṇaṃ hotīti,
tika-s0104t:1274_17: Na hi abhibyañjanakānaṃ candimasūriyamaṇipadīpādīnaṃ bhedena abhibyañjitabbānaṃ ghaṭādīnaṃ bhedo hoti,
tika-s0104t:1274_18: hoti ca visayabhedena buddhibhedo yathāvisayaṃ buddhiyā sambhavatoti bhiyyopi abhibyatti na yujjatiyeva,
tika-s0104t:1274_19: na cettha vijjamānatābhibyattivasena vuttikappanā yuttā vijjamānatābhibyattikiriyāsaṅkhātāya vuttiyā vuttimato ca anaññathānujānanato.
tika-s0104t:1274_20: Anaññāyeva hi tathā vuttisaṅkhātā kiriyā tabbantavatthuto,
tika-s0104t:1274_22: tasmā vuttimato anaññāya eva vijjamānatābhibyattisaṅkhātāya vuttiyā parikappito kesañci abhibyattivādo na yutto evāti.
tika-s0104t:1274_24: te tadidaṃ kāraṇabhāvena gahetvā “te ca sattā sandhāvanti saṃsaranti cavanti upapajjantī”ti padehi atthasambandhampi karonti,
tika-s0104t:1274_26: Te ca sattā sandhāvantīti ettha ye idha manussabhāvena avaṭṭhitā,
tika-s0104t:1274_27: teyeva devabhāvādiupagamanena ito aññattha gacchantīti attho.
tika-s0104t:1275_6: dhammānaṃyeva pana pavattivisesena evaṃ saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti evaṃ voharīyantīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t:1275_8: dhammino ca dhammamattaṃ uppajjati ceva vinassati cā”ti imaṃ vipariṇāmavādaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1275_11: Idāni aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ asambandhamattaṃ dassetuṃ “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1275_12: Sandhāvantītiādinā vacanena attano vādaṃ bhindati vināseti sandhāvanādivacanasiddhāya aniccatāya pubbe
tika-s0104t:1275_26: Sassatisamo attā ca loko ca atthi evāti attho, iti-
tika-s0104t:1275_34: saddassa sassatapadena samānatthataṃ sandhāya ṭīkāyaṃ vutto.
tika-s0104t:1276_0: Hetuṃ dassentoti yesaṃ “sassato”ti attānañca lokañca paññapeti,
tika-s0104t:1276_1: tesaṃ hetuṃ dassento ayaṃ diṭṭhigatiko āhāti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:1276_2: Na hi attano diṭṭhiyā paccakkhakatamatthaṃ attanoyeva sādheti,
tika-s0104t:1276_3: attano pana paccakkhakatena atthena attano appaccakkhabhūtampi atthaṃ sādheti,
tika-s0104t:1276_4: attanā ca yathānicchitaṃ atthaṃ parepi viññāpeti,
tika-s0104t:1276_6: idaṃ pana hetudassanaṃ etesu anekesu jātisatasahassesu ekovāyaṃ me attā ca loko ca anussaraṇasambhavato.
tika-s0104t:1276_8: so eva taṃ anussarati, na añño.
tika-s0104t:1276_9: Na hi aññena anubhūtamatthaṃ añño anussarituṃ sakkoti yathā taṃ buddharakkhitena anubhūtaṃ dhammarakkhito.
tika-s0104t:1276_12: tasmā “sassato me attā ca loko ca,
tika-s0104t:1276_14: evaṃ aññesampi sattānaṃ sassato attā ca loko cā”ti sassatavasena diṭṭhigahaṇaṃ pakkhandanto diṭṭhigatiko parepi tattha patiṭṭhapeti.
tika-s0104t:1276_16: so evamāhā”ti vacanato parānugāhāpanavasena idha hetudassanaṃ adhippetanti viññāyati.
tika-s0104t:1276_17: Etanti attano ca lokassa ca sassatabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1276_21: Kāraṇañca nāmetaṃ tividhaṃ sampāpakaṃ nibbattakaṃ ñāpakanti.
tika-s0104t:1276_26: Ñāpako hi attho ñāpetabbatthavisayassa ñāṇassa hetubhāvato kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1276_27: Tadāyattavuttitāya taṃ ñāṇaṃ tiṭṭhati etthāti ṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1276_28: vasati taṃ ñāṇamettha tiṭṭhatīti “vatthū”ti ca vuccati.
tika-s0104t:1277_1: Dutiyatatiyavārānaṃ paṭhamavārato viseso natthi ṭhapetvā kālabhedanti āha “upari vāradvayepi eseva nayo”ti.
tika-s0104t:1277_4: yāva cattālīsasaṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappā ca anussaraṇavasena vuttāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t:1277_6: nanu tidhā kālabhedamakatvā adhiccasamuppattikavādo viya duvidheneva vibhajitabbo siyāti codanaṃ sodhetuṃ “mandapañño hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:1277_7: Mandapaññādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇalābhīnaṃ vasena tidhā kālabhedaṃ katvā takkanena saha catudhā vibhattoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t:1277_8: Nanu ca anussavādivasena takkikānaṃ viya mandapaññādīnampi visesalābhīnaṃ hīnādivasena anekabhedasambhavato bahudhā bhedo siyā,
tika-s0104t:1277_9: atha kasmā sabbepi visesalābhino tayo eva rāsī katvā vuttāti?
tika-s0104t:1277_14: te vuttaparicchedaṃ atikkamitvā nānussarantīti tattha tattha ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena dassetukāmato anekajātisatasahassadasacattārīsasaṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭānussaraṇavasena
tika-s0104t:1277_19: Tesañhi nāmarūpaparicchedavirahato dubbalā paññā hotīti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1278_2: Tappakatiyattattā eva hi dutiyanayopi upapanno hoti.
tika-s0104t:1278_4: sassatādiākārena tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropayatīti attho.
tika-s0104t:1278_7: Tena tena pariyāyena takkanaṃ sandhāya “takketvā vitakketvā”ti vuttaṃ vīmaṃsāya samannāgatoti atthavacanamattaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1278_8: Nibbacanaṃ pana takkipade viya dvidhā vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1278_10: sā ca duvidhā paññā ceva paññāpatirūpikā ca.
tika-s0104t:1278_20: bhāvanapuṃsakañcetaṃ padanti dasseti “tena tena pariyāyena takketvā”ti iminā.
tika-s0104t:1278_25: Tadanugatadhammakiccampi hi padhānadhamme āropetvā tathā vuccati.
tika-s0104t:1278_33: Anāmaṭṭhakālavacane vattamānavaseneva atthaniddeso upapannoti āha “evaṃ vadatī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1279_1: ekasesena vā vuttaṃ takkībhedaṃ vibhajanto “tattha catubbidho”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:1279_9: tenevāha pāḷiyaṃ “so takkapariyāhataṃ vīmaṃsānuvicaritaṃ sayaṃpaṭibhānaṃ evamāhā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1279_12: saddena visesādhigamādayo nivattetī”ti so etassāti lābhī.
tika-s0104t:1279_17: tena tathā vessantararaññova bhagavati samāneti diṭṭhiggāhaṃ uyyojeti.
tika-s0104t:1279_19: “Anāgatepi evaṃ bhavissatī”ti idaṃ lābhītakkino evampi sambhavatīti sambhavadassanavasena idhādhippetaṃ takkanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1279_21: “Atītepi evaṃ ahosī”ti idaṃ pana anāgataṃsatakkanassa upanissayanidassanamattaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1279_22: So hi “yathā me idāni attā sukhī hoti,
tika-s0104t:1279_23: evaṃ atītepīti paṭhamaṃ atītaṃsānutakkanaṃ upanissāya anāgatepi evaṃ bhavissatī”ti takkayanto diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-s0104t:1279_24: “Evaṃ sati idaṃ hotī”ti iminā aniccesu bhāvesu añño karoti,
tika-s0104t:1279_26: tathā ca sati katassa vināso akatassa ca ajjhāgamo siyā.
tika-s0104t:1279_30: akatassa ca anajjhāgamo siyāti takkikassa yuttigavesanākāraṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1280_3: “Nanu ca visesalābhinopi sassatavādino visesādhigamahetu anekesu jātisatasahassesu,
tika-s0104t:1280_5: cattālīsāya ca saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭesu yathānubhūtaṃ attano santānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1280_7: loko”ti ca anussaritvā tato purimatarāsupi jātīsu tathābhūtassa atthitānuvitakkanamukhena anāgatepi evaṃ bhavissatīti attano bhavissamānānutakkanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1280_8: sabbesampi sattānaṃ tathābhāvānutakkanañca katvā sassatābhinivesino jātā,
tika-s0104t:1280_9: evañca sati sabbopi sassatavādī anussutikajātissaralābhītakkikā viya attano upaladdhavatthunimittena
tika-s0104t:1280_11: tathā ca sati visesabhedarahitattā ekovāyaṃ sassatavādo vavatthito bhaveyya,
tika-s0104t:1280_16: Visesalābhīnañhi khandhasantānassa dīghadīghataraṃ dīghatamakālānussaraṇaṃ sassataggāhassa asādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1280_18: Imināmahaṃ etaṃ jānāmī”ti anussaraṇameva padhānakāraṇabhāvena dassitaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1280_19: Yaṃ pana tassa “imināmahaṃ etaṃ jānāmī”ti pavattaṃ takkanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1280_20: na taṃ idha padhānaṃ anussaraṇaṃ paṭicca tassa apadhānabhāvato,
tika-s0104t:1281_2: takkikānaṃ hīnādivasena ca mandapaññādīnaṃ visesalābhīnaṃ bahudhā bhede aññatarabhedasaṅgahavasena bhagavatā
tika-s0104t:1281_3: cattāriṭṭhānāni vibhajitvā vavatthitā sassatavādānaṃ catubbidhatā. Na hi,
tika-s0104t:1281_6: Na tesaṃ aññāya sacchikiriyāya abhāvena takkapadhānattā,
tika-s0104t:1281_9: Atha vā visesādhigamanimittarahitassa takkanassa sassataggāhe visuṃ kāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ visesādhigamo visuṃ sassataggāhakāraṇabhāvena vattabbo,
tika-s0104t:1281_10: so ca mandamajjhimatikkhapaññāvasena tividhoti tidhā vibhajitvā,
tika-s0104t:1281_11: sabbatakkino ca takkībhāvasāmaññato ekajjhaṃ gahetvā catudhā eva vavatthāpito sassatavādo bhagavatāti.
tika-s0104t:1282_3: saddassa aniyamatthataṃ sandhāyāha “dvīhi vā tīhi vā”ti,
tika-s0104t:1282_4: tena catūsu vatthūsu yathārahamekaccaṃ ekaccassa paññāpane sahakārīkāraṇanti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1282_5: “Bahiddhā”ti bāhyatthavācako kattuniddiṭṭho nipātoti dassetuṃ “bahī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Etthāha –
tika-s0104t:1282_6: kiṃ panetāni vatthūni attano abhinivesassa hetu,
tika-s0104t:1282_15: takkanapariyeṭṭhibhūtā yutti viya ca āgamopi vatthubhāvena vattabbo,
tika-s0104t:1282_16: ubhayathāpi ca yathāvuttassa avasesakāraṇassa sambhavato “natthi ito bahiddhā”ti vacanaṃ na yujjatevāti?
tika-s0104t:1282_18: Abhinivesapakkhe tāva ayaṃ diṭṭhigatiko asappurisūpanissayaasaddhammassavanehi ayoniso ummujjitvā vipallāsasañño
tika-s0104t:1282_19: rūpādidhammānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanasabhāvassa anavabodhato dhammayuttiṃ atidhāvanto ekattanayaṃ micchā
tika-s0104t:1282_20: gahetvā yathāvuttānussaraṇatakkanehi khandhesu “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti abhinivesaṃ upanesi,
tika-s0104t:1282_22: padhānakāraṇattā ca taggahaṇeneva ca itaresampi gahitattā anussaraṇatakkanāniyeva idha gahitāni.
tika-s0104t:1282_23: Patiṭṭhāpanapakkhe pana āgamopi yuttiyameva ṭhito visesena nirāgamānaṃ bāhirakānaṃ takkaggāhibhāvato,
tika-s0104t:1283_5: Āgamo ca sutamayāya paññāya sādhanato anumānañāṇameva āvahati,
tika-s0104t:1283_6: sutānaṃ pana dhammānaṃ ākāraparivitakkanena nijjhānakkhantiyaṃ ṭhito cintāmayapaññaṃ nibbattetvā anukkamena
tika-s0104t:1283_7: bhāvanāya paccakkhañāṇaṃ adhigacchatīti evaṃ āgamopi takkanavisayaṃ nātikkamati,
tika-s0104t:1283_10: evaṃ anussaraṇatakkanehi asaṅgahitassa avasiṭṭhassa kāraṇassa asambhavato yuttamevidaṃ “natthi ito bahiddhā”ti vacananti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1283_12: “sassataṃ attānañca lokañca paññapentī”ti ca vacanato pana patiṭṭhāpanavatthūniyeva idha desitāni taṃdesanāya eva abhinivesassāpi sijjhanato.
tika-s0104t:1283_13: Anekabhedesu hi desitesu yasmiṃ desite tadaññepi desitā siddhā honti,
tika-s0104t:1283_15: Abhinivesapatiṭṭhāpanesu ca abhinivese desitepi patiṭṭhāpanaṃ na sijjhati abhinivesassa patiṭṭhāpane aniyamato.
tika-s0104t:1283_18: Patiṭṭhāpane pana desite abhinivesopi sijjhati patiṭṭhāpanassa abhinivese niyamato.
tika-s0104t:1284_2: saddena “sassataṃ attānañca lokañca paññapentī”ti etassa parāmasananti āha “taṃ idaṃ catubbidhampi diṭṭhigata”nti.
tika-s0104t:1284_4: Paramavajjatāya anekavihitānaṃ anatthānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato diṭṭhiyo eva ṭhānā diṭṭhiṭṭhānā.
tika-s0104t:1284_6: vajjaṃ vadāmī”ti tadevatthaṃ sandhāya “diṭṭhiyova diṭṭhiṭṭhānā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1284_7: Diṭṭhīnaṃ kāraṇampi diṭṭhiṭṭhānameva diṭṭhīnaṃ uppādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena.
tika-s0104t:1284_13: puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido”tiādi phassopi phusitvā gahaṇūpāyaṭṭhena.
tika-s0104t:1284_14: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “tadapi phassapaccayā phussa phussa paṭisaṃvedentī”ti saññāpi ākāramattaggahaṇaṭṭhena.
tika-s0104t:1284_15: Vuttañhetaṃ “saññānidānā hi papañcasaṅkhā”ti pathaviṃ pathavito saññatvā”ti ca ādi.
tika-s0104t:1284_21: Tenāha “tassa evaṃ ayoniso manasi karoto channaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ aññatarā diṭṭhi uppajjati.
tika-s0104t:1284_22: Atthi me attā’ti vā assa saccato thetato diṭṭhiuppajjatī”tiādi pāpamittopi diṭṭhānugati āpajjanaṭṭhena.
tika-s0104t:1285_16: aññaṃ pana moghaṃ tucchaṃ musā”ti abhinivesassa pariyosānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpitāti attho.
tika-s0104t:1285_21: saṅketatthavasena pana evaṃ vattabboti dassetuṃ “evaṃvidhaparalokā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1285_22: Yena kenaci hi visesaneneva vevacanaṃ sātthakaṃ siyā.
tika-s0104t:1285_23: Paraloko ca kammavasena abhimukho sampareti gacchati pavattati etthāti abhisamparāyoti vuccati.
tika-s0104t:1285_25: kusalāni sīlāni anupubbena aggāya parentī”tiādīsu viya hi curādigaṇavasena para-
tika-s0104t:1286_2: saddo cettha “yehi samannāgatassa mahāpurisassa dveva gatiyo bhavantī”tiādīsu viya niṭṭhānattho.
tika-s0104t:1286_4: ime diṭṭhisaṅkhātā diṭṭhiṭṭhānā evaṃ paramatthato asantaṃ attānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1286_6: parāmaṭṭhā ca samānā bālalapanāyeva hutvā yāva paṇḍitā na samanuyuñjanti,
tika-s0104t:1286_9: paṇḍitehi samanuyuñjiyamānā pana anavaṭṭhitavatthukā avimaddakkhamā sūriyuggamane ussāvabindū viya,
tika-s0104t:1287_1: yadi hi parehi kappito attā loko vā sassato siyā,
tika-s0104t:1287_2: tassa nibbikāratāya purimarūpāvijahanato kassaci visesādhānassa kātumasakkuṇeyyatāya ahitato nivattanatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1287_3: hite ca paṭipajjanatthaṃ upadeso eva sassatavādino nippayojano siyā,
tika-s0104t:1287_4: kathaṃ vā tena so upadeso pavattīyati vikārābhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1287_5: Evañca sati parikappitassa attano ajaṭākāsassa viya dānādikiriyā,
tika-s0104t:1287_8: dukkhassa ca anubhavananibandho eva sassatavādino na yujjati kammabaddhābhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1287_10: atha pana dhammamattaṃ tassa uppajjati ceva vinassati ca,
tika-s0104t:1287_12: evampi purimarūpāvijahanena avaṭṭhitassa attano dhammamattanti na sakkā sambhāvetuṃ,
tika-s0104t:1287_14: tasmā tassa uppannā aññe vā siyuṃ anaññe vā,
tika-s0104t:1287_16: na tāhi avatthāhi tassa uppannāhipi koci viseso atthi,
tika-s0104t:1287_17: yāhi karoti paṭisaṃvedeti cavati uppajjati cāti icchitaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1287_21: uppādavināsavantīhi avatthāhi anaññassa attano tāsaṃ viya uppādavināsasabbhāvato kuto bhaveyya niccatāvakāso,
tika-s0104t:1287_23: tasmā bandhavimokkhānaṃ asambhavo evāti na yujjatiyeva sassatavādo,
tika-s0104t:1287_24: na cettha koci vādī dhammānaṃ sassatabhāve parisuddaṃ yuttiṃ vattuṃ samattho bhaveyya,
tika-s0104t:1287_25: yuttirahitañca vacanaṃ na paṇḍitānaṃ cittaṃ ārādheti,
tika-s0104t:1288_5: “tañca tathāgato pajānātī”ti iminā ca kāraṇagatīnameva pajānanabhāvena vuttattā.
tika-s0104t:1288_10: atha kho tassa kāraṇagatisaṅkhātaṃ tañca sabbanti. “Tato…pe…
tika-s0104t:1288_11: pajānātī”ti vuttavākyassa atthaṃ vuttanayena saṃvaṇṇeti “tato cā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1288_14: tadavinābhāvato vā sabbampi dasabalādiñāṇaṃ gahitamevātipi tadeva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1289_4: tena tato diṭṭigatato uttaritaraṃ sārabhūtaṃ sīlādiguṇavisesampi tathāgato nābhinivisati,
tika-s0104t:1289_12: Dhammasabhāvamatikkamitvā “ahaṃ mama”nti parato abhūtato āmasanaṃ parāmāso,
tika-s0104t:1289_15: yaṃ khandhesu “aha”nti vā “mama”nti vā gahetabbaṃ siyā,
tika-s0104t:1289_16: aparāmasato aparāmasantassa assa tathāgatassa nibbuti viditāti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:1289_20: Aparāmasato parāmāsarahitapaṭipattihetu assa tathāgatassa kattubhūtassa nibbuti asaṅkhatadhātu viditā,
tika-s0104t:1290_1: Assāti kattāraṃ vatvāpi paccattaññevāti visesadassanatthaṃ puna kattuvacananti āha “sayameva attanāyevā”ti. Sayaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1290_5: taṃdesanāya eva tadaññesampi nibbutiyā sijjhanatoti dasseti “tesaṃ parāmāsakilesāna”nti iminā,
tika-s0104t:1290_7: Apica kāmaṃ “aparāmasato”ti vacanato parāmāsānameva nibbuti idha desitāti viññāyati,
tika-s0104t:1290_8: taṃdesanāya pana tadavasesānampi kilesānaṃ nibbuti desitā nāma bhavati pahānekaṭṭhatādibhāvato,
tika-s0104t:1290_9: tasmā tesampi nibbuti niddhāretvā dassetabbāti vuttaṃ “tesaṃ parāmāsakilesāna”nti,
tika-s0104t:1291_5: Desanāvilāsappatto hi bhagavā desanākusalo khandhāyatanādivasena anekavidhāsu catusaccadesanāsu sambhavantīsupi
tika-s0104t:1291_6: diṭṭhigatikā vedanāsu micchāpaṭipattiyā diṭṭhigahanaṃ pakkhandāti dassanatthaṃ tathāpakkhandanamūlabhūtā
tika-s0104t:1291_11: Ettha hi vedanāgahaṇena gahitā pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhasaccaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1291_14: “yathābhūtaṃ viditvā”ti etena maggasaccanti evaṃ cattāri saccāni veditabbāni.
tika-s0104t:1291_15: “Yathābhūtaṃ viditvā”ti idaṃ vibhajjabyākaraṇatthapadanti tadatthaṃ vibhajja dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1291_16: Visesato hi “avijjāsamudayā vedanāsamudayo”tiādilakkhaṇānaṃ vasena samudayādīsu attho yathārahaṃ vibhajja dassetabbo.
tika-s0104t:1291_17: Avisesato pana vedanāya samudayādīni vipassanāpaññāya ārammaṇapaṭivedhavasena,
tika-s0104t:1291_20: imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatī”ti vuttalakkhaṇena avijjādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ uppādena ceva maggena asamugghāṭena ca.
tika-s0104t:1291_25: Pañcannaṃ lakkhaṇānanti ettha ca catunnampi paccayānaṃ uppādalakkhaṇameva aggahetvā paccayalakkhaṇampi
tika-s0104t:1291_26: gahetabbaṃ samudayaṃ paṭicca tesaṃ yathārahaṃ upakārakattā.
tika-s0104t:1291_29: imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatī”ti vuttalakkhaṇena avijjādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ nirodhena ceva maggena samugghāṭena ca.
tika-s0104t:1291_34: Vedanaṃ paṭiccāti purimuppannaṃ ārammaṇādipaccayabhūtaṃ vedanaṃ labhitvā.
tika-s0104t:1291_36: Ayanti purimavedanāya yathārahaṃ pacchimuppannānaṃ sukhasomanassānaṃ paccayabhāvo.
tika-s0104t:1292_3: Ayanti ca napuṃsakaliṅgena niddiṭṭhaṃ sukhasomanassameva assādapadamapekkhitvā pulliṅgena niddisīyati,
tika-s0104t:1292_4: imasmiṃ pana vikappe sukhasomanassānaṃ uppādoyeva tehi uppādavantehi niddiṭṭho, sattiyā,
tika-s0104t:1292_6: Na hi sukhasomanassamantarena tesaṃ uppādo labbhati.
tika-s0104t:1292_7: Iti purimavedanaṃ paṭicca sukhasomanassuppādopi purimavedanāya assādo nāma assādīyateti katvā.
tika-s0104t:1292_9: purimamuppannaṃ vedanaṃ ārabbha somanassuppattiyaṃ yo purimavedanāya paccayabhāvasaṅkhāto assādetabbākāro,
tika-s0104t:1292_12: Kathaṃ pana vedanaṃ ārabbha sukhaṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0104t:1292_15: Ārabbha pavattiyañhi visesanameva somanassaggahaṇaṃ somanassaṃ sukhanti yathā “rukkho sīsapā”ti aññapaccayavasena
tika-s0104t:1293_5: Tassā evaṃbhūtāya ayaṃ aniccadukkhavipariṇāmabhāvo vedanāya sabbāyapiādīnavoti.
tika-s0104t:1293_6: Ādīnaṃ paramakāruññaṃ vāti pavattati etasmāti hi ādīnavo.
tika-s0104t:1293_7: Apicaādīnaṃ ativiya kapaṇaṃ pavattanaṭṭhena kapaṇamanusso ādīnavo,
tika-s0104t:1294_4: Avisesena vā tīṇipi padāni tissannampi vedanānaṃ vasena yojetabbāni.
tika-s0104t:1294_8: Yathābhūtaṃ viditvāti maggassa vuttattā magganibbānavasena vā yathākkamaṃ yojanāpi vaṭṭati.
tika-s0104t:1294_14: tadāyaṃ puriso vedanāya nissaṭo visaṃyutto hoti,
tika-s0104t:1294_16: Tabbacanena pana vedanāsahajātanissayārammaṇabhūtā rūpārūpadhammā gahitā eva hontītipi pañcahi upādānakkhandhehi nissaraṇavacanaṃ siddhameva.
tika-s0104t:1296_0: Vuttā bhavanti sabbo, so hāro lakkhaṇo nāmā”ti. ;
tika-s0104t:1297_0: Kāmupādānamūlakattā sesupādānānaṃ pahīne ca kāmupādāne upādānasesābhāvato “vigatachandarāgatāya anupādāno”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1298_6: pajānātīti evaṃ niddiṭṭhā ime sabbaññutaññāṇadhammā gambhīrā…pe…
tika-s0104t:1298_13: Tathāpi yassā dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā imaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ sakāraṇaṃ sagatikaṃ pabhedato vibhajituṃ samattho hoti,
tika-s0104t:1298_14: tassā padaṭṭhānena ceva saddhiṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya uppattibhūmiyā ca tadeva pākaṭataraṃ kattukāmo dhammarājā
tika-s0104t:1298_17: Antarāti pucchitavissajjitadhammadassanavacanānamantarā diṭṭhiyo vibhattā tassa pajānanākāradassanavasenāti attho.
tika-s0104t:1301_2: saṅkhāresu ca ekaccaṃ sassatametassāti ekaccasassato, vādo,
tika-s0104t:1301_4: samāsavasena pana ekaccasassato vādo etesanti ekaccasassatavādā.
tika-s0104t:1301_6: Nanu ca “ekaccasassatikā”ti vutte tadaññesaṃ ekaccaasassatikabhāvasanniṭṭhānaṃ siddhamevāti?
tika-s0104t:1301_8: saddato pana asiddhameva tasmā saddato pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1301_9: Na hi idha sāvasesaṃ katvā dhammaṃ deseti dhammassāmī.
tika-s0104t:1301_11: aññe sattā aniccā”ti evaṃpavattavādā sattekaccasassatikā seyyathāpi issaravādā.
tika-s0104t:1301_15: dviaṇukādayo aniccā”ti (visisikadassane sattamaparicchede paṭhamakaṇḍe passitabbaṃ) evaṃpavattavādā saṅkhārekaccasassatikā seyyathāpi kāṇādā.
tika-s0104t:1301_22: desitabbabhāvena vā desanāñāṇena samādinnā tathā ceva desitattā.
tika-s0104t:1301_23: Tathā hi idha purimakā tayo vādā sattavasena,
tika-s0104t:1301_25: “Saṅkhārekaccasassatikā”ti idaṃ pana tehi sassatabhāvena gayhamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ yāthāvasabhāvadassanavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1301_30: Na hi yassa sabhāvassa paccayehi abhisaṅkhatabhāvaṃ paṭijānāti,
tika-s0104t:1301_34: siyā na vattabbā”tiādinā pavattasattabhaṅgavādassa ayuttatā vibhāvitā hoti.
tika-s0104t:1302_1: yadi hi “yena sabhāvena yo dhammo atthīti vuccati,
tika-s0104t:1302_2: teneva sabhāvena so dhammo natthī”ti vucceyya,
tika-s0104t:1302_6: Na cettha desantarādisambandhabhāvo yutto vattuṃ tassa sabbalokasiddhattā,
tika-s0104t:1302_8: Ye pana vadanti “yathā suvaṇṇaghaṭena makuṭe kate ghaṭabhāvo nassati,
tika-s0104t:1302_20: na tassa atthitā vā natthitā vā niccatā vā labbhatī”ti,
tika-s0104t:1302_22: Dhammānañca dhammino aññathānaññathā ca pavattiyaṃ doso vuttoyeva sassatavādavicāraṇāyaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1302_25: loko ca paramatthato vijjamānatāparijānanato yathā niccādīnaṃ aññataraṃ rūpaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1302_27: Na hi rūpādīnaṃ udayabbayasabhāvānaṃ niccāniccanavattabbasabhāvatā sakkā viññātuṃ,
tika-s0104t:1302_28: jīvassa ca niccādīsu aññataraṃ rūpaṃ siyāti,
tika-s0104t:1302_29: evaṃ sattabhaṅgo viya sesabhaṅgānampi asambhavoyevāti sattabhaṅgavādassa ayuttatā veditabbā.
tika-s0104t:1303_1: ekacce asassatā”ti etasmiṃ vāde cakkhādīnaṃ asassatabhāvasanniṭṭhānaṃ yathāsabhāvāvabodho eva,
tika-s0104t:1303_4: Asassatesuyeva pana kesañci dhammānaṃ sassatabhāvasanniṭṭhānaṃ idha micchādassananti gahetabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1303_5: tena pana ekavāde pavattamānena cakkhādīnaṃ asassatabhāvāvabodho vidūsito saṃsaṭṭhabhāvato visasaṃsaṭṭho viya sappipiṇḍo,
tika-s0104t:1303_6: tato ca tassa sakiccakaraṇāsamatthatāya sammādassanapakkhe ṭhapetabbataṃ nārahatīti.
tika-s0104t:1303_7: Asassatabhāvena nicchitāpi vā cakkhuādayo samāropitajīvasabhāvā eva diṭṭhigatikehi gayhantīti tadavabodhassa micchādassanabhāvo na sakkā nivāretuṃ.
tika-s0104t:1303_11: saṅkhatāya ca dhātuyā vasena yathākkamaṃ “ekacce dhammā sassatā,
tika-s0104t:1303_12: ekacce asassatā”ti evaṃpavatto vibhajjavādopi ekaccasassatavādoyeva bhaveyyāti evampakārā codanā anavakāsā
tika-s0104t:1304_1: purimasmimpisassatavāde asassatānaṃ dhammānaṃ “sassatā”ti gahaṇaṃ visesato micchādassanaṃ bhavati.
tika-s0104t:1304_2: Sassatānaṃ pana “sassatā”ti gāho na micchādassanaṃ yathāsabhāvaggāhabhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1304_3: Evañca sati imassa vādassa vādantaratā na vattabbā,
tika-s0104t:1304_4: idha viya purimepi ekaccesveva dhammesu sassataggāhasambhavatoti,
tika-s0104t:1304_6: keci asassatā”ti parikappanāvasena gahetabbadhammesu vibhāgappavattiyā imassa vādassa dassitattā.
tika-s0104t:1304_7: Nanu ca ekadesassa samudāyantogadhattā ayaṃ sappadesasassataggāho purimasmiṃ nippadesasassataggāhe samodhānaṃ gaccheyyātī?
tika-s0104t:1304_8: Tathāpi na sakkā vattuṃ vādī tabbisayavisesavasena vādadvayassa pavattattā.
tika-s0104t:1304_9: Aññe eva hi diṭṭhigatikā “sabbe dhammā sassatā”ti abhiniviṭṭhā,
tika-s0104t:1304_16: ekavidhasamussaye ca khandhapabandhena abhinivesabhāvato tathā na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-s0104t:1304_17: Catubbidhopi hi sassatavādī jātivisesavasena nānāvidharūpakāyasannissaye eva arūpadhammapuñje sassatābhinivesī jāto abhiññāṇena,
tika-s0104t:1304_19: Tathā ca vuttaṃ “tato cuto amutra udapādi”nti,
tika-s0104t:1304_21: Visesalābhī pana ekaccasassatiko anupadhāritabhedasamussaye dhammapabandhe sassatākāragahaṇena abhinivesaṃ
tika-s0104t:1304_23: Tathā hi tīsupi vādesu “taṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati,
tika-s0104t:1304_25: Takkīnaṃ pana ubhinnampi sassatekaccasassatavādīnaṃ sassatābhinivesaviseso rūpārūpadhammavisayatāya supākaṭoyevāti.
tika-s0104t:1305_2: saddassa ca kālapariyāyattā evaṃ vuttanti āha “dīghassā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1305_10: saddena yuttattā tadatthasambandhanena vināsattho labbhatīti dasseti “vinassatī”ti iminā.
tika-s0104t:1305_11: Saṅkhayavasena vattatīti hi saddato attho, ta-
tika-s0104t:1305_13: Vipattikaramahāmeghasamuppattitto hi paṭṭhāya yāva aṇusahagatopi saṅkhāro na hoti,
tika-s0104t:1305_15: Pāḷiyaṃ lokoti pathavīādibhājanaloko adhippeto tadavasesassa bāhullato,
tika-s0104t:1308_2: Na hi sabbe apāyasattā tadā rūpārūpabhavesu uppajjantīti sakkā viññātuṃ apāyesu dīghatarāyukānaṃ manussalokūpapattiyā asambhavato,
tika-s0104t:1308_3: manussalokūpapattiñca vinā tadā tesaṃ tatrūpapattiyā anupapattito.
tika-s0104t:1308_4: Niyatamicchādiṭṭhikopi hi saṃvaṭṭhamāne kappe nirayato na muccati,
tika-s0104t:1308_6: Satipi sabbasattānaṃ puññāpuññābhisaṅkhāramanasā nibbattabhāve bāhirapaccayehi vinā manasāva nibbattattā rūpāvacarasattā eva “manomayā”ti vuccanti,
tika-s0104t:1308_7: na pana bāhirapaccayapaṭiyattā tadaññeti dassetuṃ “manena nibbattattā manomayā”ti āha.
tika-s0104t:1308_10: adhicittabhūtena atisayamanasā nibbattasattesuyeva manomayavohāratoti dassentena jhāna-
tika-s0104t:1308_13: Na tattha bāhirapaccayehi nibbattetabbatāsaṅkāya abhāvena manasā eva nibbattāti avadhāraṇāsambhavato.
tika-s0104t:1308_15: Tathā hi annamayo pānamayo manomayo ānandamayo viññāṇamayoti pañcadhā attānaṃ vedavādino parikappenti.
tika-s0104t:1308_17: te pana jhānānubhāvato pītibhakkhā sayaṃpabhā antalikkhacarāti āha “pīti tesa”ntiādi,
tika-s0104t:1308_19: Sobhanā vā ṭhāyī sabhā etesanti subhaṭṭhāyinotipi yujjati.
tika-s0104t:1308_23: Aṭṭha kappeti catunnamasaṅkhyeyyakappānaṃ samudāyabhūte aṭṭha mahākappe.
tika-s0104t:1309_2: saddo paṭisedhajotakena upasaggena yuttattā saṇṭhāhanatthañāpakoti āha “saṇṭhātī”ti,
tika-s0104t:1309_5: Sampattimahāmeghasamuppattito hi paṭṭhāya pathavīsandhārakudakataṃsandhārakavāyuādīnaṃ samuppattivasena yāva candimasūriyānaṃ pātubhāvo,
tika-s0104t:1309_11: tena yathā ekaccāni vimānāni tattha nibbattasattānaṃ chaḍḍitattā suññāni,
tika-s0104t:1310_3: tena yathā etassa attano kammabalena paṭhamaṃ nibbatti,
tika-s0104t:1310_9: brahmakāyikabhūmīti pana pāṭhebrahmakāyikānaṃ sambandhinī bhūmīti attho.
tika-s0104t:1310_13: etena nibbattakkamaṃ kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānabhāve ca kāraṇaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1310_15: Atha vā tattha nibbattasattānaṃ vipaccanakakammassa sahakārīkārakabhāvato kammassa paccayāti kammapaccayā.
tika-s0104t:1310_18: vuttanayena vā kammassa sahāyabhūto paccayoti kammapaccayo,
tika-s0104t:1310_27: Kathaṃ paṇītāya dutiyajjhānabhūmiyā ṭhitānaṃ hīnāya paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyā upapatti hotīti āha “atha sattāna”ntiādi,
tika-s0104t:1310_29: pakatiyā sabhāvena nikanti taṇhā uppajjatīti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:1310_31: Tato otarantīti upapattivasena dutiyajjhānabhūmito paṭhamajjhānabhūmiṃ apasakkanti,
tika-s0104t:1310_39: Antarāva cavantīti rājakoṭṭhāgāre pakkhittataṇḍulanāḷi viya puññakkhayā hutvā sakakammappamāṇena tassa devalokassa paramāyuantarā eva cavanti.
tika-s0104t:1311_2: yo tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhavavisese vipākappabandhassa ṭhitikālaniyamo purimasiddhabhavapatthanūpanissayavasena
tika-s0104t:1311_3: sarīrāvayavavaṇṇasaṇṭhānappamāṇādivisesā viya taṃtaṃgatinikāyādīsu yebhuyyena niyataparicchedo hoti,
tika-s0104t:1311_7: Yathāsakaṃ khaṇamattāvaṭṭhāyīnampi hi attanā sahajātānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ ṭhapanākāravuttitāya pavattakāni
tika-s0104t:1311_8: rūpārūpajīvitindriyāni na kevalaṃ nesaṃ khaṇaṭṭhitiyā eva kāraṇabhāvena anupālakāni,
tika-s0104t:1311_9: atha kho yāva bhaṅgupacchedā [bhavaṅgupacchedā ] anupabandhassa avicchedahetubhāvenāpi.
tika-s0104t:1311_16: tassa ca yathā purimasiddhabhavapatthanāvasena taṃtaṃgatinikāyādīsu vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivisesaniyamo siddho,
tika-s0104t:1311_18: evaṃ tāsu tāsu upapattīsu nibbattasattānaṃ yebhuyyena samappamāṇaṃ ṭhitikālaṃ dassanānussavehi labhitvā
tika-s0104t:1311_19: taṃ paramataṃ ajjhosāya pavattitabhavapatthanāvasena ādito paricchedaniyamo veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:1312_0: Yasmā pana kammaṃ tāsu tāsu upapattīsu yathā taṃtaṃupapattinissitavaṇṇādinibbattane samatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1312_1: evaṃ niyatāyuparicchedāsu upapattīsu paricchedātikkamena vipākanibbattane samatthaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0104t:1312_3: Yasmā pana upatthambhakapaccayasahāyehi anupālakapaccayehi upādinnakakkhandhānaṃ pavattetabbākāro atthato
tika-s0104t:1312_5: tasmā satipi kammāvasese ṭhānaṃ na sambhavati,
tika-s0104t:1312_6: tena vuttaṃ “attano puññabalena ṭhātuṃ na sakkontī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1312_7: “Āyukkhayā vā puññakkhayā vā ābhassarakāyā cavitvā”ti vacanato panettha kāmāvacaradevānaṃ viya brahmakāyikānampi
tika-s0104t:1312_9: Tathā hi devalokato devaputtā āyukkhayena puññakkhayena āhārakkhayena kopenāti catūhi kāraṇehi cavantīti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1312_10: Kappaṃ vā upaḍḍhakappaṃ vāti ettha asaṅkhyeyyakappo adhippeto,
tika-s0104t:1312_12: saddo pana kappassa tatiyabhāgaṃ vā tato ūnamadhikaṃ vāti vikappanattho.
tika-s0104t:1313_2: Tattha “ekakassa dīgharattaṃ nivasitattā”ti pāḷiyaṃ vacanatoti vuttaṃ “aparassāpī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1313_3: Evamanvayamatthaṃ dassetvā nanu ukkaṇṭhitāpi siyāti codanāsodhanavasena byatirekaṃ dasseti “yā panā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1313_9: Taṇhādiṭṭhisaṅkhātā cittassa purimāvatthāya ubbijjanā phandanā eva idha paritassanā.
tika-s0104t:1313_10: Sā hi dīgharattaṃ jhānaratiyā ṭhitassa yathāvuttānabhiratinimittaṃ uppannā “ahaṃ mama”nti gahaṇassa ca kāraṇabhūtā.
tika-s0104t:1313_11: Tena vakkhati “taṇhātassa nāpi diṭṭhitassanāpi vaṭṭatī”ti nanu vuttaṃ atthuddhāre imaṃyeva pāḷiṃ nīharitvā
tika-s0104t:1313_12: “aho vata aññepi sattā itthattaṃ āgaccheyyunti ayaṃ taṇhātassanā nāmā”ti? Saccaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1313_13: taṃ pana diṭṭhitassanāya visuṃ udāharaṇaṃ dassentena taṇhātassanameva tato niddhāretvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1313_14: na pana ettha diṭṭhitassanāya alabbhamānattāti na doso.
tika-s0104t:1313_15: Idāni samānasaddavacanīyānaṃ atthānamuddharaṇaṃ katvā idhādhippetaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “sā panesā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:1313_26: iminā padadvayena kiccato bhayaṃ dassetvā puna cetaso utrāsoti sabhāvato dassitanti.
tika-s0104t:1313_30: iti ettha payoge ayaṃ tassanāti evaṃ sabbattha attho.
tika-s0104t:1313_31: Paritassitavipphanditamevāti ettha “diṭṭhisaṅkhātena ceva taṇhāsaṅkhātena ca paritassitena vipphanditameva
tika-s0104t:1313_33: Tena viññāyati labbhamānampi taṇhātassanamantarena diṭṭhitassanāyeva nihaṭāti.
tika-s0104t:1313_35: Bhayanti bhaṅgānupassanāpariciṇṇante sabbasaṅkhārato bhāyanavasena uppannaṃ bhayañāṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1314_5: Sahāyabhāvo pana sahabhāvoyeva nāmāti adhippāyato atthaṃ dassetuṃ “sahabhāva”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1314_8: tasmā saha ekato vattamānassa bhāvo sahabyaṃ yathā “dāsabya”nti tadeva sahabyatā,
tika-s0104t:1314_11: tassa bhāvo sahabyaṃ yathā “vīrassa bhāvo vīriya”nti,
tika-s0104t:1314_13: tasmā tadatthaṃ dassetuṃ evaṃ vuttantipi daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1315_2: Abhibhavanā cettha pāpasabhāvena jeṭṭhabhāvena “te satte abhibhavitvā ṭhito”ti attano maññanāyevāti vuttaṃ “jeṭṭhakohamasmī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1315_4: dasoti ettha dassaneyyavisesapariggahābhāvena ca anāvaraṇadassāvitaṃ paṭijānātīti āha “sabbaṃ passāmīti attho”ti.
tika-s0104t:1315_5: Dassaneyyavisesassa hi padesabhūtassa aggahaṇe sati gahetabbassa nippadesatā viññāyati yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti,
tika-s0104t:1315_6: deyyadhammavisesassa cettha padesabhūtassa aggahaṇato pabbajito sabbampi na dadātīti gahetabbassa deyyadhammassa nippadesatā viññāyati.
tika-s0104t:1315_28: bhavissanti cāti bhabyā tabbānīyā viya ṇyapaccayassa kattaripi pavattanato.
tika-s0104t:1316_0: “Issaro kattā nimmātā”ti vatvāpi puna “mayā ime sattā nimmitā”ti vacanaṃ kimatthiyanti āha “idāni kāraṇavasenā”tiādi
tika-s0104t:1316_2: Nanu cesa brahmā anavaṭṭhitadassanattā puthujjanassa purimatarajātiparicitampi kammassakatāñāṇaṃ vissajjetvā
tika-s0104t:1316_3: vikubbaniddhivasena cittuppādamattapaṭibaddhena sattanimmānena vipallaṭṭho “mayā ime sattā nimmitā”tiādinā
tika-s0104t:1316_6: Atha kasmā kāraṇavasena sādhetukāmo paṭiññaṃ karotīti vuttanti?
tika-s0104t:1316_8: Tesampi hi “evaṃ hotī”tiādinā pacchā uppajjantānampi tathāabhinivesassa vakkhamānattā paresaṃ patiṭṭhāpanakkameneva tassa so abhiniveso jāto,
tika-s0104t:1317_8: Vaṅkachiddena vaṅkaāṇī viya onamitvā vaṅkaladdhikena vaṅkaladdhikā onamitvā tasseva brahmuno pādamūlaṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0104t:1317_10: Nanu ca devānaṃ upapattisamanantaraṃ “imāya nāma gatiyā cavitvā iminā nāma kammunā idhūpapannā”ti paccavekkhaṇā hoti,
tika-s0104t:1317_11: atha kasmā tesaṃ evaṃ maññanā siyāti?
tika-s0104t:1317_12: Purimajātīsu kammassakatāñāṇe sammadeva niviṭṭhajjhāsayānameva tathāpaccavekkhaṇāya pavattito.
tika-s0104t:1317_15: ime pana purimāsupi jātīsu issarakuttadiṭṭhivasena nibaddhābhinivesā evameva maññamānā ahesunti.
tika-s0104t:1318_5: So pana mahesakkhatarabhāvo ādhipateyyaparivārasampattiyā kāraṇabhūtāya viññāyatīti vuttaṃ “issariyaparivāravasena mahāyasataro”ti.
tika-s0104t:1319_2: tena “itthattaṃ āgacchatī”ti vuttaṃ idhāgamanameva kāraṇanti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1319_3: Idheva āgacchatīti imasmiṃ manussaloke eva paṭisandhivasena āgacchati.
tika-s0104t:1319_6: Pāḷiyaṃ yaṃ aññataro sattoti ettha yanti nipātamattaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1319_11: “Itthattaṃ āgacchatī”ti ettha yadetaṃ itthattassa āgamanasaṅkhātaṃ ṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1319_17: yaṃ aññataro satto”ti hi imāni padāni “pabbajatī”tiādīhipi padehi paccekaṃ yojetabbāni.
tika-s0104t:1320_12: Tampi hi padatthasodhanāya aṭṭhakathāya sodhitaniyāmeneva gahetabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1321_7: Yebhuyyena hi nakkhattayogena katattā tathāyogo vā hotu, mā vā,
tika-s0104t:1321_12: Dvādasapāpadhammavigghātena hi sukhassa dhāraṇato devānaṃ bhojanaṃ “sudhā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0104t:1321_13: Sā pana setā saṅkhūpamā atulyadassanā suci sugandhā piyarūpā.
tika-s0104t:1330_0: Sā ca heṭṭhimehi heṭṭhimehi uparimānaṃ uparimānaṃ paṇītatamā hoti,
tika-s0104t:1330_1: taṃ yathāsakaṃ parimitadivasavasena divase divase bhuñjanti.
tika-s0104t:1330_2: Keci pana vadanti “biḷārapadappamāṇaṃ sudhāhāraṃ te bhuñjanti,
tika-s0104t:1330_3: so jivhāya ṭhapitamatto yāva kesagganakhaggā kāyaṃ pharati,
tika-s0104t:1330_4: yathāsakaṃ gaṇitadivasavasena satta divase yāpanasamattho hotī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1333_1: na pana evaṃ niyamavasena tathā khādanapivanānamaniyamabhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1333_5: Teneva hi bhagavā indasālaguhāyaṃ pakatipathaviyaṃ patiātuṃ asakkontaṃ sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ “oḷārikaṃ kāyaṃ adhiṭṭhehī”ti avoca.
tika-s0104t:1333_12: Tañhi “rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccatī”ti evaṃ vuttarāgarajaphalattā sarīravācakena ka-
tika-s0104t:1333_14: Tena sukkasoṇitasaṅkhātena karajena sambhūto kāyo karajakāyoti ācariyā.
tika-s0104t:1333_16: Mahāassapūrasuttantaṭīkāyaṃ pana “karīyati gabbhāsaye khipīyatīti karo, sambhavo,
tika-s0104t:1333_19: Mātuādīnaṃ saṇṭhāpanavasena karato hatthato jātoti karajoti apare.
tika-s0104t:1333_24: Tathā asambhūtopi ca devādīnaṃ kāyo tabbohārena “karajakāyo”ti vuccati yathā “pūtikāyo,
tika-s0104t:1334_0: Evaṃ anvayato byatirekato ca dassetvā upamāvasenapi tamāvikaronto “yathā nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:1334_6: karajaṃ mandanti vā kammajatejakarajakāyānaṃ balavamandatāsaṅkhāta kāraṇasāmaññena.
tika-s0104t:1334_8: tasmā sabbepi devā gahetabbāti vuttaṃ hoti.
