tika-s0104t:1334_11: “Khiḍḍāpadussanamatteneva hete khiḍḍāpadosikāti vuttā”ti ayaṃ pāṭho “teyeva cavantīti veditabbā”ti etassānantare paṭhitabbo tadanusandhikattā.
tika-s0104t:1334_13: yadi sabbepi evaṃ karontā kāmāvacaradevā caveyyuṃ,
tika-s0104t:1334_16: etena imamatthaṃ dasseti “sabbepi devā evaṃ cavantāpi khiḍḍāya padussanasabhāvamattaṃ pati nāmavisesena tathā vuttā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1334_21: Atthikehi pana tassa kecivādasamavarodhanaṃ ante itisaddo yojetabboti.
tika-s0104t:1335_10: “Te aññamaññamhi paduṭṭhacittā kilantakāyā kilantacittā te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti vacanato “ete cātumahārājikā”ti āha.
tika-s0104t:1335_13: Rathena vīthiṃ paṭipajjatīti upalakkhaṇamattaṃ aññehi aññatthāpi paṭipajjanasambhavato.
tika-s0104t:1335_15: Uddhumāto viyāti pītiyā karaṇabhūtāya unnato viya.
tika-s0104t:1336_0: Akuddho rakkhatīti kuddhassa so kodho itarasmiṃ akujjhante anupādāno ceva ekavāramattaṃ uppattiyā anāsevano ca hutvā cāvetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0104t:1336_3: Ubhosu pana kuddhesu bhiyyo bhiyyo aññamaññamhi parivaḍḍhanavasena tikhiṇasamudācāro nissayadahanaraso
tika-s0104t:1336_4: kodho uppajjamāno hadayavatthuṃ nidahanto accantasukhumālakarajakāyaṃ vināseti,
tika-s0104t:1336_7: Tathā cāha pāḷiyaṃ “te aññamaññamhi paduṭṭhacittā kilantakāyā kilantacittā te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1336_9: tassapi kodho itarassa paccayo hotīti ettha kodhassa bhiyyo bhiyyo parivaḍḍhanāya eva paccayabhāvo veditabbo,
tika-s0104t:1336_10: na cavanāya nissayadahanarasena attanoyeva kodhena hadayavatthuṃ nidahantena accantasukhumālassa karajakāyassa cavanato.
tika-s0104t:1336_13: tathāuppajjanakassa ca kodhassa balavatāya ṭhānaso cavanabhāvo etesu devesu rūpārūpadhammānaṃ dhammaniyāmo sabhāvoti attho.
tika-s0104t:1337_2: ante ca adassanūpagamanato vināsaṃ passati oḷārikattā rūpadhammabhedassa.
tika-s0104t:1337_6: balavatarampi samānaṃ iminā kāraṇena na passatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t:1337_7: Balavataranti ca cittassa lahutarabhedaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1337_8: Tathā hi ekasmiṃ rūpe dharanteyeva soḷasa cittāni bhijjanti.
tika-s0104t:1337_9: Cittassa bhedaṃ na passatīti ettha khaṇe khaṇe bhijjantampi cittaṃ parassa anantarapaccayabhāveneva bhijjati,
tika-s0104t:1337_10: tasmā purimacittassa abhāvaṃ paṭicchādetvā viya pacchimacittassa uppattito bhāvapakkho balavataro pākaṭova hoti,
tika-s0104t:1337_11: na abhāvapakkhoti idaṃ kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “cittaṃ panā”tiādi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1337_14: ekattanayassa ca micchāgahitattā “yadevidaṃ viññāṇaṃ sabbadāpi evarūpena pavattati,
tika-s0104t:1337_15: ayaṃ me attā nicco”tiādinā abhinivesaṃ janesi,
tika-s0104t:1337_16: tasmā tamatthaṃ “so taṃ apassanto”tiādinā saha upamāya vibhāveti.
tika-s0104t:1339_3: so etesanti antānantikāti atthaṃ dassetuṃ “antānantavādā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1339_6: antānantesu vā pavatto vādo etesanti antānantavādā.
tika-s0104t:1339_7: Idāni “antavā ayaṃ loko”tiādinā vakkhamānapāṭhānurūpaṃ atthaṃ vibhajanto “antaṃ vā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:1339_8: Amati gacchati bhāvo osānametthāti hi anto, mariyādā,
tika-s0104t:1339_10: Anto ca ananto ca antānanto ca nevantanānanto ca antānanto tveva vutto sāmaññaniddesena,
tika-s0104t:1339_12: Catutthapadañhettha tatiyapadena samānatthanti antānantapadeneva yathāvuttanayadvayena catudhā attho viññāyati.
tika-s0104t:1339_23: tathā ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vakkhati “taṃ ‘loko’ti gahetvā”ti keci pana vadanti “jhānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1340_1: yuttaṃ tāva purimānaṃ tiṇṇampi vādīnaṃ antānantikattaṃ antañca anantañca antānantañca ārabbha pavattavādattā,
tika-s0104t:1340_2: pacchimassa pana takkikassa tadubhayapaṭisedhanavasena pavattavādattā kathaṃ antānantikattanti?
tika-s0104t:1340_4: Antānantapaṭisedhanavādopi hi so antānantavisayoyeva tamārabbha pavattattā.
tika-s0104t:1340_5: Etadatthameva hi sandhāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “antaṃ vā antantaṃ vā antānantaṃ vā nevantānānantaṃ vā ārabbha pavattavādā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1340_6: Atha vā yathā tatiyavāde desapabhedavasena ekasseva lokassa antavatā,
tika-s0104t:1340_8: evamettha takkīvādepi kālapabhedavasena ekasseva tadubhayasambhavato aññamaññapaṭisedhena tadubhayaññeva vuccati,
tika-s0104t:1340_13: Iti paṭisedhanavasena antānantasaṅkhātassa ubhayassa vuttattā yuttoyeva tabbisayassa pacchimassāpi antānantikabhāvoti.
tika-s0104t:1340_14: Yadevaṃ so antānantikavādabhāvato tatiyavādasamavarodheyeva siyāti? Na,
tika-s0104t:1340_16: Desapabhedavasena hi antānantiko tatiyavādī viya pacchimopi takkiko kālapabhedavasena antānantiko hoti. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0104t:1340_17: Yasmā ayaṃ lokasaññito attā ananto kadā ci sakkhidiṭṭhoti adhigatavisesehi mahesīhi anusuyyati,
tika-s0104t:1340_22: Ayaṃ takkiko avaḍḍhitabhāvapubbakattā paṭibhāganimittānaṃ vaḍḍhitabhāvassa ubhayathā labbhamānassa parikappitassa
tika-s0104t:1340_23: attano appaccakkhakāritāya anussavādimatte ṭhatvā vaḍḍhitakālavasena “nevantavā”ti paṭikkhipati,
tika-s0104t:1340_25: na pana antatānantatānaṃ accantamabhāvena yathā taṃ “nevasaññānāsaññā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1341_0: Keci pana yadi panāyaṃ attā antavā,
tika-s0104t:1341_1: evaṃ sati dūradese upapajjanānussaraṇādikiccanibbatti na siyā.
tika-s0104t:1341_3: evañca idha ṭhitasseva devalokanirayādīsu sukhadukkhānubhavanaṃ siyā.
tika-s0104t:1341_4: Sace pana antavā ceva anantavā ca,
tika-s0104t:1341_7: anantavā”ti ca abyākaraṇīyo attāti evaṃ takkanavasena catutthavādappavattiṃ vaṇṇenti.
tika-s0104t:1341_9: atha kasmā “ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā evamāhaṃsu ‘antavā ayaṃ loko parivaṭumo’ti,
tika-s0104t:1341_12: Teneva hi kāraṇena tathā paṭikkhepo vutto,
tika-s0104t:1341_17: Na hi antatāanantatātadubhayavinimutto attano pakāro atthi,
tika-s0104t:1341_19: Kālabhedavasena ca ekasmimpi loke tadubhayaṃ no na yujjatīti.
tika-s0104t:1341_20: Bhavatu tāva pacchimavādīdvayassa antānantikabhāvo yutto antānantānaṃ vasena ubhayavisayattā tesaṃ vādassa.
tika-s0104t:1341_21: Kathaṃ pana purimavādīdvayassa paccekaṃ antānantikabhāvo yutto siyā ekekavisayattā tesaṃ vādassāti? Vuccate –
tika-s0104t:1341_24: Samuditesu hi antānantavādīsu pavattamāno antānanti ka-
tika-s0104t:1341_25: saddo tattha niruḷhatāya tadavayavesupi paccekaṃ antānantikavādīsu pavattati yathā “arūpajjhānesu paccekaṃ aṭṭhavimokkhapariyāyo”,
tika-s0104t:1341_27: Atha vā abhinivesato purimakāle pavattavitakkavasena ayaṃ tattha vohāro kato.
tika-s0104t:1341_28: Tesañhi diṭṭhigatikānaṃ tathārūpacetosamādhisamadhigamato pubbakāle “antavā nu kho ayaṃ loko,
tika-s0104t:1341_29: udāhu anantavā”ti ubhayākārāvalambino vitakkassa vasena niruḷho antānantikabhāvo pacchā visesalābhena
tika-s0104t:1341_30: tesu antānantavādesu ekasseva vādassa saṅgahe uppannepi purimasiddharuḷhiyā vohārīyati yathā “sabbe sattā
tika-s0104t:1342_4: Uddhamadho avaḍḍhetvā tiriyaṃ vaḍḍhetvāti etthāpi “cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ katvā”ti adhikāravasena yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1342_7: Diṭṭhapubbānusārenāti dassanabhūtena viññāṇena upaladdhapubbassa antavantādino anussaraṇena,
tika-s0104t:1342_8: evañca katvā anussutitakkīsuddhatakkīnampi idha saṅgaho siddho hoti.
tika-s0104t:1342_9: Atha vā diṭṭhaggahaṇeneva “naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā”tiādīsu viya sutādīnampi gahitabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:1342_10: “Antavā”tiādinā icchitassa attano sabbadābhāvaparāmasanavaseneva imesaṃ vādānaṃ pavattanato sassatadiṭṭhisaṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t:1344_8: Tathāpavatto diṭṭhippadhāno tādisāya vācāya samuṭṭhāpako cittuppādoyeva.
tika-s0104t:1344_13: “Macchajāti” cceva avatvā “ekā”ti vadanto macchajātiviseso esoti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1344_14: Ito cito ca sandhāvati ekasmiṃ sabhāve anavaṭṭhānato.
tika-s0104t:1344_18: so viyāti amarāvikkhepoti atthamāha “sā ummujjananimujjanādivasenā”tiādinā vikkhepapadatthena upamitattā.
tika-s0104t:1344_19: Ayameva hi attho ācariyasāriputtattherenāpi sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vutto.
tika-s0104t:1344_21: Atha vā amarā viya vikkhipantīti amarāvikkhepino,
tika-s0104t:1345_3: 1.62) sabhāvabhedavasena paṭivijjhituṃ ñāṇaṃ natthīti kusalākusalapadānaṃ kusalākusalakammapathavaseneva attho vutto.
tika-s0104t:1345_4: Vighāto vihesā kāyikadukkhaṃ “vippaṭisāruppattiyā”ti domanassassa hetubhāvena vacanato,
tika-s0104t:1345_9: musāvādato vā ottappena ceva hiriyā cāti attho.
tika-s0104t:1345_13: dutiyanayavasena pana amarāsadisavikkhepaṃ dassetuṃ “idaṃ kusalanti puṭṭho”tiādivacanaṃ vakkhati.
tika-s0104t:1346_1: taṃ evantipi me laddhi no hotīti attho.
tika-s0104t:1346_3: Aniyamitavikkhepoti sassatādīsu ekasmimpi pakāre aṭṭhatvā vikkhepakaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1346_4: paravādinā yasmiṃ kismiñci pakāre pucchite tassa paṭikkhepavikkhepoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1346_5: Atha vā apariyantavikkhepadassanaṃyeva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ kataṃ “evantipi me noti aniyamitavikkhepo”tiādinā,
tika-s0104t:1346_6: “idaṃ kusalanti vā akusalanti vā puṭṭho”tiādinā ca.
tika-s0104t:1346_8: niyametvā ca sassatekaccasassatucchedatakkīvādānaṃ paṭisedhanena taṃ taṃ vādaṃ paṭikkhipateva apariyantavikkhepavādattā.
tika-s0104t:1346_9: “Amarāvikkhepino”ti dassetvā attanā pana anavaṭṭhitavādattā na kismiñci pakkhe avatiṭṭhatīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “sayaṃ pana idaṃ…pe…
tika-s0104t:1346_11: Idāni kusalādīnaṃ abyākaraṇena tadeva anavaṭṭhānaṃ vibhāveti “idaṃ kusalanti puṭṭho”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1346_13: Kiṃ no noti te laddhīti neva na hotīti tava laddhi hoti kinti attho.
tika-s0104t:1346_14: No notipi me noti neva na hotītipi me laddhi no hoti.
tika-s0104t:1347_1: Attano paṇḍitabhāvavisayānaññeva rāgādīnaṃ vasena yojanaṃ kātuṃ “ajānantopī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:1347_8: saddena yogyattā gobalībaddādinayena bhinnatthatāva yuttāti āha “chando dubbalarāgo,
tika-s0104t:1347_15: atha kho ettakampi na jānāmi nāma,
tika-s0104t:1347_17: Parehi katasakkārasamānavisayānaṃ pana rāgādīnaṃ vasena ayaṃ yojanā –
tika-s0104t:1347_18: kusalākusalaṃ yathābhūtaṃ apajānantopi yesamahaṃ samavāyena kusalameva “kusala”nti,
tika-s0104t:1347_20: tesu tathā byākaraṇahetu “aho vata re paṇḍito”ti sakkārasammānaṃ karontesu mama chando vā rāgo vā assāti.
tika-s0104t:1347_23: so mamassa vighāto”ti idaṃ abhidhammanayena yathālābhavacanaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbanti āha “chandarāgadvaya”ntiādi.
tika-s0104t:1347_24: Taṇhādiṭṭhiyo eva hi “upādāna”nti abhidhamme vuttā idāni suttantanayena avisesayojanaṃ dasseti “ubhayampi vā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1347_25: Suttante hi dosopi “upādāna”nti vutto “kodhupādānavinibandhā vighātaṃ āpajjantī”tiādīsu “ubhayampī”ti ca atthato vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1347_28: Paṭighopi hi ārammaṇaṃ na muñcati upanāhādivasena pavattanato,
tika-s0104t:1347_29: lobhasseva upādānabhāvena pākaṭattā dosassāpi upādānabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1347_31: Rāgopi hi pariḷāhavasena sāraddhavuttitāya nissayaṃ vihanati.
tika-s0104t:1348_3: sā yesaṃ te paṇḍitāti atthaṃ dasseti “paṇḍiccenā”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1348_5: Yena hi dhammena pavattinimittabhūtena yutto “paṇḍito”ti vuccati,
tika-s0104t:1348_9: “Nipuṇā”ti iminā pana kammanibbattaṃ paṭisandhipaññāsaṅkhātaṃ sābhāvikañāṇaṃ vuttanti āha “saṇhasukhumabuddhino”ti.
tika-s0104t:1348_18: Vālavedhīnaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo viya rūpametesanti vālavedhirūpāti āha “vālavedhidhanuggahasadisā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1348_30: saddassa ca sāmatthiyatthataṃ dassetuṃ “na sampādeyya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1349_5: tañca atisayatthadīpakaṃ pariyāyadvayassa atirekatthabhāvatoti yathā “padaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ “atisammūḷho”ti.
tika-s0104t:1349_6: Siddhe hi sati punārambho niyamāya vā hoti,
tika-s0104t:1349_10: Ettha ca kāmaṃ purimānampi tiṇṇaṃ kusalādidhammasabhāvānavabodhato attheva mandabhāvo,
tika-s0104t:1349_11: tesaṃ pana attano kusalādidhammānavabodhassa avabodhanato viseso atthīti.
tika-s0104t:1349_13: Nanu ca pacchimassāpi attano dhammānavabodhassa avabodho atthiyeva “atthi paro loko’ti iti ce me assa,
tika-s0104t:1349_14: ‘atthi paro loko’ti iti te naṃ byākareyyaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1349_17: na pana tassa purimānaṃ viya apariññātadhammabyākaraṇanimittamusāvādādibhāyanajigucchanākāro atthi,
tika-s0104t:1349_19: Atha vā “evantipi me no”tiādinā pucchāya vikkhepakaraṇatthaṃ “atthi paro loko”ti iti ce maṃ pucchasīti pucchāṭhapanameva tena dassīyati,
tika-s0104t:1349_20: na attano dhammānavabodhāvabodhoti ayameva visesena “mando momūho”ti vutto.
tika-s0104t:1349_21: Teneva hi tathāvādīnaṃ sañcayaṃ belaṭṭhaputtaṃ ārabbha “ayañca imesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sabbabālo sabbamūḷho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1349_25: yadi ca sammādiṭṭhiko sammādassanavasenāti dvidhāpi attho vaṭṭati.
tika-s0104t:1349_28: “atthi ca natthi ca paro loko”ti ucchedadassanavasena,
tika-s0104t:1349_30: “nevatthi na natthi paro loko”ti vuttapakārattayapaṭikkhepe sati pakārantarassa asambhavato atthitānatthitāhi
tika-s0104t:1349_31: na vattabbākāro paro lokoti vikkhepaññeva purakkhārena,
tika-s0104t:1349_34: Puññasaṅkhārattiko viya hi kāyasaṅkhārattikena purimacatukkasaṅgahito eva attho sesacatukkattayena sattaparāmāsapuññādisaphalatācodanānayena
tika-s0104t:1349_38: sesacatukkattayena ca sattaparāmāsatāya codanānayo vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1350_0: Amarāvikkhepiko pana sassatādīnaṃ attano aruccanatāya sabbattha “evantipi me no”tiādinā vikkhepaññeva karoti.
tika-s0104t:1350_1: Tattha “evantipi me no”tiādi tattha tattha pucchitākārapaṭisedhanavasena vikkhepākāradassanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1350_2: Kasmā pana vikkhepavādino paṭikkhepova sabbattha vutto.
tika-s0104t:1350_3: Nanu vikkhepapakkhassa “evameva”nti anujānanampi vikkhepapakkhe avaṭṭhānato yuttarūpaṃ siyāti? Na,
tika-s0104t:1350_6: Tathā hi sañcayo belaṭṭhaputto raññā ajātasattunā sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho paralokatthitādīnaṃ paṭisedhanamukheneva vikkhepaṃ byākāsi.
tika-s0104t:1351_1: nanu cāyaṃ sabbopi amarāvikkhepiko kusalādayo dhamme,
tika-s0104t:1351_2: paralokatthitādīni ca yathābhūtaṃ anavabujjhamāno tattha tattha pañhaṃ puṭṭho pucchāya vikkhepanamattaṃ āpajjati,
tika-s0104t:1351_4: Na hi avattukāmassa viya pucchitatthamajānantassa vikkhepakaraṇamattena diṭṭhigatikatā yuttāti? Vuccate –
tika-s0104t:1351_5: na heva kho pucchāya vikkhepakaraṇamattena tassa diṭṭhigatikatā,
tika-s0104t:1351_7: Sassatābhinivesavasena hi micchābhiniviṭṭhoyeva puggalo mandabuddhitāya kusalādidhamme,
tika-s0104t:1351_8: paralokatthitādīni ca yāthāvato appaṭibujjhamāno attanā aviññātassa atthassa paraṃ viññāpetumasakkuṇeyyatāya musāvādabhayena ca vikkhepamāpajjatīti.
tika-s0104t:1351_12: asaddahanena ca tabbisayāya pucchāya vikkhepakaraṇameva sundaranti khantiṃ ruciṃ uppādetvā abhinivisantassa
tika-s0104t:1351_13: uppannā visuṃyevesā ekā diṭṭhi sattabhaṅgadiṭṭhi viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1351_14: Tathā ca vuttaṃ “pariyantarahitā diṭṭhigatikassa diṭṭhi ceva vācā” cāti.
tika-s0104t:1351_15: Yaṃ panetaṃ vuttaṃ “imepi cattāro pubbe pavattadhammānusāreneva diṭṭhiyā gahitattā pubbantakappikesu paviṭṭhā”ti,
tika-s0104t:1351_19: Natthi hi koci dhammānaṃ yathābhūtavedī vivādabahulattā lokassa.
tika-s0104t:1351_21: tasmā sassatalesassa ettha labbhanato sassatadiṭṭhiyā etassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t:1353_1: Adhicca yadicchakaṃ yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ kassaci buddhipubbaṃ vinā samuppannoti attalokasaññitānaṃ khandhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1353_5: adhiccasamuppannadassanaṃ vā antapadalopena adhiccasamuppannaṃ yathā “rūpabhavo rūpa”nti,
tika-s0104t:1354_3: tena saññaṃ dhuraṃ katvā bhagavatā ayaṃ desanā katā,
tika-s0104t:1354_4: na pana tattha aññesaṃ arūpadhammānampi atthitāyāti dasseti,
tika-s0104t:1354_6: Bhagavā hi yathā lokuttaradhammaṃ desento samādhiṃ,
tika-s0104t:1354_12: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī”ti,
tika-s0104t:1354_13: tathā “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t:1354_14: kiṃ citto tvaṃ bhikkhu manopubbaṅgamā dhammā,
tika-s0104t:1354_17: nevasaññānāsaññāyatana”nti ca evamādīni suttāni etassatthassa sādhakāni.
tika-s0104t:1354_18: Titthaṃ vuccati micchāladdhi tattheva bāhullena paribbhamanato taranti bālā etthāti katvā,
tika-s0104t:1354_23: saññāvirāgāvirāgesu ādīnavānisaṃsadassāvino ca hutvā asaññasamāpattiṃ nibbattetvā akkhaṇabhūmiyaṃ upapajjanti,
tika-s0104t:1354_26: Vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ katvāti catutthe bhūtakasiṇe paṭhamādīni tīṇi jhānāni nibbattetvā tatiyajjhāne
tika-s0104t:1354_27: ciṇṇavasī hutvā tato vuṭṭhāya catutthajjhānādhigamāya parikammaṃ katvā,
tika-s0104t:1355_0: Kasmā panettha vāyokasiṇeyeva parikammaṃ vuttanti? Vuccate –
tika-s0104t:1355_1: yatheva hi rūpapaṭibhāgabhūtesu kasiṇavisesesu rūpavibhāvanena rūpavirāgabhāvanāsaṅkhāto arūpasamāpattiviseso sacchikarīyati,
tika-s0104t:1355_2: evaṃ aparibyattaviggahatāya arūpapaṭibhāgabhūte kasiṇavisese arūpavibhāvanena arūpavirāgabhāvanāsaṅkhāto rūpasamāpattiviseso adhigamīyati,
tika-s0104t:1355_5: dhibbate taṃ citta”ntiādinā ca nayena arūpapavattiyā ādīnavadassanena,
tika-s0104t:1355_7: rūpavirāgabhāvanā pana saddhiṃ upacārena arūpasamāpattiyo visesena paṭhamāruppajjhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1355_12: Yathā hi rūpavirāgabhāvanā virajjanīyadhammabhāvamatte parinibbindā (virajjanīyadhamma bhāvamattena parinipphannā dī. ni. ṭī. 1.6-
tika-s0104t:1355_14: evaṃ arūpavirāgabhāvanāpīti vuccamāne na koci virodho.
tika-s0104t:1355_16: tesañca visayapadesanimittasseva tassa jhānassa paṭipattito taṃ kāraṇaṃ passantehi pubbācariyehi catuttheyeva
tika-s0104t:1355_19: vaṇṇakasiṇesu viya purimabhūtakasiṇattayepi vaṇṇapaṭicchāyāva paṇṇattiārammaṇaṃ jhānassa lokavohārānurodheneva pavattito,
tika-s0104t:1355_20: evañca katvā visuddhimagge pathavīkasiṇassa ādāsacandamaṇḍalūpamāvacanañca samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1355_21: Catutthe pana bhūtakasiṇe bhūtapaṭicchāyā eva jhānassa gocarabhāvaṃ gacchatīti tasseva arūpapaṭibhāgatā yuttā,
tika-s0104t:1356_4: yo vā manussaloke jīvanakālo upatthambhakapaccayehi karīyati,
tika-s0104t:1356_6: Asaññasattesu nibbattatīti asaññasattasaṅkhāte sattanikāye rūpapaṭisandhivaseneva upapajjati,
tika-s0104t:1356_7: aññesu vā cakkavāḷesu tassā bhūmiyā atthitāya anekavidhabhāvaṃ sandhāya puthuvacananiddesotipi daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1356_11: kathaṃ arūpasannissayena vinā tattha rūpaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0104t:1356_12: nanu siyā arūpasannissitāyeva rūpakkhandhassa uppatti idheva pañcavokārabhave tathā uppattiyā adassanatoti?
tika-s0104t:1356_14: kathaṃ pana rūpasannissayena vinā arūpadhātuyā arūpaṃ pavattatīti.
tika-s0104t:1356_17: kathañca kabaḷīkārāhārena vinā rūpadhātuyā rūpaṃ pavattatīti.
tika-s0104t:1356_23: Apica yathā yassa cittasantānassa nibbattikāraṇaṃ rūpe avigatataṇhaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1356_24: tassa saha rūpena sambhavato rūpaṃ nissāya pavatti rūpasāpekkhatāya kāraṇassa.
tika-s0104t:1356_26: tassa vinā rūpena pavatti rūpanirapekkhatāya kāraṇassa,
tika-s0104t:1356_27: evaṃ yassa rūpappabandhassa nibbattikāraṇaṃ arūpe vigatataṇhaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1356_28: tassa vinā arūpena pavatti arūpanirapekkhatāya kāraṇassa,
tika-s0104t:1356_30: bhāvanābalena catuvokārabhave arūpasseva sambhavo viya ca.
tika-s0104t:1357_0: Kathaṃ pana tattha kevalo rūpappabandho paccuppannapaccayarahito cirakālaṃ pavattatīti paccetabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1357_1: kittakaṃ vā kālaṃ pavattatīti codanaṃ manasi katvā “yathā nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:1357_2: Tena na kevalaṃ idha ceva aññattha ca vutto āgamoyeva etadatthañāpane,
tika-s0104t:1357_3: atha kho ayaṃ panettha yuttīti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1357_13: Kathaṃ pana anekakappasatamatikkamena ciraniruddhato viññāṇato idha viññāṇamuppajjati.
tika-s0104t:1357_14: Na hi niruddhe cakkhupasāde cakkhuviññāṇamuppajjamānaṃ diṭṭhanti?
tika-s0104t:1357_16: Niruddhampi hi cittaṃ samānajātikassa antarā anuppajjanato samanantarapaccayamattaṃ hotiyeva, na bījaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1357_18: tasmā kammato bījabhūtato ārammaṇādīhi paccayehi asaññībhavato cutānaṃ kāmadhātuyā upapattiviññāṇaṃ hotiyeva,
tika-s0104t:1357_20: Ettha ca yathā nāma utuniyāmena pupphaggahaṇe niyatakālānaṃ rukkhānaṃ vidāraṇasaṅkhāte vekhe dinne vekhabalena aniyamatā hoti pupphaggahaṇassa,
tika-s0104t:1357_21: evameva pañcavokārabhave avippayogena vattamānesu rūpārūpadhammesu rūpārūpavirāgabhāvanāsaṅkhāte vekhe
tika-s0104t:1357_24: arūparahitā ca khandhānaṃ pavatti hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1358_0: Kasmā panettha puna saññuppādā ca pana “te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti saññuppādo tesaṃ cavanassa kāraṇabhāvena vutto,
tika-s0104t:1358_2: Idha paṭisandhisaññuppādena tesaṃ cavanassa paññāyanato ñāpakahetubhāvena vutto,
tika-s0104t:1358_3: “saññuppādā”ti vacanaṃ vā tesaṃ cavanassa paññāyanabhāvadassananti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t:1358_5: saññuppādā vā uppādasaññā te devāti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:1358_8: tadabbhantare vā pavattāya asaññūpapattiyā vasena lābhīadhiccasamuppannikavādopi lābhīsassatavādo viya anekabhedo sambhavatīti?
tika-s0104t:1358_10: anantarattā pana āsannāya asaññūpapattiyā vasena lābhīadhiccasamuppannikavādo nayadassanavasena ekova dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1358_11: Atha vā sassatadiṭṭhisaṅgahato adhiccasamuppannikavādassa sassatavāde āgato sabbopi desanānayo yathāsambhavaṃ
tika-s0104t:1358_12: adhiccasamuppannikavādepi gahetabboti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ bhagavatā lābhīadhiccasamuppannikavādo
tika-s0104t:1358_14: avassañcassa sassatadiṭṭhisaṅgaho icchitabbo saṃkilesapakkhe sattānamajjhāsayassa sassatucchedavaseneva duvidhattā,
tika-s0104t:1359_0: Nanu ca adhiccasamuppannikavādassa sassatadiṭṭhisaṅgaho na yutto “ahañhi pubbe nāhosi”ntiādivasena pavattanato apubbasattapātubhāvagāhakattā.
tika-s0104t:1359_4: Yadipi hi ayaṃ vādo “somhi etarahi ahutvā santatāya pariṇato”ti attano,
tika-s0104t:1359_6: tathāpi vattamānakālato paṭṭhāya na tesaṃ katthaci anāgate pariyantaṃ passati,
tika-s0104t:1359_8: yathāha “sassatisamaṃ tatheva ṭhassatī”ti yadevaṃ siyā imassa ca vādassa,
tika-s0104t:1359_9: sassatavādādīnañca pubbantakappikesu saṅgaho na yuttoyeva anāgatakālaparāmasanavasena pavattattāti?
tika-s0104t:1359_14: Atha vā sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇacārena dhammassāminā niravasesato agatiṃ,
tika-s0104t:1359_15: gatiñca yathābhūtaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā paveditā etā diṭṭhiyo,
tika-s0104t:1359_21: tathā ca vakkhati “tattha na ekantena kāraṇaṃ pariyesitabba”nti.
tika-s0104t:1362_2: aparantānudiṭṭhino”tiādīsu viya aparanta –saddānaṃ yathākkamaṃ anāgatakālakoṭṭhāsavācakataṃ sandhāyāha “anāgatakoṭṭhāsasaṅkhāta”nti.
tika-s0104t:1364_7: Evaṃ saddato nipphannaṃ atthato eva dassetuṃ “uddhamāghātanā attānaṃ vadantī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1364_9: Te hi diṭṭhigatikā “uddhaṃ maraṇato attā nibbikāro”ti vadanti.
tika-s0104t:1364_10: “So etesa”ntiādinā assatthiyatthaṃ dasseti yathā “buddhamassa atthīti buddho”ti.
tika-s0104t:1364_14: Saññīvādo eva vādo etesanti hi attho.
tika-s0104t:1365_1: Rūpī attāti ettha kasiṇarūpaṃ “attā”ti kasmā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1365_2: nanu rūpavinimuttena attanā bhavitabbaṃ “rūpamassa atthī”ti vutte saññāya viya rūpassāpi attaniyattā.
tika-s0104t:1365_3: Na hi “saññī attā”ti ettha saññā eva attā,
tika-s0104t:1365_4: atha kho “saññā assa atthī”ti atthena attaniyāva,
tika-s0104t:1365_6: Na kho panetamevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “rūpamassa atthīti rūpī”ti,
tika-s0104t:1365_9: Sā hi “natthī”ti na sakkā vattuṃ parittavipulatādivisesasabbhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1365_11: atha imassa vādassa sassatadiṭṭhisaṅgaho na yujjati ruppanasīlassa bhedasabbhāvatoti?
tika-s0104t:1365_12: Yujjateva kāyabhedato uddhaṃ parikappitassa attano nibbikāratāya tena adhippetattā.
tika-s0104t:1365_14: Atha vā “rūpamassa atthīti rūpī”ti vuttepi na koci doso kappanāsiddhena bhedena abhedassāpi niddesadassanato yathā “silāputtakassa sarīra”nti.
tika-s0104t:1366_0: Apica avayavavasena avayavino tathāniddesanidassanato yathā “kāye kāyānupassī”ti,
tika-s0104t:1366_5: evañca katvā attano rūpasabhāvattā “rūpī attā”ti vacanaṃ ñāyāgatamevāti vuttaṃ “kasiṇarūpaṃ attā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1366_12: Niyatavāditāya hi kammaphalapaṭikkhepato natthi tesaṃ jhānasamāpattilābho.
tika-s0104t:1366_13: Tathā hikaṇhābhijātiādīsu kāḷakādirūpaṃ “attā”ti ekacce ājīvakā paṭijānanti.
tika-s0104t:1366_22: Arogoti pana rogarahitatāsīsena nibbikāratāya niccataṃ diṭṭhigatiko paṭijānātīti dassetuṃ “nicco”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1366_24: Nimbapaṇṇe tapparimāṇo tittakaraso viya sarīrapparimāṇo arūpī attā sarīre tiṭṭhatīti takkamatteneva nigaṇṭhā
tika-s0104t:1367_0: Tatiyā panāti “rūpī ca arūpī ca attā”ti laddhi.
tika-s0104t:1367_1: Missakagāhavasenāti rūpārūpasamāpattīnaṃ yathāvuttāni nimittāni ekajjhaṃ katvā ekova “attā”ti,
tika-s0104t:1367_3: Ayañhi diṭṭhigatiko rūpārūpasamāpattilābhī tāsaṃ nimittaṃ rūpabhāvena,
tika-s0104t:1367_4: arūpabhāvena ca “attā”ti gahetvā “rūpī ca arūpī cā”ti abhinivesaṃ janesi athetavādino viya,
tika-s0104t:1367_5: takkamatteneva vā rūpārūpadhammānaṃ missakagahaṇavasena “rūpī ca arūpī ca attā”ti abhinivissa aṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0104t:1367_6: Catutthāti “neva arūpī ca nārūpī ca attā”ti laddhi.
tika-s0104t:1367_9: rūpasabhāvānativattanato na ca arūpīti evaṃ pavattatakkagāheneva.
tika-s0104t:1368_1: nevarūpī nārūpīti ettha hi antānantikacatutthavāde viya aññamaññapaṭikkhepavasena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:1368_2: Satipi ca tatiyavādena imassa samānatthabhāve tattha desakālabhedavasena viya idha kālavatthubhedavasena tatiyacatutthavādānaṃ viseso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t:1368_3: Kālabhedavasena hi idha tatiyavādassa pavatti rūpārūpanimittānaṃ sahaanupaṭṭhānato.
tika-s0104t:1368_5: Dutiyacatukkaṃ antānantikavāde vuttanayena veditabbaṃ sabbathā saddatthato samānatthattā.
tika-s0104t:1368_7: tampi “amati gacchati bhāvo osānametthā”tiādinā amhehi vuttameva,
tika-s0104t:1368_10: Kāmañca nānattasaññī attāti ayampi vādo samāpannakavasena labbhati.
tika-s0104t:1368_12: Tathāpi samāpattiyaṃ ekarūpeneva saññāya upaṭṭhānato lābhīvasena ekattasaññitā sātisayaṃ yuttāti āha “samāpannakavasena ekattasaññī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1368_13: Ekasamāpattilābhino eva vā vasena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:1368_14: Satipi ca samāpattibhedato saññābhedasambhave bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇeyeva saññānānattassa oḷārikassa
tika-s0104t:1368_15: sambhavato takkīvaseneva nānattasaññitaṃ dassetuṃ “asamāpannakavasena nānattasaññī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1368_19: iminā ca satipi saññāvinimuttadhamme “saññāyeva attā”ti vadatīti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1368_21: Evañca katvā antānantikavāde ceva idha ca antānantacatukke paṭhamadutiyavādesu saddatthamattato samānesupi
tika-s0104t:1368_22: sabhāvato tehi dvīhi vādehi imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vādānaṃ viseso siddho hoti,
tika-s0104t:1368_23: aññathā vuttappakāresu vādesu satipi pubbantāparantakappanabhedamattena kehici visese kehici avisesoyeva siyāti.
tika-s0104t:1369_2: aṇumatto attā”tiādiladdhivasena paritto ca so saññī cāti parittasaññī kāpilakāṇādapabhutayo [kapilakaṇādādayo ] viya.
tika-s0104t:1369_3: Attano sabbagatabhāvapaṭijānanavasena appamāṇo ca so saññī cāti appamāṇasaññīti.
tika-s0104t:1370_1: sattānaṃ sukhādisamaṅgitā dibbacakkhunāva diṭṭhā nāmāti āha “dibbena cakkhunā”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1370_4: Diṭṭhigatikavisayāsu hi pañcavokārajhānabhūmīsu vehapphalabhūmiṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā yathārahaṃ catukkanaye tikajjhānassa,
tika-s0104t:1370_5: pañcakanaye ca catukkajjhānassa vipākaṭṭhānattā tikacatukkajjhānabhūmiyo nāma.
tika-s0104t:1370_8: Nanu ca “ekantasukhī attā”tiādinā pavattavādānaṃ aparantadiṭṭhibhāvato “nibbattamānaṃ disvā”ti paccuppannavacanaṃ anupapannameva siyā.
tika-s0104t:1370_10: Upapannameva anāgatassa ekantasukhībhāvādikassa pakappanāya paccuppannanibbattidassanena adhippetattā.
tika-s0104t:1370_12: Ettha ca tassaṃ tassaṃ bhūmiyaṃ bāhullena sukhādisahitadhammappavattidassanaṃ paṭicca tesaṃ “ekantasukhī”tiādigahaṇato
tika-s0104t:1370_14: Saddantarābhisambandhavasena viya hi atthapakaraṇādivasenapi atthaviseso labbhati.
tika-s0104t:1370_15: “Ekantasukhī”tiādīsu ca ekantabhāvo bahulaṃ pavattimattaṃ pati payutto.
tika-s0104t:1370_17: Atha vā hatthidassakaandhā viya diṭṭhigatikā yaṃ yadeva passanti,
tika-s0104t:1370_22: “Dibbena cakkhunā disvā”ti vuttamatthaṃ samatthetuṃ “visesato hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1372_1: Atha na koci viseso atthīti codanaṃ sodheti “kevalañhī”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1372_2: “Asaññī”ti ca “nevasaññīnāsaññī”ti ca gaṇhantānaṃ tā diṭṭhiyoti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:1372_5: Satipi kiñci kāraṇapariyesanasambhave diṭṭhigatikavādānaṃ anādariyabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “na ekantena kāraṇaṃ pariyesitabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1372_10: “saññaṃ attato samanupassatī”ti ettha vuttanayena saññaṃyeva “attā”ti gahetvā tassa kiñcanabhāvena ṭhitāya
tika-s0104t:1372_13: sabbe eva vā rūpārūpadhamme “attā”ti gahetvā pavatto tatiyavādo,
tika-s0104t:1373_0: Dutiyacatukkepi kasiṇarūpassa asañjānanasabhāvatāya asaññīti katvā antānantikavāde vuttanayena cattāro vikappā pavattā.
tika-s0104t:1373_2: sabbattha vā paṭusaññākiccaṃ kātuṃ asamatthāya sukhumāya saññāya atthibhāvapaṭijānanavasena paṭhamavādo,
tika-s0104t:1373_5: Evaṃ kenaci pakārena satipi kāraṇapariyesanasambhave diṭṭhigatikavādānaṃ pariyesanakkhamābhāvato ādaraṃ
tika-s0104t:1373_6: katvā mahussāhena tesaṃ kāraṇaṃ na pariyesitabbanti.
tika-s0104t:1373_7: Etesaṃ pana saññīasaññīnevasaññīnāsaññīvādānaṃ sassatadiṭṭhisaṅgaho “arogo paraṃ maraṇā”ti vacanato pākaṭoyeva.
tika-s0104t:1375_1: Avijjamānassa vināsāsambhavato atthibhāvahetuko ucchedoti dassetuṃ vijjamānavācakena santa-
tika-s0104t:1375_3: Vijjamānatāpayutto cesa diṭṭhigatikavādavisayo sattoyeva idha adhippetoti dassanatthaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “sattassā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1375_5: yathā hetuphalabhāvena pavattamānānaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ satipi ekasantānapariyāpannānaṃ bhinnasantatipatitehi
tika-s0104t:1375_6: visese hetuphalabhūtānaṃ paramatthato bhinnasabhāvattā bhinnasantānapatitānaṃ viya accantaṃ bhedasanniṭṭhānena
tika-s0104t:1375_8: evaṃ hetuphalabhūtānaṃ vijjamānepi sabhāvabhede ekasantatipariyāpannatāya ekattanayena accantamabhedagahaṇampi kāraṇamevāti.
tika-s0104t:1375_9: Santānavasena hi pavattamānesu khandhesu ghanavinibbhogābhāvena tesaṃ idha sattagāho,
tika-s0104t:1375_11: anupubbanirodhavasena pana nirantaravināso idha “ucchedo”ti adhippeto yāvāyaṃ attā ucchijjamāno bhavati,
tika-s0104t:1375_17: Apica punānuppajjamānavasena nirudayavināsoyeva ucchedo nāma yathāvuttanayena gahaṇatoti āha “upaccheda”nti. U- saddo, hi upa-
tika-s0104t:1375_19: Niruddhato parabhāgo ca idha uparibhāgoti vuccati.
tika-s0104t:1376_2: so pana maṃsacakkhupaññācakkhūnaṃ dassanapathātikkamanato adassanamevāti āha “adassana”nti.
tika-s0104t:1376_7: Yathādhammaṃ bhavanaṃ bhāvoti hi atthena idha bhāva-
tika-s0104t:1376_12: tena vakkhati “tathā ca aññathā ca vikappetvāvā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1376_13: Tatthāti “sato sattassa ucchedaṃ vināsaṃ vibhavaṃ paññapentī”ti vacane.
tika-s0104t:1376_15: Tadavasesalābhī ceva sabbaso alābhī ca idha aparantakappikaṭṭhāne “alābhī” tveva vuccati.
tika-s0104t:1377_2: Upapattiṃ apassantoti daṭṭhuṃ samatthepi sati anolokanavasena apassanto.
tika-s0104t:1377_4: parikammākaraṇena vā upapattiṃ daṭṭhuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0104t:1377_5: evañca katvā nayadvaye viseso pākaṭo hoti.
tika-s0104t:1377_7: na jānātiyevāti natthikavādavasena ucchedaṃ gaṇhātīti saha pāṭhasesena sambandho,
tika-s0104t:1377_8: natthikavādavasena mahāmūḷhabhāveneva “ito añño paraloko atthī”ti anavabodhanato imaṃ diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhātīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t:1377_10: yvāyaṃ indriyagocaro”ti attano dhītuyā hatthaggaṇhanakarājā viya kāmasukhābhirattatāyapi gaṇhātīti āha “kāmasukhagiddhatāya vā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1377_11: Vaṇṭato patitapaṇṇānaṃ vaṇṭena apaṭisandhikabhāvaṃ sandhāya “na puna viruhantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1377_12: Evameva sattāti yathā paṇḍupalāso bandhanā pavutto puna na paṭisandhīyati,
tika-s0104t:1377_13: evameva sabbepi sattā appaṭisandhikā maraṇapariyosānā aponobbhavikā appaṭisandhikamaraṇameva nigacchantīti attho.
tika-s0104t:1377_14: Udakapubbuḷakūpamā hi sattā puna anuppajjamānatoti tassa laddhi.
tika-s0104t:1377_16: Aññathāti takkanassa anekappakārasambhavato tato aññenapi pakārena.
tika-s0104t:1377_17: Lābhinopi cutito uddhaṃ upapātassa adassanamattaṃ pati takkaneneva imā diṭṭhiyo uppajjantīti vuttaṃ “vikappetvāvā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1377_18: Tathā ca vikappetvāva uppannā aññathā ca vikappetvāva uppannāti hi sambandho.
tika-s0104t:1377_21: yathā ca uddhamāghātanikasaññīvāde catutthacatukke saññīvādā ekantalābhīvaseneva desitā, nayime.
tika-s0104t:1377_22: Ime pana sassatekaccasassatavādādayo viya lābhīalābhīvaseneva desitāti.
tika-s0104t:1377_24: takkīvasena ca paccekaṃ desanamakatvā sassatavādādidesanāhi aññathā idha desanā katāti? Vuccate –
tika-s0104t:1377_29: Yadi hi idhāpi ca tathādesanāya nibandhanabhūto veneyyajjhāsayo bhaveyya,
tika-s0104t:1377_32: ekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ātappamanvāya…pe…
tika-s0104t:1377_33: yathā samāhite citte sattānaṃ cutūpapātañāṇāya cittaṃ abhininnāmeti,
tika-s0104t:1377_34: so dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena arahato cuticittaṃ passati,
tika-s0104t:1377_37: So evamāha ‘yato kho bho ayaṃ attā rūpī cātumahābhūtiko mātāpettikasambhavo kāyassa bhado ucchijjati vinassati,
tika-s0104t:1377_40: Yasmā pana tathādesanāya nibandhanabhūto veneyyajjhāsayo na idha bhavati,
tika-s0104t:1377_41: tasmā desanāvilāsena veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ sassatavādādidesanāhi aññathāyevāyaṃ desanā katāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1378_0: Atha vā sassatekaccasassatavādādīsu viya na idha takkīvādato visesalābhīvādo bhinnākāro,
tika-s0104t:1378_1: atha kho samānappakāratāya samānākāroyevāti imassa visesassa pakāsanatthaṃ ayamucchedavādo bhagavatā purimavādehi visiṭṭhākārabhāvena desito.
tika-s0104t:1378_2: Sambhavati hi idha takkinopi anussavādivasena adhigamavato viya abhiniveso.
tika-s0104t:1378_3: Apica na imā diṭṭhiyo bhagavatā anāgate evaṃbhāvīvasena desitā,
tika-s0104t:1378_5: atha kho yathā yathā diṭṭhigatikehi “idameva saccaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1378_7: tathā tathāyeva ime diṭṭhigatā yathābhuccaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇena paricchinditvā pakāsitā,
tika-s0104t:1378_9: yesañca parikittanena tathāgatā sammadeva thomitā honti.
tika-s0104t:1379_1: yathā ucchedavādīhi diṭṭhigatikehi uttaruttarabhavadassīhi aparabhavadassīnaṃ tesaṃ vādapaṭisedhavasena sakasakavādā patiṭṭhāpitā,
tika-s0104t:1379_2: tathāyevāyaṃ desanā katāti purimadesanāhi imissā desanāya pavattibhedo na codetabbo,
tika-s0104t:1379_3: evañca katvā arūpabhavabhedavasena ucchedavādo catudhā vibhajitvā viya kāmarūpabhavabhedavasenāpi anekadhā vibhajitvāyeva vattabbo,
tika-s0104t:1379_4: evaṃ sati bhagavatā vuttasattakato bahutarabhedo ucchedavādo āpajjatīti,
tika-s0104t:1379_5: atha vā paccekaṃ kāmarūpabhavabhedavasena viya arūpabhavavasenāpi na vibhajitvā vattabbo,
tika-s0104t:1379_6: evampi sati bhagavatā vuttasattakato appatarabhedova ucchedavādo āpajjatīti ca evaṃpakārāpi codanā anavakāsā eva hoti.
tika-s0104t:1380_1: Mātāpitūnaṃ etanti taṃsambandhanato etaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ santakanti attho.
tika-s0104t:1380_7: “Rūpakāyavasenā”ti avatvā “rūpakāyasīsenā”ti vadanto arūpampi tesaṃ “attā”ti gahaṇaṃ ñāpeti.
tika-s0104t:1382_9: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ “samānepi tattha ubhayaliṅgābhāve purisasaṇṭhānāva tattha brahmāno,
tika-s0104t:1383_3: yuttaṃ tāva purimesu tīsu vādesu “kāyassa bhedā”ti vattuṃ pañcavokārabhavapariyāpannaṃ attabhāvamārabbha pavattattā tesaṃ vādānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1383_4: catuvokārabhavapariyāpannaṃ pana attabhāvaṃ nissāya pavattesu catutthādīsu catūsu vādesu kasmā “kāyassa bhedā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1383_8: rūpattabhāve pana pavattavohāreneva diṭṭhigatiko arūpattabhāvepi kāyavohāraṃ āropetvā evamāha.
tika-s0104t:1383_9: Lokasmiñhi dissati aññatthabhūtopi vohāro tadaññatthasamāropito yathā taṃ “sasavisāṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1383_13: Apica nāmakāyabhāvato phassādidhammasamūhabhūte arūpattabhāve kāyaniddeso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0104t:1383_15: Ettha ca kāmāvacaradevattabhāvādiniravasesavibhavapatiṭṭhāpakānaṃ dutiyādivādānaṃ aparantakappikabhāvo yutto hotu anāgataddhavisayattā tesaṃ vādānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1383_18: Dutiyavādādīnañhi purimapurimavādasaṅgahitasseva attano anāgate taduttaribhavūpapannassa samucchedabodhanato yujjati aparantakappikatā,
tika-s0104t:1383_19: tathā ceva vuttaṃ “no ca kho bho ayaṃ attā ettāvatā sammā samucchinno hotī”tiādi yaṃ pana tattha vuttaṃ “atthi kho bho añño attā”ti,
tika-s0104t:1383_22: Paṭhamavādassa pana anāgate taduttaribhavūpapannassa attano samucchedabodhanābhāvato,
tika-s0104t:1383_23: “atthi kho bho añño attā”ti ettha aññabhāvena aggahaṇato ca na yujjateva aparantakappikatāti?
tika-s0104t:1383_24: No na yujjati idhalokapariyāpannattepi paṭhamavādavisayassa anāgatakālikasseva tena adhippetattā.
tika-s0104t:1383_25: Paṭhamavādināpi hi idhalokapariyāpannassa attano paraṃ maraṇā ucchedo anāgatakālavaseneva adhippeto,
tika-s0104t:1383_26: tasmā cassa aparantakappikatāya na koci virodhoti.
tika-s0104t:1385_2: diṭṭho ca so sabhāvaṭṭhena dhammo cāti diṭṭhadhammo,
tika-s0104t:1385_4: So pana akkhānamindriyānaṃ abhimukhībhūto visayoyevāti vuttaṃ “paccakkhadhammo vuccatī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1385_6: sopi supākaṭabhāvena indriyavisayo viya hotīti katvā tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1385_8: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave yathākammaṃ paṭilabhitabbattabhāvassa vācakaṃ padaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1385_13: Diṭṭhadhammanibbāne pavatto vādo etesanti diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādātipi yujjati.
tika-s0104t:1386_1: Kāmanīyattā kāmā ca te anekāvayavānaṃ samūhabhāvato sattānañca bandhanato guṇā cāti kāmaguṇāti atthaṃ sandhāyāha “manāpiyarūpādīhī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1386_6: Parito tattha tattha kāmaguṇesu yathāsakaṃ indriyāni cāreti gocaraṃ gaṇhāpetīti atthaṃ dassetuṃ “tesū”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1387_4: Ñātibhogarogasīladiṭṭhibyasanehi phuṭṭhassa cetaso abbhantaraṃ nijjhāyanaṃ socanaṃ antonijjhāyanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1387_10: Pasādasaṅkhāte kāye nissitassa dukkhasahagatakāyaviññāṇassa paṭipīḷanaṃ kāyapaṭipīḷanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1387_11: sasambhārakathanaṃ vā etaṃ yathā “dhanunā vijjhatī”ti tadupanissayassa vā aniṭṭharūpassa pacchā pavattanato “rūpakāyassa paṭipīḷana”ntipi vaṭṭati.
tika-s0104t:1387_14: Ñātibyasanādinā phuṭṭhassa paridevanāyapi asakkuṇantassa antogatasokasamuṭṭhito bhuso āyāso upāyāso.
tika-s0104t:1387_15: So pana cetaso appasannākāro evāti āha “visādalakkhaṇo”ti.
tika-s0104t:1387_18: Anupasaggopi hi saddo saupasaggo viya yathāvuttassa atthassa bodhako yathā “gotrabhū”ti.
tika-s0104t:1388_7: Tenetamatthaṃ dīpeti “khobhakarasabhāvattā vitakkavicārānaṃ taṃsahitampi jhānaṃ tehi sauppīḷanaṃ viya hotī”ti,
tika-s0104t:1388_9: Oḷārikabhāvo hi vitakkavicārasaṅkhātena kaṇṭakena saha pavattakathā.
tika-s0104t:1388_11: loke hi sakaṇṭakaṃ pharusakaṃ oḷārikanti vadanti.
tika-s0104t:1389_9: Yāya nimittabhūtāya ubbilāvanapītiyā uppannāya cittaṃ ubbilāvitaṃ nāma,
tika-s0104t:1389_11: Iti pītiyā uppannāya eva cittassa ubbilāvanato tassa ubbilāvitabhāvo pītiyā kato nāmāti āha “ubbilabhāvakaraṇa”nti.
tika-s0104t:1390_6: Sukhena hi cittaṃ ārammaṇe abhinataṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t:1390_10: Ettha ca “manuññabhojanādīsu khuppipāsādiabhibhūtassa viya kāmehi viveciyamānassa upādārammaṇapatthanāvisesato abhivaḍḍhati,
tika-s0104t:1390_11: manuññabhojanaṃ bhuttāvino viya pana uḷārakāmarasassa yāvadatthaṃ nicitassa sahitassa bhuttakāmatāya kāmesu pātabyatā na hoti,
tika-s0104t:1390_12: visayānabhigiddhanato visayehi dummociyehi jalūkā viya sayameva muccatī”ti ca ayoniso ummujjitvā kāmaguṇasantappitatāya
tika-s0104t:1390_15: paṭhamādijhānasukhassa santabhāvadassitāya ca paṭhamādijhānasukhatittiyā saṃsāradukkhupacchedaṃ byākaṃsu dutiyādivādino.
tika-s0104t:1390_16: Idhāpi ucchedavādeva vuttappakāro vicāro yathāsambhavaṃ ānetvā vattabbo.
tika-s0104t:1390_21: Dutiyādivādesu yadi paṭhamavādasaṅgahito soyeva attā paṭhamajjhānādisamaṅgī,
tika-s0104t:1390_23: Teneva hi ucchedavāde viya idha pāḷiyaṃ “añño attā”ti aññaggahaṇaṃ na kataṃ.
tika-s0104t:1390_24: Kathaṃ pana accantanibbānapaññāpakassa attano diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādassa sassatadiṭṭhiyā saṅgaho,
tika-s0104t:1390_26: Taṃtaṃsukhavisesasamaṅgitāpaṭiladdhena bandhavimokkhena suddhassa attano sakarūpeneva avaṭṭhānadīpanato.
tika-s0104t:1390_27: Tesañhi tathāpaṭiladdhena kammabandhavimokkhena suddho hutvā diṭṭhadhammanibbānappatto attā sakarūpeneva avaṭṭhāsīti laddhi.
tika-s0104t:1390_28: Tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ “ettāvatā kho bho ayaṃ attā paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ patto hotī”ti sassatabhāvañāpakacchāyāya eva tesaṃ vādadassanaṃ katanti.
tika-s0104t:1391_2: Tassa imā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo kathitāti niyamanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1391_3: niyatānapekkhavacanaṃ vā etaṃ “yaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti āgataṭṭhāne viya.
tika-s0104t:1391_5: Tāsu antānantikavādādīnaṃ sassatadiṭṭhisaṅgahabhāvo tattha tattha pakāsitoyeva.
tika-s0104t:1391_10: Na hi pubbantāparantesu viya tadubhayavinimutte majjhante diṭṭhikappanā sambhavati tadubhayantaramattena ittarakālattā.
tika-s0104t:1391_12: evaṃ sati diṭṭhikappanākkhamo tassa ubhayasabhāvo pubbantāparantesuyeva antogadhoti kathaṃ tadubhayamekajjhaṃ adassitaṃ siyā.
tika-s0104t:1391_14: sopi “pubbantakappikā ca aparantakappikā ca pubbantāparantakappikā cā”ti upari vadantena bhagavatā pubbantāparantehi
tika-s0104t:1391_18: Aññathā hi saṅkaḍḍhitvā vuttavacanassa niravasesasaṅkaḍḍhanābhāvato anatthakatā āpajjeyyāti.
tika-s0104t:1391_20: Ye antānantikā hutvā diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti evamādinā ubhayasambandhābhinivesino veditabbā.
tika-s0104t:1392_8: Tadubhayavasena hi sattānaṃ saṃkilesapakkhe duvidho ajjhāsayo.
tika-s0104t:1395_0: Tañca bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ aparimāṇe eva ñeyyavisese uppajjanavasena
tika-s0104t:1395_1: anekabhedabhinnampi “cattāro janā sassatavādā”tiādinā dvāsaṭṭhiyā pabhedehi saṅgaṇhanavasena sabbaññutaññāṇena
tika-s0104t:1395_2: paricchinditvā dassento pamāṇabhūtāya tulāya dhārayamāno viya hotīti āha “tulāya tulayanto viyā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1395_3: Tathā hi vakkhati “antojālīkatā”tiādi “sinerupādato vālukaṃ uddharanto viyā”ti pana etena sabbaññutaññāṇato
tika-s0104t:1395_4: aññassa ñāṇassa imissā desanāya asakkuṇeyyataṃ dasseti paramagambhīratāvacanato.
tika-s0104t:1396_0: Ettha ca “sabbe te imeheva dvāsaṭṭhiyā vatthūhi,
tika-s0104t:1396_3: pubbantakappikādittayavinimuttassa ca kassaci diṭṭhigatikassa abhāvato yāni tāni sāmaññaphalādisuttantaresu
tika-s0104t:1396_6: tesaṃ ettheva saṅgahato antogadhatā veditabbā. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0104t:1396_7: Akiriyavādo tāva “vañjho kūṭaṭṭho”tiādinā kiriyābhāvadīpanato sassatavāde antogadho,
tika-s0104t:1396_9: “natthi hetu natthi paccayo sattānaṃ saṃkilesāyā”tiādi nayappavatto ahetukavādo ca adhiccasamuppannavāde.
tika-s0104t:1396_11: Tathā hi tattha “kāyassa bhedā ucchijjatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1397_1: tathāpi sattavatātikkamena vikkhepavāditāya nāṭaputtavādopi sañcayavādo viya amarāvikkhepavādesu antogadho.
tika-s0104t:1397_3: aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīra”nti evaṃpakārā vādā pana “rūpī attā hoti arogo paraṃ maraṇā”tiādivādesu saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
tika-s0104t:1397_8: “Hoti ca na hoti ca tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā,
tika-s0104t:1397_9: atthi ca natthi ca sattā opapātikā”ti evaṃpakārā ekaccasassatavāde.
tika-s0104t:1397_10: “Neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā,
tika-s0104t:1397_11: nevatthi na natthi sattā opapātikā”ti evaṃpakārā amarāvikkhepavāde.
tika-s0104t:1397_16: bahiddhā ca aññatitthiyasamaye dissamānānaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ imāsuyeva dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhīsu antogadhatā veditabbā.
tika-s0104t:1397_17: Te pana tattha tatthāgatanayena vuccamānā ganthavitthārakarā,
tika-s0104t:1397_18: atitthe ca pakkhandanamiva hotīti na vitthārayimha.
tika-s0104t:1397_19: Idha pāḷiyaṃ atthavicāraṇāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuttānatthapakāsanameva hi amhākaṃ bhāroti.
tika-s0104t:1398_0: “Evamayaṃ yathānusandhivasena desanā āgatā”ti vacanappasaṅgena suttassānusandhayo vibhajituṃ “tayo hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:1398_5: Pucchādayo hi desanāya bāhirakāraṇaṃ tadanurūpena desanāpavattanato.
tika-s0104t:1398_10: pucchaṃ anusandhiṃ katvā desitattā suttassa sambandho pucchāya kato nāma hoti.
tika-s0104t:1398_12: Pucchānissitena hi anusandhinā tannissayabhūtā pucchāpi gahitāti.
tika-s0104t:1398_17: pucchaṃ vacanasambandhaṃ katvā desito taṃsamuṭṭhāniko taṃtaṃsuttapadesova.
tika-s0104t:1399_1: ajjhāsayena ca ananusandhiko ādimhi desitadhammassa anurūpadhammavasena vā tappaṭipakkhadhammavasena vā pavatto uparisuttapadeso.
tika-s0104t:1399_5: Tattha “evaṃ vutte nando gopālako bhagavantaṃ etadavocā”ti paṭhanti,
tika-s0104t:1399_6: taṃ na sundaraṃ sutte tathā abhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1399_7: “Evaṃ vutte nandagopālakasutte bhagavantaṃ etadavocā”ti pana paṭhitabbaṃ tasmiṃ sutte “aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavocā”ti atthassa upapattito.
tika-s0104t:1399_9: Gaṅgāya vuyhamānaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ upamaṃ katvā saddhāpabbajite kulaputte desite nando gopālako “ahamimaṃ
tika-s0104t:1399_11: upasampadañca gahetvā tathāpaṭipajjamāno nacirasseva arahattaṃ patto.
tika-s0104t:1399_13: “Kiṃ nu kho bhante”tiādīni pana aññataroyeva bhikkhu avoca.
tika-s0104t:1399_14: Vuttañhi tattha “evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca ‘kiṃ nu kho bhante,
tika-s0104t:1400_2: dārukkhandho na orimaṃ tīraṃ upagacchatī”tiādinā gaṅgāya vuyhamānaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ upamaṃ katvā saddhāpabbajite kulaputte desite.
tika-s0104t:1400_3: Bhagavantaṃ etadavocāti anusandhikusalatāya “kiṃ nu kho bhante”tiādivacanamavoca.
tika-s0104t:1400_4: Tathāgato hi “imissaṃ parisati nisinno anusandhi kusalo atthi,
tika-s0104t:1400_5: so maṃ pañhaṃ pucchissatī”ti ettakeneva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
tika-s0104t:1400_9: Thale ussādoti jalamajjhe uṭṭhite thalasmiṃ ussārito āruḷho.
tika-s0104t:1400_13: Antopūtīti vakkahadayādīsu apūtikassāpi guṇānaṃ pūtibhāvena abbhantaraṃpūtīti.
tika-s0104t:1401_0: “Atha kho aññatarassa bhikkhuno”tiādi majjhimāgamavare uparipaṇṇāsake mahāpuṇṇamasuttaṃ tatrāyamattho –
tika-s0104t:1401_3: tena bhagavato yathādesitāya attasuññatāya attano aruciyabhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0104t:1401_12: Asati attani khandhānañca khaṇikattā tāni kammāni kaṃ nāma attānaṃ attano phalena phusissanti,
tika-s0104t:1401_14: Tassa bhikkhuno cetoparivitakkaṃ attano cetasā ceto –
tika-s0104t:1401_15: pariyañāṇasampayuttena sabbaññutaññāṇasampayuttena vā aññāya jānitvāti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:1402_1: Vidvāti hi paṇḍitādhivacanaṃ vidati jānātīti katvā.
tika-s0104t:1402_4: Taṇhādhipateyyena cetasāti “yadi ahaṃ nāma koci natthi,
tika-s0104t:1402_5: evaṃ sati mayā katassa kammassa phalaṃ ko paṭisaṃvedeti,
tika-s0104t:1402_6: sati pana tasmiṃ siyā kammaphalūpabhogo”ti taṇhādhipatito āgatena attavādupādānasahagatena cetasā.
tika-s0104t:1402_9: khaṇikattepi saṅkhārānaṃ yasmiṃ santāne kammaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0104t:1402_10: tattheva phalūpapattito dhammapuñjamattasseva siddhe kammaphalasambandhe ekattanayaṃ micchā gahetvā ekena kārakavedakabhūtena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1402_11: aññathā kammakammaphalānamasambandho siyāti attattaniyasuññatāpakāsanaṃ satthusāsanaṃ atikkamitabbaṃ maññeyyāti.
tika-s0104t:1403_0: Upari desanāti desanāsamuṭṭhānadhammadīpikāya heṭṭhimadesanāya upari pavattitā desanā.
tika-s0104t:1403_15: Tathā hi niccasārādipaññāpakānaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ vasena uṭṭhitāyaṃ desanā niccasārādisuññatāpakāsanena niṭṭhāpitāti.
tika-s0104t:1405_7: na tu sotāpannassa sammādassanavedayitamiva niccalanti ca hi imāya desanāya mariyādavibhāgaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1405_12: “Tadapī”ti vuttattā yena somanassajātā paññapentīti attho labbhatīti dassetuṃ “yenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1405_17: Ajānantānaṃ apassantānaṃ tesaṃ bhavantānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ tadapi vedayitaṃ taṇhāgatānaṃ vedayitanti sambandho.
tika-s0104t:1406_1: Na hi saṅkhatadhammasabhāvaṃ ajānanamattena micchā abhinivisanti.
tika-s0104t:1406_4: “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti idaṃ diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ evaṃgahitaṃ evaṃparāmaṭṭhaṃ evaṃgatikaṃ hoti evaṃabhisamparāyanti
tika-s0104t:1406_5: yathābhūtamajānantānaṃ apassantānaṃ atha vā yasmiṃ vedayite avītataṇhatāya evaṃdiṭṭhigataṃ upādīyati,
tika-s0104t:1406_7: Evaṃ visesayojanāya hi yathā anāvaraṇañāṇasamantacakkhūhi tathāgatānaṃ yathābhūtamettha jānanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1406_10: atha kho tesaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhiparāmāsoyevāti imamatthaṃ imāya desanāya dassetīti pākaṭaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1407_0: Vedayitanti “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti diṭṭhipaññāpanavasena pavattaṃ diṭṭhissādasukhapariyāyena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1407_5: Tañca kho panetanti ca yathāvuttaṃ vedayitameva paccāmasati,
tika-s0104t:1407_7: “tadapi vedayitaṃ taṇhāgatānaṃ vedayitamevā”ti vacchinditvā “tadapi vedayitaṃ paritassitavipphanditamevā”ti puna sambandho kātabboti.
tika-s0104t:1407_8: Tadapi tāva na sampāpuṇātīti heṭṭhimaparicchedena mariyādavibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “na sotāpannassa dassanamiva niccala”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1407_13: “Paritassitavipphanditamevā”ti hi vuttena maggaphalasukhaṃ viya avipphanditaṃ hutvā ekarūpe avatiṭṭhati,
tika-s0104t:1407_14: atha kho taṃ vaṭṭāmisabhūtaṃ diṭṭhitaṇhāsallānuviddhatāya sauppīḷattā vipphanditamevāti attho āpanno hoti,
tika-s0104t:1408_0: Evaṃ visesakāraṇato dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni vibhajitvā idāni avisesakāraṇato tāni dassetuṃ “tatra bhikkhave”tiādikā desanā āraddhā.
tika-s0104t:1408_3: Tattha tadapīti “sassataṃ attānañca lokañca paññapentī”ti ettha yadetaṃ “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti paññāpanahetubhūtaṃ
tika-s0104t:1408_6: avisesena samudayatthaṅgamassādādīnavanissaraṇato vā yathābhūtamajānantānaṃ apassantānaṃ hoti,
tika-s0104t:1408_8: taṇhāya ca upagatattā taṇhāgatānaṃ taṇhāparitassitena diṭṭhivipphanditameva diṭṭhicalanameva.
tika-s0104t:1408_9: “Asati attani ko vedanaṃ anubhavatī”ti kāyavacīdvāresu diṭṭhiyā copanappattimattameva,
tika-s0104t:1408_10: na pana diṭṭhiyā paññapetabbo koci dhammo sassato atthīti adhippāyoti.
tika-s0104t:1410_4: Yena hi taṇhāparitassitena etāni diṭṭhigatāni pavattanti,
tika-s0104t:1410_6: vedayitassāpi phasso paccayoti evaṃ paccayaparamparavibhāvinī ayaṃ desanā.
tika-s0104t:1410_13: na ettha koci sassato attā vā loko vāti evamatthantaraṃ viññāpitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1410_14: Taṇhādiṭṭhipariphanditaṃ tadapi vedayitaṃ diṭṭhikāraṇabhūtāya taṇhāya paccayabhūtaṃ phassapaccayā hotīti attho.
tika-s0104t:1411_12: Sannihitopi hi visayo sace cittuppādo phusanākāravirahito hoti,
tika-s0104t:1411_13: na tassa ārammaṇapaccayo bhavatīti phasso sabbesampi sampayuttadhammānaṃ visesapaccayo.
tika-s0104t:1411_14: Tathā hi bhagavatā dhammasaṅgaṇīpakaraṇe cittuppādaṃ vibhajantena “phasso hotī”ti phassasseva paṭhamamuddharaṇaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0104t:1413_0: Kāraṇehi catūhipi, na katthaci ravo yutto”ti.
tika-s0104t:1416_3: upari ca “phussa phussa paṭisaṃvedentī”ti vakkhamānattā vedayitamevettha padhānanti āha “sabbadiṭṭhivedayitāni sampiṇḍetī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1416_4: “Yepi te”ti tattha tattha āgatassa ca pi-
tika-s0104t:1416_7: sabbepi te chahi phassāyatanehi phussa phussa paṭisaṃvedentīti hi vedayitakiriyāvasena taṃtaṃdiṭṭhigatikānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1416_10: Upari phasse pakkhipanatthāyāti “chahi phassāyatanehī”ti vutte upari phasse pakkhipanatthaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1416_12: “Chahi phassāyatanehi phussa phussa paṭisaṃvedentī”ti iminā hi chahi ajjhattikāyatanehi chaḷārammaṇapaṭisaṃvedanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1417_9: Tattha ca seyyathāpi bhikkhave subhūmiyaṃ catumahāpathe mahānigrodho samantā pakkhīnaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ hotī”ti tanniddeso vutto.
tika-s0104t:1417_13: āyabhūtaṃ vā attano phalaṃ tanoti pavattetīti āyatanaṃ, kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1417_15: saddo aññesu viya na ettha atthantarāvabodhakoti āha “paṇṇattimatte”ti,
tika-s0104t:1418_8: Phasso vedanā saññā cetanā cittanti ime phassapañcamakā dhammā upalakkhaṇavasena vuttā aññesampi taṃsampayuttadhammānaṃ āyatanabhāvato,
tika-s0104t:1418_10: Tathā hi cittuppādaṃ vibhajantena bhagavatā teyeva “phasso hoti, vedanā, saññā, cetanā,
tika-s0104t:1418_14: Tāni ca nesaṃ kāraṇaṃ tesamabhāve abhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1418_15: Ayaṃ pana yathāvutto sañjātidesādiattho ruḷhivaseneva tattha tattha niruḷhatāya eva pavattattāti ācariyaānandattherena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1418_20: Cakkhādīsu hi taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādikiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭenti vāyamanti,
tika-s0104t:1418_21: āyabhūte ca dhamme etāni tanonti vitthārenti,
tika-s0104t:1418_23: Iti iminā nayenāti ettha ādiatthena iti saddena “sotaṃ paṭiccā”tiādipāḷiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0104t:1419_6: phasso”ti etasmiṃ sutte vijjamānesupi saññādīsu sampayuttadhammesu vedanāya padhānakāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ phassasīsena desanā katā,
tika-s0104t:1419_7: evamidhāpi “phassapaccayā vedanā”tiādinā phassaṃ ādiṃ katvā aparantapaṭisandhānena paccayaparamparaṃ
tika-s0104t:1419_8: dassetuṃ “chahi phassāyatanehī”ti ca “phussa phussā”ti ca phassasīsena desanā katāti.
tika-s0104t:1420_0: “Kiñcāpī”tiādinā saddamattato codanālesaṃ dassetvā “tathāpī”tiādinā atthato taṃ pariharati.
tika-s0104t:1420_2: Phasso arūpadhammo visamāno ekadesena ārammaṇaṃ analliyamānopi phusanākārena pavatto phusanto viya hotīti āha “phassova taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ phusatī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1420_5: “Chahi phassāyatanehi phussa phussā”ti aphusanakiccānipi nissitavohārena phusanakiccāni katvā dassanameva
tika-s0104t:1420_7: Upanikkhipitvāti hi phusanakiccāropanavasena phassasmiṃ pavesetvāti attho.
tika-s0104t:1420_8: Phassagatikāni katvā phassupacāraṃ āropetvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1420_11: Atthasijjhanako pana taṃsabhāvoyeva attho gahetabboti dassetuṃ “tasmā”tiādimāha. Yathāhu –
tika-s0104t:1423_0: Attano paccayabhūtānaṃ channaṃ phassānaṃ vasena cakkhusamphassajā yāva manosamphassajāti saṅkhepato chabbidhaṃ
tika-s0104t:1425_0: Tidhā nissitato dvīhi, tidhā kālena vaḍḍhitā”ti. –
tika-s0104t:1426_1: Mahāvihāravāsino cettha yathā viññāṇaṃ nāmarūpaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1426_3: vedanañca paccayapaccayuppannampi sasantatipariyāpannaṃ dīpento vipākameva icchanti,
tika-s0104t:1426_4: aññe pana yathā tathā vā paccayabhāvo sati na sakkā vajjetunti sabbameva icchanti.
tika-s0104t:1426_6: Rūpataṇhādibhedāyāti “seṭṭhiputto brāhmaṇaputto”ti pitunāmavasena viya ārammaṇanāmavasena vuttāya rūpataṇhā yāva dhammataṇhāti saṅkhepato chabbidhāya.
tika-s0104t:1429_7: upanissaye eva pana taṃ sabbampi antogadhanti evamuddhaṭo.
tika-s0104t:1429_8: Yuttaṃ tāva ārammaṇūpanissayassa upanissayasāmaññato upanissaye antogadhatā,
tika-s0104t:1429_9: kathaṃ pana ārammaṇamattaārammaṇādhipatīnaṃ tattha antogadhabhāvo siyāti?
tika-s0104t:1429_10: Tesampi ārammaṇasāmaññato ārammaṇūpanissayena saṅgahitattā ārammaṇūpanissayavasamodhānabhūteva upanissaye eva antogadhatā hoti.
tika-s0104t:1429_12: Siddhe hi satyārambho niyamāya vā hoti atthantaraviññāpanāya vāti.
tika-s0104t:1430_2: kathaṃ sāyeva tassa paccayo siyāti? Saccaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1430_3: purimataṇhāya pana upanissayapaccayena pacchimataṇhāya daḷhabhāvato purimāyeva taṇhā pacchimāya paccayo bhavati.
tika-s0104t:1430_4: Taṇhādaḷhattameva hi “kāmupādānaṃ upāyāso upakaṭṭhā”tiādīsu viya upa-
tika-s0104t:1430_8: Atha vā apattavisayapatthanā taṇhā tamasi corānaṃ hatthapasāraṇaṃ viya,
tika-s0104t:1430_14: Ayampi tesaṃ viseso kecivādavasena ācariyadhammapālattherena dassito purimanayasseva visuddhimagge sakavādabhāvena vuttattā.
tika-s0104t:1431_4: taṃ sabbampi vuttanayena upanissayeneva saṅgahetvā “upanissayakoṭiyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1431_5: Yasmā ca taṇhāya rūpādīni assādetvā kāmesu pātabyataṃ āpajjati,
tika-s0104t:1431_10: Tasmā itaresampi tiṇṇaṃ taṇhā upanissayakoṭiyā paccayoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1432_3: Tesu upapattibhavassa catubbidhampi upādānaṃ upapattibhavahetubhūtassa kammabhavassa kāraṇabhāvato,
tika-s0104t:1432_5: Kammārammaṇakaraṇakāle pana kammasahajātamupādānaṃ upapattibhavassa ārammaṇavasena paccayo.
tika-s0104t:1432_6: Kammabhavassa pana sahajātassa sahajātamupādānaṃ sahajātaaññamaññanissayasampayuttaatthiavigatavasena ceva hetumaggavasena ca anekadhā paccayo.
tika-s0104t:1432_11: sahajātādike ca sahajātapaccaye pakkhipitvā tathāti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1432_13: Tena hi upanissayakoṭiyā ceva sahajātakoṭiyā cāti atthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1433_0: Bhavo jātiyāti ettha bhavoti kammabhavo adhippeto.
tika-s0104t:1433_5: Tena vuttaṃ “jātīti panettha savikārā pañcakkhandhā daṭṭhabbā”ti,
tika-s0104t:1433_8: kathaṃ panetaṃ jānitabbaṃ “kammabhavo jātiyā paccayo”ti ce?
tika-s0104t:1433_10: Yathāha bhagavā “kammaṃ satte vibhajati yadidaṃ hīnapaṇītatāyā”ti savikārāti nibbattivikārena savikārā,
tika-s0104t:1433_13: so eva ca tassa kāraṇaṃ bhavitumayutto taṇhāya kāmupādānassa paccayabhāve viya purimapacchimādivisesānamasambhavato,
tika-s0104t:1433_14: tasmā kammabhavoyeva upapattibhavasaṅkhātāya jātiyā kammapaccayena ceva pakatūpanissayapaccayena ca paccayoti
tika-s0104t:1433_15: atthaṃ dassetuṃ “kammapaccayaṃ upanissayeneva saṅgahetvā upanissayakoṭiyā paccayo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1433_17: jarāmaraṇādinā phuṭṭhassa ca bālassa sokādayo sambhavanti, nāsati,
tika-s0104t:1433_23: Mahāvisayattā paṭiccasamuppādavicāraṇāya niravasesā ayaṃ kuto laddhabbāti codanamapaneti “vitthārato”tiādinā.
tika-s0104t:1433_24: “Idha panassā”tiādinā pāḷiyampi paṭiccasamuppādakathā ekadeseneva kathitāti dasseti.
tika-s0104t:1433_29: idānetarahi vijjatī”tiādīsu viya aññamaññatthāvabodhanavasena sapayojanattā, matta-
tika-s0104t:1436_0: Ekadesenevidha pāḷiyaṃ kathitattā paṭiccasamuppādassa tathā kathane saddhiṃ udāharaṇena kāraṇaṃ dassento “bhagavā hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0104t:1436_1: Tena imamadhippāyaṃ dasseti “vaṭṭakathaṃ kathento bhagavā avijjā- taṇhā-
tika-s0104t:1436_3: tesu idha diṭṭhisīseneva kathento vedanāya diṭṭhiyā balavakāraṇattā vedanāmūlakaṃ ekadesameva paṭiccasamuppādaṃ kathesī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1436_4: Etāni ca suttāni aṅguttaranikāye dasanipāte tattha purimakoṭi na paññāyatīti asukassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa,
tika-s0104t:1436_6: na tato pubbeti evaṃ avijjāya purimo ādimariyādo appaṭihatassa mama sabbaññutaññāṇassāpi na paññāyati tatā mariyādassa avijjamānattāti attho.
tika-s0104t:1436_7: Evañcetanti iminā mariyādābhāvena ayaṃ avijjā kāmaṃ vuccati.
tika-s0104t:1436_8: Atha ca panāti evaṃ kālaniyamena mariyādābhāvena vuccamānāpi.
tika-s0104t:1436_9: Idappaccayāti imasmā pañcanīvaraṇasaṅkhātapaccayā avijjā sambhavatīti evaṃ dhammaniyāmena avijjāya koṭi paññāyatīti attho.
tika-s0104t:1436_11: ‘pañca nīvaraṇā’ tissa vacanīya”nti hi tattheva vuttaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1436_22: evamidhāpi vaṇṇavikāro ca vākye viya samāsepi labbhateva yathā “jānipati tudampatī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1436_24: pabhinnapaṭisambhidena āyasmatā mahākaccāyanattherena vuttameva pamāṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1437_10: taṃ kathaneneva bhagavā ete diṭṭhigatikā yāvidaṃ micchādassanaṃ na paṭinissajjanti,
tika-s0104t:1437_11: tāva iminā paccayaparamparena vaṭṭeyeva nimujjantīti dassesīti.
tika-s0104t:1439_7: “Yehī”tiādinā diṭṭhigatikānaṃ micchādassanassa kāraṇabhūtāya vedanāya paccayabhūtaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva
tika-s0104t:1439_9: Vedanākammaṭṭhāneti “vedanānaṃ samudaya”ntiādikaṃ imaṃ pāḷiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1439_14: So hi “kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo”ti paṭṭhāne vacanato kammasamuṭṭhānānampi cakkhādīnaṃ upatthambhakapaccayo hotiyeva.
tika-s0104t:1439_16: Nanu ca “nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana”nti vacanato sabbesu chasu phassāyatanesu “nāmarūpasamudayā nāmarūpanirodhā” icceva vattabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1439_19: idha pana evampi cakkhādīsu sambhavatīti visesato dassetuṃ tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1440_0: Uttaritarajānaneneva diṭṭhigatassa jānanampi siddhanti katvā pāḷiyamanāgatepi “diṭṭhiñca jānātī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1440_2: vimutti pana ida heṭṭhimā phalasamāpattiyo “yāva arahattā”ti aggaphalassa visuṃ vacanato.
tika-s0104t:1440_10: tathāpi arahato ukkaṃsagativijānanavasena desanā arahattanikūṭena niṭṭhāpitāti.
tika-s0104t:1440_11: Suvaṇṇageho viya ratanamayakaṇṇikāya desanā arahattakaṇṇikāya niṭṭhāpitāti attho.
tika-s0104t:1440_13: pajānātī”ti etena dhammassa niyyānikabhāvena saddhiṃ saṅghassa suppaṭipattiṃ dasseti,
tika-s0104t:1440_16: yāva āraddhavipassako jānātī”ti paripuṇṇaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅgho dassito,
tika-s0104t:1441_1: “Desanājālavimutto diṭṭigatiko nāma natthī”ti dassanaṃ desanāya kevalaparipuṇṇataṃ ñāpetunti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1441_3: dabbapavesanavasena antojāle akatāpi tannissitavādappavesanavasena katāti antojālīkatā,
tika-s0104t:1441_5: dabbavasena anantojālāpi tannissitavādavasena antojālā katāti antojālīkatā.
tika-s0104t:1441_10: Nissitā avasitāva hutvā ummujjamānā ummujjantīti attho. Māna-
tika-s0104t:1441_11: saddo cettha bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇattho appahīnena ummujjanabhāvena puna ummujjanabhāvassa lakkhitattā,
tika-s0104t:1442_7: Aññatthāpi hi diṭṭhigatikā ettha pariyāpannā antojālīkatāva.
tika-s0104t:1443_3: dassentoti desanākusalatāya yathāvuttesu diṭṭhigatikānaṃ ummujjananimujjanaṭṭhānabhūtesu katthacipi bhavādīsu attano anavarodhabhāvaṃ dassento.
tika-s0104t:1443_9: Gīvāyāti ettha mahājanānanti sambandhīniddeso netīti etthāpi kammabhāvena sambajjhitabbo nī-
tika-s0104t:1443_15: Jīvitapariyādāne vutteyeva hi puna appaṭisandhikabhāvo vutto nāma tasseva adassanassa padhānakāraṇattā.
tika-s0104t:1443_16: “Na dakkhantī”ti ettha anāgatavacanavasena padasiddhi “yatra hi nāma sāvako evarūpaṃ ñassati vā dakkhati
tika-s0104t:1443_17: vā sakkhiṃ vā karissatī”tiādīsu viyāti dasseti “na dakkhissantī”ti iminā.
tika-s0104t:1443_21: tato uddhampi aññabuddhuppādesu pavattati eva yathā adhunā vipassiādīnaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1443_22: Tathā hi vakkhati “vohāramattameva bhavissatī”ti paññāya cettha paṇṇādesoti neruttikā.
tika-s0104t:1445_3: Sakaṇṭako jalacārī satto idha maṇḍūko nāma,
tika-s0104t:1445_5: tassa naṅguṭṭhe aggakoṭiyaṃ ṭhito kaṇṭakotipi vadanti.
tika-s0104t:1445_8: Ettha ca vaṇṭacchede vaṇṭūpanibandhānaṃ ambapakkānaṃ ambarukkhato vicchedo viya bhavanetticchede tadupanibandhānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1445_9: khandhādīnaṃ santānato vicchedoti ettāvatāva pāḷiyamāgataṃ opammaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1446_4: tena “evampi nāma kathitasuttassā”ti vuttanayena suttassa guṇaṃ sambhāveti.
tika-s0104t:1447_6: Nanti nipātamattaṃ “na naṃ suto samaṇo gotamo”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0104t:1447_8: Sabbena sabbaṃ saṅgaṇhanato atthasaṅkhātaṃ jālametthāti atthajālaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1447_11: saṅgāmo cettha pañcahi mārehi samāgamanaṃ abhiyujjhananti āha “devaputtamārampī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1447_17: Titthiyavādanimmaddanupāyattā anuttaro saṅgāmavijayoti evampettha atthayojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0104t:1448_2: Apica nidānāvasānatoti nidānapariyosāne vuttattā nidānāvasānabhūtato “mamaṃ vā bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t:1448_6: “Nidānena ādikalyāṇa”nti vacanato pana nidānampi nigamanaṃ viya suttapariyāpannameva.
tika-s0104t:1449_1: Yathā anattamanā attano anatthacaratāya paramanā verimanā nāma honti,
tika-s0104t:1450_0: “Diso disaṃ yaṃ taṃ kayirā, verī vā pana verinaṃ;
tika-s0104t:1451_0: Micchāpaṇihitaṃ cittaṃ, pāpiyo naṃ tato kare”ti. ;
tika-s0104t:1452_1: ime pana attano atthacaratāya attamanā nāma hontīti āha “sakamanā”ti.
tika-s0104t:1453_5: Karavīkassa rutamiva mañjumadhurassaro yassāti karavīkarutamañjū, tena.
tika-s0104t:1453_6: Amatābhisekasadisenāti kāyacittadarathavūpasamakaṃ sabbasambhārābhisaṅkhataṃ udakaṃ dīghāyukatāsaṃvattanato amataṃ nāma.
tika-s0104t:1453_8: Brahmuno saro viya aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato saro yassātibrahmassaro, tena.
tika-s0104t:1453_11: Anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ abhinandantīti upagacchanti sevantīti atthoti āha “upagamanepī”ti.
tika-s0104t:1454_1: Abhinanditvāti vuttoyevattho “anumoditvā”ti iminā pakāsitoti sandhāya “anumodanepī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1455_8: Tādinoti iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu samapekkhanādīhi pañcahi kāraṇehi tādibhūtassa.
tika-s0104t:1455_13: Kiñcāpi “katamañca taṃ bhikkhave”tiādinā tattha tattha pavattāya kathetukamyatāpucchāya vissajjanavasena
tika-s0104t:1455_14: vuttattā idaṃ suttaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ nāma bhavati.
tika-s0104t:1455_16: tathāpi pucchāvissajjanāvasena pavattaṃ suttaṃ sagāthakaṃ ce,
tika-s0104t:1455_22: aṅgantaraheturahitassa ca niggāthakabhāvasseva anaññasādhāraṇato pucchāvissajjanabhāvamanapekkhitvā niggāthakabhāvameva
tika-s0104t:1455_23: veyyākaraṇahetutāya dassento “niggāthakattā hi idaṃ veyyākaraṇa”nti āha.
tika-s0104t:1456_0: Kasmāti codanaṃ sodheti “bhaññamāneti hi vutta”nti iminā.
tika-s0104t:1456_5: atha kho dvāsaṭṭhiyā ṭhānesu akampitthāti veditabbāti.
tika-s0104t:1456_6: Yadevaṃ sakalepi imasmiṃ sutte bhaññamāne akampitthāti atthoyeva sambhavati,
tika-s0104t:1456_7: na pana tassa tassa diṭṭhigatassa pariyosāne pariyosāneti atthoti?
tika-s0104t:1456_8: Nāyamanuyogo katthacipi na pavisati sambhavamatteneva anuyuñjanato,
tika-s0104t:1456_9: ayaṃ pana attho na sambhavamatteneva vutto,
tika-s0104t:1456_12: tathāruḷhanayeneva ca saṅgahakārena vuttoti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1456_13: itarathā atakkāvacarassa imassatthassa takkapariyāhatakathanaṃ anupapannaṃ siyāti.
tika-s0104t:1457_0: Aparesupīti ettha pi-saddena pāramipavicayanaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Vuttañhi buddhavaṃse –
tika-s0104t:1460_3: mahāariṭṭhattherassa vinayapiṭakasajjhāyaneti evamādīsu sāsanassa mūlāni otiṇṇānīti pītivasaṃ gatā naccantā viya ayaṃ mahāpathavī kampittha.
tika-s0104t:1460_4: Sāsanantaradhāne pana “aho īdisassa saddhammassa antaradhāna”nti domanassappattā viya yathā taṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhāne.
tika-s0104t:1462_0: Sāgaro ca sasokova, vinadī karuṇaṃ gira”nti. ;
tika-s0104t:1463_1: Paṃsukūlaggahaṇeti puṇṇaṃ nāma dāsiṃ pārupitvā āmakasusāne chaḍḍitassa sāṇamayapaṃsukūlassa tumbamatte pāṇe vidhunitvā mahāariyavaṃse ṭhatvā gahaṇe.
tika-s0104t:1464_0: “Kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca, aṭṭhi ca avasissatu;
tika-s0104t:1466_3: Paṃsukūlaggahaṇe yathā acchariyavegābhihatāti yuttaṃ viya dissati,
tika-s0104t:1466_5: Vessantarajātake pana pāramīpūraṇapuññatejena anekakkhattuṃ kampitattā akālakampanaṃ nāma bhavati.
tika-s0104t:1466_6: Sakkhinidassane kathetabbassa atthassānurūpato sakkhi viya bhavatīti vuttaṃ “sakkhibhāvenā”ti yathā taṃ māravijayakāle.
tika-s0104t:1466_7: Sādhukāradānenāti pakaraṇānurūpavasena vuttaṃ yathā taṃ dhammacakkappavattanasaṅgītikālādīsu.
tika-s0104t:1467_0: “Na kevala”ntiādinā anekatthapathavīkampanadassanamukhena imassa suttassa mahānubhāvatāyeva dassitā.
tika-s0104t:1467_2: Tañhi sāsanassa ñāṇālokasaṅkhātāya jotiyā pātubhūtaṭṭhānattā jotivananti vuccatīti vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1468_2: Sayambhunā desitassa brahmajālassa yassa suttaseṭṭhassāti yojanā.
tika-s0104t:1477_3: Tattha sādhāraṇaṃ ajjhattikasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma bhagavato mahākaruṇā.
tika-s0104t:1477_4: Tāya hi samussāhitassa lokanāthassa veneyyānaṃ dhammadesanāya cittaṃ udapādi,
tika-s0104t:1477_5: taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “sattesu kāruññataṃ paṭicca buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokesī”tiādi.
tika-s0104t:1477_6: Ettha ca tividhāvatthāyapi mahākaruṇāya saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo yāvadeva saddhammadesanāhatthadānehi saṃsāramahoghato sattasantāraṇatthaṃ taduppattito.
tika-s0104t:1477_10: sattānaṃ āsayānusayādikañca yāthāvato jānanto bhagavā ṭhānāṭṭhānādīsu kosallena veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ vicitranayadesanaṃ pavattesi.
tika-s0104t:1477_11: Bāhiraṃ pana sādhāraṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ dasasahassimahābrahmaparivārassa sahampatibrahmuno ajjhesanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1477_12: Tadajjhesanañhi pati dhammagambhīratāpaccavekkhaṇājanitaṃ appossukkataṃ paṭippassambhetvā dhammassāmī dhammadesanāya ussāhajāto ahosi.
tika-s0104t:1478_2: yena ca desanāñāṇena idaṃ suttaṃ pavattitaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1478_4: Sāmaññāvatthāya hi sādhāraṇampi samānaṃ mahākaruṇādivisesāvatthāya asādhāraṇaṃ bhavati,
tika-s0104t:1478_5: bāhiraṃ pana asādhāraṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ vaṇṇāvaṇṇabhaṇananti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1478_12: tathāgatassa ca katthacipi bhavādīsu apariyāpannatāya sattānamanavabodhopi bāhiramasādhāraṇasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1479_1: Tattha sādhāraṇaṃ anupādāparinibbānaṃ vimuttirasattā sabbāyapi bhagavato desanāya,
tika-s0104t:1479_3: etadatthā mantanā”tiādi asādhāraṇaṃ pana bāhirasamuṭṭhānato vipariyāyena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1479_4: Nindāpasaṃsāsu hi sattānanveneyyāghātānandādibhāvappattiādikaṃ imissā desanāya phalabhūtaṃ kāraṇabhāvena imaṃ desanaṃ payojeti.
tika-s0104t:1479_5: Phalañhi taduppādakasattiyā kāraṇaṃ payojeti nāma phale satiyeva tāya sattiyā kāraṇabhāvappattito.
tika-s0104t:1479_6: Atha vā yathāvuttaṃ phalaṃ imāya desanāya bhagavantaṃ payojetīti ācariyasāriputtattherena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1479_8: taṃ ākaṅkhitabbattā desanāya desakaṃ payojeti nāma.
tika-s0104t:1481_1: samudāyena ca suttapadena yathāsambhavaṃ saṅgahito attho.
tika-s0104t:1481_2: Āghātādīnaṃ akaraṇīyatāvacanena hi dassitaṃ paṭiññānurūpaṃ samaṇasaññāya niyojanaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1488_0: Sakalena pana suttapadena dassito iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu bhagavato tādibhāvo,
tika-s0104t:1488_8: dasanāthakadhammapatiṭṭhāpananti evamādayo yathāsambhavaṃ saṅgahetvā dassetabbā atthā piṇḍattho.
tika-s0104t:1491_4: vedanāphassāyatanādimukhena ca gahitesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu taṇhāvajjitā pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhasaccaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1491_7: “vedanāpaccayā taṇhā”ti ca padehi samudayaggahaṇenañca pāḷiyaṃ sarūpena gahitameva.
tika-s0104t:1492_8: tattha tattha samudayaggahaṇena cāti saṅkhepato sabbalokiyakusalākusaladhammavibhāvanapadehi gahitā dhammakilesā samudayasaccaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1492_10: Tassa pana tattha tattha vedanānaṃ atthaṅgamanissaraṇapariyāyehi paccattaṃ nibbutivacanena,
tika-s0104t:1492_13: Tassapi tattha tattha vedanānaṃ samudayādīni yathābhūtapaṭivedhanāpadesena channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayādīni yathābhūtapajānanapariyāyena,
tika-s0104t:1493_6: Yañhi desanāya sādhetabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttaṃ payojanaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1493_10: āghātādiphalassa ca anaññasantānabhāvitā nindāpasaṃsāsu yathāsabhāvaṃ paṭijānananibbeṭhanānīti evaṃ taṃtaṃpayojanādhigamahetu upāyo.
tika-s0104t:1493_11: Āghātādīnaṃ karaṇapaṭisedhanādiapadesena atthakāmehi tato cittaṃ sādhukaṃ rakkhitabbanti ayaṃ āṇārahassa dhammarājassa āṇattīti.
tika-s0104t:1499_18: tassā ca līnatthavibhāvanaṃ anugantvā ayamattho viññunā vibhāvetunti na vitthārayimha.
tika-s0104t:1500_0: “Tatra ce tumhe assatha kupitā vā anattamanā vā,
tika-s0104t:1500_1: api nu tumhe paresaṃ subhāsitaṃ dubbhāsitaṃ ājāneyyāthā”ti ayaṃ anumatipucchā.
tika-s0104t:1500_5: paccuppannavisayāti evaṃ sabbattha yathāsambhavaṃ pucchāvicayanaṃ pucchāvicayo.
tika-s0104t:1500_9: lokiyanti evaṃ sabbassāpi vissajjanassa yathārahaṃ vicayanaṃ vissajjanāvicayo.
tika-s0104t:1501_1: na cetaso anabhiraddhi karaṇīyā”ti imāya paṭhamadesanāya “mamaṃ vā…pe…
tika-s0104t:1501_2: tumhaṃyevassa tena antarāyo”ti ayaṃ dutiyadesanā saṃsandati. Kasmā?
tika-s0104t:1501_3: Paṭhamāya manopadosaṃ nivāretvā dutiyāya tatthādīnavassa dassitattā.
tika-s0104t:1501_5: api nu tumhe paresaṃ subhāsitaṃ dubbhāsitaṃ ājāneyyāthā”ti ayaṃ tatiyadesanā saṃsandati. Kasmā?
tika-s0104t:1501_6: Dutiyāya tatthādīnavaṃ dassetvā tatiyāya vacanatthasallakkhaṇamattepi asamatthabhāvassa dassitattā.
tika-s0104t:1501_8: na ca panetaṃ amhesu saṃvijjatī”ti ayaṃ catutthadesanā saṃsandati. Kasmā?
tika-s0104t:1501_9: Tatiyāya manopadosaṃ sabbathā nivāretvā catutthāya avaṇṇaṭṭhāne paṭipajjitabbākārassa dassitattāti iminā
tika-s0104t:1501_10: nayena pubbena aparaṃ saṃsanditvā vicayanaṃ pubbāparavicayo.
tika-s0104t:1502_0: “Api nu tumhe paresaṃ subhāsitaṃ dubbhāsitaṃ ājāneyyāthā”ti imāya pucchāya “no hetaṃ bhante”ti ayaṃ vissajjanā sameti.
tika-s0104t:1502_1: Kupito hi neva buddhapaccekabuddhaariyasāvakānaṃ na mātāpitūnaṃ na paccatthikānaṃ subhāsitadubbhāsitassa atthaṃ ājānāti.
tika-s0104t:1502_4: tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno vadeyyā”ti imāya pucchāya “pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato”tiādikā ayaṃ vissajjanā sameti.
tika-s0104t:1502_11: Sabbaññutaññāṇaguṇā hi aññatra tathāgatā aññesaṃ ñāṇena alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhattā gambhīrā duddasā duranubodhā
tika-s0104t:1502_12: santā paṇītā atakkāvacarā nipuṇā paṇḍitavedanīyāti iminā nayena vissajjanāya pucchānurūpatāvicayanameva
tika-s0104t:1504_4: Bhikkhaveti āmantananiddeso yujjati tadattheyeva etassa payogassa dissanato,
tika-s0104t:1504_5: desakassa ca paṭiggāhakāpekkhatoti evamādinā byañjanato ca –
tika-s0104t:1505_0: Sabbena sabbaṃ āghātādīnamakaraṇaṃ tādibhāvāya saṃvattatīti yujjati iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu samappavattisabbhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1505_2: tannimittakā antarāyā tasseva sampattivibandhāya saṃvattantīti yujjati kammānaṃ santānantaresu asaṅkamanato.
tika-s0104t:1505_3: Cittamabhibhavitvā uppannā āghātādayo subhāsitadubbhāsitasallakkhaṇepi asamatthatāya saṃvattantīti yujjati kodhalobhānaṃ andhatamasabhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1505_4: Pāṇātipātādidussīlyato veramaṇī sabbasattānaṃ pāmojjapāsaṃsāya saṃvattatīti yujjati sīlasampattiyā mahato kittisaddassa abbhuggatattā.
tika-s0104t:1505_5: Gambhīratādivisesayuttena guṇena tathāgatassa vaṇṇanā ekadesabhūtāpi sakalasabbaññuguṇaggahaṇāya saṃvattatīti yujjati anaññasādhāraṇattā.
tika-s0104t:1505_6: Tajjāayonisomanasikāraparikkhatāni adhigamatakkanāni sassatavādādiabhinivesāya saṃvattantīti yujjati kappanajālassa asamugghāṭitattā.
tika-s0104t:1505_7: Vedanādīnaṃ anavabodhena vedanāpaccayā taṇhā vaḍḍhatīti yujjati assādānupassanāsabbhāvato,
tika-s0104t:1505_9: sassatādigāho ca viparipphandatīti yujjati kāraṇassa sannihitattā.
tika-s0104t:1505_12: tadanucchavikañca vedanaṃ vedayantānaṃ phasso hetūti yujjati visayindriyaviññāṇasaṅgatiyā vinā tadabhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1505_13: Chaphassāyatananimittaṃ vaṭṭassa anupacchedoti yujjati tattha avijjātaṇhānaṃ appahīnattā.
tika-s0104t:1505_14: Channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayatthaṅgamādipajānanā sabbadiṭṭhigatikasaññaṃ aticca tiṭṭhatīti yujjati catusaccapaṭivedhabhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1505_15: Imāhiyeva dvāsaṭṭhiyā sabbadiṭṭhigatānaṃ antojālīkatabhāvoti yujjati akiriyavādādīnaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1505_18: Ucchinnabhavanettiko tathāgatassa kāyoti yujjati bhagavato abhinīhārasampattiyā catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu
tika-s0104t:1505_20: Kāyassa bhedā parinibbutaṃ na dakkhantīti yujjati anupādisesanibbānappattiyaṃ rūpādīsu kassacipi anavasesatoti
tika-s0104t:1505_21: iminā nayena atthato ca sutte byañjanatthānaṃ yuttitāvibhāvanalakkhaṇo yuttihāro nāma yathāha “sabbesaṃ hārānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1507_9: Sabbāyapi diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhupādānabhāvato sā yathārahaṃ navavidhassapi bhavassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1507_13: Vedanānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samudayatthaṅgamādipaṭivedhanā catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ anubodhapaṭivedho hoti.
tika-s0104t:1507_19: Yāva vedanā taṇhāya padaṭṭhānanti netvā tesaṃ “vedanāpaccayā taṇhā”tiādinā pāḷiyamāgatanayena sambajjhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1507_21: “Tadapi phassapaccayā”ti ettha sassatādipaññāpanaṃ paresaṃ micchābhinivesassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1507_26: Channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samudayādipajānanaṃ nibbidāya padaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1507_31: tesañca padaṭṭhānadhammāti yathāsambhavaṃ padaṭṭhānadhammaniddhāraṇalakkhaṇo padaṭṭhānahāro nāma.
tika-s0104t:1509_2: Tathā āghātaggahaṇena avasiṭṭhaganthanīvaraṇānaṃ saṅgaho kāyaganthanīvaraṇalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattā.
tika-s0104t:1509_6: “Vedanāna”nti ettha vedanāggahaṇena avasiṭṭhaupādānakkhandhānaṃ saṅgaho upādānakkhandhalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattā.
tika-s0104t:1509_10: “Ajānataṃ apassata”nti ettha avijjāggahaṇena hetuāsavoghayoganīvaraṇādīnaṃ saṅgaho hetādilakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattā,
tika-s0104t:1509_12: “Tadapi phassapaccayā”ti ettha phassaggahaṇena saññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇānaṃ saṅgaho vipallāsahetubhāvena,
tika-s0104t:1509_16: Bhavanettiggahaṇena avijjādīnaṃ saṃkilesadhammānaṃ saṅgaho vaṭṭahetubhāvena ekalakkhaṇattāti.
tika-s0104t:1509_17: Ayaṃ sutte anāgatepi dhamme ekalakkhaṇatādinā āgate viya niddhāraṇalakkhaṇo lakkhaṇahāro nāma.
tika-s0104t:1511_7: tassā līnatthavibhāvanīvasena ca suviññeyyattā ativitthārabhayena na vitthārayimha.
tika-s0104t:1511_8: Ye te nindāpasaṃsāhi sammākampitacetasā micchājīvato anoratā sassatādimicchābhinivesino sīlādidhammakkhandhesu
tika-s0104t:1511_10: te kathaṃ nu kho yathāvuttadosavinimuttā sammāpaṭipattiyā ubhayahitaparā bhaveyyunti ayamettha bhagavato adhippāyo.
tika-s0104t:1511_12: desanābhājanaṭṭhāne ca dassitā imissā desanāya nidānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1512_1: Tattha “mama”nti etassa “avaṇṇa”nti iminā sambandhotiādinā padassa padantarena sambandho padasandhi.
tika-s0104t:1512_2: “Mama”nti vuttassa bhagavato “avaṇṇa”nti vuttena parehi upavaditena aguṇenasambandhotiādinā padatthassa padatthantarena sambandho padatthasandhi.
tika-s0104t:1512_4: pare avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyu”ntiādidesanā suppiyena paribbājakena vuttaavaṇṇānusandhivasena pavattā.
tika-s0104t:1512_6: pare vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyu”ntiādidesanā brahmadattena māṇavena vuttavaṇṇānusandhivasena pavattā.
tika-s0104t:1512_8: aññeva dhammā gambhīrā duddasā duranubodhā”tiādidesanā bhikkhūhi vuttavaṇṇānusandhivasena pavattāti evaṃ
tika-s0104t:1512_12: Suttasandhi ca tividhasuttānusandhivasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ eva vicāritā,
tika-s0104t:1512_14: Ekissā desanāya desanāntarehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanaṃ desanāsandhi,
tika-s0104t:1512_17: na cetaso anabhiraddhi karaṇīyā”ti ayaṃ desanā “ubhatodaṇḍakena cepi bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t:1512_20: na me so tena sāsanakaro”ti imāya desanāya saddhiṃ saṃsandati.
tika-s0104t:1512_21: “Tumhaṃyevassa tena anantarāyo”ti ayaṃ “kammassakā māṇava sattā kammadāyādā kammayonī kammabandhū kammapaṭisaraṇā kammaṃ satte vibhajati,
tika-s0104t:1513_0: “Kuddho atthaṃ na jānāti, kuddho dhammaṃ na passati;
tika-s0104t:1514_0: Andhaṃ tamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ kodho sahate nara”nti. ; –
tika-s0104t:1515_3: na cetaso ubbilāvitattaṃ karaṇīya”nti ayaṃ “dhammāpi vo bhikkhave,
tika-s0104t:1516_0: “Luddho atthaṃ na jānāti, luddho dhammaṃ na passati;
tika-s0104t:1517_0: Andhaṃ tamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ lobho sahate nara”nti. ca –
tika-s0104t:1521_3: ayampi kho brāhmaṇa yañño purimehi yaññehi appaṭṭhataro ca appasamārambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahānisaṃsataro
tika-s0104t:1521_4: cā”ti imāya paṭhamajjhānassa sīlato mahapphalamahānisaṃsataratāvacanena jhānato sīlassa appaphalaappānisaṃsatarabhāvadīpanato.
tika-s0104t:1522_0: “Pāṇātipātaṃ pahāyā”tiādidesanā “samaṇo khalu bho gotamo sīlavā ariyasīlena samannāgato”tiādidesanāya,
tika-s0104t:1522_1: “aññeva dhammā gambhīrā”tiādidesanā “adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo gambhīro duddaso duranubodho”tiādidesanāya,
tika-s0104t:1523_3: abhivadanti sassato attā ca loko ca,
tika-s0104t:1523_7: nevasassato ca nāsassato ca, antavā, anantavā,
tika-s0104t:1523_9: nevantavā ca nānantavā ca attā ca loko ca,
tika-s0104t:1524_2: abhivadanti saññī attā hoti arogo paraṃ maraṇā.
tika-s0104t:1524_5: nevasaññī ca nāsaññī ca attā hoti arogo paraṃ maraṇā.
tika-s0104t:1524_6: Ittheke abhivadanti sato vā pana sattassa ucchedaṃ vināsaṃ vibhavaṃ paññapenti,
tika-s0104t:1524_11: atthetanti iti viditvā tassa nissaraṇadassāvī tathāgato tadupātivatto”tiādidesanāya,
tika-s0104t:1524_13: vipphanditamevā”ti ayaṃ “idaṃ tesaṃ vata aññatreva saddhāya aññatra ruciyā aññatra anussavā aññatra ākāraparivitakkā
tika-s0104t:1524_14: aññatra diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā paccattaṃyeva ñāṇaṃ bhavissati parisuddhaṃ pariyodāta’nti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
tika-s0104t:1524_16: ñāṇe asati parisuddhe pariyodāte yadapi te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā tattha ñāṇabhāvamattameva pariyodāpenti,
tika-s0104t:1524_18: “tadapi phassapaccayā”ti ayaṃ “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1524_23: “chandamūlakā ime āvuso dhammā manasikārasamuṭṭhānā phassasamodhānā vedanāsamosaraṇā”ti (pariyesitabbaṃ) ca ādidesanāya,
tika-s0104t:1524_30: so evaṃ asamanupassanto na kiñci loke upādiyati,
tika-s0104t:1524_33: “sabbete imeheva dvāsaṭṭhiyā vatthūhi antojālīkatā”tiādidesanā “ye hi keci bhikkhave…pe…
tika-s0104t:1524_35: sabbete imāneva pañca kāyāni abhivadanti etesaṃ vā aññatara”ntiādidesanāya,
tika-s0104t:1531_16: tena ca nava ayonisomanasikāramūlakā dhammā āvattanti.
tika-s0104t:1531_17: “Taṇhāgatānaṃ paritassitavipphandita”nti ettha taṇhāggahaṇena nava taṇhāmūlakā dhammā āvattanti.
tika-s0104t:1531_23: tena bhagavato sakalasaṃkilesappahānaṃ āvattatīti ayaṃ desanāya gahitadhammānaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgadhammavasena āvattanalakkhaṇo āvattahāro nāma.
tika-s0104t:1533_2: Yehi pana dhammehi āghātānandādīnaṃ akaraṇaṃ appavatti,
tika-s0104t:1533_7: tathā pāṇātipātādīhi paṭivirati kusalā vā abyākatā vā,
tika-s0104t:1533_13: aññeva dhammā gambhīrā”ti vuttadhammā siyā kusalā,
tika-s0104t:1533_24: Visesato pana santatighanavinibbhogābhāvato ekattanayassa micchāgāho atītajātianussaraṇatakkasahito sassatadiṭṭhiyā padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1533_25: Hetuphalabhāvena sambandhabhāvassa aggahaṇato nānattanayassa micchāgāho tajjāsamannāhārasahito ucchedadiṭṭhiyā padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1534_9: tesaṃ “aññeva dhammā gambhīrā”ti ettha vuttanayena dhammādivibhāgo netabbo.
tika-s0104t:1534_14: “Tadapi phassapaccayā”ti ettha phassassa vedanāya viya dhammādivibhāgo veditabbo.
tika-s0104t:1534_15: Iminā nayena phassāyatanādīnampi yathārahaṃ dhammādivibhāgo netabboti ayaṃ saṃkilesadhamme,
tika-s0104t:1536_7: Gambhīratādivisesayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ veneyyānaṃ yathārahaṃ vijjābhiññādiguṇavisesamāvahati sabbaññeyyassa yathāsabhāvāvabodhato.
tika-s0104t:1536_8: Tathā gambhīratādivisesarahitaṃ pana ñāṇaṃ ñeyyesu sādhāraṇabhāvato yathāvuttaguṇavisesaṃ nāvahati.
tika-s0104t:1536_9: Sabbāpi cetā diṭṭhiyo yathārahaṃ sassatucchedabhāvato antadvayabhūtā sakkāyatīraṃ nātivattanti aniyyānikasabhāvattā.
tika-s0104t:1536_10: Sammādiṭṭhi pana saparikkhārā majjhimapaṭipadābhūtā sakkāyatīramatikkamma pāraṃ gacchati niyyānikasabhāvattā.
tika-s0104t:1536_12: Vedanānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samudayādiasampaṭivedho saṃsāracārakāvarodhamāvahati saṅkhārānaṃ paccayabhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1536_16: Micchābhinivese ayonisomanasikārasahitā taṇhā anekavihitaṃ diṭṭhijālaṃ pasāreti.
tika-s0104t:1536_18: Sassatavādādipaññāpanassa phasso paccayo asati phasse tadabhāvato.
tika-s0104t:1536_21: tesaṃ pana tathā apariññā diṭṭhidassanaṃ nātivattati.
tika-s0104t:1536_23: asamucchinnāya bhavanettiyā anāgate bhavappabandho parivattatiyevāti ayaṃ sutte niddiṭṭhānaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-s0104t:1538_16: Iminā nayena sabbapadesu vevacanaṃ vattabbanti ayaṃ tassa tassa atthassa taṃtaṃpariyāyasaddayojanālakkhaṇo vevacanahāro nāma.
tika-s0104t:1540_4: Pīti sāmaññato pana khuddikādivasena pañcadhā paññatto.
tika-s0104t:1541_8: “Appaccayo”ti domanassassavevacanapaññattītiādivasena ca paññattibhedo vibhajjitabboti ayaṃ ekekassa
