tika-s0104t:1541_9: dhammassa anekāhi paññattīhi paññapetabbākāravibhāvanalakkhaṇo paññattihāro nāma,
tika-s0104t:1543_18: koci jhānavasena koci maggavasenāpi paccayoti ayampi viseso veditabboti idaṃ paṭiccasamuppādamukhena otaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1543_19: Imināva nayena ānandādīnampi khandhādimukhena otaraṇaṃ vibhāvetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1544_3: tadupakārakadhammānañca lajjādayādīnaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhadhammāyatanādīsu saṅgahato purimanayeneva khandhādimukhena otaraṇaṃ vibhāvetabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1544_5: Nissaraṇānupādāvimuttiggahaṇesu pana asaṅkhatadhātuvasenapi dhātumukhena otaraṇaṃ vibhāvetabbaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1544_8: satipaṭṭhānādayo ca bodhipakkhiyadhammā pakāsitā hontīti taṃmukhenapi otaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0104t:1544_14: Ayaṃ paṭiccasamuppādādimukhehi suttatthassa otaraṇalakkhaṇo otaraṇahāro nāma.
tika-s0104t:1546_2: “Dhammassa vā avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ saṅghassa vā avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyu”nti padasuddhi,
tika-s0104t:1546_6: na cetaso anabhiraddhi karaṇīyā”ti padasuddhi ceva ārambhasuddhi ca.
tika-s0104t:1547_7: “Ime kho”tiādi padasuddhi ceva pucchāsuddhi ca ārambhasuddhi ca.
tika-s0104t:1549_2: Dhammassa vā saṅghassa vāti pakkhepi esa nayo.
tika-s0104t:1549_10: Iminā nayena sabbattha yathādesitameva sāmaññavisesā niddhāretabbā.
tika-s0104t:1549_11: Ayaṃ suttāgatānaṃ dhammānaṃ avikappanāvasena yathādesitameva sāmaññavisesaniddhāraṇalakkhaṇo adhiṭṭhānahāro nāma,
tika-s0104t:1551_0: Āghātādīnaṃ “anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādīni ekūnavīsati āghātavatthūni hetu.
tika-s0104t:1551_7: asaddhammassavanaṃ micchābhinivesena ayonisomanasikāro ca avisesena hetu.
tika-s0104t:1551_16: Bhavanettisamucchedassa visuddhibhāvanā hetūti ayaṃ parikkhārasaṅkhāte hetupaccaye niddhāretvā saṃvaṇṇanālakkhaṇo parikkhārahāro nāma,
tika-s0104t:1553_5: yathābhūtaṃ viditvā anupādāvimutto”ti ca etehi samādhisampadāya saddhiṃ vijjāvimuttivasībhāvasampadā dassitā.
tika-s0104t:1554_1: Sassatavādādivibhāgadassanaṃ pana diṭṭhiyā pariyāyavacananti ayaṃ vevacanasamāropanā.
tika-s0104t:1556_0: Sīlādidhammakkhandhehi samathavipassanābhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchati pahānattayasiddhitoti ayaṃ bhāvanāsamāropanā.
tika-s0104t:1560_2: sammohe ca “anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādinā āghāto jāyati, nāsati.
tika-s0104t:1560_6: yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”tiādivacanehi ca taṇhāvijjānaṃ accantappahānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0104t:1560_8: “ajānataṃ apassata”ntiādipadehi ca sarūpatopi dassitānaṃ taṇhāvijjānaṃ rūpadhammā,
tika-s0104t:1560_10: Yathākkamaṃ samatho ca vipassanā ca paṭipakkho,
tika-s0104t:1561_5: vipassanāpakkhiyānañca aniccasaññādīnaṃ vasenāti ayaṃ taṇhāvijjāhi saṃkilesapakkhaṃ suttatthaṃ samathavipassanāhi
tika-s0104t:1561_6: ca vodānapakkhaṃ catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇassa nandiyāvaṭṭanayassa bhūmi.
tika-s0104t:1563_7: Iti tīhi akusalamūlehi gahitehi tappaṭipakkhato āghātādīnamakaraṇavacanena ca tīṇi kusalamūlāni siddhāniyeva honti.
tika-s0104t:1563_8: Tattha tīhi akusalamūlehi tividhaduccaritasaṃkilesamalavisamākusalasaññāvitakkapañcādivasena sabbopi akusalapakkho vitthāretabbo.
tika-s0104t:1564_3: tehi pana nibbattā tesamadhiṭṭhānagocarabhūtā upādānakkhandhā dukkhasaccaṃ,
tika-s0104t:1564_7: kusalamūlehi ca vodānapakkhaṃ catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇassa tipukkhalanayassa bhūmi.
tika-s0104t:1568_7: Tattha ca ādīnavānisaṃse sallakkhetvā sāvajjaṃ pahāya anavajjaṃ samādāya vattati.
tika-s0104t:1568_11: Paññavā hi yathābhūtāvabodho samāhito ca yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti.
tika-s0104t:1569_5: Sabbeheva diṭṭhippakāsanapadehi anattani “attā”ti vipallāsoti evamettha cattāro vipallāsā siddhā honti,
tika-s0104t:1569_7: Tattha catūhi yathāvuttehi indriyehi cattāro puggalā niddisitabbā.
tika-s0104t:1569_8: Kathaṃ duvidho hi taṇhācarito mudindriyo tikkhindriyoti,
tika-s0104t:1569_10: Tesu paṭhamo asubhe “subha”nti vipallatthadiṭṭhiko satibalena yathābhūtaṃ kāyasabhāvaṃ sallakkhetvā sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamati.
tika-s0104t:1569_11: Dutiyo asukhe “sukha”nti vipallatthadiṭṭhiko “uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”tiādinā vuttena vīriyasaṃvarasaṅkhātena
tika-s0104t:1569_13: Tatiyo anicce “nicca”nti vipallatthadiṭṭhiko samādhibalena samāhitabhāvato saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikabhāvaṃ yathābhūtaṃ paṭivijjhati.
tika-s0104t:1569_16: Catūhi cettha vipallāsehi caturāsavoghayogaganthaagatitaṇhuppādupādānasattaviññāṇaṭṭhitiapariññādivasena sabbopi akusalapakkho netabbo.
tika-s0104t:1569_17: Tathā catūhi satipaṭṭhānehi catubbidhajhānavihārādhiṭṭhānasukhabhāgiyadhammaappamaññāsammappadhānaiddhipādādivasena sabbopi vodānapakkho netabbo.
tika-s0104t:1570_7: saddhindriyādīhi vodānapakkhaṃ catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇassa sīhavikkīḷitanayassa bhūmi,
tika-s0104t:1572_0: Iti tiṇṇaṃ atthanayānaṃ siddhiyā vohāranayadvayampi siddhameva hoti.
tika-s0104t:1572_3: Tasmā yathāvuttanayena atthanayānaṃ disābhūtadhammasamālokananayanavasena tampi nayadvayaṃ yojetabbanti,
tika-s0104t:1575_0: Idaṃ pana suttaṃ soḷasavidhe sāsanapaṭṭhāne saṃkilesavāsanāsekkhabhāgiyaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhādisaṃkilesānaṃ sīlādipuññakiriyassa,
tika-s0104t:1575_2: saṃkilesavāsanānibbedhāsekkhabhāgiyameva vā yathāvuttatthānaṃ sekkhasīlakkhandhādikassa ca vibhattattā.
tika-s0104t:1575_3: Aṭṭhavīsatividhe pana sāsanapaṭṭhāne lokiyalokuttaraṃ sattadhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ ñāṇañeyyaṃ dassanabhāvanaṃ
tika-s0104t:1575_4: sakavacanaparavacanaṃ vissajjanīyāvissajjanīyaṃ kammavipākaṃ kusalākusalaṃ anuññātapaṭikkhittaṃ bhavo
tika-s0104t:1577_3: mahādhammarājādhirājagarunā katāya sādhuvilāsiniyā nāma līnatthapakāsaniyā brahmajālasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthavibhāvanā.
